GP12garup1_u:4: oṃ nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam /
GP12garup1_u:5: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayamudīrayet // GarP_Mang.1 //
GP12garup1_u:6: oṃ ajamajaramanantaṃ jñānarūpaṃ mahāntaṃ śivamamalamanādiṃ bhūtadehādihīnam /
GP12garup1_u:7: sakalakaraṇahīnaṃ sarvabhūtasthitaṃ taṃ harimamalamamāyaṃ sarvagaṃ vanda ekam // GarP_1,1.1
GP12garup1_u:8: namasyāmi hariṃ rudraṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca gaṇādhipam /
GP12garup1_u:9: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva manovākkarmabhiḥ sadā // GarP_1,1.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15: munayo ravisaṅkāśāḥ śāntā yajña parāyaṇāḥ // GarP_1,1.5 //
GP12garup1_u:17: sūta ! jānāsi sarvaṃ tvaṃ pṛcchāmastvāmato vayam /
GP12garup1_u:18: devatānāṃ hi ko deva īśvaraḥ pūjya eva kaḥ // GarP_1,1.6 //
GP12garup1_u:19: ko dhyeyaḥ ko jagatsraṣṭā jagatpātti ca hanti kaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:20: kasmātpravartate dharmo duṣṭahantā ca kaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,1.7 //
GP12garup1_u:21: tasya devasya kiṃ rūpaṃ jagatsargaḥ kathaṃ mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:22: kairvrataiḥ sa tu tuṣṭaḥ syātkena yogena vāpyate // GarP_1,1.8 //
GP12garup1_u:24: varṇāśramādidharmāṇāṃ kaḥ pātā kaḥ pravartakaḥ // GarP_1,1.9 //
GP12garup1_u:28: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ vakṣye sāraṃ viṣṇukathā śrayam /
GP12garup1_u:29: garuḍoktaṃ kaśyapāya purā vyāsācchrutaṃ mayā // GarP_1,1.11 //
GP12garup1_u:31: paramātmā paraṃ brahma janmādyasya yato bhavet // GarP_1,1.12 //
GP12garup1_u:34: hariḥ sa prathamaṃ devaḥ kaumāraṃ sargamāsthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:39: tantraṃ sātvatamācaṣṭe naiṣkarmyaṃ karmaṇāṃ yataḥ // GarP_1,1.16 //
GP12garup1_u:40: naranārāyaṇo bhūtvā turye tepe tapo hariḥ /
GP12garup1_u:41: dharmasaṃ rakṣaṇārthāya pūjitaḥ sa surāsuraiḥ // GarP_1,1.17 //
GP12garup1_u:43: provāca sūraye sāṅkhyaṃ tattvagrāmavi nirṇayam // GarP_1,1.18 //
GP12garup1_u:55: dadhre kamaṭharūpeṇa pṛṣṭha ekādaśe vibhuḥ // GarP_1,1.24 //
GP12garup1_u:63: triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ kupito niḥ kṣattrāmakaronmahīm // GarP_1,1.28 //
GP12garup1_u:65: cakre vedataroḥ śākhāṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃso 'lpamedhasaḥ // GarP_1,1.29 //
GP12garup1_u:71: buddho nāmrā jinasutaḥ kīkaṭeṣu bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,1.32 //
GP12garup1_u:73: bhavitā viṣṇuyaśaso nāmnā kalkī jagatpatiḥ // GarP_1,1.33 //
GP12garup1_u:75: manuvedavido hyādyāḥ sarve viṣṇukalāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,1.34 //
GP12garup1_u:77: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ vyāsaḥ purāsau me 'bravīdidam // GarP_1,1.35 //
GP12garup1_u:78: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye karmakāṇḍe etatpurāṇapravṛttihetunirūpaṇaṃ nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:81: kathaṃ vyāsena kathitaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava /
GP12garup1_u:84: ahaṃ hi munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ gato badarikāśramam /
GP12garup1_u:85: tatra dṛṣṭo mayā vyāso dhyāyamānaḥ pareśvaram // GarP_1,2.2 //
GP12garup1_u:88: vyāsa brūhi hare rūpaṃ jagatsargādikaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,2.3 //
GP12garup1_u:89: manye dhyāyasi taṃ yasmāttasmājjānāsi taṃ vibhum /
GP12garup1_u:90: evaṃ pṛṣṭo yathā prāha tathā viprā?nibodhata // GarP_1,2.4 //
GP12garup1_u:92: śṛṇu sūta ! pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava /
GP12garup1_u:96: brahmā śrīgāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ sāravācakam // GarP_1,2.6 //
GP12garup1_u:98: ahaṃ hi nārado dakṣo bhṛgvādyāḥ praṇipatya tam /
GP12garup1_u:101: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ rudraṃ ca māṃ yathā /
GP12garup1_u:104: kathaṃ rudraṃ suraiḥ sārdhamabravīdvai hariḥ purā /
GP12garup1_u:105: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ brūhi brahmanmahārthakam // GarP_1,2.9 //
GP12garup1_u:108: tatra dṛṣṭo mayā rudro dhyāyamānaḥ paraṃ padam // GarP_1,2.10 //
GP12garup1_u:109: pṛṣṭo namaskṛtaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ devaṃ dhyāyasi śaṅkara? /
GP12garup1_u:110: tvatto nānyaṃ paraṃ devaṃ jānāmi brūhi māṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,2.11 //
GP12garup1_u:113: ahaṃ dhyāyāmi taṃ viṣṇuṃ paramātmānamīśvaram // GarP_1,2.12 //
GP12garup1_u:117: tameva gatvā pṛcchāmaḥ sāraṃ yaṃ cintayāmyaham // GarP_1,2.14 //
GP12garup1_u:119: śuciṃ śuciṣadaṃ haṃsaṃ tatpadaṃ parameśvaram // GarP_1,2.15 //
GP12garup1_u:121: yasminviśvāni bhūtāni tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca // GarP_1,2.16 //
GP12garup1_u:125: garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasāmapi // GarP_1,2.18 //
GP12garup1_u:127: gṛṇanti satyakarmāṇaṃ satyaṃ satyeṣu sāmasu // GarP_1,2.19 //
GP12garup1_u:128: purāṇa puruṣaḥ prokto brahmā prokto dvijātiṣu /
GP12garup1_u:133: yasyāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhā khaṃ nābhiścaraṇau kṣitiḥ // GarP_1,2.22 //
GP12garup1_u:134: candrādityau ca nayane taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham /
GP12garup1_u:135: yasya trilokī jaṭhare masya kāṣṭhāśca bāhavaḥ // GarP_1,2.23 //
GP12garup1_u:137: yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā nadyaḥ sarvāṅgasandhiṣu // GarP_1,2.24 //
GP12garup1_u:143: padybhāṃ yasya kṣitirjātā śrotrābhyāṃ ca tathā diśaḥ // GarP_1,2.27 //
GP12garup1_u:145: sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca // GarP_1,2.28 //
GP12garup1_u:150: stutvā praṇamya taṃ viṣṇuṃ śrotukāma sthitaḥ suraiḥ // GarP_1,2.30 //
GP12garup1_u:152: sārāntsārataraṃ viṣṇuṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstaṃ praṇamya vai // GarP_1,2.31 //
GP12garup1_u:154: yathā papraccha māṃ vyāsa stathāsau bhagavān bhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:155: papraccha viṣṇuṃ devādyaiḥ śṛṇvatāmamaraiḥ saha // GarP_1,2.32 //
GP12garup1_u:157: hare kathaya deveśa ! devadevaḥ ka īśvaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:158: ko dhyeyaḥ kaśca vai pūjyaḥ kairvratai stuṣyate paraḥ // GarP_1,2.33 //
GP12garup1_u:159: kairdharmaiḥ kaiśca niyamaiḥ kayā vā dharmapūjayā /
GP12garup1_u:160: kenācāreṇa tuṣṭaḥ syātkiṃ tadrūpaṃ ca tasya vai // GarP_1,2.34 //
GP12garup1_u:169: śṛṇu rudra ! pravakṣyāmi brahmaṇā ca suraiḥ saha // GarP_1,2.38 //
GP12garup1_u:171: ahaṃ dhyeyaśca pūjyaśca stutyohaṃ statibhiḥ suraiḥ // GarP_1,2.39 //
GP12garup1_u:172: ahaṃ hi pūjito rudra ! dadāmi paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:173: niyamaiśca vrataistuṣṭa ācāreṇa ca mānavaiḥ // GarP_1,2.40 //
GP12garup1_u:175: duṣṭanigrahakartā hi dharmagoptā tvahaṃ hara ! // GarP_1,2.41 //
GP12garup1_u:177: ahaṃ mantrāśca mantrārthaḥ pūjādhyānaparo hyaham // GarP_1,2.42 //
GP12garup1_u:180: jñātā śrotā tathā mantā vaktā vaktavyameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:181: sarvaḥ sarvātmako devo bhuktimuktikaraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,2.44 //
GP12garup1_u:183: itihāsānyahaṃ rudra ! sarvavedā hyahaṃ śiva ! // GarP_1,2.45 //
GP12garup1_u:185: ahaṃ brahmā sarvalokaḥ sarvadevātmako hyaham // GarP_1,2.46 //
GP12garup1_u:188: yamo 'haṃ niyamo rudra ! vratāni vividhāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:189: ahaṃ sūryastathā candro maṅgalādīnyahaṃ tathā // GarP_1,2.48 //
GP12garup1_u:191: tuṣṭa ūce varaṃ brūhi matto vavre varaṃ sa tu // GarP_1,2.49 //
GP12garup1_u:193: mama mātā ca vinatā nāgairdāsīkṛtā hare /
GP12garup1_u:194: yathāhaṃ deva tāñjitvā cāmṛtaṃ hyānayāmi tat // GarP_1,2.50 //
GP12garup1_u:199: yathā tvayoktaṃ garuḍa tathā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,2.52 //
GP12garup1_u:205: gāruḍaṃ tava nāmnā talloke khyātiṃ gamiṣyati // GarP_1,2.55 //
GP12garup1_u:207: tathā khyātiṃ purāṇeṣu gāruḍaṃ gāruḍaiṣyati // GarP_1,2.56 //
GP12garup1_u:209: māṃ dhyātvā pakṣimukhyedaṃ purāṇaṃ gada gāruḍam // GarP_1,2.57 //
GP12garup1_u:211: kaśyapo gāruḍaṃ śrutvā vṛkṣaṃ dagdhamajīvayat // GarP_1,2.58 //
GP12garup1_u:214: garuḍoktaṃ gāruḍaṃ hi śṛṇu rudra ! madātmakam // GarP_1,2.59 //
GP12garup1_u:215: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇotpattinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:218: iti rudrābjajo viṣṇoḥ śuśrāva brahmaṇo muniḥ /
GP12garup1_u:219: vyāso vyāsādahaṃ vakṣyehaṃ te śaunaka naimiṣe // GarP_1,3.1 //
GP12garup1_u:223: vyavahāro vrataṃ vaṃśā vaidyakaṃ sanidānakam // GarP_1,3.3 //
GP12garup1_u:228: bhutvā harervāhanaṃ ca sargādīnāṃ ca kāraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:230: cakre kṣudhā hṛtaṃ yasya brahmāṇḍamudare hareḥ /
GP12garup1_u:231: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtamātreṇa nāgāndīnāṃ ca saṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_1,3.7 //
GP12garup1_u:233: garuḍaḥ sa haristena proktaṃ śrīkaśyapāya ca // GarP_1,3.8 //
GP12garup1_u:235: vakṣye vyāsaṃ namaskṛtya śṛṇu śaunaka tadyathā // GarP_1,3.9 //
GP12garup1_u:236: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣayanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyo
GP12garup1_u:240: vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva etad brūhi janārdana // GarP_1,4.1 //
GP12garup1_u:243: sargasthitilayāntāṃ tāṃ viṣṇoḥ krīḍāṃ purātanīm // GarP_1,4.2 //
GP12garup1_u:247: tathā puruṣarūpeṇa kālarūpeṇa ca sthitam // GarP_1,4.4 //
GP12garup1_u:248: vyaktaṃ viṣṇustathāvyaktaṃ puruṣaḥ kāla eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:254: aṇḍo hiraṇmayo rudra tasyāntaḥ svayameva hi /
GP12garup1_u:255: śarīragrahaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭyarthaṃ kurute prabhuḥ // GarP_1,4.8 //
GP12garup1_u:259: sraṣṭā sṛjati cātmānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālyaṃ ca pāti ca // GarP_1,4.10 //
GP12garup1_u:260: apasaṃhriyate cānte saṃhartā ca svayaṃ hara /
GP12garup1_u:267: (2) nanmātrāṇāṃ dvitīyastu bhūtasargo hi sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,4.14 //
GP12garup1_u:269: ityeṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ sambhūto buddhipūrvakaḥ // GarP_1,4.15 //
GP12garup1_u:273: (7) tator'vāksrotasāṃ sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mā nuṣaḥ // GarP_1,4.17 //
GP12garup1_u:275: pañcaite vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāstu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,4.18 //
GP12garup1_u:277: sthāvarāntāḥ surādyāstu prajā rudra ! caturvidhāḥ // GarP_1,4.19 //
GP12garup1_u:278: brahmaṇaḥ kurvataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ jajñire mānasāḥ sutāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:283: utsasarja tatastāṃ tu tamomātrātmikāṃ tanūm // GarP_1,4.22 //
GP12garup1_u:288: tato hi balino rātrāvasurā devatā divā /
GP12garup1_u:289: sattvamātrāṃ tanuṃ gṛhya pitaraśca tato 'bhavan // GarP_1,4.25 //
GP12garup1_u:293: jyotsnā rātryahanī sandhyā śarīrāṇi tu tasya vai // GarP_1,4.27 //
GP12garup1_u:294: rajomātrāṃ tanu gṛhya kṣudabhūtkopa eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:295: kṣuttṛṭkṣāmā amṛgbhakṣā rākṣasā rakṣaṇācca ye // GarP_1,4.28 //
GP12garup1_u:297: jātāḥ kopena bhūtāste gandharvā jajñire tataḥ // GarP_1,4.29 //
GP12garup1_u:299: svargaṃ dyaurvakṣasaścakre sukhato 'jāḥ sa muṣṭavān // GarP_1,4.30 //
GP12garup1_u:308: āsyādvai brāhmaṇā jātā bāhubhyāṃ kṣattriyāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:309: ūrubhyāṃ tu viśaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ śūdraḥ padybhāma jāyata // GarP_1,4.35 //
GP12garup1_u:311: mārutaṃ ca viśāṃ sthānaṃ gāndharvaṃ śūdrajanmanām // GarP_1,4.36 //
GP12garup1_u:316: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sṛṣṭivarṇanaṃ nāma caturtho
GP12garup1_u:321: dharmaṃ rudraṃ manuṃ caiva sanakaṃ ca sanātanam /
GP12garup1_u:322: bhṛguṃ sanatkumāraṃ ca ruciṃ śraddhāṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,5.2 //
GP12garup1_u:329: tasyāṃ tu janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaraḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:330: dadau tā brahmaputrebhyaḥ satīṃ rudrāya dattavān // GarP_1,5.6 //
GP12garup1_u:332: bhṛgave ca dadau khyātiṃ rūpeṇāpratimāṃ śubhām // GarP_1,5.7 //
GP12garup1_u:334: śriyaṃ ca janayāmāsa patnī nārāyaṇasya yā // GarP_1,5.8 //
GP12garup1_u:335: tasyāṃ vai janayāmāsa balonmādau hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup1_u:340: virajāḥ sarvagaścaiva tasya putrau mahātmanaḥ // GarP_1,5.11 //
GP12garup1_u:344: somaṃ durvāsasaṃ caiva dattātreyaṃ ca yoginam // GarP_1,5.13 //
GP12garup1_u:347: kṣamā tu suṣuve bhāryā pulahasya prijāpateḥ /
GP12garup1_u:351: ūrjāyāṃ tu vasiṣṭasya saptājāyanta vai sutāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:354: svāhāṃ prādātsa dakṣo 'pi śaśarīrāya vahnaye // GarP_1,5.18 //
GP12garup1_u:356: phāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ ca śuciṃ cāpi jalāśinaḥ // GarP_1,5.19 //
GP12garup1_u:357: pitṛbhyaśca svadhā jajñe menāṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:358: te ubhe brahmavādinyau menāyāṃ tu himācalaḥ // GarP_1,5.20 //
GP12garup1_u:359: mainākaṃ janayāmāsa gaurīṃ pūrvaṃ tu yā satī /
GP12garup1_u:360: tato brahmātmasambhūtaṃ pūrvaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhuḥ // GarP_1,5.21 //
GP12garup1_u:362: śatarūpāṃ ca tāṃ nārīṃ taponihatakalmaṣām // GarP_1,5.22 //
GP12garup1_u:366: devahūtiṃ manustāsu ākūtiṃ rucaye dadau // GarP_1,5.24 //
GP12garup1_u:367: prasūtiṃ caiva dakṣāya davahūtiṃ ca kardame /
GP12garup1_u:371: śraddhā calā dhṛtistuṣṭiḥ puṣṭirmedhā kriyā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:374: khyatiḥ satyatha sambhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā // GarP_1,5.28 //
GP12garup1_u:375: sannatiścānasūyā ca ūrjā svāhā svadhā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:376: bhṛghurbhavo marīciśca tathā caivāṅgirā muniḥ // GarP_1,5.29 //
GP12garup1_u:380: śraddhā kāmaṃ calā darpaṃ niyamaṃ dhṛtirātmajam // GarP_1,5.31 //
GP12garup1_u:382: medhā śrutaṃ kriyā daṇḍaṃ layaṃ vinayameva ca // GarP_1,5.32 //
GP12garup1_u:384: vyavasāyaṃ prajajñe vai kṣemaṃ śāntirasūyata // GarP_1,5.33 //
GP12garup1_u:386: kāmasya ca ratirbhāryā tatputro harṣa ucyate // GarP_1,5.34 //
GP12garup1_u:388: tasya jāmātaraḥ sarve yajñaṃ jagmurnimantritāḥ // GarP_1,5.35 //
GP12garup1_u:389: bhāryabhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve rudraṃ devīṃ satīṃ vinā /
GP12garup1_u:391: tyaktā dehaṃ punarjātā menāyāṃ tu himālayāt /
GP12garup1_u:394: vidhvaṃsya yajñaṃ dakṣaṃ tu taṃ śaśāpa pinākadhṛk /
GP12garup1_u:396: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prajākartrādisṛṣṭirnāma pañcamo
GP12garup1_u:400: sunītyāṃ tu dhruvaḥ putraḥ sa lebhe sthānamuttamam // GarP_1,6.1 //
GP12garup1_u:404: divañjayastasya sutastasya putro ripuḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,6.3 //
GP12garup1_u:408: adharṃmakārī veṇa(na) śca munibhiśca kuśairhataḥ // GarP_1,6.5 //
GP12garup1_u:412: tato 'sya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ mamanthuḥ sahasā dvijāḥ // GarP_1,6.7 //
GP12garup1_u:414: puthurityevanāmā sa veṇaputro divaṃ yayau // GarP_1,6.8 //
GP12garup1_u:415: dudoha pṛthivīṃ rājā prajānāṃ jīvanāya hi /
GP12garup1_u:418: upayeme samudrasya lavaṇasya sa vai sutām // GarP_1,6.10 //
GP12garup1_u:420: sarve prācetasā nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ // GarP_1,6.11 //
GP12garup1_u:423: prajāpatitvaṃ saṃprāpya bhāryā teṣāṃ ca māriṣa /
GP12garup1_u:426: nāvardhanta ca tāstasya apadhyātā hareṇa tu // GarP_1,6.14 //
GP12garup1_u:430: nāradoktā bhuvaścāntaṃ gatā jñātuṃ ca nāgatāḥ // GarP_1,6.16 //
GP12garup1_u:432: śavalāśvāste 'pi gatā bhrātṝṇāṃ padavīṃ hara ! // GarP_1,6.17 //
GP12garup1_u:433: dakṣaḥ kruddhaḥ śaśāpātha nāradaṃ janma cāpsyasi /
GP12garup1_u:434: nārado hyabhavatputraḥ kaśyapasya muneḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,6.18 //
GP12garup1_u:439: asiknyāṃ (mahiṣyāṃ) janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaro hyatha // GarP_1,6.20 //
GP12garup1_u:440: ṣaṣṭiṃ kanyā rūpayutā dve caivāṅgirase dadau /
GP12garup1_u:441: dve prādātsa kṛśāśvāya daśa dharṃmāya cāpyatha // GarP_1,6.21 //
GP12garup1_u:443: pradadau bahuputrāya suprabhāṃ bhāminīṃ tathā // GarP_1,6.22 //
GP12garup1_u:446: sa kṛśāśvāya ca prādātsuprajāṃ ca tathā jayām /
GP12garup1_u:447: arundhatī vasuryār(jā) mī lambā bhānurmarudvatī // GarP_1,6.24 //
GP12garup1_u:448: saṅkalpā ca muhūrtā ca sādhyā viśvā ca tā daśa /
GP12garup1_u:451: kadrūḥ sādhyā harā krodhā vinatā surabhiḥ khagā // GarP_1,6.26 //
GP12garup1_u:455: lambāyāścaiva ghoṣo 'tha nāgavīthistu yā (jā) mitaḥ // GarP_1,6.28 //
GP12garup1_u:457: saṅkalpāyāstu sarvātmā jajñe saṃkalpa eva hi // GarP_1,6.29 //
GP12garup1_u:459: pratyūṣaśca prabhāsaśca vasavo nāmabhiḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,6.30 //
GP12garup1_u:460: āpasya putro vetuṇḍiḥ (ṇḍaḥ) śramaḥ śrānto dhvanistathā /
GP12garup1_u:465: anilasya śivā bhāryā tasyāḥ putraḥ pulomajaḥ // GarP_1,6.33 //
GP12garup1_u:469: apatyaṃ kṛttikānāṃ tu kārtikeya iti smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,6.35 //
GP12garup1_u:470: pratyuṣasya viduḥ putramṛṣiṃ nāmnā tu devalam /
GP12garup1_u:479: viṣṇuḥ śakror'yyamā dhātā tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaiva ca // GarP_1,6.40 //
GP12garup1_u:480: vivasvānsavitā caiva mitro varuṇa eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:481: aśumāṃśca bhagaścaiva ādityā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,6.41 //
GP12garup1_u:497: svarbhānurvṛṣaparvā ca pulomā ca mahāsuraḥ // GarP_1,6.49 //
GP12garup1_u:498: ete danoḥ sutāḥ khyātā vipracittiśca vīryavān /
GP12garup1_u:499: svarbhānoḥ suprabhā kanyā śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī // GarP_1,6.50 //
GP12garup1_u:501: vaiśvānarasute cobhe pulomā kālakā tathā // GarP_1,6.51 //
GP12garup1_u:502: ubhe te tu mahābhāge mārīcestu parigrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:508: añja (nta) ko narakaścaiva kāla nābhastathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:511: śukī śyenī ca bhāsī ca sugrīvī śucigṛdhrike // GarP_1,6.56 //
GP12garup1_u:513: śyenī śyenāṃstathā bhāsī bhāsān gṛdhrāṃśca gṛdhryapi // GarP_1,6.57 //
GP12garup1_u:522: gaṇaṃ krodhavaśaṃ viddhi te ca sarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:523: krodhā tu janayāmāsa piśācāṃśca mahābalān // GarP_1,6.62 //
GP12garup1_u:531: īdṛk sadṛk tathānyādṛk tataḥ pratisadṛk tathā // GarP_1,6.66 //
GP12garup1_u:535: ṛtaśca ṛtadharṃmā ca vihartā varuṇo (camaso) dhruvaḥ // GarP_1,6.68 //
GP12garup1_u:541: dyutirvasuranādhṛṣyo lābha kāmo jayī virāṭ // GarP_1,6.71 //
GP12garup1_u:542: udveṣaṇo gaṇo nāma vāyuskandhe tu saptame /
GP12garup1_u:543: etatsarvaṃ hare rūpaṃ rājāno dānavāḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,6.72 //
GP12garup1_u:544: sūryādi parivāreṇa manvādyā ījire harim // GarP_1,6.73 //
GP12garup1_u:545: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe uttānapādavaṃśādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:549: bhuktimuktipradaṃ sāraṃ vyāsa ! saṃkṣepataḥ param // GarP_1,7.1 //
GP12garup1_u:554: oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:557: oṃ budhāya namaḥ oṃ bṛhaspataye namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:564: snānaṃ vastropavītañca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam // GarP_1,7.4 //
GP12garup1_u:587: oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:588: oṃ āṃ oṃ namo bhagavate saṅkarṣaṇāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:589: oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate pradyumnāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:590: oṃ aḥ oṃ namo bhagavate aniruddhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:594: oṃ kṣauṃ namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:595: oṃ bhūḥ oṃ namo bhagavate varāhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:596: oṃ kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ vainateyāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:597: oṃ jaṃ khaṃ raṃ sudarśa nāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:598: oṃ khaṃ ṭhaṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadaiyau namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:599: oṃ vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:600: oṃ ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:601: oṃ gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ saṃ puṣṭyai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:602: oṃ dhaṃ ṣaṃ vaṃ saṃ vanamālāyai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:603: oṃ saṃ daṃ laṃ śrīvatsāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:604: oṃ ṭhaṃ caṃ bhaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:609: viṣṇuśaktyāḥ sarasvatyāḥ pūjāṃ śṛṇu śubhapradām // GarP_1,7.7 //
GP12garup1_u:617: śraddhā ṛddhiḥ kalā medhā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ prabhā matiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:618: oṃ hrīṅkārādyā namo 'ntāśca sarasvatyāśca śaktayaḥ // GarP_1,7.9 //
GP12garup1_u:624: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryādīnāṃ sarasvatyāśca pūjanaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:632: teṣu caiva prakurvīta sūtrapātaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,8.3 //
GP12garup1_u:635: antareṣu ca sarveṣu aṣṭau caiva tunābhayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:636: pūrvamadhyamanābhi bhyāmathaṃ sūtraṃ tu bhrāmayet // GarP_1,8.5 //
GP12garup1_u:642: padmāni tāni kurvīta deśikaḥ para mārthavit // GarP_1,8.8 //
GP12garup1_u:644: dvāraśobhāṃ tathā tatra tadardhena tu kalpayet // GarP_1,8.9 //
GP12garup1_u:646: antaraṃ nīlavarṇena dalāni asitena ca // GarP_1,8.10 //
GP12garup1_u:648: dvārāṇi śuklavarṇena rekhāḥ pañca ca maṇḍale // GarP_1,8.11 //
GP12garup1_u:649: sitā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā caiva yathākramam /
GP12garup1_u:651: hṛnmadhye tu nyasedviṣṇuṃ kaṇṭhe saṅkarṣaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:654: ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddharim // GarP_1,8.14 //
GP12garup1_u:656: aniruddhaṃ paścime ca brihmāṇaṃ cottare nyaset // GarP_1,8.15 //
GP12garup1_u:658: tato 'bhyarcya ca gandhādyaiḥ prāpnuyātparamaṃ padam // GarP_1,8.16 //
GP12garup1_u:659: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjopayogivajranābhamaṇḍalanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:664: dviguṇaṃ putrake homaṃ triguṇaṃ sādhake matam /
GP12garup1_u:673: ekaikaṃ yo jayettatra kṣetrajñaṃ dehakāraṇāt // GarP_1,9.6 //
GP12garup1_u:677: hastaṃ padmaṃ samākhyātaṃ patrāṇyaṅgulayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,9.8 //
GP12garup1_u:680: taṃ hastaṃ pātayenmūrdhni śiṣyasya tu samāhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:683: guruḥ śiṣyaṃ samabhyarcya netre baddhe tu vāsasā /
GP12garup1_u:685: puṣpaṃ nipatitaṃ yatra mūrdhno devasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // GarP_1,9.11 //
GP12garup1_u:688: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇudīkṣānidṛ nāma navamo
GP12garup1_u:693: śrāṃ śrīṃ śrūṃ śraiṃ śrauṃ śraḥ kramāddhṛdayaṃ ca śiraḥ śikhām /
GP12garup1_u:694: kavacaṃ netramastraṃ ca āsanaṃ mūrtimarcayet // GarP_1,10.1 //
GP12garup1_u:696: catuḥ ṣaṣṭyantamaṣṭādi khākṣe khākṣyādi maṇḍalam // GarP_1,10.2 //
GP12garup1_u:698: lakṣmīmaṅgāni caikasminkoṇe durgāṃ gaṇaṃ gurum // GarP_1,10.3 //
GP12garup1_u:700: oṃ ghaṃ ṭaṃ ḍaṃ haṃ śrīmahālakṣmyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.4 //
GP12garup1_u:703: oṃ hrīṃ saiṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.5 //
GP12garup1_u:704: oṃ hrīṃ vadavadavāgvādinisvāhā oṃ hrīṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.6 //
GP12garup1_u:705: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe lakṣmyarcananirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:711: yamityanena bījena tacca sarva vināśayet // GarP_1,11.2 //
GP12garup1_u:720: madhye bījadvayaṃ nyasya nyasedaṅge tataḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:723: padmākārau karau kṛtvā madhye 'ṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet // GarP_1,11.8 //
GP12garup1_u:725: kramāccaitāni bījāni tarjanyādiṣu vinya set // GarP_1,11.9 //
GP12garup1_u:726: tato mūrdhākṣivakkreṣu kaṇṭhe ca hṛdaye tathā /
GP12garup1_u:727: nābhau guhye tathā jānvoḥ pādayorvinyasetkramāt // GarP_1,11.10 //
GP12garup1_u:728: pāṇyoḥ ṣaḍaṅgabījāni nyasya kāye tato nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:731: hṛdaye hṛdayaṃ nyasya śiraḥ śirasi vinyaset // GarP_1,11.12 //
GP12garup1_u:732: śikhāyāṃ tu śikhāṃ nyasya kavacaṃ sarvatastanau /
GP12garup1_u:734: tenaiva ca diśo baddhā pūjā vidhimathācaret /
GP12garup1_u:736: dharma jñanaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ ca yathākramam /
GP12garup1_u:747: manasāvāhya tatreśaṃ hariṃ śārṅgaṃ nyasetpunaḥ // GarP_1,11.20 //
GP12garup1_u:749: madhye netraṃ tu koṇeṣu astramantraṃ nyasettataḥ // GarP_1,11.21 //
GP12garup1_u:751: dvāri pūrve pare caiva vainateyaṃ tu vinyaset // GarP_1,11.22 //
GP12garup1_u:754: dvāryattare gadāṃ nyasya śaṅkhaṃ koṇeṣu vinyaset /
GP12garup1_u:755: devadakṣiṇataḥ śārṅgaṃ vāme caiva sudhīrnyaset // GarP_1,11.24 //
GP12garup1_u:761: añjaliḥ prathamā mudrā kṣipraṃ devaprasādhanī // GarP_1,11.27 //
GP12garup1_u:764: savyasya tasya cāṅguṣṭho yaḥ sa uddhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:765: tisraḥ sādhāraṇā hyetā mūrtibhedena kalpitāḥ // GarP_1,11.29 //
GP12garup1_u:769: mudreyaṃ narasiṃhasya nyubjaṃ kṛtvā karadvayam // GarP_1,11.31 //
GP12garup1_u:771: navamīyaṃ smṛtā mudrā varāhābhimatā sadā // GarP_1,11.32 //
GP12garup1_u:777: vāsudevo balaḥ kāmo hyaniruddho yathākramam // GarP_1,11.35 //
GP12garup1_u:779: nārāyaṇastathā brahmā viṣṇuḥ siṃho varāharāṭ // GarP_1,11.36 //
GP12garup1_u:782: kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ garutmānsyājjaṃ khaṃ vaṃ ca sudarśanam /
GP12garup1_u:783: ṣaṃ caṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadādevī vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ ca śaṅkhakam // GarP_1,11.38 //
GP12garup1_u:784: ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ bhavecchrīśca gaṃ jaṃ vaṃ śaṃ ca puṣṭikā /
GP12garup1_u:785: ghaṃ vaṃ ca vanamālā syācchrī vatsaṃ daṃ saṃ bhavet // GarP_1,11.39 //
GP12garup1_u:786: chaṃ ḍaṃ paṃ yaṃ kaustubhaḥ proktaścānanto hyahameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:793: vidyudrūpāṇi cāstrāṇi yāni noktāni varṇataḥ // GarP_1,11.43 //
GP12garup1_u:795: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navavyūhārcanaṃ nāmaikādaśo
GP12garup1_u:799: oṃ nama ityādau saṃsmṛtiḥ paramātmanaḥ // GarP_1,12.1 //
GP12garup1_u:840: kṣaiṃ narasiṃhāya bhūrvarāhya kaṃ vainateyāya jaṃ khaṃ vaṃ sudarśanāya khaṃ caṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadāyai vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ śaṃ puṣṭyai dhaṃ vaṃ vanamālāyai daṃ śaṃ śrīvatsāya chaṃ ḍaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya śaṃ śārṅgāya iṃ iṣudhibhyāṃ caṃ carmaṇe khaṃ khaḍgāya indrāya surāya partaye agnaye tejodhipatayeyamāyadharmādhipatayekṣaṃnairṛtāyarakṣodhipataye varuṇāya jalādhipataye yoṃ vāyave prāṇādhipataye dhāṃ dhanadāya dhanādhipataye hāṃ īśānāya vidyādhipataye oṃ vajrāya śaktyai oṃ daṇḍāya khaṅgāya oṃ pāśāya dhvajāya gadāyai triśūlāya laṃ anantāya pātālādhipataye khaṃ brahmaṇe
GP12garup1_u:841: sarvalokādhipataye oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:861: oṃ naṃnoṃ bhagavateṃ vāṃsuṃdevāyaṃ oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:866: evaṃ japtvā vidhānena śatamaṣṭottaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,12.5 //
GP12garup1_u:867: arghaṃ dattvā jitaṃ tena praṇāmaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:868: tato 'gnāvapi sampūjyaṃ taṃ yajeta yathāvidhi // GarP_1,12.6 //
GP12garup1_u:870: pūrvamullikhya cābhyukṣya praṇavena tu mantravit // GarP_1,12.7 //
GP12garup1_u:872: pūrvaṃ tatsakalaṃ dhyātvā maṇḍale manasā nyaset // GarP_1,12.8 //
GP12garup1_u:877: vāgatīte pare tattve ātmānaṃ ca layaṃ nayet /
GP12garup1_u:880: gacchagaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ yatra devo nirañjanaḥ // GarP_1,12.12 //
GP12garup1_u:882: sudarśanaḥ śrīhariśca acyutaḥ sa trivikramaḥ // GarP_1,12.13 //
GP12garup1_u:883: caturbhujo vāsudevaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pradyumna eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:888: oṃ cakrāya svāhā,oṃ vicakrāya svāhā,oṃ sucakrāya svāhā,oṃ mahācakrāya
GP12garup1_u:889: svāhā,oṃ mahācakrāya asurāntakṛt huṃ phaṭ oṃ huṃ sahasrāra huṃ phaṭ //
GP12garup1_u:891: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pūjānukramanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:895: namonamaste movidaṃ cakraṃ gṛhya sudarśanam // GarP_1,13.1 //
GP12garup1_u:896: prācyāṃ rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo ! tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:897: gadāṃ kaumodakīṃ gṛhṇa padmanābha namo 'sta te // GarP_1,13.2 //
GP12garup1_u:898: yāmyāṃ rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo ! tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:900: pratīcyāṃ rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo ! tvāmaha śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:901: musalaṃ śātanaṃ gṛhya puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa mām // GarP_1,13.4 //
GP12garup1_u:904: namaste rakṣa rakṣoghna ! aiśānyāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:906: pragṛhya rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo āgnyeyyāṃ rakṣa sūkara /
GP12garup1_u:907: candrasūryaṃ samāgṛhya khaḍgaṃ cāndramasaṃ tathā // GarP_1,13.7 //
GP12garup1_u:908: nairṛtyāṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva divyamūrte nṛkesarin /
GP12garup1_u:910: vāyavyāṃ rakṣa māṃ deva hayagrīva namo 'stu te /
GP12garup1_u:913: viśālākṣaṃ samāruhya rakṣa māṃ tvaṃ rasātale // GarP_1,13.10 //
GP12garup1_u:916: kṛtvā rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo namaste puruṣottama /
GP12garup1_u:917: etaduktaṃ śaṅkarāya vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ mahat // GarP_1,13.12 //
GP12garup1_u:922: iti śrīgāruḍe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupañjarastotraṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:926: dhyāyibhiḥ procyate dhyeyo dhyānena harirīśvaraḥ // GarP_1,14.1 //
