GP12garup1_u:2427: oṃ bhūrvinyasya hṛdaye oṃ bhuvaḥ śirasi nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:2428: oṃ svariti śikhāyāṃ ca gāyattryāḥ prathamaṃ padam // GarP_1,36.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2437: taṃ hanti sūryaḥ sandhyāyāṃ nopāstiṃ kurute tu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2438: turīyasya padasyāpi ṛṣirnirmala eva ca // GarP_1,36.17 //
GP12garup1_u:2439: chandastu devī gāyattrī paramātmā ca devatā // GarP_1,36.18 //
GP12garup1_u:2440: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saṃdhyāvidhirnāma ṣaṭtriṃśo
GP12garup1_u:2443: gāyattrī paramā devī bhuktimuktipradā ca tām /
GP12garup1_u:2446: aṣṭottaraṃ sahasraṃ vā athavāṣṭaśataṃ japet // GarP_1,37.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2452: vedamātre ca sāṃkṛtyai brahmāṇī kauśikī kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:2453: sādhvyai sarvārthasādhinyai sahasrākṣyai ca bhūrbhuvaḥ // GarP_1,37.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2460: uttare śikhare jātā bhūmyāṃ parvata vāsinī /
GP12garup1_u:2461: brahmaṇā samanujñātā gaccha devi yathāsukham // GarP_1,37.9 //
GP12garup1_u:2462: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gāyattrīkalpanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2465: navamyādau yajeddurgāṃ hrīṃ durge rakṣiṇīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:2468: gaurī kālī umā durgā bhadrā kāntiḥ sarasvatī // GarP_1,38.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2469: maṅgalā vijayā lakṣmīḥ śivā nārāyaṇī kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:2472: dhanurdhvajaṃ ḍamarukaṃ paraśuṃ pāśameva ca // GarP_1,38.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2474: vajra cakraṃ śalākāṃ ca aṣṭādaśabhujāṃ smaret // GarP_1,38.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2476: oṃ namo bhagavati cāmuṇḍe śmaśānavāsini kapālahaste mahāpretasamārūḍhe mahāvimānamālākule kālarātri bahugaṇaparivṛte mahāmukhe bahubhuje sughaṇṭāḍamarukiṅkiṇīke aṭṭāṭṭahāse kilikili huṃ sarvanādaśabdabahule gajacarmaprāvṛtaśarīre rudhiramāṃsadigdhe lolagrajihve mahārākṣasi raudradaṃṣṭrākarāle bhīmāṭṭāṭṭahāse sphuritavidyutsamaprabhe calacala karālanetre hilihili lalajjihve hraiṃ hrīṃ bhṛkuṭimukhi oṃ kārabhadrāsane kapālamālāveṣṭite jaṭāmukuṭaśaśāṅkadhāriṇi aṭṭāṭṭahāse kilikili huṃhuṃ daṃṣṭrāghorāndhakāriṇi sarvavighnavināśini idaṃ karma sādhaya sādhaya
GP12garup1_u:2477: śīghraṃ kurukuru kahakaha aṅkuśe samanupraveśaya vargaṃvargaṃ (vaṅgavaṅga)
GP12garup1_u:2478: kampayakampaya calacala cālayacālaya rudhiramāṃsamadyapriye hanahana kuṭṭakuṭṭa chindachinda mārayamāraya anubūma anubūma vajraśarīraṃ sādhayasādhaya trailokyagatamapi duṣṭamaduṣṭaṃ vā gṛhītamagṛhītam āveśaya āveśaya krāmayakramaya nṛtyanṛtya bandhabandha valgavalga koṭarākṣi urdhvakeśi ulūkavadane karakiṅkiṇi karaṅkamālādhāriṇi dahadaha pacapaca gṛhṇagahṇa maṇḍalamadhye praveśayapraveśaya kiṃ vilambasi brahmasatyena viṣṇusatyena ṛṣisatyena rudrasatyena āveśaya āveśaya kilikili khilikhili milimili cilicili vikṛtarūpadhāriṇi kṛṣṇabhujaṅga veṣṭitaśarīra sarvagrahāveśini pralambhoṣṭhi bhrūmagnanāsike vikaṭamukhi kapilajaṭe brāhmi bhañjabhañja jvalajvala kālamukhi khalakhala kharakharaḥ pātayapā taya raktākṣi dhūrṇāpayadhūrṇāpaya bhūmiṃ pātayapātaya śiro gṛhṇagṛhṇa cakṣurmolayamīlaya bhañjabhañja pādau gṛhṇagṛhṇa mudrāṃ sphoṭayasphoṭaya
GP12garup1_u:2479: huṃ hūṃ phaṭ vidāraya vidāraya triśūlena bhedayabhedaya vajreṇa hanahana daṇḍena tāḍayatāḍaya cekraṇa chedayachedaya śaktinā bhedayabhedaya daṃṣṭrayā daṃśayadaṃśaya kīlakena kīlaya kīlaya kartārikayā pāṭayapāṭaya aṅkuśena gṛhṇagṛhṇa brahmāṇi ehi ehi māheśvari ehi ehi kaumāri ehi ehi vārāhi ehi ehi aindri ehi ehi cāmuṇḍe ehi ehi vaiṣṇāvi ehi ehi himavantacāriṇi ehi ehi kailāsavārīṇi ehi ehi paramantraṃ chindhichindhi kilikili bimbe aghore ghorarūpiṇi cāmuṇḍe rurukrodhāndhaviniḥ) sṛte asurakṣayaṅkari ākāśagāmini
GP12garup1_u:2480: pāśena bandhabandha samaye tiṣṭhatiṣṭha maṇḍalaṃ praveśayapraveśaya pātayapātaya gṛhṇagṛhṇa mukhaṃ bandhabandha cakṣurbandhayabandhaya hṛdayaṃ bandhabandha hastapādau ca bandhabandha duṣṭagrahān sarvān bandhabandha diśāṃ bandhabandha vidiśāṃ bandhabandha ūrdhvaṃ bandhabandha adhastād bandhabandha bhasmanā pānīyena mṛtikayā sarṣapairvā āveśaya āveśaya pātayapātaya cāmuṇḍe kilikili vicchehrīṃ(huṃ) phaṭ svāh // GarP_1,38.7 //
GP12garup1_u:2483: mahāmāṃsena-trimadhurāktena aṣṭottarasahsatraṃ ca ekaikaṃ ca padaṃ yajet /
GP12garup1_u:2488: dvādaśāṣṭabhujā vāpi dhyeyā vāpi caturbhujā // GarP_1,38.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2496: abhayasvastikādyau ca mahiṣaghnī ca siṃhagā // GarP_1,38.15 //
GP12garup1_u:2498: rakṣa māṃ nijabhūtebhyo valiṃ gṛhṇa namo 'stu te // GarP_1,38.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2499: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe durgājapapūjābalimantranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2505: śṛṇu sūryasya rudra tvaṃ punarvakṣyāmi pūjanam /
GP12garup1_u:2506: oṃ uccaiḥ śravase namaḥ oṃ aruṇāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2509: ete dvāre prapūjyā vai epirmantrairvṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,39.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2519: maghye tu pūjayedrudra pūrvādiṣu tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:2533: oṃ haṃ saṃ khaṃ khakholkāya krāṃ krīṃ saḥ svāhā sūryamūrtaye namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2536: mudrāyā darśanaṃ rudra mūlamantreṇa vā hara /
GP12garup1_u:2539: evaṃ dhyāyetsadā sūryaṃ mūlamantraṃ śṛṇuṣva ca /
GP12garup1_u:2540: oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ // GarP_1,39.7 //
GP12garup1_u:2544: oṃ aḥ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ jvālini śikhāyai vaṣaṭ /
GP12garup1_u:2549: tdṛyadayādi hi vāyavyāṃ netraṃ cāntaḥ prapūjayet // GarP_1,39.9 //
GP12garup1_u:2553: paścime caiva bhūteśaṃ uttare bhārgavaṃ sitam // GarP_1,39.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2555: śanaiścaraṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ nairṛtyāṃ diśi pūjayet // GarP_1,39.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2557: aiśānyāṃ dhūmravarṇaṃ tu ketuṃ saṃ paripūjayet // GarP_1,39.13 //
GP12garup1_u:2566: oṃ kaṃ ketave nama iti // GarP_1,39.15 //
GP12garup1_u:2569: japtvā cāṣṭasahasraṃ tu tacca tasmai samarpayet /
GP12garup1_u:2570: aiśānyāṃ diśi bhūteśa tejaścaṇḍaṃ tu pūjayet // GarP_1,39.17 //
GP12garup1_u:2571: oṃ tejaścaṃṇḍāya huṃ phaṭ svadhā svāhā pauṣaṭ /
GP12garup1_u:2572: nirmālyaṃ cārpayettasmai hyarghyaṃ dadyāttato hara // GarP_1,39.18 //
GP12garup1_u:2576: darghyaṃ tu sūryāya tdṛnmantreṇa vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,39.20 //
GP12garup1_u:2580: sūryasya kathitā pūjā kṛtvaitāṃ viṣṇulokabhāk // GarP_1,39.22 //
GP12garup1_u:2581: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryārcanaprakāro nāmaikonacatvāriṃśo
GP12garup1_u:2584: māheśvarīṃ ca me pūjāṃ vada śaṅkhagadādhara /
GP12garup1_u:2585: yāṃ jñātvā mānavāḥ siddhiṃ gacchanti parameśvara // GarP_1,40.1 //
GP12garup1_u:2588: ādau snātvā tathācamya hyāsane copaviśya ca // GarP_1,40.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2589: nyāsaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍale vai pūjayacce maheśvaram /
GP12garup1_u:2600: oṃ hāṃ astrāya nama iti // GarP_1,40.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2627: oṃ hāṃ hauṃ haṃ śivamūrtaye namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2629: oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hauṃ śivāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2645: satyasyāṣṭau kalā jñeyāḥ pūjyāḥ pūrvādiṣu sthitāḥ // GarP_1,40.8 //
GP12garup1_u:2668: kalāṣaṭkaṃ hyakhorasya vijñeyaṃ bhairavaṃ hara // GarP_1,40.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2675: īśānasya kalāḥ pañca jānīhi vṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,40.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2690: tattvanyāsaṃ ca mudrāyā darśanaṃ dyānameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:2693: vastrālaṃ kārabhogāṃśca hyaṅganyāsaṃ ca dhūpakam // GarP_1,40.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2696: nṛtyaṃ chatrā dikaraṇaṃ mudrāṇāṃ darśanaṃ tatā /
GP12garup1_u:2697: rūpaṃ dhyānaṃ japañcātha ekavadbhāva eva ca // GarP_1,40.18 //
GP12garup1_u:2699: māheśī kathitā pūjā rudra pāpavināsinī // GarP_1,40.19 //
GP12garup1_u:2700: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe maheśvarapūjāvidhirnāma catvāriṃśo
GP12garup1_u:2703: oṃ viśvāvasurnāma gandharvaḥ kanyānāmadhipatirlabhāmi te kanyāṃ samutpādya tasmai viśvavāsave svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:2705: oṃ namo bhagavati ṛkṣakarṇi caturbhuje ūrdhvakeśi trinayane kālarātri mānuṣāṇāṃ vasārudhirabhojane amukasya prāptakālasya mṛtyuprade huṃ phaṭ hanahana dahadaha māṃsarudhiraṃ pacapaca ṛkṣapatni svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:2706: na tithirna ca nakṣatraṃ nopavāso vidhīyate // GarP_1,41.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2707: kruddho raktena saṃmārjya karau tābhyāṃ pragṛhya ca /
GP12garup1_u:2709: oṃ namaḥ sarvatoyantrāṇyetadyathā jambhani mohani sarvaśatruvidāriṇi rakṣarakṣa māmamukaṃ sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:2710: śukre naṣṭe mahādeva vakṣye 'haṃ dvijapādiha // GarP_1,41.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2711: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaśyādisādhikamantranirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2715: ācāryaḥ sādhakaḥ kuryātputrakaḥ samayī hara // GarP_1,42.1 //
GP12garup1_u:2717: āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe māghe kuryādbhādrapade 'pi vā // GarP_1,42.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2719: jñeyaṃ kujādau saṃgrāhyaṃ kanyayā kartitaṃ ca yat // GarP_1,42.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2725: ravirviṣṇuḥ śivaḥ proktaḥ kramāttantuṣu devatāḥ // GarP_1,42.6 //
GP12garup1_u:2727: rudro 'ttamādi vijñeyaṃ mānaṃ ca granthayo daśa // GarP_1,42.7 //
GP12garup1_u:2729: prakṛtiḥ pauruṣī vīrā caturtho cāparājitā // GarP_1,42.8 //
GP12garup1_u:2730: jayā ca vijayā rudrā ajitā ca sadāśivā /
GP12garup1_u:2733: saptamyāṃ vā trayodaśyāṃ śuklapakṣe tathetare // GarP_1,42.10 //
GP12garup1_u:2735: dadyādrandhapavitraṃ tu ātmane brahmaṇe hara // GarP_1,42.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2737: pūrve ca daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ tu uttare cāmalakīphalam // GarP_1,42.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2742: homaṃ kṛtvā gneya dattvā dadyādbhūtabaliṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:2743: āmantrito 'si deveśa gaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ maheśvara // GarP_1,42.15 //
GP12garup1_u:2745: nimantryānena tiṣṭhettu kurvan gītādikaṃ niśi // GarP_1,42.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2747: snātvādityaṃ caturdaśyāṃ prāgrudraṃ ca prapūjayet // GarP_1,42.17 //
GP12garup1_u:2756: oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ kṣaiṃ sarvatattvāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2757: kālātmanā tvayā deva yaddṛṣṭaṃ māmake vidhau // GarP_1,42.21 //
GP12garup1_u:2758: kṛtaṃ kliṣṭaṃ samutsṛṣṭaṃ hutaṃ gupta ca yatkṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:2760: pūrayapūraya makhavrataṃ tanniyameśvarāya sarvatattvātmakāya sarvakāraṇapālitāya oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ haiṃ hauṃ śivāya namaḥ // GarP_1,42.23
GP12garup1_u:2762: dattvā vahneḥ (vare) pavitraṃ ca gurave dakṣiṇāṃ diśet // GarP_1,42.24 //
GP12garup1_u:2763: baliṃ dattvā dvijān bhojya caṇḍaṃ prācyai visarjayet // GarP_1,42.25 //
GP12garup1_u:2764: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śivapavitrāropaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśo
GP12garup1_u:2768: purā devāsure yuddhe brahmādyāḥ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // GarP_1,43.1 //
GP12garup1_u:2769: viṣṇuśca teṣāṃ devānāṃ dhvajaṃ graiveyakaṃ dadau /
GP12garup1_u:2772: vṛṇīta ca vapitrākhyaṃ varaṃ cedaṃ vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,43.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2774: ityukte tena te devāstannāmnā tadvaraṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,43.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2775: prāvṛṭkāle tu ye martyā nārciṣyanti pavitrakaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2776: teṣāṃ sāṃvatsarī pūjā viphalā ca bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,43.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2779: dvādaśyāṃ viṣṇave kāryaṃ śukle kṛṣṇe 'tha vā hara /
GP12garup1_u:2783: kauśeyaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ vā kārpāsaṃ kṣaumameva vā /
GP12garup1_u:2786: kārpāsaṃ padmajaṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ śastamīśvara // GarP_1,43.10 //
GP12garup1_u:2788: oṃ kāro 'tha śivaḥ somo hyagnirbrahyā phaṇī raviḥ // GarP_1,43.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2790: brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca trisūtre devatāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,43.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2791: sauvarṇe rājate tāmre vaiṇave mṛnmaye nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:2792: aṅguṣṭhena catuḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ śreṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ tadardhataḥ // GarP_1,43.13 //
GP12garup1_u:2794: uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ caiva kanyasaṃ pūrvavatkramāt // GarP_1,43.14 //
GP12garup1_u:2796: kanyase ca kaniṣṭhena aṅgulyā granthayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,43.15 //
GP12garup1_u:2798: śivoddhṛtaṃ pavitraṃ tu pratimāyāṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,43.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2806: daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ kuśāgraṃ ca pūrve saṅkarṣaṇena tu // GarP_1,43.20 //
GP12garup1_u:2810: āgneyādiṣu koṇeṣur śyādīnāṃ tu kramānnyaset // GarP_1,43.22 //
GP12garup1_u:2812: dṛṣṭvā punaḥ prapūjyātha vastreṇācchādya yatnataḥ // GarP_1,43.23 //
GP12garup1_u:2814: paścime dakṣiṇe caiva uttare pūrvavatkramāt // GarP_1,43.24 //
GP12garup1_u:2816: astreṇa maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā naivedyañca samarpayet // GarP_1,43.25 //
GP12garup1_u:2817: adhivāsya pavitraṃ tu trisūtreṇa navena vā (ca) /
GP12garup1_u:2818: vedikāṃ veṣṭayitvā tu ātmānaṃma kalaśaṃ ghṛtam // GarP_1,43.26 //
GP12garup1_u:2819: agnikuṇḍaṃ vimānaṃ ca maṇḍapaṃ gṛhameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:2820: sūtramekaṃ tu saṃgṛhya dadyāddevasya mṛrdhāni // GarP_1,43.27 //
GP12garup1_u:2824: ekarātraṃ trirātraṃ vā adhivāsya pavitrakam // GarP_1,43.29 //
GP12garup1_u:2825: rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prātaḥ saṃpūjya keśavam /
GP12garup1_u:2829: gāyattryā cārcitaṃ tena devaṃ saṃpūjya dāpayet /
GP12garup1_u:2830: samaṃ putrakalatrādyaiḥ sūtrapucchaṃ tu dhārayet // GarP_1,43.32 //
GP12garup1_u:2836: vanamālāṃ samabhyarcya svena mantreṇa dāpayet // GarP_1,43.35 //
GP12garup1_u:2840: ādau dattvārghyamāditye tatra caikaṃ pavitrakam // GarP_1,43.37 //
GP12garup1_u:2846: iyaṃ sāṃvatsarī pūjā tavāstu garuḍadhvaja // GarP_1,43.40 //
GP12garup1_u:2847: vanamālā yathā deva kaustubhaṃ satataṃ hṛdi /
GP12garup1_u:2848: tadvatpavitraṃ tantūnāṃ mālāṃ tvaṃ hṛdaye dhara // GarP_1,43.41 //
GP12garup1_u:2849: evaṃ prārthya dvijān bhojya dattvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām /
GP12garup1_u:2853: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupavitrāropaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo
GP12garup1_u:2866: ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu /
GP12garup1_u:2867: buddhiṃ ca sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:2870: yastu vijñāna bāhmena yuktena manasā sadā // GarP_1,44.7 //
GP12garup1_u:2871: sa tu tatpadamāpnoti sa hi bhūyo na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:2876: pratyāhā ro jayaḥ prokto dhyānamīśvaracintanam // GarP_1,44.10 //
GP12garup1_u:2878: pūrvaṃ cetaḥ sthiraṃ na syāttatomūrtiṃ vicintayet // GarP_1,44.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2882: ātmāhaṃ paramaṃ brahma paramaṃ jyotireva tu // GarP_1,44.13 //
GP12garup1_u:2884: dvārakādiśilāsaṃstho dhyeyaḥ pūjyo 'pyahaṃ ca saḥ // GarP_1,44.14 //
GP12garup1_u:2887: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmamūrtidhyānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuścatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2927: (kṛṣṇaḥ) sa vartulāvartaḥ pātu vo natapṛṣṭhakaḥ // GarP_1,45.19 //
GP12garup1_u:2929: (vāmano) vartulo hrasvo vā (rā) macakraḥ sureśvaraḥ // GarP_1,45.20 //
GP12garup1_u:2939: śālagrāme dvārakāyāṃ sthitāya gadina namaḥ // GarP_1,45.25 //
GP12garup1_u:2950: viṣṇormūrtimayaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhetsa divaṃ vrajet /
GP12garup1_u:2953: yathāyudhastathā gaurī caṇḍikā ca sarasvatī // GarP_1,45.32 //
GP12garup1_u:2955: gajāsyaśca gaṇaḥ skandaḥ ṣaṇmukhonekadhā guṇāḥ // GarP_1,45.33 //
GP12garup1_u:2958: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śālagrāmamūrtilakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2963: īśāne ca śiraḥ pādau nairṛte 'gnyanile karau /
GP12garup1_u:2968: sūryaḥ satyo bhṛguścaiva ākāśo vāyureva ca // GarP_1,46.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2972: asuraḥ śeṣapāpau (dau) ca rogo/ḍahimukha (khya) eva ca // GarP_1,46.6 //
GP12garup1_u:2976: āpaścaivātha sāvitrī jayo rudrastathaiva ca // GarP_1,46.8 //
GP12garup1_u:2977: madhye navapade brahmā tasyāṣṭhau ca samīpagān /
GP12garup1_u:2980: mitro 'tha rājayakṣmā ca tathā pṛthvīdharaḥ kramāt // GarP_1,46.10 //
GP12garup1_u:2982: īśānakoṇādārabhya durge car (jñeyo) vaṃśa ucyate // GarP_1,46.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2984: aditiṃ himavantaṃ ca jayantaṃ ca idaṃ trayam // GarP_1,46.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2990: bhāṇḍāgāraṃ ca kauberyāṃ goṣṭhāgāraṃ ca vāyave // GarP_1,46.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3000: madhye catuṣpado brahmā dvipa dāstvaryamādayaḥ // GarP_1,46.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3002: tebhyo hyubhayataḥ sārdhādanye 'pi dvipadāḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,46.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3004: carakī ca vidārī ca pūtanā pāparākṣasī // GarP_1,46.22 //
GP12garup1_u:3010: vistārābhihataṃ dairghyaṃ rāśiṃ vāstostu kārayet // GarP_1,46.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3011: kṛtvā ca vasubhirbhāgaṃ śeṣaṃ baddhā yamādiśet /
GP12garup1_u:3018: vāstukroḍe gṛhaṃ kuryānna pṛṣṭhe mānavaḥ sadā // GarP_1,46.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3022: dvāraṃ dīrghārdhavistāraṃ dvārāṇyaṣṭau smṛtāni ca // GarP_1,46.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3024: sutahīnaṃ tu raudreṇa vīryaghnaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā // GarP_1,46.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3028: arthadaṃ cārthahānyai ca doṣadaṃ putramṛtyudam // GarP_1,46.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3034: aṣṭabhāge kṛte bhāge dvārāṇāṃ ca phalāphalam // GarP_1,46.37 //
GP12garup1_u:3036: gṛhasya śobhanaḥ prokta īśāne caiva sālmaliḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3037: pūjito vignahārī syātprāsādasya gṛhasya ca // GarP_1,46.38 //
GP12garup1_u:3038: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vāstumānalakṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśo
GP12garup1_u:3041: prāsādānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca vakṣye śaunaka tacchṛṇu /
GP12garup1_u:3051: atha vāpi samaṃ vāstuṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśabhāgikam /
GP12garup1_u:3052: tasya madhye caturbhāgamādau garbhaṃ tu kārayet // GarP_1,47.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3056: caturdikṣu tathā jñeyo nirgamastuḥ tathā budhaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3061: liṅgamānamatho vakṣye pīṭho liṅgasamo bhavet // GarP_1,47.11 //
GP12garup1_u:3066: nir gamastu samākhyātaḥ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadeva tu /
GP12garup1_u:3075: traivedaṃ kārayetkṣetraṃ yatra tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ // GarP_1,47.18 //
GP12garup1_u:3077: nemiḥ pādena vistīrṇā prāsādasya samantataḥ // GarP_1,47.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3078: garbhaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ kuryānnemyā mānaṃ bhavediha /
GP12garup1_u:3079: sa eva bhitterutsedho śikharo dviguṇo mataḥ // GarP_1,47.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3080: prāsādānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi mānaṃ yoniṃ ca mānataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3085: etebhya eva sambhūtāḥ prāsādāḥ sumanoharāḥ // GarP_1,47.23 //
GP12garup1_u:3091: valabhī gṛharājaśca śā lāgṛhaṃ ca mandiram // GarP_1,47.26 //
GP12garup1_u:3092: vimānaṃ ca tathā brahmamandiraṃ bhavanaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:3093: uttambhaṃ śibikā veśma navaite puṣpakodbhavāḥ // GarP_1,47.27 //
GP12garup1_u:3095: mukulī cāsya uṣṇīṣī śaṅkhaśca kalaśastathā // GarP_1,47.28 //
GP12garup1_u:3097: gajo 'tha vṛṣabho haṃso garuḍaḥ siṃhanāmakaḥ // GarP_1,47.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3101: vakraḥ svastikakhaḍgau ca gadā śrīvṛkṣa eva ca // GarP_1,47.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3104: yatra tatra vidhātavyaṃ saṃsthānaṃ maṇḍapasya tu /
GP12garup1_u:3105: rājyaṃ ca vibhavaścaivaḥ hyāyurvardvanameva ca // GarP_1,47.33 //
GP12garup1_u:3113: prāsāde mañcarī kāryā citrā viṣamabhūmikā // GarP_1,47.37 //
GP12garup1_u:3119: kiyanto yeṣu cādhārā nirādhārāśca kecana // GarP_1,47.40 //
GP12garup1_u:3123: prāsāde niyamo nāsti devatānāṃ svayambhuvām // GarP_1,47.42 //
GP12garup1_u:3127: purato vāhanānāṃ ca kartavyā lagna(ghu) maṇḍapāḥ // GarP_1,47.44 //
GP12garup1_u:3129: prasāde devatānāṃ ca kāryā dikṣu vidikṣvapi // GarP_1,47.45 //
GP12garup1_u:3135: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe prāsādaliṅgamaṇḍapādilakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃnāma saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3139: sutithyādau suramyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayedguruḥ // GarP_1,48.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3141: svaśākhoktavidhānena atha vā praṇavena tu // GarP_1,48.2 //
GP12garup1_u:3144: mantranyāsaṃ guruḥ kṛtvā tataḥ karma samārabhet /
GP12garup1_u:3147: dhvajāṣṭakaiścaturhastāṃ madhye vediṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,48.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3153: śiraḥ sthāne tu devasya ācāryo homamācaret // GarP_1,48.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3155: dvārāṇi caiva catvāri kṛtvā vai toraṇāntike // GarP_1,48.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3159: pūrvadvāre mṛgendraṃ tu hayarājaṃ tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,48.11 //
GP12garup1_u:3161: agnimīleti hi mantreṇa prathamaṃ pūrvato nyaset // GarP_1,48.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3166: yāmyāṃ vai kṛṣṇarūpā tu nairṛtyā śyāmalā (dhūsarā) bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:3167: vāruṇyāṃ pāṇḍurā jñeyā vāyavyāṃ pītavarṇikā // GarP_1,48.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3168: uttare raktavarṇā tu śukleśī ca patākikā /
GP12garup1_u:3169: bahurūpā tathā madhye indravidyeti pūrvake // GarP_1,48.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3171: pūjyā rakṣohanoveti paścime uttare 'pi ca // GarP_1,48.17 //
GP12garup1_u:3174: kalaśau tu tato dvaudvau niveśyau toraṇāntike /
GP12garup1_u:3177: dikpālāśca tataḥ pūjyāḥ śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā // GarP_1,48.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3179: asminvṛkṣa itaṃ caiva pracārīti parā smṛtā // GarP_1,48.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3184: ālokanena dravyāṇi śuddhiṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3194: pratiṣṭhā yasya devasya tadākhyaṃ kalaśaṃ nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:3195: aiśānyāṃ pūjayedyāmye astreṇaiva ca bardhanīm // GarP_1,48.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3201: vardhanyā tu samāyuktaṃ kalaśaṃ bhrāmayedanu // GarP_1,48.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3204: ghaṭaṃ cāvāhya vāyavyāṃ gaṇānāṃ tveti sadgaṇam /
GP12garup1_u:3207: kumbhasya pūrvato bhūtaṃ gaṇadevaṃ baliṃ haret // GarP_1,48.35 //
GP12garup1_u:3212: kṛtvā brahmarathe devaṃ pratiṣṭhanti tato dvijāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3219: lakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe tu nāmaikaṃ sthāpako va(da) det // GarP_1,48.41 //
GP12garup1_u:3225: sahadevī balā caiva śatamūlī śatāvarī // GarP_1,48.44 //
GP12garup1_u:3226: kumārī ca guḍūcī ca siṃhī vyāghrī tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3231: ratnāni caiva dhānyāni oṣadhīṃ śatapuṣpikām // GarP_1,48.47 //
GP12garup1_u:3233: kṣīraṃ dadhi kṣīrodasya ghṛtodasyeti vā punaḥ // GarP_1,48.48 //
GP12garup1_u:3235: tejo 'sīti ca mantraiśca kumbhaṃ caivābhimantrayet // GarP_1,48.49 //
GP12garup1_u:3237: snātaścaiva suveṣaśca dhūpo deyaśca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,48.50 //
GP12garup1_u:3239: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni saritaḥ sāgarāstathā // GarP_1,48.51 //
GP12garup1_u:3241: tena toyena yaḥ snāyātsa mucyetsarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,48.52 //
GP12garup1_u:3243: gandhadvāreti gandhaṃ ca nyāsaṃ vai vedamantrakaiḥ // GarP_1,48.53 //
GP12garup1_u:3248: sthitvā caiva pare tattve mantranyāsaṃ tu kārayet /
GP12garup1_u:3251: yathāśāstraṃ nivedyāni pādamūle tu dāpayet // GarP_1,48.57 //
GP12garup1_u:3253: kalaśaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ ca śiraḥ sthāne nivedayet // GarP_1,48.58 //
GP12garup1_u:3257: vṛṣākapiṃ ca mitraṃ bahvacaḥ pūrvato japet // GarP_1,48.60 //
GP12garup1_u:3258: rudraṃ puruṣasūktaṃ ca ślokādhyāyaṃ ca śukriyam /
GP12garup1_u:3259: brahmāṇaṃ pitṛmaitraṃ ca adhvaryurdakṣiṇe japet // GarP_1,48.61 //
GP12garup1_u:3261: bheruṇḍāni ca sāmāni chandogaḥ paścime japet // GarP_1,48.62 //
GP12garup1_u:3263: nīlarudrāṃśca maitraṃ ca atharvaścottare japet // GarP_1,48.63 //
GP12garup1_u:3265: tāmrapātre śarāve vā yathāvibhavato 'pi vā // GarP_1,48.64 //
GP12garup1_u:3267: astreṇa jvālayedvahniṃ kavacena tu veṣṭayet // GarP_1,48.65 //
GP12garup1_u:3269: pātraṃ gṛhya karābhyāṃ ca kuṇḍaṃ bhrāmya tataḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,48.66 //
GP12garup1_u:3270: vaiṣṇavena tu yogena paraṃ tejastu niḥ kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:3273: dikṣudikṣu tato dadyātparidhiṃ viṣṭaraiḥ saha // GarP_1,48.68 //
GP12garup1_u:3279: agnestu rakṣaṇārthāya yaduktaṃ karma ntravit // GarP_1,48.71 //
GP12garup1_u:3281: pavitraṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā kuryādājyasya saṃskṛtim // GarP_1,48.72 //
GP12garup1_u:3289: pūjayitvā tato vahniṃ kuṇḍeṣu viharettathā // GarP_1,48.76 //
GP12garup1_u:3291: purṇāhutiṃ śatasyānte sarveṣāṃ caiva homayet // GarP_1,48.77 //
GP12garup1_u:3295: niṣkṛṣya bahirācāryo dikpālānāṃ baliṃ haret // GarP_1,48.79 //
GP12garup1_u:3296: bhūtānāṃ caiva devānāṃ nāgānāṃ ca prayogataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3297: tilāśca samidhaścaiva homadravyaṃ dvayaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,48.80 //
GP12garup1_u:3299: paruṣasuktaṃ pūrveṇaiva rudracaiva tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,48.81 //
GP12garup1_u:3303: evaṃ madhye tathā pāde pūrṇāhutyā tathā punaḥ // GarP_1,48.83 //
GP12garup1_u:3309: caraṇāvagnimīḷe tu iṣetvo gulphayoḥ sthitāḥ // GarP_1,48.86 //
GP12garup1_u:3310: agna āyāhi jaṅghe dve śannodevīti jānunī /
GP12garup1_u:3319: lauhabījāni siddhāni paścāddevaṃ tu vinyaset // GarP_1,48.91 //
GP12garup1_u:3320: na garbhe sthāpayeddevaṃ na garbhaṃ tu parityajet /
GP12garup1_u:3321: īṣanmadhyaṃ parityajya tato doṣāpahaṃ tu tat // GarP_1,48.92 //
GP12garup1_u:3323: oṃ sthiro bhava śivo bhava prajābhyaśca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,48.93 //
GP12garup1_u:3324: devasya tvā saviturvaḥ ṣaḍbhyo vai vinyasedguruḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3329: arghyaṃ dattvā namaskṛtya tato devaṃ kṣamāpayet // GarP_1,48.96 //
GP12garup1_u:3331: ṛttvigbhyaśca pradātavyā dakṣiṇā caiva śaktitaḥ // GarP_1,48.97 //
GP12garup1_u:3333: āhutīnāṃ śataṃ hutvā tataḥ pūrṇāṃ pradāpayet // GarP_1,48.98 //
GP12garup1_u:3337: mukuṭaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ chatraṃ keyūraṃ kaṭisūtrakam // GarP_1,48.100 //
GP12garup1_u:3341: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe devapratiṣṭhādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśo
GP12garup1_u:3346: viprādyaiḥ svena dharmeṇa taddharmaṃ vyāsa ! vai śṛṇu // GarP_1,49.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3353: bhikṣācaryātha śuśrūṣā guroḥ svādhyāya eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3362: kuṭumbabharaṇe yuktaḥ sādhako 'sau gṛhī bhavet // GarP_1,49.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3364: ekākī yastu vicaredudāsīnaḥ sa maukṣikaḥ // GarP_1,49.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3370: sanyāsī sa hi vijñeyo vānaprasthāśrame sthitaḥ // GarP_1,49.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3372: jñānāya vartate bhukṣuḥ procyate pārameṣṭhikaḥ // GarP_1,49.14 //
GP12garup1_u:3374: samyak ca damasampannaḥ sa yogī bhikṣurucyate // GarP_1,49.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3375: bhaikṣyaṃ śrutaṃ ca maunitvaṃ tapo dhyānaṃ viśeṣataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3376: samyak ca jñānavairāgyaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ bhikṣuke mataḥ // GarP_1,49.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3379: yogī ca trividho jñeyo bhautikaḥ kṣattra evaca /
GP12garup1_u:3381: prathamā bhāvanā pūrve mokṣe tvakṣa(duṣka) rabhāvanā /
GP12garup1_u:3382: tṛtīye cāntimā proktā bhāvanā pārameśvarī // GarP_1,49.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3384: pravṛttiśca nivṛttiśca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam // GarP_1,49.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3386: kṣamā damo dayā dānamalobhā (bho) bhyāsa eva ca // GarP_1,49.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3388: satyaṃ saṃtoṣa āstikyaṃ tathā cendriyanigrahaḥ // GarP_1,49.22 //
GP12garup1_u:3392: prājāpatyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ kriyāvatām // GarP_1,49.24 //
GP12garup1_u:3397: smṛtaṃ teṣāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ tadeva vana (guru) vāsinām /
GP12garup1_u:3398: saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ sthānaṃ tadvai vanaukasām // GarP_1,49.27 //
GP12garup1_u:3400: ānandaṃ brahma tatsthānaṃ yasmānnāvartate muniḥ // GarP_1,49.28 //
GP12garup1_u:3404: yamāḥ pañca tvahiṃsādyā ahiṃsā prāṇyahiṃsanam // GarP_1,49.30 //
GP12garup1_u:3412: evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpyuktaṃ puraṇātpūrakaḥ sa ca // GarP_1,49.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3416: brahmātmacintā dhyānaṃ syāddhāraṇā manaso dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,49.36 //
GP12garup1_u:3418: ahamātmā paraṃ brahma satyaṃ jñānamanantakam // GarP_1,49.37 //
GP12garup1_u:3426: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3430: brāhme muhūrte cotthāya dharmamarthaṃ ca cintayet // GarP_1,50.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3432: uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte kṛtvā cāvaśyakaṃ budhaḥ // GarP_1,50.2 //
GP12garup1_u:3434: prataḥ snānena pūyante ye 'pi pāpakṛto janāḥ // GarP_1,50.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3436: prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaṣṭakaraṃ hi tat // GarP_1,50.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3439: alakṣmīḥ kālakarṇo ca duḥ svapnaṃ durvicintitam /
GP12garup1_u:3440: prataḥ snānena pāpāni dhūyante nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,50.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3441: na ca snānaṃ vinā puṃsāṃ prāśastyaṃ karma saṃsmṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:3442: home japye viśeṣeṇa tasmātsnānaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,50.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3444: ārdreṇa vāsasā vāpi mārjanaṃ kāyikaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,50.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3447: brāhmaṃ tu mārjanaṃ mantraiḥ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3449: gavāṃ hi rajasā proktaṃ vāyavyaṃ snānamuttamam /
GP12garup1_u:3455: apāmārgaṃ ca vilvaṃ ca karavīraṃ ca dhāvane /
GP12garup1_u:3460: saṃmārjya mantrai rātmānaṃ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhaiḥ // GarP_1,50.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3464: prākkūleṣu tataḥ sthitvā darbheṣu susamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.18 //
GP12garup1_u:3466: yā sandhyā sā jagatsūtirmāyātītā hi niṣkalā // GarP_1,50.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3468: dhyātvā raktāṃ sitāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ gāyattrīṃ vai japedvudhaḥ // GarP_1,50.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3474: yo 'nyatra kurute yatnaṃ dharma kārye dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.23 //
GP12garup1_u:3486: tvameva brahma paramamāpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam // GarP_1,50.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3490: athāgamya gṛhaṃ vipraḥ (paścāt) samācamya yathāvidhi // GarP_1,50.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3492: ṛtvik putro 'tha patnī vā śiṣyo vāpi sahodaraḥ // GarP_1,50.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3494: vinā ma (ta) ntreṇa yatkarma nāmutreha phalapradam // GarP_1,50.33 //
GP12garup1_u:3496: guruṃ caivāpyupāsīta hitaṃ cāsya samācaret // GarP_1,50.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3505: nadīṣu devakhāteṣu taḍāgeṣu saraḥ su ca /
GP12garup1_u:3508: mṛdaikayā śiraḥ kṣālyaṃ dvābhyāṃ nābhestathopari // GarP_1,50.40 //
GP12garup1_u:3509: adhaśca tisṛbhiḥ kṣālyaṃ pādau ṣaṭbhistathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3519: tvaṃ yajñastvaṃ vaṣaṭkāra āpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:3526: drupadāṃ vātha sāvitrariṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // GarP_1,50.49 //
GP12garup1_u:3528: apaḥ pāṇau samādāya japtvā vai mārjane kṛte // GarP_1,50.50 //
GP12garup1_u:3534: haṃsaḥ śuciṣadetena sāvitryā ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,50.53 //
GP12garup1_u:3535: anyaiḥ saurairvaidikaiśca gāyattrīṃ ca tato japet /
GP12garup1_u:3539: kartavyā tvakṣālā syādantarā tatra sā smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:3541: anyathā ca śucau bhūmyāṃ darbheṣu ca samāhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3542: pradakṣiṇaṃ samāvṛtya namaskṛtya tataḥ kṣitau // GarP_1,50.57 //
GP12garup1_u:3550: prācīnāvītī pitrye tu tena tīrthena bhārata /
GP12garup1_u:3551: niṣpīḍya snānavastraṃ vai samācamya ca vāgyataḥ // GarP_1,50.62 //
GP12garup1_u:3553: brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ sūryaṃ tathaiva madhusūdanam // GarP_1,50.63 //
GP12garup1_u:3555: pradadyādvātha puṣpādi sūktena puruṣeṇa tu // GarP_1,50.64 //
GP12garup1_u:3556: āpo vā devatāḥ sarvāstena samyak samarcitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3557: dhyātvā praṇavapūrvaṃ vai devaṃ vārisamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.65 //
GP12garup1_u:3559: narte hyārādhanātpuṇyaṃ vidyate karma vaidikam // GarP_1,50.66 //
GP12garup1_u:3561: tadviṣṇoriti mantreṇa sūktena puruṣeṇa tu // GarP_1,50.67 //
GP12garup1_u:3566: mānuṣaṃ brahmayajñaṃ ca pañca yajñānsamācaret // GarP_1,50.69 //
GP12garup1_u:3568: kṛtvā manuṣyayajñaṃ vai tataḥ svādhyāyamācaret // GarP_1,50.70 //
GP12garup1_u:3569: vaiśvadevastu kartavyo devayajñaḥ sa tu smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3570: bhūtayajñaḥṛ sa vai jñeyo bhūtebhyo yastvayaṃ baliḥ // GarP_1,50.71 //
GP12garup1_u:3578: manovākkarmabhiḥ śāntaṃ svāgataiḥ svagṛhaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,50.75 //
GP12garup1_u:3586: akṛtvā tu dvijaḥ pañca mahāyajñān dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.79 //
GP12garup1_u:3587: bhuñjate cetsa mūḍhātmā tiryagyoniṃ ca gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:3592: aśaucaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi aśuciḥ pātakī sadā // GarP_1,50.82 //
GP12garup1_u:3599: śudhyenmāsena vai śūdro yatīnāṃ nāsti pātakam /
GP12garup1_u:3601: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nityakarmāśaucayornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3611: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ vimalaṃ dānamīritam // GarP_1,51.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3613: anuddiśya phalaṃ tasmādbrāhmaṇāya tu nityaśaḥ // GarP_1,51.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3614: yattu pāpopaśāntyai ca dīyate vidupāṃ kare /
GP12garup1_u:3619: cetasā sattvayuktena dānaṃ tadvimalaṃ śivam // GarP_1,51.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3621: dadāti vedaviduṣe sa na bhūyo 'bhijāyate // GarP_1,51.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3622: bhūmidānātparaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup1_u:3623: vidyāṃ dattvā brāhmaṇāya brahmaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,51.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3626: vaiśākhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu brāhmaṇānsapta pañca ca /
GP12garup1_u:3629: prīyatāṃ dharmarājeti yathā manasi vartate // GarP_1,51.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3632: dadāti yastu viprāya sarvaṃ tarati duṣkṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:3633: ghṛtānnamudakaṃ caiva vaiśākhyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,51.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3637: yo hi yāṃ devatāmicchetsamārādhayituṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,51.17 //
GP12garup1_u:3643: bhogakāmo hi śaśinaṃ balakāmaḥ samīraṇam // GarP_1,51.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3645: akāmaḥ sarvakāmo vā pūjayettu gadādharam // GarP_1,51.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3651: anaḍuddaḥ śriyaṃ puṣṭāṃ godo bradhnasya viṣṭapam // GarP_1,51.24 //
GP12garup1_u:3653: dhānyadaḥ śāvataṃ saukhyaṃ brahmado brahma śāśvatam // GarP_1,51.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3661: yadyadiṣṭatamaṃ loke yaccāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe // GarP_1,51.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3663: ayena viṣuve caiva grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ // GarP_1,51.30 //
GP12garup1_u:3665: prayāgādiṣu tīrtheṣu gayāyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,51.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3671: mriyamāṇeṣu vipreṣu brahmahā sa tu garhitaḥ // GarP_1,51.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3672: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dānadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapañcāśattamo
GP12garup1_u:3676: brahmahā ca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,52.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3679: brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset /
GP12garup1_u:3680: kuryādanaśanaṃ vātha bhṛgoḥ patanameva ca // GarP_1,52.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3681: jvalantaṃ vā viśedagniṃ jalaṃ vā praviśetsvayam /
GP12garup1_u:3682: brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe vā samyak prāṇānparityajet // GarP_1,52.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3683: dattvā cānnaṃ ca viduṣe brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati /
GP12garup1_u:3684: aśvamedhāvabhṛthake snātvā vā mucyate dvijaḥ // GarP_1,52.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3688: setubandhe naraḥ snātvā mucyate brahmahatyayā // GarP_1,52.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3690: surāpastu surāṃ pītvā agnivarṇāṃ dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,52.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3692: suvarṇasteyī muktaḥ syānmusalena hato nṛpaiḥ // GarP_1,52.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3697: cāndrāyaṇāni vā kuryātpañca catvāri vā punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3698: patitena ca saṃsargaṃ kurute yastu vai dvijaḥ // GarP_1,52.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3702: cāndrāyaṇaṃ ca vidhinā kṛtaṃ caivātikṛcchrakam // GarP_1,52.14 //
GP12garup1_u:3704: amāvasyāṃ tithiṃ prāpya yaḥ samārādhayedbhavam // GarP_1,52.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3710: snātvā nadyāṃ tu pūrvāhne mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,52.18 //
GP12garup1_u:3723: pativratā tu yā nārī bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇotsukā /
GP12garup1_u:3724: na tasyā vidyate pāpamiha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,52.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3728: ityāha bhagavānviṣṇuḥ purā mama yatavratāḥ // GarP_1,52.27 //
GP12garup1_u:3729: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prāyaścittanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvipañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3742: dadyācchrutāya maitrīṃ ca yāti nityaṃ ca rājabhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3743: dravyārthaṃ śatruṇā nāśaṃ saṃgrāme cāpi saṃvrajet // GarP_1,53.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3744: makaraḥ kacchapaścaiva tāmasau tu nidhī smṛtau /
GP12garup1_u:3745: kacchapī viśvasennaiva na bhuṅkena (nā) dadāti ca // GarP_1,53.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3749: rajastamomayo nandī ādhāraḥ syātkulasya ca // GarP_1,53.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3750: stutaḥ prīto bhavati vai bahubhāryā bhavanti ca /
GP12garup1_u:3751: pūrvamitreṣu śaithilyaṃ prītimanyaiḥ karoti ca // GarP_1,53.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3755: ekasya syānnidhiḥ śaṅkhaḥ svayaṃ bhuṅkte dhanādi(nta)kam // GarP_1,53.12
GP12garup1_u:3761: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navanidhivarṇanaṃ nāma tripañcāśattamo
GP12garup1_u:3765: medhāmedhātithirbhavyaḥ śabalaḥ putra eva ca // GarP_1,54.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3769: vibhajya sapta dvīpāni saptānāṃ pradadau nṛpaḥ // GarP_1,54.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3771: jalopari mahī yātā maurivāste sarijjale // GarP_1,54.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3773: kuśaḥ krauñcastathā śākaḥ puṣkaraścaiva saptamaḥ // GarP_1,54.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3782: nīlaḥ śvetaśca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3783: plakṣādiṣu narā rudra ye vasanti sanātanāḥ // GarP_1,54.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3787: ramyo hiraṇmayākhyaśca kururbhadrāśva eva ca // GarP_1,54.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3789: nābhestu merudevyāṃ tu putro 'bhūdṛṣabho hara // GarP_1,54.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3790: tatputro bharato nāma śālagrāme sthito vratī /
GP12garup1_u:3795: pṛthuśca tatsuto nakto naktasyāpi gayaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,54.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3800: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanopayogipriyavratavaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ pañcaśattamo
GP12garup1_u:3810: siddhiḥ svābhāvikī rudra ! varjayitvā tu bhāratam /
GP12garup1_u:3815: andhrā dakṣiṇato rudra ! turaṣkāstvapi cottare // GarP_1,55.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3819: vedasmṛtir narmadā ca varadā surasā śivā // GarP_1,55.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3820: tāpī payoṣṇī sarayūḥ kāverī gomatī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:3823: ṛṣikulyā ca kāverī mattagaṅgā payasvinī // GarP_1,55.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3824: vidarbhā ca śatadrūśca nadyaḥ pāpaharāḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3825: āsāṃ pibanti salilaṃ madhyadeśādayo janāḥ // GarP_1,55.11 //
GP12garup1_u:3829: kāśaya (ṣāyā) śca videhāśca pūrvasyāṃ kosalāstathā // GarP_1,55.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3836: strīrājyāḥ saindhavā mlecchā nāsti kā yavanāstathā /
GP12garup1_u:3837: paścimena ca vijñeyā māthurā naiṣadhaiḥ saha // GarP_1,55.17 //
GP12garup1_u:3844: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśattamo
GP12garup1_u:3849: sukhodayastathā nandaḥ śivaḥ kṣemaka eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3850: dhruvaśca saptamasteṣāṃ plakṣadvīpeśvarā hi te // GarP_1,56.2 //
GP12garup1_u:3852: somakaḥ sumanāḥ śailo baibhrājaścātra saptamaḥ // GarP_1,56.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3853: anutaptā śikhī caiva vipāśā tridivā kramuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3854: amṛtā sukṛtā caiva saptaitāstatra nimnagāḥ // GarP_1,56.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3860: yonitoyā vitṛṣṇā ca candrā śukla vimocanī // GarP_1,56.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3862: jyotiṣmataḥ kuśadvīpe sapta putrāḥ śṛṇuṣvatān // GarP_1,56.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3874: gaurī kumudvatī caiva sandhyā rātrirmanojavā // GarP_1,56.14 //
GP12garup1_u:3879: sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī dhenukā ca yā /
GP12garup1_u:3880: ikṣuśca veṇukā caiva gabhastī saptamī tathā // GarP_1,56.17 //
GP12garup1_u:3884: tāvaccaiva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvataḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ // GarP_1,56.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3890: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭpañcāśattamo
GP12garup1_u:3895: atalaṃ vitalaṃ caiva nitalaṃ ca gabhastimat /
GP12garup1_u:3896: mahākhyaṃ sutalaṃ cāgryaṃ pātālaṃ cāpi saptamam // GarP_1,57.2 //
GP12garup1_u:3898: bhūyastatra daiteyā vasanti ca bhujaṅgamāḥ // GarP_1,57.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3899: raudre tu puṣkaradvīpe narakāḥ santi tāñchṛṇu /
GP12garup1_u:3902: rudhirākhyo vaitaraṇī kṛmiśaḥ kṛmibho janaḥ // GarP_1,57.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3904: tathā pūyavahaḥ pāpo vahnijvālastvadhaḥ śirāḥ // GarP_1,57.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3908: uparyupari vai lokā rudra ! bhūtādayaḥ sthitāḥ // GarP_1,57.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3910: tadaṇḍaṃ mahatā rudra ! pradhānena ca veṣṭitam // GarP_1,57.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3911: aṇḍaṃ daśaguṇaṃ vyāptaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,57.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3912: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośagatāpātalanarakādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3916: yojānānāṃ sahasrāṇi bhāskarasya ratho nava // GarP_1,58.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3926: dvitīye 'kṣe tu taccakraṃ saṃsthitaṃ mānasācale // GarP_1,58.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3934: hāhā rathasvanaścaiva jyeṣṭhe bhāno rathe sthitāḥ // GarP_1,58.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3938: pramlocā ca nabhasyete sarpāścārke tu santi vai // GarP_1,58.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3942: suṣeṇo 'nyo dhṛtācī ca vasantyāśvayuje ravau // GarP_1,58.14 //
GP12garup1_u:3954: viśvāmitrastathā rakṣo yajñāpeto hi phālgune // GarP_1,58.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3956: stuvanti munayaḥ sūryaṃ gandharvairgoyate puraḥ // GarP_1,58.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3967: aṣṭāśvaḥ kāñcanaḥ śrīmān bhaumasyāpi ratho mahān // GarP_1,58.26 //
GP12garup1_u:3973: svarbhānosturagā hyaṣṭau bhṛṅgābhā dhūsaraṃ ratham // GarP_1,58.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3975: tathā keturathasyāśvā aṣṭau te vātaraṃhasaḥ // GarP_1,58.30 //
GP12garup1_u:3978: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭapañcāśattamo
GP12garup1_u:3983: caturlakṣaṃ jyotiṣasya sāraṃ rudrāya sarvadaḥ // GarP_1,59.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3990: sāvitraśca tathā hastā citrā tvaṣṭā prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,59.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3997: vāsavastu tathā ṛkṣaṃ dhaniṣṭhā procyate budhaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3998: tathā śatabhiṣā proktaṃ nakṣatraṃ vāruṇaṃ śiva // GarP_1,59.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4004: pañcamyāṃ ca trayodaśyāṃ vārāhī dakṣiṇe sthitā // GarP_1,59.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4006: saptamyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca cāmuṇḍā vāyugocare // GarP_1,59.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4009: dvādaśyāṃ ca caturthyāṃ tu kaumārī nairṛte tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4012: puṣyā hastā tathā jyeṣṭhā prasthāne śreṣṭhamucyate // GarP_1,59.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4014: aśvinī rohiṇī puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā ca punarvasū // GarP_1,59.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4022: revatī cāśvinī citrā svātī hastā punarvasū // GarP_1,59.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4023: anurādhā mṛgo jyeṣṭhā ete pārśvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4028: rohiṇyārdrāṃ tathā puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā cottarātrayam // GarP_1,59.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4029: vāruṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ caiva nava cordhvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4030: eṣu rājyābhiṣekaṃ ca paṭṭabandhaṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,59.24 //
GP12garup1_u:4032: caturtho cāśubhā ṣaṣṭhī aṣṭamī navamī tathā // GarP_1,59.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4033: amāvāsyā pūrṇimā ca tadvādaśī ca caturdaśī /
GP12garup1_u:4034: aśuklā pratipacchreṣṭhā dvitīyā candra sūnunā // GarP_1,59.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4038: navamī candravā(sau) reṇa daśamī tu gurau śubhā // GarP_1,59.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4040: trayodaśī śukrabhaumau śanau śreṣṭhā caturdaśī // GarP_1,59.29 //
GP12garup1_u:4042: dvādaśīṃ dahate bhānuḥ śaśī caikādaśīṃ dahet // GarP_1,59.30 //
GP12garup1_u:4043: kujo dahecca daśāmīṃ navamīṃ ca budho dahet /
GP12garup1_u:4044: aṣṭamīṃ dahate jīvaḥ saptamīṃ bhārgavo dahet // GarP_1,59.31 //
GP12garup1_u:4048: meṣe karkaṭake ṣaṣṭhī kanyāyāṃ mithune 'ṣṭamī // GarP_1,59.33 //
GP12garup1_u:4049: vṛṣe kumbhe caturtho ca dvādaśī makare tule /
GP12garup1_u:4050: daśamī vṛścike siṃhe dhanurmone caturdaśī // GarP_1,59.34 //
GP12garup1_u:4051: etā dagdhā na gantavyaṃ pīḍādiḥ kila mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4054: rohiṇyāditrayaṃ jīve śukre puṣyātrayaṃ śiva // GarP_1,59.36 //
GP12garup1_u:4058: kṛttikāsu budhaścaiva gurau rudra punarvasuḥ // GarP_1,59.38 //
GP12garup1_u:4064: bhāge dviśeṣe strīnāśaḥ pusaḥ syādekaśūnyayoḥ // GarP_1,59.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4065: viṣkambhe ghaṭikāḥ pañca śūle sapta prakīrtitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4066: ṣaḍgaṇḍe cātigaṇḍe ca nava vyāghātavajrayoḥ // GarP_1,59.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4067: vyatīpāte ca parighe vaidhṛte ca dinedine /
GP12garup1_u:4068: etai mṛtyuyutā hyeṣu sarvakarmāṇi varjayet // GarP_1,59.43 //
GP12garup1_u:4069: haster'kaśca guruḥ puṣye anurādhā budhe śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4070: rohiṇī ca śanau śreṣṭhā saumaṃ somena vai śubham // GarP_1,59.44 //
GP12garup1_u:4071: śukre ca revatī śreṣṭhā aśvinī maṅgale śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4073: bhārgave bhaparaṇī caiva some citrā vṛṣadhvaja ! /
GP12garup1_u:4074: bhaume cai vottarāṣāḍhā dhaniṣṭhā ca budhe hara ! // GarP_1,59.46 //
GP12garup1_u:4075: garau śatabhiṣā rudra ! śukre vai rohiṇī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4076: śanau ca revatī śambho ! viṣayogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,59.47 //
GP12garup1_u:4078: śravaṇaṃ ca dhaniṣṭhā ca hastāśvanīmṛgāstathā // GarP_1,59.48 //
GP12garup1_u:4081: āśleṣā kṛttikā rudra ! prasthāne maraṇapradāḥ // GarP_1,59.49 //
GP12garup1_u:4082: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre nakṣatrataddevatādagdhayogādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4085: ṣaḍāditye daśā jñeyā some pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4086: aṣṭāvaṅgārake cava budhai spatadaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,60.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4098: mithunasya budho jñeyaḥ somaḥ karkaṭakasya ca // GarP_1,60.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4099: sūryakṣetraṃ bhavetsiṃhaḥ kanyā kṣetraṃ budhasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:4100: bhārgavasya tulā kṣetraṃ vṛścikoṅgārakasya ca // GarP_1,60.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4104: dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe // GarP_1,60.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4116: artha prāpnoti vāyavye uttare kalahobhavet // GarP_1,60.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4118: vilikhya ravicakraṃ tu bhāskaro narasannibhaḥ // GarP_1,60.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4122: hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi ekaṃ nābhau pradāpayet // GarP_1,60.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4124: nakṣatrāṇi ca śeṣāṇi ravipāde niyojayet // GarP_1,60.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4130: mastake padṛvastraṃ syānnakṣatraṃ yadi sthitam // GarP_1,60.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4131: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍaṃ prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahadaśādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4137: candrasya dvādaśāvasthā bhavanti śṛṇu tā api // GarP_1,61.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4143: pravāso hānimṛnyṛ ca jayo hāseratiḥ sukham // GarP_1,61.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4144: śoko bhogo jvaraḥ kampaḥ sukhaṃ ceti kramātphalam /
GP12garup1_u:4145: janmasthaḥ kurute tuṣṭiṃ dvitīye nāsti nirvṛtiḥ // GarP_1,61.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4147: pañcamena mṛgāṅkena strīlābho vai tathā bhavet // GarP_1,61.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4148: ghanadhānyāgamaḥ ṣaṣṭhe ratiḥ pūjā ca saptame /
GP12garup1_u:4151: dvādaśena śaśāṅkena mṛtyureva na saṃkhayaḥ // GarP_1,61.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4152: kṛttikādau ca pūrveṇa saptarkṣāṇi ca vai vrajet /
GP12garup1_u:4155: aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā samalaṅkṛtau // GarP_1,61.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4158: śukracandrau hi janmasthau śubhadau ca dvitīyake /
GP12garup1_u:4159: śaśijñaśukrajīvāśca rāśau rāśau cātha tṛtīyake // GarP_1,61.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4162: mandākārai ca kujaḥ ṣaṣṭhe gurucandrau ca saptame /
GP12garup1_u:4163: jñaśukrāvaṣṭame śreṣṭhau navamastho guruḥ śubhaḥ // GarP_1,61.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4165: budho 'tha dvādaśe caiva bhārgavaḥ sukhado bhavet // GarP_1,61.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4166: siṃhena makaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kanyayā meṣa uttamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4167: tulayā saha mīnastu kumbhena sahakarkaṭaḥ // GarP_1,61.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4168: dhanuṣā vṛṣabhaḥ śreṣṭho mithunena ca vṛścikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4170: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahāṇāṃ śubhāśubhasthānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4171: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre lagnaghaṭikā pramāṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4178: kūrmonnatau ca caraṇau syātāṃ nṛpavarasya hi // GarP_1,63.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4180: sūrpākārau ca caraṇau saṃkhuṣkau viralāṅgulī // GarP_1,63.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4181: duḥ khadāridyadau syātā nātra kāryāṃ vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:4184: dvedve romṇī paṇḍitānāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,63.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4188: viṣamestrīcañcalo vai nṛpaḥ syādvṛṣaṇe same // GarP_1,63.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4192: bhogāḍhyāḥ samajaṭharā niḥ svāḥ syurghaṭasannibhāḥ // GarP_1,63.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4194: lalāṭe yasya dṛśyante tisro rekhāḥ samāhitāḥ // GarP_1,63.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4195: sukhī putrasamāyuktaḥ sa ṣaṣṭiṃ jīvate naraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4202: triśūlaṃ paṭṭiśaṃ vāpi lalāṭe yasya dṛśyate /
GP12garup1_u:4203: dhanaputra samāyuktaḥ sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4205: saṃprāptā yā bhavedrudra ! sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4207: madhyamāmūlagā rekhā āyūrekhā ataḥ param // GarP_1,63.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4209: acchinnā vā vibhaktā vā sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4211: śatavarṣāṇi jīvecca bhogī rudra ! na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,63.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4214: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike puṃllakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4217: yasyāstu kuñcitāḥ keśā mukhaṃ ca parimaṇḍalam /
GP12garup1_u:4218: nābhiśca dakṣiṇāvartā sā kanyā kulavardhinī // GarP_1,64.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4220: sahasrāṇāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ bhavetsāpi pativratā // GarP_1,64.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4221: vakrakeśā ca yā kanyā maṇḍalākṣī ca yā bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:4222: bhartā ca mriyate tasyā niyataṃ duḥ khabhāginī // GarP_1,64.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4224: viśālanetrā bimboṣṭhī sā kanyā labhate sukham // GarP_1,64.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4227: kārye ca mantrī satstrī syātsatī (khī) syātkaraṇeṣu ca /
GP12garup1_u:4228: streheṣu bhāryā mātā syādveśyā ca śayane śubhā // GarP_1,64.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4229: aṅkuśaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ cakraṃ yasyāḥ pāṇitale bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:4230: putraṃ prasūyate nārī narendraṃ labhate patim // GarP_1,64.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4231: yasyāstu romaśau pārśvau romaśau ca payodharau /
GP12garup1_u:4232: annatau cādharoṣṭhau ca kṣipraṃ mārayate patim // GarP_1,64.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4238: patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate // GarP_1,64.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4240: patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate // GarP_1,64.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4242: tvacaḥ snehena śāyyāṃ ca pādasnehena vāhanam // GarP_1,64.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4246: śubhe jaṅghe virome ca ūrū hastikaropamau // GarP_1,64.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4249: aromā trivalī nāryā hṛtstanau romavarjitau // GarP_1,64.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4250: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīlakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4258: śū(sar) pākārau virūkṣau ca vakrau pādau śirālakau // GarP_1,65.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4261: vicchittidau ca vaṃśasya brahmanghau śaṅku (pakra) sannibhau /
GP12garup1_u:4266: nṛpāṇāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ ca dvedve śriye ca dhīmatām // GarP_1,65.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4267: tryādyairniḥ svā mānavāḥ syurduḥ svabhājaśca ninditāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4268: keśāśca vai kuñcitāśca pravāse mriyate naraḥ // GarP_1,65.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4270: vikaṭaiśca daridrāḥ syuḥ samāṃsai rājyameva ca // GarP_1,65.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4278: balavānyuddhaśīlaśca laghuśektaḥ sa eva ca // GarP_1,65.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4280: samābhyāṃ kṣitipaḥ proktaḥ pralambena śatābdavān // GarP_1,65.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4288: samaiḥ strīratnadhanino madhye nimnaiśca kanyakāḥ // GarP_1,65.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4290: puṣpagandhe nṛpāḥ śukre madhugandhe dhanaṃ bahuḥ // GarP_1,65.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4291: putrāḥ śukre matsyagandhe tanuśukre ca kanyakāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4295: māṃsalasphik sukhī syācca siṃhasphik bhūpatiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4296: bhavetsiṃhakaṭī rājā niḥ svaḥ kapikaṭirnaraḥ // GarP_1,65.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4297: sarpodarā daridrāḥ syuḥ piṭharaiśca ghaṭaiḥ samaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4298: dhanino vipulaiḥ pārśvairniḥ svā raktaiśca nimnagaiḥ // GarP_1,65.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4304: vāmāvartaśca sādhyaṃ vai medhāṃ dakṣiṇatastathā // GarP_1,65.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4306: adho gavāḍhyaṃ kuryācca nṛpatvaṃ padmakarṇikā // GarP_1,65.27 //
GP12garup1_u:4308: trivaliḥ kṣmāpa ācārya ṛjubhirvālibhiḥ sukhī // GarP_1,65.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4314: samonnataṃ ca hṛdayamakampaṃ māṃsalaṃ pṛthu // GarP_1,65.31 //
GP12garup1_u:4326: saṃmāsau caiva bhugnālpau śliṣṭau ca vipulau śubhau // GarP_1,65.37 //
GP12garup1_u:4328: niḥ svānāṃ romaśau hrasvau śreṣṭhau karikara prabhau // GarP_1,65.38 //
GP12garup1_u:4330: medhāvināṃ ca sūkṣmāḥ syurbhṛtyānāṃ cipiṭāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,65.39 //
GP12garup1_u:4357: śatāyuṣaṃ ca kurute chinnayā taruto bhayam /
GP12garup1_u:4358: niḥ svāśca bahurekhāḥ syunirdravyāścibukaiḥ kṛśaiḥ // GarP_1,65.53 //
GP12garup1_u:4362: tīkṣṇā dantāḥ samāḥ śreṣṭhā jihvā raktā samā śubhā // GarP_1,65.55 //
GP12garup1_u:4363: ślakṣṇā dīrghā ca vijñeyā tālū śvete dhanakṣaye /
GP12garup1_u:4364: kṛṣṇe ca paruṣo vakraṃ samaṃ saumyaṃ ca saṃvṛtam // GarP_1,65.56 //
GP12garup1_u:4365: bhūpānāmamalaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ viparītaṃ ca duḥ khinām /
GP12garup1_u:4366: mahā duḥ khaṃ durbhagāṇāṃ strīmukhaṃ putramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,65.57 //
GP12garup1_u:4367: āḍhyānāṃ vartulaṃ vakraṃ nirdravyāṇāṃ ca dīrghakam /
GP12garup1_u:4370: sampūrṇaṃ bhogināṃ kāntaṃ śmaśru snigdhaṃ śubhaṃ mṛdu // GarP_1,65.59 //
GP12garup1_u:4382: svalpacchidrau supuṭau ca avakrau ca nṛpeśvare // GarP_1,65.65 //
GP12garup1_u:4383: krūre dakṣiṇavakrā syādvalināṃ ca kṣutaṃ sakṛt /
GP12garup1_u:4384: syādviniṣpiṇḍitaṃ hrādi sānunādaṃ ca jīvakṛt // GarP_1,65.66 //
GP12garup1_u:4388: jihyaiśca locanaiḥ śūrāḥ senānyo gajalocanāḥ // GarP_1,65.68 //
GP12garup1_u:4390: nīlotpa lākṣā vidvāṃsaḥ saubhāgyaṃ śyāmacakṣuṣām // GarP_1,65.69 //
GP12garup1_u:4392: maṇḍalākṣāśca pāpāḥ syurniḥ svāḥ syurdenalocanāḥ // GarP_1,65.70 //
GP12garup1_u:4396: āḍhyo niḥ svaśca khaṇḍabhrṛrmadhye ca vinatabhruvaḥ // GarP_1,65.72 //
GP12garup1_u:4397: strīṣu gamyāsu saktāḥ syuḥ sutārthe parivarjitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4405: pracurāśrudīnaṃ rūkṣaṃ ca ruditaṃ ca sukhāvaham /
GP12garup1_u:4424: vipulastriṣu gambhīro dīrghaḥ sūkṣmaśca pañcasu // GarP_1,65.86 //
GP12garup1_u:4426: nābhiḥ svaraśca sasattvaṃ ca trayaṃ gambhīramīritam // GarP_1,65.87 //
GP12garup1_u:4428: cakṣuḥ kakṣā nāsikā ca ṣaṭ syur nṛpakṛkāṭikāḥ // GarP_1,65.88 //
GP12garup1_u:4429: unnatāni ca hrasvani jaṅghā grīvā ca liṅgakam /
GP12garup1_u:4430: pṛṣṭhaṃ catvāri raktāni karatālvadharā nakhāḥ // GarP_1,65.89 //
GP12garup1_u:4434: narāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ vadāmi strīṣu lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,65.91 //
GP12garup1_u:4435: rājñyāḥ snigdhau samau pādau talau tāmrau nakhau tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4436: śliṣṭāṅgulī connatāgrau tāṃ pāpya nṛpatirbhavet // GarP_1,65.92 //
GP12garup1_u:4440: jaṅghe ca romarahite suvṛtte viśire śubhe // GarP_1,65.94 //
GP12garup1_u:4442: ūrū karikarākārāvaromau ca samau śubhau // GarP_1,65.95 //
GP12garup1_u:4445: gūḍho maṇiśca śubhado nitambaśca guruḥ śubhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4448: aromaśau stanau pīnau ghanāvaviṣamau śubhau // GarP_1,65.98 //
GP12garup1_u:4449: kaṭhinau romaśā śastā mṛdugrīvā ca kambubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4450: āraktāvadharau śreṣṭhau māṃsalaṃ vartulaṃ mukham // GarP_1,65.99 //
GP12garup1_u:4453: nāsā samā samapuṭā strīṇāṃ tu rucirā śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4455: na pṛthū bālendunibhe bhruvau cātha lalāṭakam /
GP12garup1_u:4458: snigdhā nīlāśca mṛdavo mūrdhajāḥ kuñcitāḥ kacāḥ // GarP_1,65.103 //
GP12garup1_u:4459: strīṇāṃ samaṃ śiraḥ śreṣṭhaṃ pāde pāṇitale 'tha vā /
GP12garup1_u:4465: na nimnaṃ nonnataṃ strīṇāṃ bhavetkaratalaṃ śubham /
GP12garup1_u:4467: rekhā yā maṇibandhotthā gatā madhyāṅguliṃ kare // GarP_1,65.107 //
GP12garup1_u:4468: gatā pāṇitale yā ca yordhvapādatale sthitā /
GP12garup1_u:4469: strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ tathā sā syādrājyāya ca sukhāya ca // GarP_1,65.108 //
GP12garup1_u:4475: śubhaṃ tu lakṣaṇaṃ strīṇāṃ proktaṃ tvaśubhamanyathā // GarP_1,65.111 //
GP12garup1_u:4476: kaniṣṭhikānāmikā vā yasyā na spṛśate mahīm /
GP12garup1_u:4477: aṅguṣṭhaṃ vā gatātītya tarjanī kulaṭā ca sā // GarP_1,65.112 //
GP12garup1_u:4480: vāmāvartaṃ nimnamalpaṃ duḥ khitānāṃ ca guhyakam /
GP12garup1_u:4481: grīvayā hrasvayā niḥ svā dīrghayā ca kulakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,65.114 //
GP12garup1_u:4483: kekare piṅgale netre śyāme lolekṣaṇā satī // GarP_1,65.115 //
GP12garup1_u:4484: smite kūpe gaṇḍayośca sā dhruvaṃ vyabhicāriṇī /
GP12garup1_u:4485: pralambinī lalāṭe tu devaraṃ hanti cāṅganā // GarP_1,65.116 //
GP12garup1_u:4486: udare śvaśuraṃ hanti patiṃ hanti sphicordvayoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4487: yā tu romottarauṣṭhī syānna śubhā bhartureva hi // GarP_1,65.117 //
GP12garup1_u:4488: stanau saromāvaśubhau karṇau ca viṣamau tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4489: karālā viṣamā dantāḥ kleśāya ca bhavanti te // GarP_1,65.118 //
GP12garup1_u:4496: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīnaralakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4508: ubhayoḥ saṃgamo yatra tatra muktirna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,66.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4509: śālagrāmo dvārakā ca naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ gayā /
GP12garup1_u:4510: vārāṇasī prayāgaśca kurukṣetraṃ ca sūkaram // GarP_1,66.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4511: gaṅgā ca narmadā caiva candrabhāgā sarasvatī /
GP12garup1_u:4514: prabhavo vibhavaḥ śuklaḥ pramodo 'tha prajāpatiḥ // GarP_1,66.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4515: aṅgirāḥ śrīmukho bhāvaḥ yuvā dhātā tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:4516: īśvaro bahudhānyaśca pramāthī vikramo viṣuḥ // GarP_1,66.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4518: sarvajitsarvadhārī ca virodhī vikṛtiḥ kharaḥ // GarP_1,66.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4520: hemalambo vilaṃbaśca vikāraḥ śarvarī plavaḥ // GarP_1,66.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4523: paridhāvī pramādī ca ānando rākṣaso nalaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4526: aśobhanāḥ śobhanāśca nāmnaivaite hi vatsarāḥ // GarP_1,66.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4528: rājā sā(mā) jā udāsā ca pīḍā mṛtyustathaiva ca // GarP_1,66.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4529: ā ī ū ai au svarāṃśca likhetpañcāgnikoṣṭhake /
GP12garup1_u:4531: tithī ekā gnikoṣṭheṣu trayo rājātha sā (mā) jayāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4537: kalāliṅgā ca yā tiṣṭhetpañcamastasya vai mṛtiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4538: kalā tithistathā vāro nakṣatraṃ māsameva ca // GarP_1,66.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4539: nāmodayasya pūrvaṃ ca tathā bhavati nānyathā /
GP12garup1_u:4542: trailokyamohanaṃ bījaṃ nṛsiṃhasya tu padma(nna)gam // GarP_1,66.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4544: bhūrje tu dhāritāḥ kaṇṭhe bāhau ceti jayādidāḥ // GarP_1,66.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4545: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre śālagrāmaṣaṣṭyūbdasvarodayānāṃ nirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4549: hareḥ śrutvā haro gaurīṃ dehasthaṃ jñānamabravīt // GarP_1,67.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4550: kujo vahnī raviḥ pṛthvī saurirāpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4555: sthānasevāṃ tathā dhyānaṃ vāṇijyaṃ rājadarśanam // GarP_1,67.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4559: śubhāśubhaviveko hi jñāyate tu svarodayāt // GarP_1,67.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4563: cakravacca sthitāstāstu sarvāḥ prāṇaharāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,67.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4565: vāmā somātmikā proktā dakṣiṇā ravisannibhā // GarP_1,67.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4567: vāmā hyamṛtarūpā ca jagadāpyāyane sthitā // GarP_1,67.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4570: nirgame tu bhavedvāmā praveśe dakṣaiṇā smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:4577: śobhaneṣu ca kāryeṣu yātrāyāṃ viṣakarmaṇi // GarP_1,67.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4579: dvābhyāṃ caiva pravāhe ca krūrasaumyavivarjane // GarP_1,67.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4583: yuddhādibhojane ghāte strīṇāṃ caiva tu saṃgame // GarP_1,67.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4587: vāmācāre 'thavā dakṣe pratyaye yatra nāyakaḥ // GarP_1,67.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4588: tanusthaḥ pṛcchate yastu tatra siddhirna saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4589: vaicchando vāmadevastu yadā vahati cātmani // GarP_1,67.21 //
GP12garup1_u:4591: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra saṃkramate śivā // GarP_1,67.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4592: ghore ghorāṇi kāryāṇi saumye vai madhyamāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:4593: prasthite bhāgato haṃse dvābhyāṃ vai sarvavāhinī // GarP_1,67.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4597: agrato vāmikā śreṣṭhā pṛṣṭhato dakṣiṇā śubhā // GarP_1,67.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4598: vāmena vāmikā proktā dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4599: vāme vāmā śubhe caiva dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā // GarP_1,67.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4600: jīvo jīvati jīvena yacchūnyaṃ tastvaro bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:4604: yāvatṣaṣṭhī tu pṛcchāyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ prathamo jayet /
GP12garup1_u:4607: pravṛtte dakṣiṇe mārge viṣame viṣamākṣaram // GarP_1,67.30 //
GP12garup1_u:4608: anyatra vāmavāhe tu nāma vai viṣamākṣaram /
GP12garup1_u:4611: jā(ja) yate nātra sandeho nāḍīmaghye tu lakṣayet // GarP_1,67.32 //
GP12garup1_u:4614: na dātuṃ jāyate so 'pi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:4615: atha saṃgrāmamadhye tu yatra nāḍī sadā vahet // GarP_1,67.34 //
GP12garup1_u:4616: sā diśā jayamāpnoti śūnye bhaṅgaṃ vinirdiśet /
GP12garup1_u:4618: jayaṃ parājayaṃ caiva yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4619: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra sañcarate śivam // GarP_1,67.36 //
GP12garup1_u:4621: śaśisūryapravāhe tu sati yuddhaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,67.37 //
GP12garup1_u:4623: yāṃ diśaṃ vahate vāyustāṃ diśaṃ yāvadājayaḥ // GarP_1,67.38 //
GP12garup1_u:4624: jāyate nātra sandeha handro yadyagrataḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4625: meṣyādyā daśa yā nāḍyo dakṣiṇā vāma saṃsthitāḥ // GarP_1,67.39 //
GP12garup1_u:4627: nirgame nirgamaṃ yāti saṃgrahe saṃgrahaṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,67.40 //
GP12garup1_u:4629: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi pañcatattvasthitaḥ śive // GarP_1,67.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4631: madhye tu pṛthivī jñeyā nabhaḥ sarvatra sarvadā // GarP_1,67.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4633: madhye stambhaṃ vijānīyānmokṣaḥ sarvatra sarvage // GarP_1,67.43 //
GP12garup1_u:4634: iti śrīgāruḍemahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe svarodaye śubhāśubhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4638: indrādyā nirjitāstena vijetuṃ tairna śakyate // GarP_1,68.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4640: balo dadau sa (sva) paśutāmatisattva surairhataḥ // GarP_1,68.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4648: yadyatpapāta ratnānāṃ bījaṃ kracana kiñcana // GarP_1,68.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4649: mahodadhau sariti vā pavarta kānane 'pi vā /
GP12garup1_u:4652: prādurbhavanti ratnāni tathaiva viguṇāni ca // GarP_1,68.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4657: ākāravarṇau prathamaṃ guṇadoṣau tatphalaṃ parīkṣā ca /
GP12garup1_u:4662: dhāraṇaṃ saṃgraho vāpi kāryaḥ śriyamabhīpsatā // GarP_1,68.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4664: ta eva mūlyamātrāyā vettāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,68.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4667: tasyāsthileśo nipapāta yeṣu bhuvaḥ pradeśeṣu kathañcideva /
GP12garup1_u:4671: ātāmrā himaśailajāśca śaśibhā veṇvātaṭīyāḥ smṛtāḥ sauvīre tvasitābjameghasadṛśāstābhrāśca saurāṣṭrajāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4672: kāliṅgāḥ kana kāvadātarucirāḥ pītaprabhāḥ kosale śyāmāḥ puṇḍrabhavā mataṅgaviṣaye nātyantapītaprabhāḥ atyarthaṃ laghu varṇataśca guṇavatpārśveṣu samyak samaṃrekhābindukalaṅkakākapadakatrāsādibhirvarjitam
GP12garup1_u:4681: dvau vajravarṇau pṛthivīpatīnāṃ sadbhiḥ pradiṣṭau na tu sārvajanyau /
GP12garup1_u:4682: yaḥ syājjavāvidrumabhaṅgaśoṇo yo vā haridrārasannikāśaḥ // GarP_1,68.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4686: tataḥ kaṣṭataro vajravarṇānāṃ saṅkaro mataḥ // GarP_1,68.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4687: na ca mārgavibhāgamātravṛttyā viduṣā vajraparigraho vidheyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4689: ekamapi yasya śṛṅgaṃ vidalitamavalokyate viśīrṇaṃ vā /
GP12garup1_u:4690: guṇavadapi tanna dhāryaṃ vajraṃ śreyo 'rthibhirbhavane // GarP_1,68.27 //
GP12garup1_u:4692: na hi vajrabhṛto 'pi vajramāśu śriyamapyāśrayalālasāṃ na kuryāt //
GP12garup1_u:4695: koṭyaḥ pārśvani dhārāśca ṣaḍaṣṭau dvādaśeti ca /
GP12garup1_u:4697: ṣaṭkoṭi śudvamamalaṃ sphuṭatīkṣṇadhāraṃ varṇānvitaṃ laghu supārśvamapetadoṣam /
GP12garup1_u:4699: tīkṣṇāgraṃ vimalamapetasarvadoṣaṃ dhatte yaḥ prayatatanuḥ sadaiva vajram /
GP12garup1_u:4707: yattaṇḍulairdvādaśabhiḥ kṛtasya vajrasya mūlyaṃ prathamaṃ pradiṣṭam /
GP12garup1_u:4714: sva (sa) mūlyāddaśamaṃ bhāgaṃ vajraṃ labhati mānavaḥ // GarP_1,68.39 //
GP12garup1_u:4716: sva (su) mūlyācchataśo bhāgo vajrasya na vidhīyate // GarP_1,68.40 //
GP12garup1_u:4718: ratnānāṃ parikarmārthaṃ mūlyaṃ tasya bhavellaghu // GarP_1,68.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4719: prathamaṃ guṇasampadābhyupetaṃ pratibaddhaṃ samupaiti yacca doṣam /
GP12garup1_u:4720: alamābharaṇena tasya rājño guṇahīno 'pi maṇirna bhūṣaṇāya // GarP_1,68.42
GP12garup1_u:4726: parīkṣā teṣu kartavyā vidvadbhiḥ suparīkṣakaiḥ // GarP_1,68.45 //
GP12garup1_u:4728: pṛthivyāṃ yāni ratnāni ye cānye lohadhātavaḥ // GarP_1,68.46 //
GP12garup1_u:4732: jātirajātiṃ vilikhati jātiṃ vilikhanti vajrakuruvindāḥ // GarP_1,68.48 //
GP12garup1_u:4734: vajrāṇi muktāmaṇayo ye ca kecana jātayaḥ // GarP_1,68.49 //
GP12garup1_u:4740: saudā minīvisphuritābhirāmaṃ rājā yathoktaṃ kaliśaṃ dadhānaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4742: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ratnatadviśeṣavajraparīkṣaṇādivarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4746: muktāphalāni prathitāni loke teṣāṃ ca śuktyudbhavameva bhūri //
GP12garup1_u:4747: tatraiva caikasya hi mūlamātra niviśyate ratnapadasya jātu /
GP12garup1_u:4748: vedhyaṃ tu śuktayudbhavameva teṣāṃ śeṣāṇyavedhyāni vadanti tajjñāḥ //
GP12garup1_u:4750: prāyo vimuktāni bhavanti bhāsā śastāni māṅgalyatayā tathāpi // GarP_1,69.3
GP12garup1_u:4759: utpadyate vāricarānaneṣu matsyāśce te madhyacarāḥ payodheḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4763: te veṇavo divyajanopabhogye sthāne prarohanti na sārvajanye /
GP12garup1_u:4766: prāpyātiratnāni mahāprabhāṇi rājyaṃ śriyaṃ vā mahatīṃ durāpām //
GP12garup1_u:4768: jijñāsayā ratnadhanaṃ vidhijñaiḥ śubhemuhūrte prayataiḥ prayatnāt //
GP12garup1_u:4769: rakṣāvidhānaṃ sumahadvidhāya harmyopariṣṭhaṃ kriyate yadā tat /
GP12garup1_u:4772: na taṃ bhujaṅgā na tu yātudhānā na vyādhayo nāpyupasargadoṣāḥ //
GP12garup1_u:4773: hiṃsanti yasyāhiśiraḥ samutthaṃ muktāphalaṃ tiṣṭhati kośamadhye /
GP12garup1_u:4774: nābhyeti meghaprabhavaṃ dharitrīṃ vipradgataṃ tadvibudhā haranti //
GP12garup1_u:4777: divā yathā dīrptiṅkaraṃ tathaiva tamo 'vagāḍhāsvapi tanniśāsu /
GP12garup1_u:4779: mūlyaṃ na vā syāditi niścayo me kṛtsnā mahī tasya muvarṇapūrṇā /
GP12garup1_u:4781: sāpatnyahīnāṃ sa mahīṃ samagrāṃ bhunakti tattiṣṭhati yāvadeva /
GP12garup1_u:4782: na kevalaṃ tacchubhakṛnnṛpasya bhāgyaiḥ prajānāmapi tasya janma //
GP12garup1_u:4784: nakṣatramāleva divo viśīrṇā dantāvalistasya mahāmurasya // GarP_1,69.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4785: vicitravarṇeṣu viśuddhavarṇā payaḥ su patyuḥ payasāṃ papāta /
GP12garup1_u:4794: cintyā na tasyākarajā viśeṣā rūpe pramāṇe ca yateta vidvān /
GP12garup1_u:4795: na ca vyavasthāsti guṇāguṇeṣu sarvatra sarvākṛtayo bhavanti //
GP12garup1_u:4797: mūlyaṃ sahasrāṇi tu rūpakāṇāṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyādhikāni pañca //
GP12garup1_u:4799: yanmāṣakāṃstrīnbibhṛyātsahasre dve tasya mūlyaṃ paramaṃ pradiṣṭam //
GP12garup1_u:4800: ardhādhikau dvau vahato 'sya mūlyaṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyadhikaṃ sahasram /
GP12garup1_u:4801: dvimāṣa konmānitagauravasya śatāni cāṣṭau kathitāni mūlyam // GarP_1,69.28
GP12garup1_u:4802: ardhādhikaṃ māṣakamunmitasya samaṃ ca viṃśatritayaṃ śatānām /
GP12garup1_u:4803: guñjāśca ṣaḍ dhārayataḥ śate dve mūlyaṃ paraṃ tasya vadanti tajjñāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4804: adhyardhamunmāna(pa) kṛtaṃ śataṃ syānmūlyaṃ guṇaistasya samanvitasya //
GP12garup1_u:4806: adhikaṃ daśabhiḥ śataṃ ca mūlyaṃ samavāpnotyapi bāliśasya hastāt //
GP12garup1_u:4809: triṃśatā dharaṇaṃ pūrṇaṃ śikyaṃ tasyeti kīrtyate /
GP12garup1_u:4812: pañcāśattu bhavetsomastasya mūlyaṃ tu viṃśatiḥ // GarP_1,69.33 //
GP12garup1_u:4817: ghṛṣṭaṃ tato mṛdutanūkṛtapiṇḍamūlaiḥ kuryādyatheṣṭamanu mauktikamāśu viddham // GarP_1,69.35
GP12garup1_u:4818: mṛlliptamatsyapuṭamadhyagataṃ tu kṛtvā paścātpacettanu tataśca biḍālapuṭyā
GP12garup1_u:4819: dugdhe tataḥ payasi taṃ vipacetsudhāyāṃ pakraṃ tato 'pi payasā śucicikraṇena // GarP_1,69.36
GP12garup1_u:4821: vyāḍirjagāda jagatāṃ hi mahāprabhāvaḥ siddho vidagdhahitatatparayā dayāluḥ
GP12garup1_u:4824: evaṃ hi siṃhale deśe kurvanti kuśalā janāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4829: sitaṃ pramāṇavatsnigdhaṃ guru svacchaṃ sunirmalam // GarP_1,69.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4830: tejo 'dhikaṃ suvṛttaṃ ca mauktikaṃ guṇavatsmṛtam // GarP_1,69.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4833: evaṃ samastena guṇodayena yanmauktikaṃ yogamupāgataṃ syāt /
GP12garup1_u:4834: na tasya bhartāramanarthajāta eko 'pi kaścit samupaiti doṣaḥ //
GP12garup1_u:4835: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe muktāphalapramāṇādivarṇanaṃ nāma muktāphalaparīkṣā nāmaikonasaptatitamo
GP12garup1_u:4840: asṛggṛhītvā carituṃ pratasthe nistriṃśanīlena nabhaḥ sthalena //
GP12garup1_u:4847: tataḥ prabhṛtyeva ca śarvarīṣu kūlāni ratnairnicitāni tasyāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4854: sāṃdre 'pi rāge prabhayā svayaiva bhānti svalakṣyāḥ sphuṭamadhyaśobhāḥ //
GP12garup1_u:4860: anye punaḥ santi ca puṣpitānāṃ tulyatviṣā kokanadottamānām // GarP_1,70.11
GP12garup1_u:4863: kāmaṃ tu rāgaḥ kuruvindajeṣu sa naiva yādṛk sphaṭikodbhaveṣu /
GP12garup1_u:4868: na jāyante hi ye kecinmūlyaleśamavāpnuyuḥ // GarP_1,70.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4870: sadharmāṇaḥ prajāyante svalpamūlyā hi te smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,70.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4872: arciṣmattā mahattā ca maṇīnāṃ guṇasaṃgrahaḥ // GarP_1,70.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4874: na te praśastā maṇayo bhavanti samānato jātiguṇaiḥ samastaiḥ //
GP12garup1_u:4884: yastāmrikāṃ puṣyati padmarāgo yogāttuṣāṇāmiva pūrṇamadhyaḥ // GarP_1,70.23
GP12garup1_u:4885: strehapradigdhaḥ pratibhāti yaśca yo vā praghṛṣṭaḥ prajahāti dīptim /

GP12garup1_u:4888: tulyapramāṇasya ca tulyajāteryo vā gurutvena bhavettu tulyaḥ /

GP12garup1_u:4892: vajraṃ vā kuruvindaṃ vā vimucyānena kenacit /
GP12garup1_u:4894: jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇerna jātu vijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4895: tathāpi nānākaraṇārthameva bhedaprakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ // GarP_1,70.28

GP12garup1_u:4901: na padmarāgasya mahāguṇasya bhartāramāpatspṛśatīha kācit // GarP_1,70.31
GP12garup1_u:4903: guṇaiḥ samuttejitacārurāgaṃ yaḥ padmarāgaṃ prayato bibharti //
GP12garup1_u:4908: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe padmarāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptatitamo
GP12garup1_u:4912: dvidhā kurvanniva vyoma satvaraṃ vāsukiryayau // GarP_1,71.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4921: tatraiva kiñcitpatatastu pittādupetya jagrāha tato garutmān /
GP12garup1_u:4924: kalhāraśaṣpakabhujaṅgabhujāñca patraprāptatviṣo marakatāḥ śubhadā bhavanti // GarP_1,71.7
GP12garup1_u:4926: tasyākarasyātitarāṃ sa deśo duḥ khopalabhyaśca guṇaiśca yuktaḥ //
GP12garup1_u:4935: yuktaṃ saṃsthānaguṇaiḥ samarāgaṃ gauraveṇa na vihīnam /
GP12garup1_u:4944: tadapi guṇavatsaṃjñāmāpnoti hi yādṛśī pūrvam // GarP_1,71.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4948: śreyaskāmairna taddhāryaṃ kretavyaṃ vā katañcana // GarP_1,71.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4951: kṣaumeṇa vāsasā mṛṣṭā dīptiṃ tyajati putrikā /
GP12garup1_u:4952: lāghavenaiva kācasya śakyā kartuṃ vibhāvanā // GarP_1,71.21 //
GP12garup1_u:4955: vajrāṇi muktāḥ santyanye ye ca keciddvijātayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4964: saṃgrāme vicaradbhiśca dhāryaṃ marakataṃ budhaiḥ // GarP_1,71.27 //
GP12garup1_u:4969: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍa marakataparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikasaptatitamo
GP12garup1_u:4973: deśe papāta ditijasya nitāntakāntaṃ protphullanīrajasamadyuti netrayugmam
GP12garup1_u:4984: tata eva hi jāyante maṇayastatra bhūrayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4991: ta eva pratyayā dṛṣṭā indranīlamaṇerapi // GarP_1,72.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4999: kathitā vijātaya ime sadṛśā maṇinendranīlena // GarP_1,72.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5007: nīlatāṃ tannayetsarvaṃ mahānīlaḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,72.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5009: tadindranīlasya mahāguṇasya suvarṇa saṃkhyātu litasya mūlyam //
GP12garup1_u:5010: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe indranīlaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma dvisaptatitamo
GP12garup1_u:5014: parīkṣāṃ brahmaṇā proktāṃ vyāsena kathitāṃ dvijā // GarP_1,73.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5026: cāṣāgrapakṣapratimaśriyo ye na te praśastā maṇiśāstravidbhiḥ //
GP12garup1_u:5034: tadeva vaidūryamaṇeḥ pradiṣṭaṃ paladvayonmāpi tagauravasya // GarP_1,73.11
GP12garup1_u:5035: jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇestu yādṛgvijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5037: sukhopalakṣyaśca sadā vicāryo hyayaṃ prabhedo viduṣā nareṇa /
GP12garup1_u:5038: snehaprabhedo laghutā mṛdutvaṃ vijātiliṅgaṃ khalu sārvajanyam //
GP12garup1_u:5042: yadi nāma bhavanti doṣahīnā maṇayaḥ ṣaḍguṇamāpnuvanti mūlyam //
GP12garup1_u:5044: mūlyametanmaṇīnāṃ tu na sarvatra mahītale // GarP_1,73.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5046: tasya saptatimo bhāgaḥ saṃjñārūpaṃ kariṣyati // GarP_1,73.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5048: palasya daśamo bhāgo dharaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,73.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5049: itthaṃ maṇividhiḥ prokto ratnānāṃ mūlyaniścaye // GarP_1,73.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5050: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma trisaptatitamo
GP12garup1_u:5054: prādurbhavanti tābhyastu puṣpa (ṣya) rāgā mahāguṇāḥ // GarP_1,74.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5056: kaukaṇṭakanāmā syātsa eva yadi lohitāpītaḥ // GarP_1,74.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5057: ālohitastu pītaḥ svacchaḥ kāṣāyakaḥ sa ekoktaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5058: ānīlaśuklavarṇaḥ snigdhaḥ somāla(na) kaḥ saguṇaḥ // GarP_1,74.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5059: atyantalohito yaḥ sa eva khalu padmarāgasaṃjñaḥ syāt /
GP12garup1_u:5060: api cendranīlasaṃjñaḥ sa eva kathitaḥ sunīlaḥ san // GarP_1,74.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5062: dhāraṇaphalaṃ ca tadvatkiṃ tu strīṇāṃ sutaprado bhavati // GarP_1,74.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5063: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe puṣparāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5067: tataḥ prasūtaṃ pavanopapannaṃ karketanaṃ pūjayatamaṃ pṛthivyām //
GP12garup1_u:5069: nīlaṃ punaḥ khalu sitaṃ paruṣaṃ vibhinnaṃ vyādhyādidoṣakaraṇena ca tadvibhāti // GarP_1,75.2
GP12garup1_u:5070: snigdhā viśuddhāḥ samarāgiṇaśca āpītavarṇā guravo vicitrāḥ /
