GP12garup1_u:5073: rogapraṇāśanakaraṃ kalināśanaṃ tadāyuṣkaraṃ kulakaraṃ ca sukhapradaṃ ca //
GP12garup1_u:5074: evaṃvidhaṃ bahuguṇaṃ maṇimāvahanti karketanaṃ śubhalaṅkṛtaye narā ye /
GP12garup1_u:5075: te pūjitā bahudhanā bahubāndhavāśca nityojjvalāḥ pramuditā apite bhavanti // GarP_1,75.5
GP12garup1_u:5079: tasyottamasya maṇi śāstravidāṃ mahimnā tulyaṃ tu mūlyamuditaṃ tulitasya kāryam // GarP_1,75.7
GP12garup1_u:5080: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karketanaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcasaptatitamo
GP12garup1_u:5088: bhīṣmamaṇiṃ grīvādiṣu susampadaṃ sa sarvadā labhate // GarP_1,76.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5100: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatitamo
GP12garup1_u:5103: puṇyeṣu parvatavareṣu ca nimnagāsu sthānāntareṣu ca tathottaradeśagatvāt /
GP12garup1_u:5104: saṃsthāpitāḥ svanakhabāhugateḥ prakāśaṃ saṃpūjya dānavapatiṃ prathite pradeśe // GarP_1,77.1
GP12garup1_u:5111: mṛtyupradāśca viduṣā parivarjanīyā mūlyaṃ palasya kathitaṃ ca śatāni pañca
GP12garup1_u:5112: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pulakaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptasaptatitamo
GP12garup1_u:5120: madhyendupāṇḍuramatīva viśuddhavarṇaṃ taccendranīlasadṛśaṃ paṭalaṃ tule syāt /
GP12garup1_u:5121: saiśvaryabhṛtyajananaṃ kathitaṃ tadaiva pakrañca tatkila bhavetsuravajravarṇam // GarP_1,78.3
GP12garup1_u:5122: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rudhirākṣaratnaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5130: saṃskṛtaṃ śilpinā sadyo mūlyaṃ kiñcillabhettataḥ (dā) // GarP_1,79.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5131: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sphaṭikaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikonāśītitamo
GP12garup1_u:5135: cikṣepa tatra jāyante vidrumāḥ subhahāguṇāḥ // GarP_1,80.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5137: sunīlakaṃ devakaromakañca sthānāni teṣu prabhavaṃ surāgam // GarP_1,80.2
GP12garup1_u:5138: anyatra jātaṃ ca na tatpradhānaṃ mūlyaṃ bhavecchilpiviśeṣayogāt /
GP12garup1_u:5139: prasannaṃ komalaṃ snigdhaṃ surāgaṃ vidrumaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,80.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5143: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vidrumaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāśītitamo
GP12garup1_u:5149: sarvatra sulabhā gaṅgātriṣu sthāneṣu durlabhā // GarP_1,81.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5151: prayāgaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ mṛtānāṃ bhuktimuktidam // GarP_1,81.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5153: vārāṇasī paraṃ tīrthaṃ viśveśo yatra keśavaḥ // GarP_1,81.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5155: prabhāsaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ somanātho hi tatra ca // GarP_1,81.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5157: prācī sarasvatī puṇyā saptasārasvataṃ param // GarP_1,81.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5160: śvetadvīpaṃ purī māyā naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:5161: ayodhyā cārghyatīrthaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ ca gomatī // GarP_1,81.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5168: mahā keśī ca kāverī candrabhāgā vipāśayā /
GP12garup1_u:5169: ekāmraṃ ca tathā tīrthaṃ brahmeśaṃ devakoṭakam // GarP_1,81.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5170: mathurā ca purī ramyā śoṇaścaiva mahānadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5171: jambūsaro mahātīrthaṃ tāni tīrthāni viddhi ca // GarP_1,81.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5172: sūryaḥ śivo gaṇo devī hariryatra ca tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup1_u:5173: eteṣu ca yathānyeṣu snānaṃ dānaṃ japastapaḥ // GarP_1,81.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5174: pūjā śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati cākṣayam /
GP12garup1_u:5175: śālagrāmaṃ sarvadaṃ syāttīrthaṃ paśupateḥ param // GarP_1,81.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5176: kokāmukhaṃ ca vārāhaṃ bhā (bhu) ṇḍīraṃ svāmisaṃjñakam /
GP12garup1_u:5179: puṇḍravardhanakaṃ tīrthaṃ kārtikeyaśca yatra ca // GarP_1,81.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5181: mahendraparvatastīrthaṃ kāverī ca nadī parā // GarP_1,81.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5183: vindhyaḥ pāpaharaṃ tīrthaṃ narmadābheda uttamaḥ // GarP_1,81.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5184: gokarṇaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ māhiṣmatī purī /
GP12garup1_u:5186: kṛte śauce muktidaṃ ca śārṅgadhārī tadantike /
GP12garup1_u:5187: virajaṃ sarvadaṃ tīrthaṃ svarṇākṣaṃ tīrthamuttamam // GarP_1,81.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5189: nāsikyaṃ ca mahātīrthaṃ govardhanamataḥ param // GarP_1,81.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5191: tīrthaṃ bindusaraḥ puṇyaṃ viṣṇupādodakaṃ param // GarP_1,81.22 //
GP12garup1_u:5193: damastīrthaṃ tu paramaṃ bhavaśuddhiḥ paraṃ tathā // GarP_1,81.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5195: yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,81.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5196: idaṃ tīrthamidaṃ neti ye narā bhedadarśinaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5197: teṣāṃ vidhīyate tīrthagamanaṃ tatphalaṃ ca yat // GarP_1,81.25 //
GP12garup1_u:5201: śrīraṅgaṃ ca harestīrthaṃ tāpī śreṣṭhā mahānadī // GarP_1,81.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5203: mahālakṣmīryatra devī praṇītā paramā nadī // GarP_1,81.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5206: snātvā kanakhale tīrthe sa bhavenna punarbhave /
GP12garup1_u:5208: etānyanyāni tīrthāni snānādyaiḥ sarvadāni hi // GarP_1,81.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5212: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sarvatīrtha māhātmyaṃ nāmaikāśītitamo
GP12garup1_u:5222: śaraṇaṃ harirūce tān bhavitavyaṃ śivātmabhaiḥ // GarP_1,82.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5228: tasya deho liṅgarūpī sthitaḥ śuddhe pitāmahaḥ // GarP_1,82.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5231: yajñaṃ śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ snānādi kurute naraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5232: sa svargaṃ brahmalokaṃ ca gacchenna narakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,82.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5233: gayātīrthaṃ paraṃ jñātvā yāgaṃ cakre pitāmahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5240: mā bhūttraipuruṣī vidyā mā bhūttraipuruṣaṃ dhanam // GarP_1,82.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5243: lokāḥ puṇyā gayāyāṃ hi śrāddhino brahmalokagāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5244: yuṣmānye pūjayiṣyanti tairahaṃ pūjitaḥ sadā // GarP_1,82.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5246: vāsaḥ puṃsāṃ kurukṣetre muktireṣā caturvidhā // GarP_1,82.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5248: snātukāmā gayātīrthaṃ vyāsa yāsa yānti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,82.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5251: asaṃskṛtā mṛtā ya ca paśucorahatāśca ye /
GP12garup1_u:5252: sarpadaṣṭā gayāśrāddhānmuktāḥ svargaṃ vrajanti te // GarP_1,82.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5254: na tacchakyaṃ mayā vaktuṃ varṣakoṭiśatairapi // GarP_1,82.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5255: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma dvyaśītitamo
GP12garup1_u:5258: kīkaṭeṣu gayā puṇyā puṇyaṃ rājagṛhaṃ vanam /
GP12garup1_u:5259: viṣayaścāraṇaḥ puṇyo nadīnāṃ ca punaḥ punā // GarP_1,83.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5269: taṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ mucyate vai ṛṇatrayāt // GarP_1,83.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5271: kāleśvaraṃ ca kedāraṃ pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5273: lokaṃ tvanāmayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham // GarP_1,83.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5275: taṃ praṇamya prayatnena na bhūyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,83.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5277: dṛṣṭvā maunena viprarṣe pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.10 //
GP12garup1_u:5279: gāyattrīṃ pratarutthāya yastu paśyati mānavaḥ // GarP_1,83.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5281: sāvitrīṃ caiva madhyāhne dṛṣṭvā yajñaphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5282: sarasvatīṃ ca sāyāhne dṛṣṭvā dānaphalaṃ labhet /
GP12garup1_u:5285: devaṃ gṛdhreśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,83.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5287: prabhāseśaṃ prabhāse ca dṛṣṭvā yāti parāṃ gatim // GarP_1,83.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5291: brahmeśvaraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā mucyate brahmahatyayā // GarP_1,83.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5293: phalgvīśaṃ phalgucaṇḍīṃ ca gaurīṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maṅgalām // GarP_1,83.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5295: aṅgāreśaṃ ca siddheśaṃ gayādityaṃ gajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,83.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5297: phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharam // GarP_1,83.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5298: etena kiṃ na paryāptaṃ nṝṇāṃ sukṛtakāriṇām /
GP12garup1_u:5300: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthānī ye samudrāḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GP12garup1_u:5302: pṛthivyāṃ ca gayā puṇyā gayāyāṃ ca gayāśiraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5303: śreṣṭhaṃ tathā phalgutīrthaṃ tanmukhaṃ ca surasya hi // GarP_1,83.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5309: koṭitītha gayālole vaitaraṇyāṃ ca gomake // GarP_1,83.26 //
GP12garup1_u:5313: uttare mānase śrāddhī na bhūyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,83.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5317: gṛdhreśvare tathā śrāddhī pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.29 //
GP12garup1_u:5319: tiladhenupradaḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā dhenuṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5320: aindre vā naratīrthe ca vāsave vaiṣṇave tathā /
GP12garup1_u:5322: gāyattre caiva sāvitre tīrthe sārasvate tathā /
GP12garup1_u:5324: pitṝṇāṃ tu kulaṃ brahmalokaṃ nayati mānavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5329: dharmayūpe ca kūpe ta pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.35 //
GP12garup1_u:5332: rāmatīrthe narāḥ snātvā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā prabhāsake /
GP12garup1_u:5336: gayāyāṃ na hi tatsthānaṃ yatra tīrthaṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5337: pañcakrośe gayākṣetre yatra tatra tu piṇḍadaḥ // GarP_1,83.39 //
GP12garup1_u:5339: janārdanasya haste tu piṇḍaṃ dadyātsvakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,83.40 //
GP12garup1_u:5340: eṣa piṇḍe mayā dattastava haste janārdana ! /
GP12garup1_u:5343: gayāyāṃ dharmapṛṣṭhe ca sarasi brahmaṇastathā // GarP_1,83.42 //
GP12garup1_u:5347: brahmāraṇyaṃ mahānadyāḥ paścimo bhāga ucyate // GarP_1,83.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5349: bharatasyāśrame śrāddhī mataṅgasya pade bhavet // GarP_1,83.45 //
GP12garup1_u:5351: tatsmṛtaṃ campakavanaṃ tatra pāṇḍuśilāsti hi // GarP_1,83.46 //
GP12garup1_u:5355: padāni tatra krauñcasya śrāddhī svargaṃ nayetpitṝn // GarP_1,83.48 //
GP12garup1_u:5361: sāvitre paṭhyate sandhyā kṛtā syāddvādaśābdikī // GarP_1,83.51 //
GP12garup1_u:5362: śuklakṛṣṇāvubhau pakṣau gayāyāṃ yo vasennaraḥ punātyāsaptamaṃ caiva kulaṃ nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ gayāyāṃ muṇāḍapṛṣṭhaṃ ca aravindaṃ ca parvatam /
GP12garup1_u:5363: tṛtīyaṃ kraiñcapādaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,83.53 //
GP12garup1_u:5365: durlabhaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gayāyāṃ piṇḍapātanam // GarP_1,83.54 //
GP12garup1_u:5367: guhāyāṃ gṛdhrakūṭasya śrāddhaṃ dattaṃ (sapta) mahāphalam // GarP_1,83.55
GP12garup1_u:5368: yatra māheśvarī dhārā śrāddhī tatrānṛṇo bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:5369: puṇyāṃ viśālāmāsādya nadīṃ trailokya viśrutām // GarP_1,83.56 //
GP12garup1_u:5371: śrāddhī māsapade snātvā vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.57 //
GP12garup1_u:5373: gayāstho yo dadātyannaṃ pitarastena putriṇaḥ // GarP_1,83.58 //
GP12garup1_u:5377: pabhdyāmapi jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā asmabhyaṃ kila dāsyati // GarP_1,83.60 //
GP12garup1_u:5378: ātmajo vā tathānyo vā gayākūpe yadā tadā /
GP12garup1_u:5379: yannāmnā pātayetpiṇḍaṃ taṃ nayedbrahma śāśvatam // GarP_1,83.61 //
GP12garup1_u:5381: yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā // GarP_1,83.62 //
GP12garup1_u:5387: teṣāṃ brahmasadaḥ sthānaṃ somapānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,83.65 //
GP12garup1_u:5389: pūjitaiḥ pūjitāḥ sarve pitṛbhiḥ saha devatāḥ // GarP_1,83.66 //
GP12garup1_u:5391: sthānaṃ dehaparityāge gayāyāṃ tu vidhīyate // GarP_1,83.67 //
GP12garup1_u:5393: agniṣṭomaśataṃ puṇyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.68 //
GP12garup1_u:5397: tebhyo vyāsagayābhūmau piṇḍo deyo vidhānataḥ // GarP_1,83.70 //
GP12garup1_u:5399: mataṅgavāpyāṃ snātvā ca gosahasraphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.71 //
GP12garup1_u:5401: vasiṣṭhasyāśrame snātvā vājapeyaṃ ca vindati // GarP_1,83.72 //
GP12garup1_u:5404: samīpe tvagnidhāreti viśrutā kapilā hi sā /
GP12garup1_u:5408: somakuṇḍe naraḥ snātvā somalokaṃ ca gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:5409: saṃvartasya naro vāpyāṃ subhagaḥ syāttu piṇḍadaḥ // GarP_1,83.76 //
GP12garup1_u:5410: dhautapāpo naro yāti pretakuṇḍe ca piṇḍadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5414: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma tryaśītitamo
GP12garup1_u:5417: udyatastu gayāṃ gantuṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5424: varjayitvā kurukṣetraṃ viśālāṃ virajāṃ gayām // GarP_1,84.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5425: divā ca sarvadā rātrau gayāyāṃ śrāddhakṛdbhavet /
GP12garup1_u:5426: vārāṇasyāṃ kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ tīrthe śoṇanade tathā // GarP_1,84.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5428: uttaraṃ mānasaṃ gatvā siddhiṃ prāpnotyanuttamām // GarP_1,84.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5430: kāmānsa labhate divyānmokṣopāyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_1,84.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5431: dakṣiṇaṃ mānasaṃ gatvā maunī piṇḍādi kārayet /
GP12garup1_u:5435: nāmnā kanakhalaṃ tīrthaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12garup1_u:5437: tatra snātvā divaṃ yāti śrāddhaṃ dattamathākṣayam /
GP12garup1_u:5442: madīyāḥ pitaro ye ca kule jātāḥ sanābhayaḥ // GarP_1,84.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5446: phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharam // GarP_1,84.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5452: śrāddhaṃ piṇḍodakaṃ kāryaṃ madhye vai kūpayūpayoḥ // GarP_1,84.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5454: tṛtīye 'bahni brahmasado gatvā snātvātha tarpaṇam // GarP_1,84.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5455: kṛtvā śrāddhādikaṃ piṇḍaṃ madhye vai yūpakūpayoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5464: anvaṣṭakāsu vṛddhau ca gayāyāṃ mṛtavāsare // GarP_1,84.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5465: atra mātuḥ pṛthak śrāddhamanyatra patinā saha /
GP12garup1_u:5466: snātvā daśāśvamedhe tu dṛṣṭvā devaṃ pitāmaham // GarP_1,84.25 //
GP12garup1_u:5467: rudrapādaṃ naraḥ spṛṣṭvā na cehāvartate punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5471: pitaro yānti devatvaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:5472: muṇḍapṛṣṭe padaṃ nyastaṃ mahādevena dhīmatā // GarP_1,84.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5474: gayāśīrṣe tu yaḥ piṇḍānnāmnā yeṣāṃ tu nirvapet // GarP_1,84.29 //
GP12garup1_u:5476: pañcame 'hni gandālole snātvā vaṭatale tataḥ // GarP_1,84.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5480: kṛte śrāddhe 'kṣayavaṭe dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham // GarP_1,84.32 //
GP12garup1_u:5482: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ puttrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,84.33 //
GP12garup1_u:5492: gayāyāṃ piṇḍadānena tava sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,84.38 //
GP12garup1_u:5494: dṛṣṭvākāśe sitaṃ raktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ puruṣamabravīt // GarP_1,84.39 //
GP12garup1_u:5495: ke yūyaṃ teṣu caivaikaḥ sitaḥ proce viśālakam /
GP12garup1_u:5496: ahaṃ sitaste janaka indralokaṃ gataḥ śabham // GarP_1,84.40 //
GP12garup1_u:5497: mama putra pitā rakto brahmahā pāpakṛtparam /
GP12garup1_u:5498: ayaṃ pitāmahaḥ kṛṣṇa ṛṣayo 'nena ghātitāḥ // GarP_1,84.41 //
GP12garup1_u:5499: avīciṃ narakaṃ prāptau muktau jātau ca piṇḍada /
GP12garup1_u:5501: kṛtakṛtyo viśālo 'pi rājyaṃ kṛtvā divaṃ yayau /
GP12garup1_u:5504: yeṣāṃ dāho na kriyāca ye 'gnidagdhāstathāpare // GarP_1,84.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5505: bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:5508: tathā mātāmahaścaiva pramātāmaha eva ca // GarP_1,84.46 //
GP12garup1_u:5512: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma caturaśītitamo
GP12garup1_u:5517: asmatkule mṛtā ye ca gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5519: pitavaṃśe mṛtā ye ca mātṛvaṃśe ca ye mṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5521: mātāmahakule ye ca gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5523: ajātadantā ye kecidye ca garbhe prapīḍitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5526: svagotre paragotre vā gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5529: ātmopaghātino ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5531: daṃṣṭribhiḥ śṛṅgibhirvāpi teṣāṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5533: vidyuccaurahatā ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5534: raurave cāndhatāmistre kālasūtre ca ye gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5536: asipatravane ghore kaṃbhīpāke ca ye gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5541: athavā vṛkṣayoni sthāstebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5545: mānuṣyaṃ durlabhaṃ yeṣāṃ tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5549: te sarve tṛptimāyāntu piṇḍadānena sarvadā // GarP_1,85.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5550: ye me pitṛkule jātāḥ kule mātustathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:5551: guruśvaśurabandhūnāṃ ye cānye bāndhavā mṛtāḥ // GarP_1,85.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5553: kriyālo pahatā ye ca jātyandhāḥ paṅgavastathā // GarP_1,85.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5557: maya gayāṃ samāsādya pitṝṇāṃ niṣkatiḥ kṛtā // GarP_1,85.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5562: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma pañcāśītitamo
GP12garup1_u:5565: yeyaṃ pretaśilā khyātā gayāyāṃ sā tridhā sthitā /
GP12garup1_u:5568: pretatvaṃ ye gatā nṝṇāṃ mitrādyā bāndhavādayaḥ // GarP_1,86.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5570: ato 'tra munayo bhūpā rājapatnyādayaḥ sadā // GarP_1,86.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5572: gayāsurasya yanmuṇḍaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhe śilā yataḥ // GarP_1,86.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5578: gadādharādayo devā ādyā ādau vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_1,86.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5586: yathā dāśarathī rāmaḥ kṛṣṇobuddho 'tha kalkyapi // GarP_1,86.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5590: gadādharaṃ suraiḥ sārdhamādyaṃ gatvā dadāti yaḥ // GarP_1,86.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5591: arghyaṃ pātraṃ ca pādyaṃ ca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam /
GP12garup1_u:5592: dīpaṃ naivaidyamutkaṣṭaṃ mālyāni vividhāni ca // GarP_1,86.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5602: jñānaṃ prāpya śriyaṃ putrānvrajanti puruṣottamam // GarP_1,86.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5611: vidyāṃ sarasvatīṃ prārcya lakṣmīṃ saṃpūjya ca śriyam /
GP12garup1_u:5618: subhadrāṃ pūjayitvā tu saubhāgyaṃ paramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5620: nārāyaṇaṃ tu saṃpūjya narāṇāmadhipo bhavet // GarP_1,86.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5621: spṛṣṭvā natvā nārasiṃhaṃ saṃgrāme vijayī bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:5628: brahmeśvaraṃ naraḥ stutvā brahmalokāya kalpyate // GarP_1,86.32 //
GP12garup1_u:5630: kedāraṃ pūjayitvā tu śivaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,86.33 //
GP12garup1_u:5631: siddheśvaraṃ ca saṃpūjya siddho brahmapuraṃ vrajet /
GP12garup1_u:5632: ādyai rudrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā hyādigadādharam // GarP_1,86.34 //
GP12garup1_u:5638: putrānputrārthinī strī ca saubhāgyaṃ ca tadarthinī // GarP_1,86.37 //
GP12garup1_u:5642: pṛthivyāṃ sarvatīrthebhyo yathā śreṣṭhā gayā purī // GarP_1,86.39 //
GP12garup1_u:5644: tasmindṛṣṭe śilā dṛṣṭā yataḥ sarvaṃ gadādharaḥ // GarP_1,86.40 //
GP12garup1_u:5645: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma ṣaḍaśītitamo
GP12garup1_u:5656: sa hato viṣṇunā daityaścakreṇa sumahātmanā // GarP_1,87.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5658: citrako vinataścaiva karṇānto vidyuto raviḥ // GarP_1,87.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5660: ūrja stambastathā prāṇa ṛṣabho niścala (ra) stathā // GarP_1,87.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5662: tuṣitā dvādaśa proktāstathā pārāvatāśca ye // GarP_1,87.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5666: vinītaśca suketuśca sumitraḥ subalaḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,87.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5671: pañca devagaṇāḥ proktā sarve dvādaśakāstu te /
GP12garup1_u:5672: indraḥ svaśāntistacchukraḥ pralambo nāma dānavaḥ // GarP_1,87.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5674: tāmasasya manoḥ putrā jānujaṅgho 'tha nirbhayaḥ // GarP_1,87.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5678: munayaḥ kīrtitāḥ sapta surāgāḥ sudhiyastathā // GarP_1,87.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5679: harayo devatāmāṃ ca catvāraḥ pañca (sapta) viṃśakāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5680: gaṇā indraḥ śivistasya śatrurbhomarathāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,87.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5682: raivatasya manoḥ putro mahā prāṇaśca sādhakaḥ // GarP_1,87.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5686: hiraṇyaromā parjanyaḥ satyanetraḥ (nāmā) svadhāma ca // GarP_1,87.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5688: vaikuṇṭha (ṇṭhāḥ ścāmṛta (tā) ścaiva catvāro devatāgaṇāḥ // GarP_1,87.20
GP12garup1_u:5690: śāntaḥ śatrurhato daityo haṃsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā // GarP_1,87.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5696: āryāḥ prabhūtā bhāvyāśca lekhāśca pṛthukāstathā // GarP_1,87.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5697: aṣṭakasya gaṇāḥ pañca tathā proktā divaukasām /
GP12garup1_u:5702: nariṣyantastathā pāṃsurnabho nediṣṭha eva ca // GarP_1,87.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5708: ekādaśā tathā rudrā vasavo 'ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5711: tejasvī nāma vai śakro hiraṇyākṣo ripuḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5716: aśvatthāmā kṛpo vyāso gālavo dīptimānatha // GarP_1,87.34 //
GP12garup1_u:5718: sutapā amṛtābhāśca mukhyāścāpi tathā surāḥ // GarP_1,87.35 //
GP12garup1_u:5719: teṣāṃ gaṇastu devānā mekaiko viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5725: pṛtuśravā bṛhadūdyumna ṛcīko bṛhato guṇaḥ // GarP_1,87.38 //
GP12garup1_u:5728: paro marīcirgarbhaśca sva (su) dharmāṇaśca te trayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5730: bhaviṣyanti tadā devā ekaiko dvādaśo gaṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5732: dhamaputrasya putrāṃstu daśa masya manoḥ śṛṇu /
GP12garup1_u:5740: baliḥ śatrustaṃ hariśca gadayā ghātayiṣyati // GarP_1,87.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5742: sarvatragaḥ suśarmā ca devānīkaḥ pururguruḥ // GarP_1,87.45 //
GP12garup1_u:5756: surārayo gaṇāścaite pratyekaṃ daśako gaṇaḥ // GarP_1,87.52 //
GP12garup1_u:5757: ṛtadhāmā ca bhadre (tatre) ndrastārako nāma tadripuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5764: sva (su) romāṇaḥ sva (su) dharmāṇaḥ sva (su) karmāṇastathāmarāḥ //
GP12garup1_u:5766: indro divaspatiḥ śatrustviṣṭibho nāma dānavaḥ // GarP_1,87.57 //
GP12garup1_u:5769: ururgabhīro dhṛṣṭaśca tarasvīgrā (gra) ha eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:5771: tejasvī durlabhaścaiva bhautyasyaite manoḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,87.59 //
GP12garup1_u:5773: ajito muktaśukrau ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.60 //
GP12garup1_u:5775: vacovṛddhā devagaṇāḥ pañca proktāstu saptakāḥ // GarP_1,87.61 //
GP12garup1_u:5777: eko devaścaturdhā tu vyāsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā // GarP_1,87.62 //
GP12garup1_u:5779: aṅgāni caturo vedā mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ // GarP_1,87.63 //
GP12garup1_u:5781: dhanurvedaśca gāndharvo vidyā hyaṣṭādaśaiva tāḥ // GarP_1,87.64 //
GP12garup1_u:5782: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe manutadvaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma spatāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5786: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ pitṛsto traṃ krauñcukiṃ prāha tacchṛṇu // GarP_1,88.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5791: nimuktasaṃgaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā procuḥ svapitaro munim // GarP_1,88.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5793: vatsa kasmāttvayā puṇyo na kṛto dāra saṃgrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5802: akṛtvā ca kathaṃ māṇḍyaṃ svargatiṃ prāptumicchasi // GarP_1,88.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5804: mṛtasya narakaṃ tyaktvā kleśa evānyajanmani // GarP_1,88.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5807: bhavatyato mayā pūrvaṃna kṛto dārasaṃgrahaḥ // GarP_1,88.10 //
GP12garup1_u:5811: mama tvapaṅkadigdho 'pi vidyāmbhobhirvaraṃ hi tat // GarP_1,88.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5816: kiṃ tu nopāyamārgo 'yaṃ yatastvaṃ putra vartase // GarP_1,88.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5819: evaṃ na bandho bhavati kurvataḥ kāraṇātmakam /
GP12garup1_u:5820: na ca bandhāya tatkarma bhavatyanatisannibham // GarP_1,88.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5822: sukhaduḥ khātmakairvatsa puṇyā puṇyātmakaṃ nṛṇām // GarP_1,88.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5827: tatkathaṃ karmaṇo mārge bhavanto yojayanti mām // GarP_1,88.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5830: kiṃ tu vidyāpariprāptau hetuḥ karma na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,88.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5831: vihitākaraṇānartho na sadbhiḥ kriyate tu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5836: anuṣṭhānā bhyupāyena bandhayogyāpi no hi sā // GarP_1,88.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5840: vṛddho 'haṃ sāmprataṃ ko me pitaraḥ sampridāsyati /
GP12garup1_u:5844: nūnaṃ bhāvi bhavitrī ca nābhinandasi no vacaḥ // GarP_1,88.26 //
GP12garup1_u:5846: babhūvuḥ sahasādṛśyā dīpā vātahatā iva // GarP_1,88.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5849: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karmajñānamā nāmāṣṭāśītitamo
GP12garup1_u:5857: kiṃ karomi kra gacchāmi kathaṃ me dārasaṃgrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5863: ārādhanāya sa tadā paraṃ niyamamāsthitaḥ // GarP_1,89.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5870: sṛṣṭvā prajāḥ sutānvipra samutpādya kriyāstathā // GarP_1,89.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5872: satvaṃ yathoktaṃ pitṛbhiḥ kuru dāraparigraham // GarP_1,89.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5874: ta eva tuṣṭāḥ pitaraḥ pradāsyanti tavepsitam /
GP12garup1_u:5875: patnīṃ sutāṃśca santuṣṭāḥ kiṃ na dadyuḥ pitāmahāḥ // GarP_1,89.10 //
GP12garup1_u:5878: nadyā vivikte puline cakāra pitṛtarpaṇam // GarP_1,89.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5883: devairapi hi tarpyante ye śrāddheṣu svadhottaraiḥ // GarP_1,89.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5884: namasye 'haṃ pitṝn svarge ye tarpyante maharṣibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5903: santarpyate jagatkṛtsnaṃ nāmnā khyātāḥ sukālinaḥ // GarP_1,89.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5910: pitṝnnamasye nivasanti sākṣādye devaloke 'tha mahītale vā /
GP12garup1_u:5911: tathāntarikṣe ca surāripūjyāste vai pratīcchantu mayopanītam //
GP12garup1_u:5912: pitṝnnamasye paramārthabhūtā ye vai vimāne nivasantyamūrtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5914: pitṝnnamasye divi ye ca mūrtāḥ svadhābhujaḥ kāmyaphalābhisandhau /
GP12garup1_u:5916: tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaraḥ samastā icchāvatāṃ ye pradiśanti kāmān /
GP12garup1_u:5918: somasya ye raśmiṣu yer'kabimbe śukle vimāne ca sadā vasanti /
GP12garup1_u:5920: yeṣāṃ hute 'gnau haviṣā ca tṛptirye bhuñjate vipraśarīrasaṃsthāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5921: ye piṇḍadānena mudaṃ prayānti tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaro 'nnatoyaiḥ //
GP12garup1_u:5923: kālena śākena maharṣivaryaiḥ saṃprīṇitāste mudamatra yāntu // GarP_1,89.33
GP12garup1_u:5924: kavyānyaśeṣāṇi ca yānyabhīṣṭānyatīva teṣāṃ mama pūjitānām /
GP12garup1_u:5926: dinedine ye pratigṛhṇater'cāṃ māsāntapūjyā bhuvi ye 'ṣṭakāsu /
GP12garup1_u:5927: ye vatsarānte 'bhyudaye ca pūjyāḥ prayāntu te me pitaro 'tra tuṣṭim //
GP12garup1_u:5928: pūjyā dvijānāṃ kumudendubhāso ye kṣattriyāṇāṃ jvalanārkavarṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5929: tathā viśāṃ ye kanakāvadātā nīlīprabhāḥ śūdrajanasya ye ca // GarP_1,89.36
GP12garup1_u:5931: tathāgnihomena ca yānti tṛptiṃ sadā pitṛbhyaḥ praṇato 'smi tebhyaḥ //
GP12garup1_u:5933: tṛptāśca ye bhūtisṛjo bhavanti tṛpyantu te 'sminpraṇato 'smi tebhyaḥ //
GP12garup1_u:5938: agniṣvāttāḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ prācīṃ rakṣantu me diśam /
GP12garup1_u:5939: tathā barhiṣadaḥ pāntu yāmyāṃ me pitaraḥ sadā /
GP12garup1_u:5942: sarvataḥ pitaro rakṣāṃ kurvantu mama nityaśaḥ // GarP_1,89.42 //
GP12garup1_u:5944: bhūtido bhūtikṛd bhūtiḥ pitṝṇāṃ ye gaṇā nava // GarP_1,89.43 //
GP12garup1_u:5946: kalyatāheturanghaḥ ṣaḍime te gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,89.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5948: viśvapātā tathā dhātā saptaite ca gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,89.45 //
GP12garup1_u:5950: gaṇāḥ pañca tathaivaite pitṝṇāṃ pāpanāśanāḥ // GarP_1,89.46 //
GP12garup1_u:5952: pitṝṇāṃ kathyate caiva tathā gaṇacatuṣṭayam // GarP_1,89.47 //
GP12garup1_u:5954: ta evātra pitṛgaṇāstuṣyantu ca madāhitāt // GarP_1,89.48 //
GP12garup1_u:5962: namasyāmi sadā teṣāṃ dhyānināṃ divyacakṣuṣām // GarP_1,89.51 //
GP12garup1_u:5974: namasyāmi tathā somaṃ pitaraṃ jagatāmaham // GarP_1,89.57 //
GP12garup1_u:5977: ye ca tejasi ye caite somasūryāgnimūrtayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5985: tadbhūṣitānatha sa tāndadṛśe purataḥ sthitān // GarP_1,89.62 //
GP12garup1_u:5992: so 'haṃ patnīmabhīpsāmi dhanyāṃ divyāṃ prajāvatīm // GarP_1,89.65 //
GP12garup1_u:5995: tasyāñca putro bhavitā bhavato munisattama ! // GarP_1,89.66 //
GP12garup1_u:5997: ruce ! raucya iti khyātiṃ prayāsyati jagattraye // GarP_1,89.67 //
GP12garup1_u:6000: tvaṃ ca prijāpatirbhūtvā prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā caturvidhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6003: tasya tuṣṭā vayaṃ bhogānātmajaṃ dhyānamuttamam // GarP_1,89.70 //
GP12garup1_u:6005: vāñchadbhiḥ satataṃ stavyāḥ stotreṇānena vai yataḥ // GarP_1,89.71 //
GP12garup1_u:6006: śrāddheṣu ya imaṃ bhaktyā tvasmatprītikaraṃ stavam /
GP12garup1_u:6007: paṭhiṣyati dvijāgryāṇāṃ bhuñjatāṃ purataḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,89.72 //
GP12garup1_u:6013: akāle 'pyatha vā deśe vidhihīnamathāpi vā // GarP_1,89.75 //
GP12garup1_u:6019: śiśire dviguṇābdāni tṛptiṃ stotramidaṃ śubham // GarP_1,89.78 //
GP12garup1_u:6027: sannidhānaṃ kṛte śrāddhe tatrāsmākaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,89.82 //
GP12garup1_u:6030: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rucikṛtapitṛstotraṃ nāmaikonanavatitamo
GP12garup1_u:6034: pramlaucā nāma tanvaṅgī tatsamīpe varāpsarāḥ // GarP_1,90.1 //
GP12garup1_u:6036: prasādayāmāsa bhūyaḥ pramlocā ca varāpsarāḥ // GarP_1,90.2 //
GP12garup1_u:6039: tāṃ gṛhāṇa mayā dattāṃ bhāryārthe varavarṇinīm /
GP12garup1_u:6043: uddadhāra tataḥ kanyāṃ māninīṃ nāma nāmataḥ // GarP_1,90.5 //
GP12garup1_u:6046: tasyāṃ tasya suto jajñe mahāvīryo mahādyutiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6052: ākaśena vihīnaṃ vai tejasā parivarjitam // GarP_1,91.2 //
GP12garup1_u:6069: sarvadṛṣṭaṃ tathā mūrtaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:6074: buddhidharmavihīnaṃ vai nirādhāraṃ śivaṃ harim // GarP_1,91.13 //
GP12garup1_u:6076: vedarūpaṃ paraṃ bhūtamindriyebhyaḥ paraṃ śubham // GarP_1,91.14 //
GP12garup1_u:6080: anādi brahma randhrāntamahaṃ brahmāsmi kevalam // GarP_1,91.16 //
GP12garup1_u:6082: dhyānaṃ yaḥ kurute hyevaṃ sa bhavedbahma mānavaḥ // GarP_1,91.17 //
GP12garup1_u:6085: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe haridhyānaṃ nāmaikanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6093: amūrtaṃ rudra kathitaṃ hanta mūtta bravīmyaham /
GP12garup1_u:6096: viśālena susaumyena śaṅkhena ca samanvitaḥ // GarP_1,92.4 //
GP12garup1_u:6098: cakreṇa cānvitaḥ śānto gadāhastaḥ śubhānanaḥ // GarP_1,92.5 //
GP12garup1_u:6114: śaraṇyaḥ lasukhakārī ca saumyarūpo maheśvaraḥ // GarP_1,92.13 //
GP12garup1_u:6121: dhyāyantyevaṃ ca ye viṣṇuṃ te yānti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:6122: yājñavalkyaḥ purā hyevaṃ dhyātvā viṣṇuṃ sureśvaram // GarP_1,92.17 //
GP12garup1_u:6124: tasmāttvamapi deveśa ! viṣṇuṃ cintaya śaṅkara ! // GarP_1,92.18 //
GP12garup1_u:6125: viṣṇudhyānaṃ paṭhedyastu prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,92.19 //
GP12garup1_u:6126: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇudhyānaṃ nāma dvinavatitamo
GP12garup1_u:6129: yājñavalkyena yatpūrvaṃ dharmaṃ proktaṃ kayaṃ hare ! /
GP12garup1_u:6130: tanme kāthaya keśighna ! yathā tattvena mādhava ! // GarP_1,93.1 //
GP12garup1_u:6134: tebhyaḥ sa kathayāmāsa viṣṇuṃ dhyātvā jitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,93.2 //
GP12garup1_u:6138: vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānāṃ dharmasya ca caturdaśa /
GP12garup1_u:6143: ete viṣṇuṃ samārādhya jātā dharmopadeśakāḥ // GarP_1,93.6 //
GP12garup1_u:6147: ayaṃ ca paramo dharmo yadyogenātmadarśanam // GarP_1,93.8 //
GP12garup1_u:6149: sā brūte yatsvadharmaḥ syādeko vādhyātmavittamaḥ // GarP_1,93.9 //
GP12garup1_u:6151: niṣekādyāḥ śmaśānāntāsteṣāṃ vai mantrataḥ kriyāḥ // GarP_1,93.10 //
GP12garup1_u:6153: ṣaṣṭhe 'ṣṭame vā sīmantaḥ prasave jātakarma ca // GarP_1,93.11 //
GP12garup1_u:6157: tūṣṇa īmetāḥ kriyāḥ strīṇāṃ vivāhaśca samantrakaḥ // GarP_1,93.13 //
GP12garup1_u:6158: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharṃmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6170: prāgvā brāhmeṇa tīrthena dvijo nityamupaspṛśet // GarP_1,94.5 //
GP12garup1_u:6178: sūryasya cāpyupasthānaṃ gāyattrayāḥ pratyayaṃ japaḥ // GarP_1,94.9 //
GP12garup1_u:6198: sa gururyaḥ kriyāḥ kṛtvā vedamasmai prayacchati // GarP_1,94.19 //
GP12garup1_u:6202: prativedaṃ brahmacaryaṃ dvādaśābdāni pañca vā // GarP_1,94.21 //
GP12garup1_u:6210: yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva śubhānāṃ caiva karmaṇām // GarP_1,94.25 //
GP12garup1_u:6211: veda eva dvijātīnāṃ niḥ śreyasakaraḥ paraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6212: madhunā payasā caiva sa devāṃstarpayeddvijaḥ // GarP_1,94.26 //
GP12garup1_u:6216: vākovākyaṃ purāṇaṃ ca nārāśaṃsīśca gāthikāḥ // GarP_1,94.28 //
GP12garup1_u:6225: brahmalokamavāpnoti na ceha jāyate punaḥ // GarP_1,94.32 //
GP12garup1_u:6226: ita śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturnavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6230: gurave ca dhanaṃ dattvā snātvā ca tadanujñayā // GarP_1,95.1 //
GP12garup1_u:6236: savarṇaḥ śrotriyo vidvānvaro doṣānvito na ca // GarP_1,95.4 //
GP12garup1_u:6238: na tanmama mataṃ yasmāttatrāyaṃ jāyate svayam // GarP_1,95.5 //
GP12garup1_u:6245: ityuktvā caratāṃ dharmaṃ saha yā dīyate 'rthine /
GP12garup1_u:6246: sa kāyaḥ pāvayettajjaḥ ṣaḍvaṃśyānātmanā saha // GarP_1,95.9 //
GP12garup1_u:6250: rājñastathāsuro vaiśye śūdre cāntyastu garhitaḥ // GarP_1,95.11 //
GP12garup1_u:6253: pitā pitāmaho bhrātā sakulyo jananī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:6254: kanyāpradaḥ pūrvanāśe prakṛtīsthaḥ paraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,95.13 //
GP12garup1_u:6256: eṣāmabhāve dātṝṇāṃ kanyā kuryāt svayaṃvaram // GarP_1,95.14 //
GP12garup1_u:6258: aduṣṭāṃ hi tyajandaṇḍyaḥ suduṣṭāṃ tu parityajet // GarP_1,95.15 //
GP12garup1_u:6260: sapiṇḍo vā samotro vā ghṛtābhyakta ṛtāviyāt // GarP_1,95.16 //
GP12garup1_u:6262: anena vidhinā jāta kṣetrapasya bhavetsutaḥ // GarP_1,95.17 //
GP12garup1_u:6265: somaḥ śaucaṃ dadau tāsāṃ gandharvaśca subhāṃ giram /
GP12garup1_u:6266: pāvakaḥ sarvamedhyatvaṃ medhyā vai yoṣito yataḥ // GarP_1,95.19 //
GP12garup1_u:6268: garbhabhartṛvadhe tāsāṃ tathā mahati pātake // GarP_1,95.20 //
GP12garup1_u:6270: adhivinnā ca bhartavyā mahadenonyathā bhavet // GarP_1,95.21 //
GP12garup1_u:6272: mṛte jīvati yā patyau yā nānyamupagacchati // GarP_1,95.22 //
GP12garup1_u:6276: ṣoḍaśartuniśāḥ strīṇāṃ tāsu yugmāsu saṃviśet // GarP_1,95.24 //
GP12garup1_u:6278: evaṃ gacchaṃ striyaṃ kṣāmāṃ maghāṃ mūlāṃ ca varjayet // GarP_1,95.25 //
GP12garup1_u:6280: yathā kāmī bhavedvāpi strīṇāṃ (sma) valamanusmaran // GarP_1,95.26 //
GP12garup1_u:6284: saṃyato paskarā dakṣā hṛṣṭā vyayaparāṅmukhī // GarP_1,95.28 //
GP12garup1_u:6288: rakṣetkanyāṃ pitā bālye yauvane patireva tām // GarP_1,95.30 //
GP12garup1_u:6290: patiṃ vinā na tiṣṭhettu divā vā yadi vā niśi // GarP_1,95.31 //
GP12garup1_u:6294: hitā bharturdivaṃ gacchediha kīrtīravāpya ca // GarP_1,95.33 //
GP12garup1_u:6295: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktagṛhalthadharmanirṇayo nāma pañcanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6299: viprānmūrdhāvaṣikto hi kṣāttriyāyāṃ viśaḥ striyām // GarP_1,96.1 //
GP12garup1_u:6305: kṣattriyā māgadhaṃ vaiśyācchūdrā kṣattārameva ca // GarP_1,96.4 //
GP12garup1_u:6307: māhiṣyeṇa karaṇyāṃ tu rathakāraḥ prajāyate // GarP_1,96.5 //
GP12garup1_u:6309: jātyutkarṣāddvijo jñeyaḥ saptame pañcame 'pi vā // GarP_1,96.6 //
GP12garup1_u:6311: karma smārtaṃ vivāhāgnau kurvīta pratyahaṃ gṛhī // GarP_1,96.7 //
GP12garup1_u:6323: devebhyastu hutaṃ cāgnau kṣipedbhūtabaliṃ haret // GarP_1,96.13 //
GP12garup1_u:6330: mitaṃ vipākaṃ ca hitaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bālādipūrvakam /
GP12garup1_u:6335: satkṛtya bhikṣave bhikṣā dātavyā suvratāya ca // GarP_1,96.19 //
GP12garup1_u:6338: priyo vivāhyaśca tathā yajñaṃ pratyṛrtvijaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6345: upāsya paścimāṃ sandhyāṃ hutvāgnau bhojanaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,96.24 //
GP12garup1_u:6347: brāhme muhūrte cotthāya mānyo vipro dhanādibhiḥ // GarP_1,96.25 //
GP12garup1_u:6351: pradhānaṃ kṣattriye karma prajānāṃ paripālanam // GarP_1,96.27 //
GP12garup1_u:6353: śūdrasya dvijaśuśrūṣā dvijo yajñānna hāpayet // GarP_1,96.28 //
GP12garup1_u:6355: damaḥ kṣamārjavaṃ dānaṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmasādhanam // GarP_1,96.29 //
GP12garup1_u:6357: traivārṣikā dhikānno yaḥ sa somaṃ pātumarhati // GarP_1,96.30 //
GP12garup1_u:6359: pratisaṃvatsaraṃ somaḥ paśuḥ pratyayanaṃ tathā // GarP_1,96.31 //
GP12garup1_u:6362: hīnakalpaṃ na kurvīta sati dravye phalapradam /
GP12garup1_u:6365: kusūtakumbhīdhānyo vā tryāhikaḥ śvastano 'pi vā // GarP_1,96.34 //
GP12garup1_u:6377: na ca mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vā svapetpratyakūśirā na ca // GarP_1,96.40 //
GP12garup1_u:6381: nākṣaiḥ krījecca kitavairvyādhitaiśca na saṃviśet // GarP_1,96.42 //
GP12garup1_u:6387: hastenauṣadhibhāve vā pañcamyāṃ śrāvaṇasya ca // GarP_1,96.45 //
GP12garup1_u:6395: ṛtusandhiṣu bhuktvā vā śrāddhikaṃ pratigṛhya ca // GarP_1,96.49 //
GP12garup1_u:6403: dhāvataḥ pūtigandhe ca śiṣṭe ca gṛhamāgate // GarP_1,96.53 //
GP12garup1_u:6411: na nindātāḍane kuryātsutaṃ śiṣyaṃ ca tāḍayet // GarP_1,96.57 //
GP12garup1_u:6417: kadaryabaddhaco (vai) rāṇāṃ tathā cānamnikasya ca // GarP_1,96.60 //
GP12garup1_u:6425: na bhoktavyaṃ vṛthā māṃsaṃ keśakīṭasamanvitam // GarP_1,96.64 //
GP12garup1_u:6431: annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ bhojyaṃ snehāktaṃ cirasaṃbhṛ (sthi) tam // GarP_1,96.67
GP12garup1_u:6439: ballūraṃ kāmato jagddhvā sopa vāsastryahaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,96.71 //
GP12garup1_u:6441: śrāddhe devānpitṝnprārcya khādanmāṃsaṃ na doṣabhāk // GarP_1,96.72 //
GP12garup1_u:6444: māṃsaṃ santyajya saṃprārthya kāmānyāti tato harim // GarP_1,96.73 //
GP12garup1_u:6445: iti śrīgāruje mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktaśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12garup1_u:6984: aurasaḥ kṣetrajaḥ putraḥ pitṛjau piṇḍadau pituḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6985: parivittestu kṛcchraṃ syātkanyāyāḥ kṛcchrameva ca // GarP_1,107.27 //
GP12garup1_u:6989: naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe vā patite patau // GarP_1,107.29 //
GP12garup1_u:6991: bhartrā sahamṛtā nārī romābdāni vaseddivi // GarP_1,107.30 //
GP12garup1_u:6994: kṣīraiḥ prakṣālya tasyāsthi svāgninā mantrato dahet /
GP12garup1_u:6995: pravāse tu mṛte bhūyaḥ kṛtvā kuśamayaṃ dahet // GarP_1,107.32 //
GP12garup1_u:6997: śamīṃ śiśre viniḥ kṣipya araṇiṃ vṛṣaṇe kṣipet // GarP_1,107.33 //
GP12garup1_u:6999: pārśve tūlūkhalaṃ dadyātpṛṣṭhe tu musalaṃ dadet // GarP_1,107.34 //
GP12garup1_u:7001: śrotra ca prokṣaṇīṃ dādyadājyasthālīṃ ca cakṣuṣoḥ // GarP_1,107.35 //
GP12garup1_u:7002: karṇe netre mukhe ghrāṇe hiraṇyaśakalān kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:7010: kṣattraṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ vipraṃ dvāviṃśātriṃśamāhare (vahe) t // GarP_1,107.39
GP12garup1_u:7011: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe parāśaroktadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7016: sadbhiḥ saṅgaṃ prakurvīta siddhikāmaḥ sadā naraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7019: virodhaṃ saha mitreṇa saṃprītiṃ śatrusevinā // GarP_1,108.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7026: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7027: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ // GarP_1,108.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7028: kāleṣu harate vīryaṃ kāle garbhe ca vartate /
GP12garup1_u:7029: kālo janayate sṛṣṭiṃ punaḥ kālo 'pi saṃharet // GarP_1,108.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7036: uttamaiḥ saha sāṅgatyaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ saha satkathām /
GP12garup1_u:7037: alubdhaiḥ saha mitratvaṃ kurvāṇo nāvasīdati // GarP_1,108.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7039: paraveśmani vāsaṃ ca na kurvīta kadācana // GarP_1,108.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7042: sa bandhuryo hite yuktaḥ sa pitā yastu poṣakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7043: tanmitraṃ yatra viśvāsaḥ sa deśo yatra jīvyate // GarP_1,108.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7044: sa bhṛtyo yo vidheyastu tadbījaṃ yatprarohati /
GP12garup1_u:7045: sā bhāryā yā priyaṃ brūte sa putro yastu jīvati // GarP_1,108.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7046: sa jīvati guṇā yasya dharmo yasya sa jīvati /
GP12garup1_u:7047: guṇadharmavihīno yo niṣphala tasya jīvanam // GarP_1,108.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7048: sā bhāryā yā gṛhe dakṣā sā bhāryāyā priyaṃvadā /
GP12garup1_u:7049: sā bhāryā yā patiprāṇā sā bhāryā yā pativratā // GarP_1,108.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7050: nitya snātā sugandhā ca nityaṃ ca priyavādinī /
GP12garup1_u:7053: satataṃ priyavakrī ca satataṃ tvṛtukāminī // GarP_1,108.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7055: yasyedṛśī bhavedbhāyyā sa devendrona mānuṣaḥ // GarP_1,108.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7057: uttarottaravādā syā sā jarā na jarā jarā // GarP_1,108.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7059: kukriyā tyaktalajjā ca sā jarā na jarā jarā // GarP_1,108.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7061: alpālpena tu santuṣṭā sā priyā na priyā priyā // GarP_1,108.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7063: sasarpe ca gṛhe vāsomṛtyureva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,108.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7066: vyālīkaṇṭhapradeśāhyapi ca phaṇabhṛdbhāṣaṇā yā ca raudrī yā kṛṣṇā vyākulāgī rudhiranayanasaṃvyākulā vyāghrakalpā /
GP12garup1_u:7067: krodhe yaivogravaktrā sphuradanalaśikhā kākajihvā karālā sevyā na strī vidagdhā parapuragamanā bhrāntacittā virākta // GarP_1,108.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7068: saktiḥ sutoke sukṛtaṃ kṛtaghne śatiṃ ca vahnau (sītāpahau
GP12garup1_u:7070: utpadyate daivavaśātkadācidveśyāsu rāgo na bhavetkadācit // GarP_1,108.28
GP12garup1_u:7071: bhujaṅgame veśmani dṛṣṭidṛṣṭe vyādhau cikitsāvinivartite ca /
GP12garup1_u:7072: dehe ca bālyādivayo 'nvite ca kālā vṛto 'sau labhate dhṛtiṃ kaḥ //
GP12garup1_u:7073: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhaspatiproktanītisāranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7079: grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7080: varaṃ hi narake vāso na tu duścarite gṛhe /
GP12garup1_u:7083: na parīkṣya paraṃ sthānaṃ pūrvamāyatanaṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.4 //
GP12garup1_u:7086: arthena kiṃ kṛpaṇahastagatena kena jñānena kiṃ bahuśaṭhāgrahasaṃkulena /
GP12garup1_u:7087: rūpeṇa kiṃ guṇaparākramavarjitena mitreṇa kiṃ vyasanakālaparāṅmukhena //
GP12garup1_u:7088: adṛṣṭapūrvā bahavaḥ sahāyāḥ sarve padasthasya bhavanti mitrāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7090: āpatsu mitraṃ jānī yādraṇe śūraṃ rahaḥ śucim /
GP12garup1_u:7091: māryā ca vibhave kṣīṇe durbhikṣe ca priyātithim // GarP_1,109.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7092: vṛkṣaṃ kṣīṇaphalaṃ tyajanti vihagāḥ śuṣkaṃ saraḥ sārasānirdravyaṃ puruṣaṃ tyajanti gaṇikā bhraṣṭaṃ nṛpaṃ mantriṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7093: puṣpaṃ paryuṣitaṃ tyajanti madhupāḥ dargdha vanāntaṃ mṛgāḥ sarvaḥ kāryavaśājjano hi ramate kasyāsti ko vallabhaḥ // GarP_1,109.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7095: mūrkhaṃ chandānuvṛttyā ca yāthātathyena paṇḍitam // GarP_1,109.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7096: sadbhāvena hi tuṣyanti devāḥ satpuruṣā dvijāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7100: yasyayasya hi yo bhāvastasyatasya hitaṃ vadan /
GP12garup1_u:7102: nadīnāṃ ca nakhīnāṃ ca śṛṅgiṇāṃ śastrapāṇinām /
GP12garup1_u:7103: viśvāso naiva gantavyaḥ striṣu rājakuleṣu ca // GarP_1,109.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7105: vañcanaṃ cāpa mānaṃ ca matimānna prikāśayet // GarP_1,109.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7108: kasya doṣaḥ kule nāsti vyādhinā ko pīḍitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7109: kena na vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ śriyaḥ kasya nirantarāḥ // GarP_1,109.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7110: kor'thaṃ prāpya na garvito bhuvi naraḥ kasyāpadonāgatāḥ strībhiḥ kasya na
GP12garup1_u:7111: khaṇḍitaṃ bhuvi manaḥ ko nāma rājñāṃ priyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7112: kaḥ kālasya na gocarāntaragataḥ kor'tho gato gauravaṃ ko vā durjanavāgurānipatitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān // GarP_1,109.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7115: vipattau ca mahadduḥkhaṃ tadvudhaḥ kathamācaret // GarP_1,109.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7116: yasmindeśe na saṃmānaṃ na prītirna ca bāndhavāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7117: na ca vidyāgamaḥ kaścittaṃ deśaṃ parivarjayet // GarP_1,109.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7118: dhanasya yasya rājato bhayaṃ na cāsti caurataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7119: mṛtaṃ ca yanna mucyate samarjayasva taddhanam // GarP_1,109.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7120: yadarjitaṃ prāṇaharaiḥ pariśramairmṛtasya taṃ vai vibhajantirikthinaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7121: kṛtaṃ ca yadduṣkṛtamarthalipsayā tadeva doṣopahatasya yautukam //
GP12garup1_u:7123: ākhoriva kadaryasya dhanaṃ duḥ khāya kevalam // GarP_1,109.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7126: śikṣayanti ca yācante dehīti kṛpaṇā janāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7128: sañcitaṃ kratuśatairna yujyate yācitaṃ guṇavate na dīyate /
GP12garup1_u:7130: na devebhyo na viprobhyo bandhubhyo naiva cātmane /
GP12garup1_u:7133: arervā praṇipātena mā bhūtaste kadācana // GarP_1,109.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7135: vyādhīnāṃ bhojanaṃ jīrṇaṃ śatrorghātaḥ prapañcatā // GarP_1,109.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7137: pṛthak śayyā tu nārīṇāṃ brāhmaṇasyānimantraṇam // GarP_1,109.30 //
GP12garup1_u:7138: durjanāḥ śilpino dāsā duṣṭāśca paṭahāḥ striyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7139: tāḍitā mārdavaṃ yānti na te satkārabhājanam // GarP_1,109.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7141: mitramāpadi kāle ca bhāryāñca vibhavakṣaye // GarP_1,109.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7142: strīṇāṃ dviguṇa āhāraḥ prajñā caiva caturguṇā /
GP12garup1_u:7144: na svapnena jayennidrāṃ na kāmena striyaṃ jayet /
GP12garup1_u:7145: na cendhanairjayedvahniṃ na madyena tṛṣāṃ jayet // GarP_1,109.34 //
GP12garup1_u:7149: hṛdyaṃ hi puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ // GarP_1,109.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7150: suveṣaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ yadi vā sutam /
GP12garup1_u:7151: yoniḥ klidyati nārīṇāṃ satyaṃsatyaṃ hi śaunaka ! // GarP_1,109.37 //
GP12garup1_u:7153: toyaiśca doṣaiśca nipātayanti nadyo hi kūlāni kulā ni nāryaḥ //
GP12garup1_u:7154: nadī pātayate kūlaṃ nārī pātayate kulam /
GP12garup1_u:7155: nārīṇāñca nadīnāṃ ca svacchandā lalitā gatiḥ // GarP_1,109.39 //
GP12garup1_u:7157: nāntakaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ na puṃsāṃ vāmalocanāḥ // GarP_1,109.40 //
GP12garup1_u:7159: sukhānāñca sutānāñca jīvitasya varasya ca // GarP_1,109.41 //
GP12garup1_u:7160: rājā na tapto dhanasaṃcayena na sāgarastṛptimagājjalena /
GP12garup1_u:7161: na paṇḍitastṛpyati bhāṣitena tṛptaṃ na cakṣurnṛpadarśanena //
GP12garup1_u:7162: svakarma dharmārjitajīvitānāṃ śāstreṣu dāreṣu sadā ratānām /
GP12garup1_u:7166: na dānena na mānena nārjavena na savayā /
GP12garup1_u:7167: na śastreṇa na śāstreṇa sarvathā viṣamā striyaḥ // GarP_1,109.45 //
GP12garup1_u:7169: śanaiḥ kāmaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca pañcaitāni śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // GarP_1,109.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7171: śāśvataṃ saguṇā vidyā suhṛnmitraṃ ca śāśvatam // GarP_1,109.47 //
GP12garup1_u:7172: ye bālabhāvānna paṭhanti vidyāṃ ye yauvanasthā hyadhanātmadārāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7173: te śocanīyā iha jīvaloke manuṣyarūpeṇa mṛgāścaranti // GarP_1,109.48 //
GP12garup1_u:7176: ye bālabhāve na paṭhanti vidyāṃ kāmāturā yauvananaṣṭavittāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7177: te vṛddhabāve paribhūyamānāḥ saṃdahyamānāḥ śiśire yathābjam //
GP12garup1_u:7178: tarke 'pratiṣṭhā śrutayo vibhinnāḥ nāsāvṛṣiryasya mataṃ na bhinnam /
GP12garup1_u:7179: dharmasya tattvaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ mahājano yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ //
GP12garup1_u:7182: anuktamapyūhati paṇḍito janaḥ pareṅgitajñānaphalā hi buddhayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7183: udīritorthaḥ paśunāpi gṛhyate hayāśca nāgāśca vahanti darśitam //
GP12garup1_u:7184: arthādbhraṣṭastīrthayātrāṃ tu gacchetsatyādbhraṣṭo rauravaṃ vai vrajecca /
GP12garup1_u:7186: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre navottaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:7190: dhruvāṇi tasya naśyanti hyadhruvaṃ naṣṭameva ca // GarP_1,110.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7191: vāgyantrahīnasya narasya vidyā śastraṃ yathā kāpuruṣasya haste /
GP12garup1_u:7192: na tuṣṭimutpādayate śarīre hyandhasya dārā iva darśanīyāḥ // GarP_1,110.2
GP12garup1_u:7194: vibhave dānaśaktiśca nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam // GarP_1,110.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7199: arthenāpi hi kiṃ tena yasyānarthe tu saṃgatiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7200: ko hi nāma śikhājātaṃ pannagasya maṇiṃ haret // GarP_1,110.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7205: na rājñā saha mitratvaṃ na sarpo nirviṣaḥ kracit /
GP12garup1_u:7206: na kulaṃ nirmalaṃ tatra strījano yatra jāyate // GarP_1,110.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7210: na hi cūḍāmaṇiḥ pāde śobhate vai kadācana // GarP_1,110.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7212: athavā pṛthivīpālo mūrdhni pāde pramādataḥ // GarP_1,110.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7214: mūrdhni vā sarvalokānāṃ śīrṣataḥ patito vane // GarP_1,110.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7216: na ca virauti na cāpi sa śobhate bhavati yojayiturvacanīyatā //
GP12garup1_u:7220: adhaḥ khalenāpi kṛtasya vahnernādhaḥ śikhā yāti kadācideva //
GP12garup1_u:7221: na sadaśvaḥ kaśāghātaṃ siṃho na gajagarjitam /
GP12garup1_u:7222: vīro vā paranirdiṣṭaṃ na sahedbhīmaniḥ svanam // GarP_1,110.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7223: yadi vibhavavihīnaḥ pracyuto vāśu daivānna tu khalajanasevāṃ kāṅkṣayennaiva nīcām /
GP12garup1_u:7224: na tṛṇamadanakārye sukṣudhārto 'tti siṃhaḥ pibati rudhiramuṣṇaṃ prāyaśaḥ kuñcarāṇām // GarP_1,110.18
GP12garup1_u:7228: tānyeva kāleṣu vipatkarāṇi viṣasya pātrāṇyapi dāruṇāni // GarP_1,110.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7232: svayameva patiṣyanti kūlajātā iva drumāḥ // GarP_1,110.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7234: bhavanti te vināśāya daivāyattasya vai sadā // GarP_1,110.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7236: sānukūle tu daive śaṃ puṃsaḥ sarvatra jāyate // GarP_1,110.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7238: āhāre vyavahāre ca tyaktalajjaḥ sadā bhavet // GarP_1,110.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7239: dhaninaḥ śrotriyo rājā nadī vaidyastu pañcamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7240: pañca yatra na vidyante na kuryāttatratra saṃsthitim // GarP_1,110.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7242: pañca yatra na vidyante na tatra divasaṃ vaset // GarP_1,110.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7244: ete yatra na vidyante tatra vāsaṃ na kārayet // GarP_1,110.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7246: sarvaḥ sarvaṃ na jānāti sarvajño nāsti kutracit // GarP_1,110.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7247: na sarvavitkaścidihāsti loke nātyantamūrkho bhuvi cāpi kaścit /
GP12garup1_u:7248: jñānena nīcottamamadhyamena yo 'yaṃ vijānāti sa tena vidvān //
GP12garup1_u:7249: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre daśottaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:7253: sarvāṇi hi mahīpālaḥ samyaṅnityaṃ parīkṣayet // GarP_1,111.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7255: nirjitya parasainyāni kṣitaṃ dharmeṇa pālayet // GarP_1,111.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7259: pararāṣṭraṃ mahīpālairbhoktavyaṃ na ca dūṣayet // GarP_1,111.4 //
GP12garup1_u:7260: nodhaśchindyāttu yo dhenvāḥ kṣārārtho labhate payaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7261: evaṃ rāṣṭraṃ prayogeṇa pīḍyamānaṃ na vardhate // GarP_1,111.5 //
GP12garup1_u:7265: prajāḥ pālayituṃ śaktaḥ pārthivo vijitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,111.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7268: satyaṃ manoramāḥ kāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7269: kintu vai vanitāpāṅgabhaṅgilolaṃ hi jīvitam // GarP_1,111.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7270: vyāghrīva tiṣṭhati jarā paritarjayantī rogāśca śatrava iva prabhavanti gātre /
GP12garup1_u:7271: āyuḥ paristravati bhinnaghaṭādivāmbho loko na cātmahitamācaratīha kaścit
GP12garup1_u:7272: niḥ śaṅkaṃ kiṃ manuṣyāḥ kuruta parahitaṃ yuktamagre hitaṃ yanmodadhvaṃ kāminībhirmadanaśarahatā mandamandātidṛṣṭyā /
GP12garup1_u:7273: mā pāpaṃ saṃkurudhvaṃ dvijahariparamāḥ saṃbhajadhvaṃ sadaiva āyurniḥ śeṣameti skhalati jalaghaṭībhūtamṛtyucchalena mātṛvatparadāreṣu paradravyeṣu loṣṭavat /
GP12garup1_u:7274: ātmavat sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ paśyati sa paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,111.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7276: yadeṣāṃ sarvakāryeṣu vaco na pratihanyate // GarP_1,111.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7278: rakṣayitvā tu cātmānaṃ yaddhanaṃ taddvijātaye // GarP_1,111.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7280: sa rājā vardhate yogādvyādhibhiśca na badhyate // GarP_1,111.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7284: yasyārthāḥ sa mumāṃllāke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,111.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7285: tyajanti mitrāṇi dhanairvihīnaṃ putrāśca dārāśca suhṛjjanāśca /
GP12garup1_u:7286: te cārthavantaṃ punarāśrayanti hyartho hi loke puruṣasya bandhuḥ //
GP12garup1_u:7287: andhā hi rājā bhavati yastu sāstravivarjitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7288: andhaḥ paśyati cāreṇa śāstrahīno na paśyati // GarP_1,111.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7290: indriyāṇi prasuptāni tasya rājyaṃ ciraṃ na hi // GarP_1,111.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7294: sahi naśyati vai rājā iha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,111.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7295: manastāpaṃ na kurvīta āpadaṃ prāpya pārthivaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7296: samabuddhiḥ prasannātmā prasannātmā sukhaduḥkhe samo bhavet //
GP12garup1_u:7298: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoḥ kiṃ nodati punaḥ śaśī // GarP_1,111.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7299: dhigdhik śarīrasukhalālitamānaveṣu mā khedayeddhanakṛśaṃ hi śarīrameva /
GP12garup1_u:7300: saddārakā hyadhanapāṇḍusutāḥ śrutā hi duḥkhaṃ vihāya punareva sukhaṃ prapannāḥ // GarP_1,111.25
GP12garup1_u:7303: kāraṇena vinā bhṛtye yastu kupyati pārthivaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7306: mānave śrotriye caiva bhṛtyavarge sadaiva hi // GarP_1,111.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7308: śāsane sarvadā kṣipraṃ ripubhiḥ paribhūyate // GarP_1,111.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7309: huṅkāre bhṛkuṭīṃ naiva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7310: vinā doṣeṇa yo bhṛtyānrājādhamaṇa śāsti ca /
GP12garup1_u:7312: sukhapravṛttaiḥ sādhyantai śatravo vigrahe sthitaiḥ // GarP_1,111.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7314: ṣaḍvidho yasya utsāhastasya devo 'pi śaṅkate // GarP_1,111.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7315: udyogena kṛte kārye siddharyasya na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:7316: daivaṃ tasya pramāṇaṃ hi kartavyaṃ pauruṣaṃ sadā // GarP_1,111.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7317: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre ekādaśottaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:7322: bhṛtye parikṣaṇaṃ vakṣye yasyayasya hi yo guṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7323: tamimaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi ye yathākathitaṃ kila // GarP_1,112.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7325: tathā caturbhirbhṛtakaṃ parīkṣayedvatena śīlena kalena karmaṇā //
GP12garup1_u:7331: apramādī pramāthī ca pratīhāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7333: sarvaśāstrasamālokī hyeṣa sādhuḥ sa lekhakaḥ // GarP_1,112.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7335: krūro yathoktavādī ca eṣa dūto vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7339: śuciśca kaṭhinaścaiva sūpakāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7341: āyuḥ śīlaguṇopeto vaidya eva vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7349: maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kimasau na bhayaṅkaraḥ // GarP_1,112.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7350: akāraṇaviṣkṛtakopadhāriṇaḥ khalādbhayaṃ kasya na nāma jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:7351: viṣaṃ mahāherviṣamasya durvacaḥ saduḥ sahaṃ sannipatetsadā mukhe //
GP12garup1_u:7353: ardharājyaharaṃ bhṛtyaṃ yo hanyātsa na hanyate // GarP_1,112.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7355: prāgeva paścādviparī tarupā ye te tu bhṛtyā na hitā bhavanti //
GP12garup1_u:7357: sukhaduḥ khasamā dhīrā bhṛtyā lokeṣu durlabhāḥ // GarP_1,112.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7360: aśakto bhayabhītaśca rājñā tyaktavya eva saḥ // GarP_1,112.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7362: durge praveśitavyāni tataḥ śatruṃ nipātayet // GarP_1,112.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7367: yatkiñcitkurute karma śubhaṃ vā yādi vāśubham /
GP12garup1_u:7368: tena sma vardhate rājā sūkṣmato bhṛtyakāryataḥ // GarP_1,112.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7371: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhaspatyukta nītiptāre dvādaśottarakaśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:7375: paṇḍitasya guṇāḥ sarve mūrve doṣāśca kevalāḥ // GarP_1,113.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7379: bandhstho 'pi tiṣṭhecca na tu rājye khalaiḥ saha // GarP_1,113.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7383: vatsāpekṣī duhetkṣīraṃ bhūmiṃ gāñcaiva pārthipaḥ // GarP_1,113.5 //
GP12garup1_u:7385: tathā vittamu pādāya rājā kurvīta sañcayam // GarP_1,113.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7390: vane 'pi doṣāḥ prabhavanti rāgiṇāṃ gṛhe 'pi pañcendriyanigrahastapaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7391: akutsite karmaṇi yaḥ pravartate nivṛttarāgasya gṛhaṃ tapovanam //
GP12garup1_u:7392: satyena rakṣyate dharmo vidyā yogena rakṣyate /
GP12garup1_u:7393: mṛjayā rakṣyate pātraṃ kulaṃ śalina rakṣyate // GarP_1,113.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7394: varaṃ vindhyāṭavyāṃ nivasanamabhuktasya maraṇaṃ varaṃ sarpākīrṇe śayanamatha kūpe nipatanam
GP12garup1_u:7395: varaṃ bhrāntāvarte sabhayajalamadhye praviśanaṃ na tu svīye pakṣe hi dhanamaṇu dehīti kathanam bhāgyakṣayeṣu kṣīyante nopabhogena sampadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7396: pūrvārjite hi sukṛte na naśyanti kadācana // GarP_1,113.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7397: viprāṇāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vidyā pṛthivyā bhūṣaṇaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7398: nabhaso bhūṣaṇaṃ candraḥ śīlaṃ sarvasya bhūṣaṇam // GarP_1,113.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7399: ete te candratulyāḥ kṣitipatitanayā bhīmasenārjunādyāḥ śurāḥ satyapratijñā dinakaravapuṣaḥ keśavenopagūḍhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7400: te vai duṣṭagrahasthāḥ kṛpaṇavaśagatā bhaikṣyacaryāṃ prayātāḥ ko vā kasminsamartho bhavati vidhivaśādbhrāmayetkarmarekhā // GarP_1,113.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7401: brahmā yena kulālavanniyamito brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍodare viṣṇuryena daśāvatāragahane kṣipto mahāsaṅkaṭe
GP12garup1_u:7402: rudroyena kapālapāṇipuṭake bhikṣāṭanaṃ kāritaḥ sūryo bhrāmyati nityameva gagane taramai namaḥ karṇaṇe // GarP_1,113.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7403: dātā baliryācakako murārirdānaṃ mahī vipramukhasya madhye /
GP12garup1_u:7404: dattvā phalaṃ bandhanameva labdhaṃ namo 'stu te daiva yatheṣṭakāriṇe //
GP12garup1_u:7409: ātmanā vihitaṃ duḥ khamātmanā vihitaṃ sakham /
GP12garup1_u:7411: na cāntarikṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivarapraveśe /
GP12garup1_u:7412: na mātṛmūrdhni pradhṛtastathāṅke tyaktuṃ kṣamaḥ karma kṛtaṃ naro hi //
GP12garup1_u:7413: dugastrikūṭaḥ parikhā samudro rakṣāṃsi yodhāḥ paramā ca vṛttiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7414: śāstrañca vai tūśanasā pradiṣṭaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ kālavaśādvinaṣṭaḥ //
GP12garup1_u:7415: yasminvayasi yatkāle yaddivā yacca vā niśi /
GP12garup1_u:7416: yanmuhūrte kṣaṇe vāpi tattathā na tadanyathā // GarP_1,113.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7419: purādhītā ca yā vidyā purā dattañca yaddhanam /
GP12garup1_u:7420: purā kṛtāni karmāṇi hyagre dhāvanti dhāvataḥ // GarP_1,113.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7423: sthūlajaṅgho yadā rāmaḥ śabdagāmī ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7424: ghanakeśī yadā sītā trayaste duḥ khabhājanam // GarP_1,113.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7425: na pituḥ karmaṇā putraḥ pitā vā putrakarmaṇā /
GP12garup1_u:7426: svayaṃ kṛtena gacchanti svayaṃ baddhāḥ svakarmaṇā // GarP_1,113.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7428: śarā iva patantīha vimuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ // GarP_1,113.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7431: bālo yuvā ca vṛddhaśca yaḥ karoti śubhāśubham /
GP12garup1_u:7435: prāptavyamarthaṃ labhate manuṣyo devo 'pi taṃ vārayituṃ na śaktaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7436: ato na śocāmi na vismayo me lalāṭalekhā na punaḥ prayāti (yadasmadīyaṃ na tu tat pareṣām // sarpaḥ kūpe gajaḥ skandhe bila ākhuśca dhāvati /
GP12garup1_u:7437: naraḥ śīghratarādeva karmaṇaḥ kaḥ palāyate // GarP_1,113.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7440: yer'thā dharmeṇa te satyā ye 'dharmeṇa gatāḥ śriyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7441: dharmārtho ca mahāṃlloke tatsmṛtvā hyarthakāraṇāt // GarP_1,113.35 //
GP12garup1_u:7442: annārtho yāni duḥ khāni karoti kṛpaṇo janaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7443: tānyeva yadi dharmārtho na bhūyaḥ kleśabhājanam // GarP_1,113.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7445: yo 'nnārthaiḥ śuciḥ śaucānna mṛdā vāriṇā śuciḥ // GarP_1,113.37 //
GP12garup1_u:7447: sarvabhūte dayā śaucaṃ jalaśaucañca pañcamam // GarP_1,113.38 //
GP12garup1_u:7448: yasya satyañca śaucañca tasya svargo na durlabhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7449: satyaṃ hi vacanaṃ yasya so 'śvamedhādviśiṣyate // GarP_1,113.39 //
GP12garup1_u:7452: yasya hastau ca pādau ca manaścaiva susaṃyatam /
GP12garup1_u:7453: vidyā tapaśca kīrtiśca sa tīrthaphalamaśnute // GarP_1,113.41 //
GP12garup1_u:7455: na kruddhaḥ paruṣaṃ brūyādetatsādhostu lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,113.42 //
GP12garup1_u:7457: kāle śrutvā hitaṃ vākyaṃ na kaścitparituṣyati // GarP_1,113.43 //
GP12garup1_u:7459: alabhyaṃ labhyate martyaistatra kā parivedanā // GarP_1,113.44 //
GP12garup1_u:7463: prabhāte 'nyadiśo yānti kā tatra parivedanā // GarP_1,113.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7465: yastvekastvarito yāti kā tatra parivedanā // GarP_1,113.47 //
GP12garup1_u:7469: kuśāgreṇa tu saṃspṛṣṭaṃ prāptakālo na jīvati // GarP_1,113.49 //
GP12garup1_u:7471: prāptavyānyeva prāpnāti duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca // GarP_1,113.50 //
GP12garup1_u:7473: ācodyamānāni yathā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:7474: svakālaṃ nātivartante tathā karma purākṛtam // GarP_1,113.51 //
GP12garup1_u:7475: śīlaṃ kulaṃ naiva na caiva vidyā jñānaṃ guṇā naiva na bījaśuddhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7476: bhāgyāni pūrvaṃ tapasārjitāni kāle phalantyasya yathaiva vṛkṣāḥ //
GP12garup1_u:7477: tatra mṛtyuryatra hantā tatra śrīryatra sampadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7478: tatra tatra svayaṃ yāti preryamāṇaḥ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_1,113.53 //
GP12garup1_u:7480: yathā dhenusahasreṣu vatso vindanti mātaram // GarP_1,113.54 //
GP12garup1_u:7482: sukṛtaṃ bhuṅkṣva cātmīyaṃ mūḍha kiṃ paritapyase // GarP_1,113.55 //
GP12garup1_u:7483: yathā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GP12garup1_u:7484: tathā janmāntare tadvai kartā ramanugacchati // GarP_1,113.56 //
GP12garup1_u:7486: ātmano balivamātrāṇi paśyannapi na paśyati // GarP_1,113.57 //
GP12garup1_u:7488: vicārya khalu paśyāmi tatsukhaṃ yatra nirvṛtiḥ // GarP_1,113.58 //
GP12garup1_u:7489: yatra sneho bhayaṃ tatra sneho duḥ khasya bhājanam /
GP12garup1_u:7490: snehamūlāni duḥ khāni tasmistyakte mahatsukham // GarP_1,113.59 //
GP12garup1_u:7491: śarīramevāyatanaṃ duḥ khasya ca sukhasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:7492: jīvitañca śarīrañca jātyaiva saha jāyate // GarP_1,113.60 //
GP12garup1_u:7493: sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥ khaṃ sarva mātmavaśaṃ sukham /
GP12garup1_u:7495: sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥ khaṃ duḥ khasyānantaraṃ sukham /
GP12garup1_u:7496: śukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cakravatparivartate // GarP_1,113.62 //
GP12garup1_u:7498: vartamānena varteta na sa śokena bādhyate // GarP_1,113.63 //
GP12garup1_u:7499: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre trayośottaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:7507: baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati // GarP_1,114.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7508: na mātari na dāreṣu na sodarye na cātmaje /
GP12garup1_u:7512: mātrā svastrā duhitrā vā na viviktāsano vaset /
GP12garup1_u:7515: yathopāyo vadho daṇḍastathaiva hyanu vartate // GarP_1,114.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7517: śakyate prasaro boddhuṃ na hyaraktasye catasaḥ // GarP_1,114.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7518: kṣaṇo nāsti raho nāsti na sti prārthayitā janaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7524: parādhīnā nidrā paradṛdayakṛtyānusaraṇaṃ sadā helā hāsyaṃ niyatamapi śokena rahitam /
GP12garup1_u:7525: paṇe nyastaḥ kāyo viṭajanakhurairdāritagalo bahūtkaṇṭhavṛtirjagati gaṇikrāyā bahumataḥ // agnirāpaḥ striyo mūrkhāḥ sarpā rājakulāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:7526: nityaṃ paropasevyāni sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7527: kiṃ citraṃ yadi veda (śabda) śāstrakuśalo vipro bhavetpaṇḍitaḥ kiṃ citraṃ yadi daṇḍanītikuśalo rājā bhaveddhārmikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7528: kiṃ citraṃ yadi rūpayauvanavatī sādhvī bhavetkāminī taccitraṃ yadi nirdhano 'pi puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ na kuryātkracit // GarP_1,114.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7532: yadi no cikurodbhedāllabhyante kaiḥ striyo na hi // GarP_1,114.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7534: na tathā bādhate śatruḥ kṛtavairo bahiḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,114.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7535: sa paṇḍito yo hyanuñjayedvai miṣṭena bālaṃ viniyena śiṣṭam /
GP12garup1_u:7536: arthena nārīṃ tapasā hi devānsarvāṃśca lokāṃśca susaṃgraheṇa //
GP12garup1_u:7537: chalena mitraṃ kaluṣeṇa dharmaṃ paropatāpena samṛddhibhāvanam /
GP12garup1_u:7538: sukhena vidyāṃ puruṣeṇa nārīṃ vāñchanti vai ye na ca paṇḍitāste //
GP12garup1_u:7540: niṣphalaṃ tasya vai kāryāṃ mahādoṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,114.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7541: sadhano hi tapasvī ca dūrato vai kṛtaśramaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7542: madyapa strī satītyevaṃ vipra na śraddadhāmyaham // GarP_1,114.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7544: kadācitkupitaṃ mitraṃ sarvaṃ guhyaṃ prakāśayet // GarP_1,114.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7549: vṛddhāḥ striyo navaṃ madyaṃ śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ trimūlakam /
GP12garup1_u:7550: rātrau dadhi divā svapnaṃ vidvānṣaṭ parivarjayet // GarP_1,114.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7551: viṣaṃ goṣṭhī daridrasya vṛddhasya taruṇī viṣam /
GP12garup1_u:7552: viṣaṃ kuśikṣitā vidyā ajīrṇe bhojanaṃ viṣam // GarP_1,114.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7554: priyaṃ dānaṃ daridrasya bhūnaścataruṇī priyā // GarP_1,114.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7556: divāśayo jāgaraṇañca rātrau ṣaḍbhirnarāṇāṃ nivasanti rogāḥ //
GP12garup1_u:7559: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ striyo vṛddhā bālārkastaruṇaṃ dadhi /
GP12garup1_u:7560: prabhāte maithunaṃ nidrā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.30 //
GP12garup1_u:7561: sadyaḥ pakraghṛtaṃ drākṣā bālā strī kṣīrabhojanam /
GP12garup1_u:7562: uṣṇodakaṃ tarucchāyā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7566: trayo balaharāḥ sadyo hyadhvā ve maithunaṃ jvaraḥ // GarP_1,114.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7567: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ payo nityaṃ bhāryāmitraiḥ sahaiva tu /
GP12garup1_u:7568: na bhāktavyaṃ nṛpaiḥ sārdhaṃ viyogaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt // GarP_1,114.34 //
GP12garup1_u:7570: sūryodaye hyastamaye 'pi śāyinaṃ vimuñcati śrīrapi cakrapāṇinam //
GP12garup1_u:7571: nityaṃ chedastṛṇānaṃ dharaṇivilakhanaṃ pādayoścāpamārṣṭiḥ dantānāmapyaśaucaṃ malinavasanatā rūkṣatā mūrdhajānām /
GP12garup1_u:7572: dve sadhye cāpi nidrā vivasanaśayanaṃ grāsahāsātirekaḥ svāṅge pīṭhe ca vādyaṃ nidhanamupanayetkeśavasyāpi lakṣmīm // GarP_1,114.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7575: yasya kasya tu puṣpasya pāṇāḍarasya viśeṣataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7577: dīpasya paścimā chāyā chāyā śayyāsanasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:7579: bālātapaḥ pretadhūmaḥ strī vṛddhā taruṇaṃ dadhi /
GP12garup1_u:7580: āyuṣkāmo na seveta tathā saṃmārjanīrajaḥ // GarP_1,114.40 //
GP12garup1_u:7588: keśāmbu mārjanīreṇurhanti puṇyaṃ purā kṛtam // GarP_1,114.44 //
GP12garup1_u:7590: antareṇa na gantavyaṃ hayasya vṛṣabhasya ca // GarP_1,114.45 //
GP12garup1_u:7592: bhogāsvādeṣu viśvāsaṃ kaḥ prājñaḥ kartumarhati // GarP_1,114.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7595: vairiṇā saha sandhāya viśvasto yadi tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup1_u:7596: sa vṛkṣāgre prasupto hi patitaḥ pratibudhyate // GarP_1,114.48 //
GP12garup1_u:7598: mṛdunaiva mṛduṃ hanti dāruṇenaiva dāruṇam // GarP_1,114.49 //
GP12garup1_u:7601: namanti phalino vṛkṣā namanti guṇino janāḥ /

GP12garup1_u:7657: martyāḥ strīvaśagāḥ striyaśca capalā nīcā janā unnatāḥ hā kaṣṭaṃ khalujīvitaṃ kaliyuge dhanyā janā ye mṛtāḥ // GarP_1,115.2 //

GP12garup1_u:7679: uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam // GarP_1,115.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7680: vane 'pi siṃhā na namanti kaṃ ca bubhu kṣitā māṃsanirīkṣaṇaṃ ca /

GP12garup1_u:7895: arghyaṃ dadyādagastyāya mūrtiṃ saṃpūjya vai mune ! /

GP12garup1_u:7924: audumbaraṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ tagaryāḥ śrāvaṇe śriyam // GarP_1,120.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7928: prāśayenniśi naivedyaiḥ kṛsaraiḥ kārtike yajet // GarP_1,120.9 //

GP12garup1_u:7988: naivadyaṃ paramānnaṃ tu japedaṣṭottaraṃ śatam // GarP_1,123.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7990: aṣṭākṣareṇa mantreṇa svāhāntena tu homayet // GarP_1,123.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7995: gomūtraṃ ca dadhi kṣīraṃ pañcame pañcagavyakam /
GP12garup1_u:7999: ekādaśī dvādaśī ca niśānte ca trayodaśī /
GP12garup1_u:8000: nityamekādaśī yatra tatra sannihito hariḥ // GarP_1,123.12 //
GP12garup1_u:8002: dvādaśyāṃ pāraṇa kuryātsūtake mṛtake caret // GarP_1,123.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8008: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhīṣmapañcakādivrataṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:8012: yathā ca gaurī bhūteśaṃ pṛcchati sma paraṃ vratam // GarP_1,124.1 //
GP12garup1_u:8019: sa kukruraiḥ samāyukto mṛgānhantuṃ vanaṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,124.4 //
GP12garup1_u:8023: parṇāni cāpatanmūrdhni liṅgasyaiva na jānataḥ // GarP_1,124.6 //
GP12garup1_u:8024: tena dhūlinirodhāya kṣiptaṃ nīraṃ ca liṅgake /
GP12garup1_u:8027: evaṃ snānaṃ sparśanaṃ ca pūjanaṃ jāgaro 'bhavat // GarP_1,124.8 //
GP12garup1_u:8029: kāle mṛto yamabhaṭaiḥ pāśairbaddhvā tu nīyate // GarP_1,124.9 //
GP12garup1_u:8030: tadā mama gaṇairyuddhe jitvā muktīkṛtaḥ sa ca /
GP12garup1_u:8033: trayodaśyāṃ śivaṃ pūjya kuryātta niyamaṃ vratī // GarP_1,124.11 //
GP12garup1_u:8035: pūjāṃ dānaṃ tapo homaṃ kariṣyāmyātmaśaktitaḥ // GarP_1,124.12 //
GP12garup1_u:8037: bhokṣye 'haṃ bhuktimuktyarthaṃ śaraṇaṃ me bhaveśvara // GarP_1,124.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8039: oṃ namo namaḥ śivāya gandhādyaḥ pūjayeddharam // GarP_1,124.14 //
GP12garup1_u:8042: ardharātre triyāme ca caturthe ca punayarjat /
GP12garup1_u:8043: mūlamantraṃ tathā japtvā prabhāte tu kṣamāpayet // GarP_1,124.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8045: kṣamasva jagatāṃ nātha ! trailokyādhipate hara ! // GarP_1,124.17 //
GP12garup1_u:8048: prasanno bhava me śrīman gṛhaṃ prati ca gamyatām /
GP12garup1_u:8052: yanmayā śraddhayā dattaṃ prīyatāṃ tena me prabhuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8053: iti kṣamāpya ca vratī kuryādvādaśavārṣikam // GarP_1,124.21 //
GP12garup1_u:8056: vratī dvādaśa saṃbhojya dīpadaḥ svargamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,124.23 //
GP12garup1_u:8057: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śivarātrivrataṃ nāma caturviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:8063: tasyāḥ putraśataṃ naṣṭaṃ tasmāttāṃ parivarjayet // GarP_1,125.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8067: dvādaśī tu tadā grāhyā trayodaśyāntu pāraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:8070: trimiśrā sā tithirgrāhyā sarvapāpaharā śubhā // GarP_1,125.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8072: trimiśrāṃ caiva kurvīta na daśamyā yutāṃ kracit // GarP_1,125.6 //
GP12garup1_u:8076: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekādaśīmāhātmyaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:8079: yenārcanena vai loko jagāma paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:8082: vidhātāraṃ tathā gaṅgāṃ yamunāṃ ca mahānadīm // GarP_1,126.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8083: dvāraśriyaṃ ca daṇḍaṃ ca pracaṇḍaṃ vāstupūruṣam /
GP12garup1_u:8084: madhye cādhāraśaktiṃ ca kūrmaṃ cānantamarcayet // GarP_1,126.3 //
GP12garup1_u:8085: bhūmiṃ dharmaṃ tathā jñānaṃ vairagyaiśvaryameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:8086: adharmādīṃśca caturaḥ kandaṃ nālaṃ ca paṅkajam // GarP_1,126.4 //
GP12garup1_u:8087: karṇikāṃ kesaraṃ sattvaṃ rājasaṃ tāmasaṃ guṇam /
GP12garup1_u:8089: durgāṃ gaṇaṃ sarasvatīṃ kṣetrapālaṃ ca koṇake /
GP12garup1_u:8090: āsanaṃ mūrtimabhyarcya vāsudevaṃ balaṃ smaran // GarP_1,126.6 //
GP12garup1_u:8096: ekādaśī tathā caikā bhīmena samupoṣitā // GarP_1,127.1 //
GP12garup1_u:8100: vinihanti mahāpāpaṃ kunṛpo viṣayaṃ yathā // GarP_1,127.3 //
GP12garup1_u:8101: kuputtrastu kulaṃ yadvatkubhāryā ca patiṃ yathā /
GP12garup1_u:8102: adharmaṃ ca yathā dharmaḥ kumantrī ca yathā nṛpam // GarP_1,127.4 //
GP12garup1_u:8106: yathā prakartināddānaṃ tapo vai vismayādyathā // GarP_1,127.6 //
GP12garup1_u:8108: krodhena ca yathā śāntiryathā vittamavaddhanāt // GarP_1,127.7 //
GP12garup1_u:8110: tathaiva pāpanāśāya prokteyaṃ dvādaśī śubhā // GarP_1,127.8 //
GP12garup1_u:8113: na cāpi naimiṣaṃ kṣetraṃ kurukṣetraṃ prabhāsakam /
GP12garup1_u:8114: kālindī yamunā gaṅgā na caiva na sarasvatī // GarP_1,127.10 //
GP12garup1_u:8116: na dānaṃ na japo homo na cānyatsukṛtaṃ kracit // GarP_1,127.11 //
GP12garup1_u:8120: ghaṭopari nave pātre kṛtvā vai tāmrabhājane // GarP_1,127.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8123: varāhāya namaḥ pādau kroḍākṛtaye namaḥ kaṭim /
GP12garup1_u:8126: mukhaṃ sarvātmane pūjyaṃ lalāṭaṃ prabhavāya ca // GarP_1,127.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8128: vidhinā pūjayitvā tu kṛtvā jāgaraṇaṃ niśi // GarP_1,127.17 //
GP12garup1_u:8130: prātarviprāya dattvā ca yācakāya śubhāya tat // GarP_1,127.18 //
GP12garup1_u:8133: evaṃ kṛtvā naro vidyānna bhūya stanapo bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:8136: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekādaśīmāhātmyaṃ nāma saptaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:8139: vratāni vyāsa vakṣyāmi yaistuṣṭaḥ sarvado hariḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8140: śāstrodito hi niyamo vrataṃ tacca tapo matam // GarP_1,128.1 //
GP12garup1_u:8142: nityaṃ triṣavaṇaṃ snāyādadhaḥ śayī jitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,128.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8144: pavitrāṇi ca pañcaiva juhuyāccaiva śaktitaḥ // GarP_1,128.3 //
GP12garup1_u:8146: keśānāṃ rakṣaṇārthaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ vratamācaret // GarP_1,128.4 //
GP12garup1_u:8148: śākaṃ madhu parānnaṃ ca varjayedupavāsavān // GarP_1,128.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8154: kṣamā satyaṃ dayā dānaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ // GarP_1,128.8 //
GP12garup1_u:8158: gomūtraṃ ca pala dadyādardhāṅguṣṭhaṃ tu gomayam // GarP_1,128.10 //
GP12garup1_u:8161: gāyattryā caiva gandheti āpyāyasva dṛ dadhigrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8162: tejo 'sīti ca devasya brahmakūrcavrataṃ caret // GarP_1,128.12 //
GP12garup1_u:8168: sauro māso vivāhāya yajñādau sāvanasthitiḥ // GarP_1,128.15 //
GP12garup1_u:8170: rudreṇa dvādaśī yuktā caturdaśyātha pūrṇimā // GarP_1,128.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8172: etadvyastaṃ mahāghoraṃ hanti puṇyaṃ purā kṛtam // GarP_1,128.17 //
GP12garup1_u:8173: prārabdhatapasā strīṇāṃ rajo hanyādvrataṃ na hi /
GP12garup1_u:8176: dinatrayaṃ na bhuñjīta śiraso muṇḍanaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,128.19 //
GP12garup1_u:8179: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vrataparibhāṣā nāmāṣṭāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:8188: kārtike ta site 'ṣṭamyāṃ puṣpahārī ca vatsaram // GarP_1,129.3 //
GP12garup1_u:8190: kṛṣṇapakṣe tṛtīyāyāṃ śrāvaṇe śrīdharaṃ śriyā // GarP_1,129.4 //
GP12garup1_u:8192: śayyāṃ dattvā prārthayecca śrīdharāya namaḥ śriyai // GarP_1,129.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8193: umāṃśivaṃ hutāśaṃ ca tṛtīyāyāṃ ca pūjayet /
GP12garup1_u:8194: haviṣyamanna naivedya deya damanakaṃ tathā // GarP_1,129.6 //
GP12garup1_u:8200: gaurī kālī umā bhadrā durgā kāntiḥ sarasvatī // GarP_1,129.9 //
GP12garup1_u:8201: maṅgalā vaiṣṇavī lakṣmīḥ śivā nārāyaṇī kramāt /

GP12garup1_u:8206: gaḥ svāhā mūlamantro 'yaṃ praṇavena samanvitaḥ // GarP_1,129.12 //
GP12garup1_u:8207: glaiṃ glāṃhṛdaye gāṃ gīṃ hūṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ śiraḥ śikhā /
GP12garup1_u:8208: gūṃ varma goṃ ca gaiṃ netraṃ goṃ ca āvāhanādiṣu // GarP_1,129.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8210: dīpolkāya maholkāya baliścātha visa (mār) janam // GarP_1,129.14 //
GP12garup1_u:8212: oṃ mahākarṇāya vidmahe--vakratuṇḍāya dhīmahi--tanno dantiḥ pracodayāt //
GP12garup1_u:8214: gaṇāya gaṇapataye svāhā kūṣmāṇḍakāya ca // GarP_1,129.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8216: oṃ śyāma (va) dantavikarālāsyāhavepāya vai namaḥ // GarP_1,129.17 //
GP12garup1_u:8217: padmadaṃṣṭāya svāhānte mudrā vai nartanaṃ gaṇe /
GP12garup1_u:8226: āṃ gaṇapataye namaḥ caturthyantaṃ yajedgaṇam // GarP_1,129.22 //
GP12garup1_u:8236: śrāvaṇe cāśvine bhādre pañcamyāṃ kāttika śubhe // GarP_1,129.27 //
GP12garup1_u:8240: anantaṃ vāsukiṃ śaṅkhaṃ padmaṃ kambalameva ca // GarP_1,129.29 //
GP12garup1_u:8241: tathā karkāṭakaṃ nāgaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca śaṅkhakam /
GP12garup1_u:8242: kālīyaṃ takṣakaṃ caiva piṅgalaṃ māsimāsi ca // GarP_1,129.30 //
GP12garup1_u:8244: dvārasyobhayato lekhyāḥ śrāvaṇe tu site yajet // GarP_1,129.31 //
GP12garup1_u:8248: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe daṣṭoddhārapañcamavritaṃ nāmaikonatriṃśottaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:8254: oṃ khakholkāyamṛtatvaṃ (tantaṃ) priyasaṅgamo bhava sada svāhā //
GP12garup1_u:8255: aṣṭamyāṃ pāraṇaṃ kuryānmarīcaṃ prāśya svargabhāk saptamyāṃ niyataḥ snātvā pūjayitvā divākaram dadyātphalāni viprebhyo mārtaṇḍaḥ prīyatāmiti /
GP12garup1_u:8257: sarve bhavantu saphalā mama kāmāḥ samantataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8259: saṃpūjya devaṃ saptamyāṃ pāyasenātha bhojayet // GarP_1,130.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8260: viprāṃśca dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā svayaṃ cātha payaḥ pibet /
GP12garup1_u:8261: bhakṣyaṃ coṣyaṃ tathā lehyaṃ odanaṃ ceti kīrtitam // GarP_1,130.6 //
GP12garup1_u:8265: abhyañjanāñjanatilāṃśca vivarjayedyaḥ tasyeṣitaṃ bhavati saptasu saptamīṣu
GP12garup1_u:8267: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saptamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṃśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
