GP12garup1_u:8277: kāryā viddhāpi saptamyā hanti pāpaṃ trijanmanaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8279: yogāya yogapataye yogeśvarāya yogasambhavāya govindāya namonamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8282: (śayanadṛ)--sarvāya sarveśvarāya sarvetāya sarvasambhavāya govindāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,131.6
GP12garup1_u:8288: śriyai ca vasude vāya nandāya ca balāya ca // GarP_1,131.9 //
GP12garup1_u:8290: anantaṃ (ghaṃ) vāmanaṃ śauriṃ vaikuṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam // GarP_1,131.10 //
GP12garup1_u:8300: yaṃ devaṃ devakī devī vasudevādajījanat // GarP_1,131.15 //
GP12garup1_u:8301: bhaumasya brahmaṇo guptyai tasmai brahmātmane namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8304: trāhi māṃ sarvapāpaghna ! duḥ khaśokārṇavātprabho ! // GarP_1,131.17 //
GP12garup1_u:8306: durvṛttāṃstrāyase viṣṇo ! ye smaranti sakṛtsakṛt // GarP_1,131.18 //
GP12garup1_u:8309: trāhi māṃ devadeveśa ! tvāmṛte 'nyo na rakṣitā /
GP12garup1_u:8314: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kṛṣṇāṣṭamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nā maikatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:8320: matprītaye kṛtaṃ devi śathasāhasrikaṃ phalam // GarP_1,132.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8322: bhaviṣyati tadā tasyāṃ vratametatkathā parā // GarP_1,132.3 //
GP12garup1_u:8326: āmra patrapuṭe kṛtvā yo bhuḍkte kuśavoṣṭite // GarP_1,132.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8327: kalambikāmlikopetaṃ kāmyaṃ tasya phalaṃ bhave (labhe) t /
GP12garup1_u:8330: buṃ budhāyeti bījaṃ syātsvāhāntaḥ kamalādikaḥ // GarP_1,132.7 //
GP12garup1_u:8334: rambhā bhāryā tasya cāsītkauśikaḥ putra uttamaḥ // GarP_1,132.9 //
GP12garup1_u:8336: gṛhītvā kauśikastaṃ ca grīṣme gaṅgāṃ gato 'ramat // GarP_1,132.10 //
GP12garup1_u:8338: gaṅgātaḥ sa ca utthāya vanaṃ babhrāma duḥ khitaḥ // GarP_1,132.11 //
GP12garup1_u:8339: jalārthaṃ vijayā cāgādbhrā(nmā) trā sārdhaṃ ca sāpyagāt /
GP12garup1_u:8342: sa tā gatvā yayāce 'nnaṃ sānujo 'haṃ bubhukṣitaḥ // GarP_1,132.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8348: vīraṃ ca duḥ khitaṃ natvā rātrau supto yathāsukham // GarP_1,132.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8349: kanyāṃ ca yuvatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmai deyā sutā mayā /
GP12garup1_u:8351: svargaṃ gatau ca pitarau vrataṃ rājyāya kau śikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8352: cakre 'yodhyāmahārājyaṃ dattvā ca bhaginīṃ yame // GarP_1,132.18 //
GP12garup1_u:8353: yamo 'pi vijayāmāha gṛhasthā bhava me pure /
GP12garup1_u:8355: apaśyanmātaraṃ svāṃ sā pāśayātanayā sthitām // GarP_1,132.19 //
GP12garup1_u:8357: cakre ca sā tato muktā mātā tasmāccaredvratam // GarP_1,132.20 //
GP12garup1_u:8359: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe budhāṣṭamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvātriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:8363: caitre māsi sitāṣṭamyāṃ na te śokamavāpnuyuḥ // GarP_1,133.1 //
GP12garup1_u:8365: pibāmi śokasantapto māmaśokaṃ sadā kuru // GarP_1,133.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8370: navamī kevalā cāpi durgāṃ caiva tu pūjayet /
GP12garup1_u:8379: tasmindevī prakartavyā haimī vārājatāpi vā // GarP_1,133.8 //
GP12garup1_u:8380: śūle khaṅge pustake vā paṭe vā maṇḍale (pe) yajet /
GP12garup1_u:8381: kapālaṃ kheṭakaṃ ghaṇṭāṃ darpaṇaṃ tarjanīṃ dhanaḥ // GarP_1,133.9 //
GP12garup1_u:8383: śaktiṃ ca mudgaraṃ śūlaṃ vajraṃ khaṅgaṃ tathāṅkuśam // GarP_1,133.10 //
GP12garup1_u:8385: śeṣāḥ ṣoḍaśahastāṃ syurañjanaṃ ḍamaruṃ vinā // GarP_1,133.11 //
GP12garup1_u:8389: rocanā tvaruṇā kṛṣṇā nīlaṃ dhūmrā ca śukrakā // GarP_1,133.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8390: pātā ca pāṇḍurā proktā ālīḍhaṃ haritaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:8392: japtvā daśākṣarīṃ vidyāṃ nāsau kenāpi badhyate /
GP12garup1_u:8393: pañca (ñcā) daśāṅgulaṃ khaḍgaṃ triśūlaṃ ca tato yajet /
GP12garup1_u:8394: liṅgasyāṃ pūjayedvāpi pāduke 'tha jale 'pi vā // GarP_1,133.15 //
GP12garup1_u:8396: pañcābdaṃ mahiṣaṃ bastaṃ rātriśeṣe ca ghātayet // GarP_1,133.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8398: nerṛtyāṃ pūtanāṃ caiva vāyavyāṃ pāparākṣasīm // GarP_1,133.17 //
GP12garup1_u:8400: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mahānavamīvrataṃ nāma trayastriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:8405: oṃ hūṃ hūṃ prasphura lala lala kulva kulva culva culva khalla khalla mulva mulva gulva gulva tulva pulla pulla dhalva dhulva dhuma dhuma dhamadhama māraya māraya dhakadhaka vajñāpayajñāpaya vidārayavidāraya kampakampa kampayakampaya pūrayapūraya āveśayāveśaya oṃ hrīṃ oṃ hrīṃ haṃ vaṃ vaṃ huṃ taṭataṭa madamada hrīṃ oṃ hūṃ nairṛtāyā namaḥ nirṛtaye dātavyam /
GP12garup1_u:8407: tasyāgrato nṛpaḥ snāyācchatraṃ kṛtvā ca paiṣṭikam /
GP12garup1_u:8409: mātṝṇāṃ caiva devīnāṃ pūjā kāryā tathā niśi /
GP12garup1_u:8410: brahmāṇī caiva māheśī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā // GarP_1,134.4 //
GP12garup1_u:8411: vārāhī caiva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā caṇḍikā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:8412: jayantī maṅgalā kālī bhadrakālī kapālinī // GarP_1,134.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8413: durgā kṣamā śivā dhātrī svāhā svadhā namo 'stu te /
GP12garup1_u:8418: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mahānavamyāṃ mahākauśikamantrakṛtyādivivaraṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:8435: pracetāśca vasiṣṭhaśca bhṛgurnārada eva ca // GarP_1,135.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8439: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṛṣyekādaśīvrataṃ nāma pañcatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:8443: ekādaśī dvādaśī ca śravaṇena ca saṃyutā // GarP_1,136.1 //
GP12garup1_u:8444: vijayā sā tithiḥ proktā haripūjādi cākṣayam /
GP12garup1_u:8445: eka bhaktena naktena tathaivāyācitena ca // GarP_1,136.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8447: kāsyaṃ māṃsaṃ tathā kṣaudraṃ lobhaṃ vitathabhāṣaṇam // GarP_1,136.3 //
GP12garup1_u:8449: śilāṣiṣṭaṃ masūraṃ ca dvādaśyāṃ varjayennaraḥ // GarP_1,136.4 //
GP12garup1_u:8451: mahatī dvādaśī jñeyā upavāse mahāphalā // GarP_1,136.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8453: kuṃbhe saratne sajale yajetsvarṇaṃ tu vāmanam // GarP_1,136.6 //
GP12garup1_u:8455: oṃ namo vāsudevāya śiraḥ saṃpūjayettataḥ // GarP_1,136.7 //
GP12garup1_u:8456: śrīdharāya mukhaṃ tadvatkaṇṭhaṃ kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8457: namaḥ śrīpataye vakṣo bhujau sarvāstradhāriṇe // GarP_1,136.8 //
GP12garup1_u:8459: trailokyapataye meḍhraṃ jaṅghe sarvabhṛte namaḥ // GarP_1,136.9 //
GP12garup1_u:8467: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śravaṇadvādaśīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:8474: yo 'bdamekaṃ na bhuñjīta muktibhāk śivapūjanāt // GarP_1,137.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8481: dvādaśarkṣāṇi viprarṣe ! pratimāsaṃ tu yāni vai /
GP12garup1_u:8488: visarjite jagannāthe nirmālyaṃ bhavati kṣaṇāt // GarP_1,137.8 //
GP12garup1_u:8491: namonamaste 'cyuta ! saṃkṣayo 'stu pāpasya vṛddhiṃ samupaitu puṇyam /
GP12garup1_u:8492: aiśvaryavittādi sadākṣayaṃ me tathāstu me santatirakṣayaiva //
GP12garup1_u:8493: yathācyuta !tvaṃ parataḥ parasmātsa brahmabhūtaḥ parataḥ parasmāt /
GP12garup1_u:8494: tathācyutaṃ me kuru vāñchitaṃ sadā mayā kṛtaṃ pāpaharāprameya //
GP12garup1_u:8499: saptamīṃ pūjayedviṣṇuṃ durgāṃ śambuṃ raviṃ kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:8500: teṣāṃ lokaṃ samāpnoti sarvakāmāṃśca nirmalaḥ // GarP_1,137.14 //
GP12garup1_u:8504: dhanado 'gniḥ pratipadi nāsatyo dastra arcitaḥ // GarP_1,137.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8506: nāgāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kārtikeyaḥ saptamyāṃ bhāskaror'thadaḥ // GarP_1,137.17 //
GP12garup1_u:8508: indro daśamyāṃ dhanada ekādaśyāṃ munīśvarāḥ // GarP_1,137.18 //
GP12garup1_u:8510: caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ brahmā ca pitaro 'pare // GarP_1,137.19 //
GP12garup1_u:8511: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tithivāranakṣatrādivratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:8516: viṣṇunābhyabjato brahmā dakṣo 'ṅguṣṭhācca tasya vai // GarP_1,138.1 //
GP12garup1_u:8517: tato 'pitarvivasvāṃśca tataḥ sūnurvivasvataḥ manurikṣvākuśaryātī nṛgo dhṛṣṭaḥ praṣadhrakaḥ nariṣyantaśca nābhāgo diṣṭaḥ śaśaka eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:8519: ilāyāṃ tu budhājjāto rājā rudra purūravāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8522: karūṣātkṣattriyā jātā kārūṣā iti viśrutāḥ // GarP_1,138.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8540: tatputraśca sumantiśca ete vaiśālakā nṛpāḥ // GarP_1,138.14 //
GP12garup1_u:8544: dhṛṣṭasya dhārṣṭar (ta) kaṃ kṣetraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ (śyakaṃ) tadvabhūva ha //
GP12garup1_u:8570: vijayādruruko jajñe rurukāttu vṛkaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.29 //
GP12garup1_u:8572: ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi sumatyāṃ sagarāddhara // GarP_1,138.30 //
GP12garup1_u:8580: sudāsasya ca saudāso nāmnā mitrasahaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8583: tato daśaratho rājā tasya cailavilaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.36 //
GP12garup1_u:8591: kuśasya cātithiḥ putro niṣadho hyatitheḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.40 //
GP12garup1_u:8592: niṣadhasya nalaḥ putro nalasya ca nabhāḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8603: maroḥ prasuśrutaḥ putrastasya codāvasuḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.46 //
GP12garup1_u:8621: kṣemāri tastvanenāśca tasya rāmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,138.55 //
GP12garup1_u:8627: vijayasya ṛtaḥ putraḥ ṛtasya sunayaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.58 //
GP12garup1_u:8629: bahulāśvo dhṛteḥ putro bahulāśvātkṛtiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,138.59 //
GP12garup1_u:8630: janakasya dvaye vaṃśe ukto yogasamāśrayaḥ // GarP_1,138.60 //
GP12garup1_u:8631: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:8634: sūryasya kathito vaṃśaḥ somavaṃśaṃ śṛṇuṣva me /
GP12garup1_u:8636: atreḥ somastasya bhāryā tārā suraguroḥ priyā /
GP12garup1_u:8637: somāttarā budhaṃ jajñe budhaputraḥ purūravāḥ // GarP_1,139.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8643: balākāśvastasya putro balākāśvāt kuśaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,139.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8646: kanyā satyavatī dattā ṛcīkāya dvijāya sā /
GP12garup1_u:8659: vibhostu suvibhuḥ putraḥ suvibhoḥ sukumārakaḥ // GarP_1,139.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8665: vijayaḥ saṃjayasyāpi vijayasya kṛtaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8671: yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva devayānī vyajāyata // GarP_1,139.19 //
GP12garup1_u:8672: druhyuṃ cānuṃ ca pūruñca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣapārvaṇī /
GP12garup1_u:8682: jayadhvajo madhuḥ śūro vṛṣaṇaḥ pañca savratāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8696: kauśikasya ṛciḥ putraḥ tataścaidyo nṛpaḥ kila /
GP12garup1_u:8697: kuntiḥ kilāsya putro 'bhūtkuntervṛṣṇiḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,139.32 //
GP12garup1_u:8699: daśārhasya suto vyomā jīmūtaśca tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.33 //
GP12garup1_u:8701: tato madhuratho jajñe śakunistasya cātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.34 //
GP12garup1_u:8705: puruhotro hyanoḥ putro hyaṃśuśca puruhotrataḥ // GarP_1,139.36 //
GP12garup1_u:8725: tadātmajo vilomā ca vilomnastumburuḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.46 //
GP12garup1_u:8727: tasyāhukaścāhukī ca kanyā caivāhukasya tu // GarP_1,139.47 //
GP12garup1_u:8730: śrīdevī śāntidevī ca vasudeva uvāha tāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8739: pṛthā ca śrutadevī ca śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ // GarP_1,139.53 //
GP12garup1_u:8741: sā dattā kuntinā pāṇḍostasyāṃ dharmānilendrakaiḥ // GarP_1,139.54 //
GP12garup1_u:8743: mādrayāṃ nāsatyadastrābhyāṃ kuntyāṃ karṇaḥ purābhavat // GarP_1,139.55 //
GP12garup1_u:8751: niśaṭhaścolmuko jāto devakyāṃ ṣaṭ ca jajñire // GarP_1,139.59 //
GP12garup1_u:8753: ṛjudāso bhadradevaḥ kaṃsa evāvadhīcca tān // GarP_1,139.60 //
GP12garup1_u:8757: śreṣṭhā jāmbavatī cāṣṭau jajñire tāḥ sutānbahūn // GarP_1,139.62 //
GP12garup1_u:8788: iti śrīgāruḍe mahupārāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:8796: jaleyuḥ santateyuśca rodrāśvasya sutā varāḥ // GarP_1,140.3 //
GP12garup1_u:8802: narasya saṃkṛtiḥ putro gargo vai saṃkṛteḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,140.6 //
GP12garup1_u:8803: gargādamanyuḥ putro vai śiniḥ putro vyajāyata /
GP12garup1_u:8810: bṛhatkarmā tasya putrastasya putro jayadrathaḥ // GarP_1,140.10 //
GP12garup1_u:8814: nṛpasya sṛmaraḥ putraḥ sukṛtiśca pṛthoḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,140.12 //
GP12garup1_u:8822: purañjayaḥ sudhīrācca tasya putro vidūrathaḥ // GarP_1,140.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8840: sudhanuśca pīkṣicca jahnuścaiva kuroḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,140.25 //
GP12garup1_u:8848: sahadevācca ca somāpiḥ somāpeḥ śrutavānsutaḥ // GarP_1,140.29 //
GP12garup1_u:8862: dhṛrāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuñca taddāsyāṃ vidurantathā // GarP_1,140.36 //
GP12garup1_u:8864: śataputraṃ duryodhanādyaṃ pāṇḍoḥ pañca prajajñire // GarP_1,140.37 //
GP12garup1_u:8866: śatānīkaḥ śrutakarmā draupadyāṃ pañca vai kramāt // GarP_1,140.38 //
GP12garup1_u:8867: yaudheyī ca hiḍimbā ca kauśī caiva subhadrikā /
GP12garup1_u:8868: vijayā vai reṇumatī pañcabhyastu sutāḥ kramāt // GarP_1,140.39 //
GP12garup1_u:8872: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:8878: nṛcakṣuśca mukhābāṇaḥ medhāvī ca nṛpañjayaḥ // GarP_1,141.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8882: kṣemakaśca tataḥ śūdraḥ pitā pūrvastataḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,141.4 //
GP12garup1_u:8889: kṛtañjayo dhanañjayaḥ saṃjayaḥ śākya eva ca // GarP_1,141.7 //
GP12garup1_u:8895: kṣemyaśca suvrato dharmaḥ śmaśrulo dṛḍhasenakaḥ // GarP_1,141.10 //
GP12garup1_u:8897: iṣuñjayaśca ityete nṛpā bārhadrathāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,141.11 //
GP12garup1_u:8901: yāti bhūḥ pralayaṃ cāpsu hyāpastejasi pāvakaḥ // GarP_1,141.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8903: ahaṃ buddhau matirjove jīvo 'vyakte tadātmani // GarP_1,141.14 //
GP12garup1_u:8905: avināśyaparaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsvargādi nāśi hi // GarP_1,141.15 //
GP12garup1_u:8907: dharmaṃ kuryātsthiraṃ yena pāpaṃ hitvā hariṃ vrajet // GarP_1,141.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8908: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhaviṣya rājavaṃśa dṛ nāmaikacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:8914: matsyo bhūtvā hayagrīvaṃ daityaṃ hatvājikaṇṭakam // GarP_1,142.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8916: mandaraṃ dhārayāmāsa kūrmo bhūtvā hitāya ca // GarP_1,142.3 //
GP12garup1_u:8920: amṛtaṃ pāyayāmāsa strīrūpī ca surānhariḥ // GarP_1,142.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8926: triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ cakre niḥ kṣattriyāṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,142.8 //
GP12garup1_u:8928: yāgaṃ kṛtvā mahābāhurmahendre parvate sthitaḥ // GarP_1,142.9 //
GP12garup1_u:8936: rāvaṇaṃ cānujaṃ tasya laṅkāpuryāṃ vibhīṣaṇam // GarP_1,142.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8938: āruhya puṣpakaṃ sārdhaṃ sītayā patibhaktayā // GarP_1,142.14 //
GP12garup1_u:8940: rājyaṃ cakāra devādīnpālayāmāsa sa prajāḥ // GarP_1,142.15 //
GP12garup1_u:8942: sā mahīpatinā reme rāmeṇaiva yathāsukham // GarP_1,142.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8943: rāvaṇasya gṛhe sītā sthitā bheje na rāvaṇam /
GP12garup1_u:8944: karmaṇā manasā vācā sā gatā rāghavaṃ sadā // GarP_1,142.17 //
GP12garup1_u:8945: pativratā tu sā sītā hyanasūyā yathaiva tu /
GP12garup1_u:8946: pativratāyā māhātmyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ kathayāmyaham // GarP_1,142.18 //
GP12garup1_u:8948: taṃ tathā vyādhitaṃ bhāryā patiṃ devamivārcayat // GarP_1,142.19 //
GP12garup1_u:8956: tacchrutvā prāha tadbhāryā sūryo nodayameṣyati // GarP_1,142.23 //
GP12garup1_u:8958: bahūnyabdapramāṇāni tato devā bhayaṃ yayuḥ // GarP_1,142.24 //
GP12garup1_u:8965: taiḥ sā prasāditā gatvā hyanasūyā pativratā /
GP12garup1_u:8968: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe daśāvatāradṛ nāma dvicatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:8980: astragrāmaṃ tato yakṣīṃ tāṭakāṃ prajaghāna ha // GarP_1,143.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8982: janakasya kratuṃ gatvā upayeme 'tha jānakīm // GarP_1,143.6 //
GP12garup1_u:8983: ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇo vīro bharato māṇḍavīṃ sutām /
GP12garup1_u:8984: śatrughno vai kīrtimatīṃ kuśadhvajasute ubhe // GarP_1,143.7 //
GP12garup1_u:8988: sa rāmāya tatputrāya kaikeyyā prārthitastadā // GarP_1,143.9 //
GP12garup1_u:8990: rāmaḥ pitṛhitārthañca lakṣmaṇena ca sītayā // GarP_1,143.10 //
GP12garup1_u:8992: rathaṃ tyaktvā prayāgañca citrakūṭagiriṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,143.11 //
GP12garup1_u:8993: rāmasya tu viyogena rājā svargaṃ samāśritaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8996: sa naicchatpāduke dattvā rājyāya bharatāya tu // GarP_1,143.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8998: nandigrāme sthito bhakto hyayodhyāṃ nāviśadvratī // GarP_1,143.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9002: nikṛtya karṇo nāse ca rāmeṇāthāpavāritā // GarP_1,143.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9008: sītayā prerito rāmo mārīcaṃ nijaghāna ha // GarP_1,143.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9009: mriyamāṇaḥ sa ca prāha hā sīte ! lakṣmaṇoti ca /
GP12garup1_u:9011: uvāca rākṣasī māyā nūnaṃ sītā hṛteti saḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9013: jaṭāyuṣaṃ vinirbhidya yayau laṅkāṃ tato balī /
GP12garup1_u:9015: āgatya rāmaḥ sūnyāñca parṇaśālāṃ dadarśa ha /
GP12garup1_u:9016: śokaṃ kṛtvātha jānakyā mārgaṇaṃ kṛtavānprabhuḥ // GarP_1,143.23 //
GP12garup1_u:9018: gatvā sakhyaṃ tataścakre sugrīveṇa ca rāghavaḥ // GarP_1,143.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9024: pratīcīmuttarāṃ prācīṃ diśaṃ gatvā samāgatāḥ // GarP_1,143.27 //
GP12garup1_u:9025: dakṣiṇāntu diśaṃ ye ca mārgayanto 'tha jānakīm /
GP12garup1_u:9032: bhava bhāryeti vadatā cintayantīñca rāghavam // GarP_1,143.31 //
GP12garup1_u:9034: rāmasya tasya dūto 'haṃ śokaṃ mā kuru maithili // GarP_1,143.32 //
GP12garup1_u:9035: svābhijñānañca me dehi yena rāmaḥ smariṣyati /
GP12garup1_u:9036: tacchrutvā pradadau sītā veṇīratnaṃ hanūmate // GarP_1,143.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9037: yathā rāmo nayecchīghraṃ tathā vācyaṃ tvayā kape /
GP12garup1_u:9038: tathetyuktvā tu hanumānvanaṃ divyaṃ babhañja ha // GarP_1,143.34 //
GP12garup1_u:9044: dagdhvā laṅkāṃ samāyāto rāmapārśvaṃ sa vānaraḥ // GarP_1,143.37 //
GP12garup1_u:9046: veṇīratnañca rāmāya rāmo laṅkāpurrī yayau // GarP_1,143.38 //
GP12garup1_u:9048: vibhīṣaṇo 'pi samprāptaḥ śaraṇaṃ rāghavaṃ prati // GarP_1,143.39 //
GP12garup1_u:9050: rāmo nalena setuñca kṛtvābdhau cottatāra tam // GarP_1,143.40 //
GP12garup1_u:9052: atha te vānarā vīrā nīlāṅgadanalādayaḥ // GarP_1,143.41 //
GP12garup1_u:9056: rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇo hatvā sakapiḥ sarvarākṣasān // GarP_1,143.43 //
GP12garup1_u:9063: sītāṃ śuddhāṃ gṛhītvātha vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9064: savānaraḥ samāyāto hyayodhyāṃ pravarāṃ purīm // GarP_1,143.47 //
GP12garup1_u:9068: putrau kuśalavau dṛṣṭvā tau ca rājye 'bhyaṣecayat // GarP_1,143.49 //
GP12garup1_u:9070: śatrughno lavaṇaṃ jaghne śailūṣaṃ bhatastataḥ // GarP_1,143.50 //
GP12garup1_u:9072: svargaṃ gato janaiḥ sārdhamayodhyāsthaiḥ kṛtārthakaḥ // GarP_1,143.51 //
GP12garup1_u:9073: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rāmāyaṇavarṇanaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:9079: kṛṣṇaḥ pītvā stanau gāḍhaṃ pūtanāmanayatkṣayam // GarP_1,144.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9081: damitaḥ kāliyo nāgo dhenuko vinipātitaḥ // GarP_1,144.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9085: keśī vinihato daityo gopādyāḥ paritoṣitāḥ // GarP_1,144.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9087: rukmiṇīsatyabhāmādyāḥ hyaṣṭau patnyo hareḥ parāḥ // GarP_1,144.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9089: tāsāṃ putrāśca pautrādyāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // GarP_1,144.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9094: narako nihato yena pārijātaṃ jahāra yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9095: balaśca śisupālaśca hataśca dvividaḥ kapiḥ // GarP_1,144.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9096: aniruddhādabhūdvajraḥ sa ca rājā gate harau /
GP12garup1_u:9098: mathurāyāṃ cograsenaṃ pālanaṃ ca divaukasām // GarP_1,144.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9099: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe harivaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catuścātvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:9109: śantanoḥ satyavatyāṃ ca dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9116: pāṇḍoḥ kuntyāñca mādyāṃ ca pañca putrāḥ prajajñire // GarP_1,145.8 //
GP12garup1_u:9121: dagdhā jatugṛhe vīrāste muktāḥ svadhiyāmalāḥ // GarP_1,145.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9127: ardvarājyaṃ tataḥ prāptā indraprasthe purottame // GarP_1,145.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9132: gāṇḍīvaṃ nāma taddivyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12garup1_u:9134: sa tena dhanuṣā vīraḥ pāṇḍavo jātavedasam /
GP12garup1_u:9137: yudhiṣṭhirāya mahate bhrātre nītivide mudā // GarP_1,145.18 //
GP12garup1_u:9152: pāṇḍavānāṃ śikhaṇḍī ca tayoryuddhaṃ babhūva ha /
GP12garup1_u:9157: ānande tu pade līno vimale muktakilbiṣe // GarP_1,145.27 //
GP12garup1_u:9158: tato droṇo yayau yoddhuṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnena bīryavān /
GP12garup1_u:9160: yatra te pṛthivīpālā hatāḥ pārthena saṃgare /
GP12garup1_u:9164: nimagnaḥ sūryalokantu tataḥ prāpa sa vīryavān // GarP_1,145.30 //
GP12garup1_u:9165: tataḥ śalyo yayau yoddhuṃ dharmarājena dhīmatā /
GP12garup1_u:9170: aśvatthāmā gato drauṇiḥ suptasainyaṃ tato niśi // GarP_1,145.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9174: aiṣikāstreṇa taṃ jitvā jagrāhārjuna uttamam // GarP_1,145.35 //
GP12garup1_u:9176: snātvā santarpya devāṃśca pitṝnatha pitāmahān // GarP_1,145.36 //
GP12garup1_u:9180: śrutvā tu mausale rājā japtvā nāmasahasrakam // GarP_1,145.38 //
GP12garup1_u:9186: duṣṭānāñca vadhārthāya hyavatāraṃ karoti ca // GarP_1,145.41 //
GP12garup1_u:9191: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhāratādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:9196: rogaḥ pāpmā jvaro vyādhirvikāro duṣṭa āmayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9199: saṃprāptiścaiti vijñānaṃ rogāṇāṃ pañcadhā smṛtam // GarP_1,146.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9201: nidānamāhuḥ paryāyaiḥ prāgrūpaṃ yena lakṣyate // GarP_1,146.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9205: saṃsthānāṃ vyañjanaṃ liṅgaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cihnamākṛtiḥ // GarP_1,146.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9208: vidyādupaśayaṃ vyādheḥ sa hi sātmyamiti smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9213: sā bhidyate yathātraiva vakṣyante 'ṣṭau jvarā iti // GarP_1,146.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9219: sarveṣāmeva rogāṇāṃ nidānaṃ kupitā malāḥ // GarP_1,146.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9231: pūrvāhne pūrvarātre ca śleṣmā vakṣyāmi saṅkarān // GarP_1,146.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9242: rasāyanaṃ prapadyāśu doṣā dehe vikurvate // GarP_1,146.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9243: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe sarvaroganidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:9252: indramado jaladeṣvapsu nīlikā jyotiroṣadhīṣu bhūmyāmūṣaro nāma //
GP12garup1_u:9254: aṅgeṣu ca samudbhūtāḥ piḍakāśca kaphodbhave // GarP_1,147.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9262: na vijīrṇaṃ na ca mlānirjvarasyāmasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,147.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9273: taducchītaṃ mahā nidrā divā jāgaraṇaṃ niśi // GarP_1,147.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9274: sadā vā naiva vā nidrā mahāsvedo hi naiva vā /
GP12garup1_u:9278: sasvanau sarujau karṇau mahāśītau hi naiva vā /
GP12garup1_u:9281: koṣṭhānāṃ śyāvaraktānāṃ maṇḍalānāṃ ca darśanam // GarP_1,147.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9292: tvaci koṣṭhe ca vā dāhaṃ vidadhāti puro 'nu vā // GarP_1,147.21 //
GP12garup1_u:9294: śītādau tatra pittena kaphe syānditaśoṣite // GarP_1,147.22 //
GP12garup1_u:9295: pitte śānte 'tha vai mūrchā madastṛṣṇā ca jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:9296: dāhādau punaranteṣu tandrālasye vamiḥ kramāt // GarP_1,147.23 //
GP12garup1_u:9298: caturdhā tu kṛtaḥ svedo dāhādyairabhighātajaḥ // GarP_1,147.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9313: iti jvaro 'ṣṭadhā dṛṣṭaḥ samāsāddvibidhastu saḥ // GarP_1,147.32 //
GP12garup1_u:9315: prākṛto vaikṛtaḥ sādhyo 'sādhyaḥ sāmo nirāmakaḥ // GarP_1,147.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9316: pūrvaṃ śarire śarīre tāpo manasi mānase /
GP12garup1_u:9318: dāhaḥ pittayute miśraṃ miśre 'ntaḥ saṃśraye punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9319: jvare 'dhikaṃ vikārāḥ syurantaḥ kṣobho malagrahaḥ // GarP_1,147.35 //
GP12garup1_u:9320: bahireva bahirvege tāpo 'pi ca sa sādhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9322: vaikṛto 'nyaḥ sa duḥ sādhyaḥ prāyaśca prākṛto 'nilāt /
GP12garup1_u:9323: varṣāsu māruto duṣṭaḥ pittaśleṣmānvitaṃ jvaram // GarP_1,147.37 //
GP12garup1_u:9324: kuryācca pittaṃ śaradi tasya cānucaraḥ kaphaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9341: malaṃ jvaroṣṇadhātūnvā sa śīghraṃ kṣapayettataḥ // GarP_1,147.46 //
GP12garup1_u:9344: prāyo 'nuyāti maryādāṃ mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca /
GP12garup1_u:9345: ityagniveśasya mataṃ hārītasya punaḥ smṛtiḥ // GarP_1,147.48 //
GP12garup1_u:9346: dviguṇā saptamī yā ca navamyekādaśī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:9347: eṣā tridoṣamaryādā mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca // GarP_1,147.49 //
GP12garup1_u:9353: doṣaḥ pravartate teṣāṃ sve kāle jvarayanbalī // GarP_1,147.52 //
GP12garup1_u:9355: kṣīṇadoṣo jvaraḥ sūkṣmo rasādiṣveva līyate // GarP_1,147.53 //
GP12garup1_u:9358: āśu sarvasya vapuṣo vyāptidoṣo na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:9361: doṣo raktāśrayaḥ prāyaḥ karoti santataṃ jvaram // GarP_1,147.56 //
GP12garup1_u:9379: kramo yatnena vicchinnaḥ satāpo lakṣyate jvaraḥ // GarP_1,147.65 //
GP12garup1_u:9384: bhūmau sthitaṃ jalaiḥ siktaṃ kālaṃ naiva pratīkṣate /
GP12garup1_u:9385: aṅkurāya yathā bījaṃ doṣabījaṃ bhavettathā // GarP_1,147.68 //
GP12garup1_u:9389: utkleśo gauravaṃ dainyaṃ bhaṅgo 'ṅgānāṃ vijṛmbhaṇam // GarP_1,147.70 //
GP12garup1_u:9395: svedo 'titṛṣṇā vamanaṃ daurgandhyaṃ vā sahiṣṇutā // GarP_1,147.73 //
GP12garup1_u:9398: antardāho bahiḥ śaityaṃ śvāso hikkā hi majjame /
GP12garup1_u:9401: uttarottaraduḥ sādhyāḥ pañcānye tu viparyaye // GarP_1,147.76 //
GP12garup1_u:9407: sa vai hāridrako nāma jvarabhedo 'ntakaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,147.79 //
GP12garup1_u:9409: tīkṣṇo 'tha vā divā mando jāyate rātrijo jvaraḥ // GarP_1,147.80 //
GP12garup1_u:9413: tadardhaṃ śītalaṃ dehe hyardhaṃ coṣṇaṃ prajāyate // GarP_1,147.82 //
GP12garup1_u:9414: kāye pittaṃ yadā nyastaṃ śleṣmā cānte vyavasthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9415: uṣṇatvaṃ tena dehasya śītatvaṃ karapādayoḥ // GarP_1,147.83 //
GP12garup1_u:9421: svedaḥ kṣuvaḥ prakṛtiyogimano 'nnalipsā kaṇḍūśca mūrdhni vigatjvaralakṣaṇāni // GarP_1,147.86
GP12garup1_u:9422: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jvaranidānādikaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:9428: kupitaṃ paittikaiḥ pittaṃ dravaṃ raktañca mūrchati // GarP_1,148.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9434: chardhitaśchardibai bhatsyaṃ kāsaḥ śvāso bhramaḥ klamaḥ // GarP_1,148.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9442: bahvauṣadhāni pittasya vireko hi varauṣadham // GarP_1,148.9 //
GP12garup1_u:9443: anubandhī kapho yatra tatra tasyāpi śuddhikṛt /
GP12garup1_u:9444: kaṣāyāḥ svādavo yasya viśuddhau śleṣmalā hitāḥ // GarP_1,148.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9448: anubandhi balaṃ yasya śāntapittanarasya ca // GarP_1,148.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9452: na hi saṃśodhanaṃ kiñcidasya ca pratilominaḥ // GarP_1,148.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9455: saṃsṛṣṭeṣu hi doṣeṣu sarvathā chardanaṃ hitam /
GP12garup1_u:9456: tatra doṣo 'tra gamanaṃ śivāstra iva lakṣyate // GarP_1,148.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9458: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe raktapittanidānaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:9461: āśukārī yataḥ kāsaḥ sa evātaḥ pravakṣyate /
GP12garup1_u:9464: teṣāṃ bhaviṣyatāṃ rūpaṃ kaṇṭhe kaṇḍūrarocakaḥ // GarP_1,149.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9466: ūrdhvaṃ pravṛttaḥ prāpyo rastasminkaṇṭhe ca saṃsṛjan // GarP_1,149.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9468: kṣipannivākṣiṇī kliṣṭasvaraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan // GarP_1,149.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9472: soṃgaharṣo kaphaṃ śuṣkaṃ kṛchrānmuktvālpatāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,149.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9474: pittāsṛgvamanaṃ tṛṣṇā vaisvaryaṃ dhūmako madaḥ // GarP_1,149.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9480: upasyantaḥ kṣato vāyuḥ pittenānugato balī // GarP_1,149.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9481: kupitaḥ kurute kāsaṃ kaphaṃ tena saśoṇitam /
GP12garup1_u:9482: pītaṃ śyāvañca śuṣkañca grathitaṃ kupitaṃ bahu // GarP_1,149.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9493: supyate tudyata iva hṛdayaṃ pacatīva ca /
GP12garup1_u:9498: yāpyau vā balināṃ tadvatkṣatajo 'pi navau tu tau // GarP_1,149.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9500: miśrā yāpyāśca ye sarve jarasaḥ sthavirasya ca // GarP_1,149.20 //
GP12garup1_u:9503: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kāsanidānā nāmaikonapañcāśaduttaraśatatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9516: preritaḥ prerayankṣudraṃ svayaṃ sa samalaṃ marut /
GP12garup1_u:9517: pratilomaṃ śirā gacchedudīrya pavanaḥ kapham // GarP_1,150.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9526: sa yāpyastamakaḥ sādhyo narasya balino bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:9537: yo dīrghamucchvasityūrdhvaṃ na ca pratyāharatyadhaḥ // GarP_1,150.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9539: ūrdhvaṃ samīkṣate bhrāntamakṣiṇī paritaḥ kṣipan // GarP_1,150.17 //
GP12garup1_u:9541: ete sidhyeyuravyaktāḥ vyaktāḥ prāṇaharā dhruvam // GarP_1,150.18 //
GP12garup1_u:9542: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śvāsanidānā nāma pañcāśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:9547: hikrā bhakṣyodbhavā kṣudrā yamalā mahatīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:9550: karoti hikrāṃ śvasanaḥ mandaśabdāṃ kṣudhānugām // GarP_1,151.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9551: samaṃ sandhyānnapānena yā prayāti ca sānnajā /
GP12garup1_u:9552: āyāsātpavanaḥ kruddhaḥ kṣudrāṃ hikrāṃ pravartayet // GarP_1,151.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9554: vṛddhimāyāsato yāti bhuktamātre ca mārdabam // GarP_1,151.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9556: pariṇāmānmukhe vṛddhiṃ pariṇāme ca gacchati // GarP_1,151.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9557: kampayantī śiro grīvāṃ yamalāṃ tāṃ vinirdiśet /
GP12garup1_u:9559: yamalā veginī hikrā pariṇāmavatī ca sā /
GP12garup1_u:9561: stambhayantī tanuṃ vācaṃ smṛtiṃ saṃjñāṃ ca muñcatī /
GP12garup1_u:9567: gambhīreṇa nidānena gambhīrā tu susādhayet // GarP_1,151.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9568: ādye dve varjayedanye sarvaliṅgāṃ ca veginīm /
GP12garup1_u:9571: sarve 'pi rogā nāśāya na tvevaṃ śāghrakāriṇaḥ // GarP_1,151.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9572: hikrāśvāsau yathā tau hi mṛtyukāle kṛtālayau // GarP_1,151.15 //
GP12garup1_u:9573: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hikrānidānā nāmaikapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:9580: yacca rājā ca yakṣmā ca rājayakṣmā tato mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9585: tairudīrṇo 'nilaḥ pittaṃ vyarthaṃ codīrya sarvataḥ // GarP_1,152.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9587: mukhāni srotasāṃ ruddhvā tathaivātivisṛjya vā // GarP_1,152.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9589: rūpaṃ bhaviṣyatastasya pratiśyāyo bhṛśaṃ jvaraḥ // GarP_1,152.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9595: bāhvoḥ pratodo jihvāyāḥ kāye baibhatsyadarśanam // GarP_1,152.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9601: jyotirdivi davāgnīnāṃ jvalatāṃ ca mahīruhām // GarP_1,152.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9604: sthite pārśve ca rugbodhe sandhisthe bhavati jvaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9615: vidāho manasaḥ sthāne bhavantyanye hyupadravāḥ // GarP_1,152.20 //
GP12garup1_u:9618: raso hyasya na raktāya māṃsāya kurute tu tat /
GP12garup1_u:9619: upaṣṭabdhaḥ samantācca kevalaṃ vartate kṣayī // GarP_1,152.22 //
GP12garup1_u:9623: svarabhedo bhavettasya kṣāmo rūkṣaścalaḥ svaraḥ // GarP_1,152.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9625: pittāttālugale dāhaḥ śoṣo bhavati santatam // GarP_1,152.25 //
GP12garup1_u:9627: svayaṃ viruddhaiḥ sarvaistu sarvāliṅgaiḥ kṣayo bhavet // GarP_1,152.26 //
GP12garup1_u:9630: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yakṣmanidānā nāma dvipañcāśaduttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:9648: madhuraṃ lavaṇaṃ bhūri prasaktaṃ lomaharṣaṇam // GarP_1,153.8 //
GP12garup1_u:9654: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe
GP12garup1_u:9659: kṛmihṛdrogaliṅgaiśca smṛtāḥ pañca tu hṛdgatāḥ // GarP_1,154.1 //
GP12garup1_u:9661: bhidyate śuṣyate stabdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ śūnyatā bhramaḥ // GarP_1,154.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9669: tamaḥ praveśo hṛllāsaḥ śothaḥ kaṇḍūḥ kaphastrutiḥ // GarP_1,154.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9673: ṣaṣṭhī syādupasargācca vātapitte ca kāraṇam // GarP_1,154.8 //
GP12garup1_u:9677: saṃśoṣya tṛṣṇā jāyante tāsāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam // GarP_1,154.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9693: yā ca pānātipānotthā tīkṣṇāgre snehapākajā // GarP_1,154.18 //
GP12garup1_u:9697: yā tṛṣṇā jāyate tīvrā sopasargātmikā smṛtā // GarP_1,154.20 //
GP12garup1_u:9698: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āmlapittanidānā nāma catuḥ pañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9708: ādye made dvitīye 'pi prama (mo) dāyatane sthitaḥ // GarP_1,155.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9710: madhyamottamayoḥ sandhiṃ prāpya rājāsano madaḥ // GarP_1,155.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9714: niśceṣṭaḥ sannavākśete tṛtīye 'tra made sthitaḥ // GarP_1,155.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9716: dharmādharmaṃ sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ mānānarthaṃ hitāhitam // GarP_1,155.8 //
GP12garup1_u:9722: vibhedaṃ prasabhaṃ tṛṣṇā saumyo glānirjvaro 'ruciḥ // GarP_1,155.11 //

GP12garup1_u:9970: sapicchaṃ saniruddhaṃ ca sarvaiḥ sarvātmakaṃ malaiḥ /

GP12garup1_u:10040: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mūtrāghātamūtrākṛcchanidāna nāmāṣṭapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12garup1_u:10473: śavagandhī ca vīsarpaḥ kardamākhyamuśanti tam // GarP_1,163.21 //

GP12garup1_u:10488: tvacaḥ kurvānti vaivarṇyaṃ śiṣṭāḥ kuṣṭhamuśantitam // GarP_1,164.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10494: kuṣṭhāni saptadhā doṣaiḥ pṛthagdvandvaiḥ samāgataiḥ // GarP_1,164.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10496: vātena kuṣṭhaṃ kāpālaṃ pittenaudumbaraṃ kaphāt // GarP_1,164.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10500: puṇḍarīkaṃ savisphoṭaṃ pāmā carmadalaṃ tathā // GarP_1,164.9 //
GP12garup1_u:10502: puṇḍarīkaryajihve ca mahākuṣṭhāni sapta tu // GarP_1,164.10 //
GP12garup1_u:10510: kāpālaṃ todabahulaṃ tatkuṣṭhaṃ viṣamaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,164.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10514: sthiraṃ satyānaṃ guru snigdhaṃ śvetaraktaṃ malānvitam // GarP_1,164.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10523: antā rūkṣaṃ bahiḥ snigdhamantarghṛṣṭaṃ rajaḥ kiret /
GP12garup1_u:10534: puṇḍarīkaṃ bhavettaddhi citaṃ sphoṭaiḥ sitāruṇaiḥ // GarP_1,164.26 //
GP12garup1_u:10536: sūkṣmā śyāmāruṇā rūkṣā prāyaḥ sphikpāṇikūrpare // GarP_1,164.27 //
GP12garup1_u:10546: tatra tvaci sthite kaṣṭhe kāye vaivarṇyarūkṣātā // GarP_1,164.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10556: sadāhaṃ romavidhvaṃsi kaphācchvetaṃ ghana guru // GarP_1,164.37 //
GP12garup1_u:10565: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kuṣṭharoganidāna nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10579: śvetāstāmrāvabhāsāśca nāmataḥ saptadhā tu te // GarP_1,165.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10581: cyuravo darbhakusumāḥ sugandhāste ca kurvate // GarP_1,165.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10593: sausurādāḥ saśūlākhyā lelihā janayanti hi // GarP_1,165.13 //
GP12garup1_u:10596: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kriminidānaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭhyadhikaśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:10600: sarvathānarthakathane vighna eva ca kāraṇam // GarP_1,166.1 //

GP12garup1_u:11444: oṃ hoṃ hāṃ haḥ mantreṇa śāntirvālānāṃ mārjanādvalidānataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11445: oṃ hrīṃ bālamrahādvaliṃ gṛhṇīta vālaṃ muñcata svāhā // GarP_1,172.19 //
GP12garup1_u:11448: dadhyājyaṃ taṇḍulīyaṃ ca gṛhadhṛmo niśā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:11449: piṣṭaṃ pānaṃ tathā kṣaudraṃ sindhṛtthasya vipāntakam // GarP_1,172.21 //
GP12garup1_u:11459: trikaṭu triphalā vahnirguḍūcī ca śatāvarī // GarP_1,172.26 //
GP12garup1_u:11461: triphalā ca kaṇā śuṇṭhī guḍūcī ca śatāvarī // GarP_1,172.27 //
GP12garup1_u:11463: cūrṇaṃ vidāryā madhvājyaṃ līḍhvā daśa striyo vrajet // GarP_1,172.28 //
GP12garup1_u:11467: śirovirecanaṃ ceti pañcakarma ca kathyate // GarP_1,172.30 //
GP12garup1_u:11470: strīyuktaḥ śiśire tadvadvasante na divā svapet /
GP12garup1_u:11472: pathyāni śālayo mudrā varṣāmbhaḥ kvathitaṃ payaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11494: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe strīrogacikitsādikayanaṃ nāma dvisaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11500: gambhagī pauṣkaraṃ bījaṃ drākṣā kharjūrakaṃ balā // GarP_1,173.2 //
GP12garup1_u:11502: madhukaṃ tālakaṣmāṇḍaṃ mukhyo 'yaṃ madhuro gaṇaḥ // GarP_1,173.3 //
GP12garup1_u:11509: dadhi takraṃ kāñjikaṃ ca lakucaṃ cāmlave tasam /
GP12garup1_u:11510: amlo loṇaḥ śuṇṭhīyukto jāraṇaḥ pācano rasaḥ // GarP_1,173.7 //
GP12garup1_u:11529: rohiṇī śaṅkhacūrṇaṃ ca karkoṭo vai jayantikā /
GP12garup1_u:11541: kacchurā sallakī pāṭhā punarnavā śatāvarī // GarP_1,173.21 //
GP12garup1_u:11546: dūrvā vaṭaḥ pippalī ca badarī sallakī tathā // GarP_1,173.23 //
GP12garup1_u:11558: atha dagdhvā śirājālaṃ yonikarma śiroruji (jam ) // GarP_1,173.29 //
GP12garup1_u:11561: jalamuṣṇaṃ ghṛte deyaṃ pṛthak taile tu śasyate /
GP12garup1_u:11562: senehe pitte tu tṛṣṇāyāṃ pibeduṣṇodakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,173.31 //
GP12garup1_u:11566: vātaśleṣmāṇi vāte vā kaphe vā sveda iṣyate /
GP12garup1_u:11568: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yogasamadivarṇanaṃ nāma trisaptanyuttaraśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:11572: śaṅkhapuṣpī vacā somā brāhmī brahmasuvarcalā // GarP_1,174.1 //
GP12garup1_u:11578: punarnavā guḍūcī ca bṛhatī ca śatāvarī // GarP_1,174.4 //
GP12garup1_u:11589: candanaṃ tagaraṃ kuṣṭaṃ manaḥ śilā jyotiṣmatī // GarP_1,174.9 //
GP12garup1_u:11592: vāyunā bhagnagātrāṇāṃ ye ca sīdanti maithune /
GP12garup1_u:11599: nirguṇḍyā vā prasāraḥ syātkaṇṭakāryā rasādibhiḥ // GarP_1,174.14 //
GP12garup1_u:11603: vaṭikā modako vāpi cūrṇa syātsarvaroganut // GarP_1,174.16 //
GP12garup1_u:11605: lavaṇaiḥ kaṭukairyuktaṃ yathālābhaṃ ca geganut // GarP_1,174.17 //
GP12garup1_u:11607: sudhāṃ ca bālāṃ gaṇikāṃ saptaparṇasuvarcikām // GarP_1,174.18 //
GP12garup1_u:11619: ropaṇaṃ mṛdubhāvaṃ ca tailenānena kārayet // GarP_1,174.24 //
GP12garup1_u:11620: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brāhmīghṛtādivarṇanaṃ nāma catuḥ saptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11629: vātajvaraharaḥ kvātho guḍūcyā mustakena ca // GarP_1,175.3 //
GP12garup1_u:11632: sājyaḥ kvāthaḥ śleṣmajaṃ tu saśuṇṭhiḥ sadurālabhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11637: jvaranucca kṛtaḥ kvāthastathā vai suradāruṇā // GarP_1,175.7 //
GP12garup1_u:11642: cūrṇaṃ jvaraṃ ca kvathitaṃ dhānya (dhanyā) kośīrapaparpaṭaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11643: āmalakyā guḍūcyā ca madhuyuktaṃ sacandanam // GarP_1,175.10 //
GP12garup1_u:11653: bilvādipa pañcamūlasya kvāthaḥ syādvātike jvare // GarP_1,175.15 //
GP12garup1_u:11655: vātajvare tvayaṃ kvātho dattaḥ śāntikaraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,175.16 //
GP12garup1_u:11657: vidhāne kriyamāṇe 'pi ysaya saṃjñā na jāyate // GarP_1,175.17 //
GP12garup1_u:11659: tiktā pāṭhā parpaṭāśca viśālā triphalā trivṛt /
GP12garup1_u:11661: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jvaraharanānāyogādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcasaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11673: baddhamūlā ghanā dīrghāḥ snagdhāḥ syurnotpatanti ca // GarP_1,176.5 //
GP12garup1_u:11680: nīlī ca karavīraṃ ca guḍametaiḥ samaṃ śṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:11682: āmrāsthimajjā triphalā nī (tā) lī ca bhṛṅga rājakam /
GP12garup1_u:11683: jīrṇaṃ pakvaṃ lohacūrṇaṃ kāñjikaṃ kṛṣṇakeśakṛt // GarP_1,176.10 //
GP12garup1_u:11686: saindhavaṃ ca vacā hiṅgu kuṣṭhaṃ nāgeśvaraṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:11687: śatapuṣpā devadāru ebhistailaṃ tu sādhitam // GarP_1,176.12 //
GP12garup1_u:11699: valkalaiḥ sādhitairliptaṃ liṅgaṃ tena vivardhate // GarP_1,176.18 //
GP12garup1_u:11700: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe keśotpattyādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11711: puṣpaṃ rātryandhatāṃ hanti timiraṃ paṭalaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:11712: caturbhāgāni śaṅkhasya tadardhena manaḥ śilā // GarP_1,177.5 //
GP12garup1_u:11714: chāyāśuṣkāṃ tu vaṭikāṃ kṛtvā nayanamañjayet // GarP_1,177.6 //
GP12garup1_u:11715: timiraṃ paṭalaṃ hanti piciṭaṃ ca mahauṣadham /
GP12garup1_u:11716: trikaṭu triphalāṃ caiva karaṃ jasya phalāni ca // GarP_1,177.7 //
GP12garup1_u:11722: saindhaṃvaṃ kaṭutailaṃ ca apāmārgasya mūlakam // GarP_1,177.10 //
GP12garup1_u:11725: oṃ dadru sara kroṃ hrīṃ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ dadru sara hrīṃ hrīṃ oṃ uṃ ū sara krīṃ krīṃ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11726: ādyā hi vaśāmāyānti mantreṇānena cāñjanāt // GarP_1,177.12 //
GP12garup1_u:11732: prabhāte netrarogaiśca nityaṃ sarvaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,177.15 //
GP12garup1_u:11736: paṭalaṃ kusumaṃ nīlī ca (va) krikāṃ harate 'ñjanam // GarP_1,177.17 //
GP12garup1_u:11737: guñjāmūlaṃ chāgamūtre ghṛṣṭaṃ timiranucca tat raupyatāmrasuvarṇānāṃ hastaghṛṣṭaśalākayā // ghṛṣṭamudvartanaṃ rudra kāmalāvyādhināśanam /
GP12garup1_u:11741: āpiṣṭvā jāṅgalī mū (tū) laṃ tadrasena vṛṣadhvaja /
GP12garup1_u:11744: dhuttūrakaṃ gairikaṃ ca etaiḥ sādhitasikthakam // GarP_1,177.22 //
GP12garup1_u:11746: jātīpatraṃ ca carvitvā vidhṛtaṃ mukharoganut // GarP_1,177.23 //
GP12garup1_u:11748: muṣṭakaṃ kuṣṭhamelā ca yaṣṭikaṃ madhuvālakam // GarP_1,177.24 //
GP12garup1_u:11750: kaṣāyaṃ kaṭukaṃ vāpi tiktaśākasya bhakṣaṇāt // GarP_1,177.25 //
GP12garup1_u:11752: dantavraṇāni sarvāṇi kṣayaṃ gacchantyanena tu // GarP_1,177.26 //
GP12garup1_u:11756: mātuluṅgadalānyelā yaṣṭī madhu ca pippalī // GarP_1,177.28 //
GP12garup1_u:11757: jātīpatramathaiṣāṃ ca cūrṇaṃ līḍhvā tathā kṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:11769: trisaptāhaṃ vāḥ piṣṭāni jyotiṣmatyāḥ phalāni hi /
GP12garup1_u:11774: dvibhāgaṃ chāgadugdhena tailaprasthaṃ tu sādhitam // GarP_1,177.37 //
GP12garup1_u:11778: ebhiśca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,177.39 //
GP12garup1_u:11782: dāhaṃ pittaṃ jvaraṃ śoṣaṃ mūrchāṃ caiva kṣayaṃ nayet // GarP_1,177.41 //
GP12garup1_u:11787: dugdhaṃ pītaṃ tu saṃyuktaṃ gopurīṣarasena ca /
GP12garup1_u:11794: siddhaṃ tailaṃ kāñjikena tathā sarjarasena ca // GarP_1,177.47 //
GP12garup1_u:11798: śauvāñjanaṃ gokṣuraṃ vā varuṇacchannameva ca // GarP_1,177.49 //
GP12garup1_u:11799: saubhāñjanasya mūlaṃ ca etaiḥ kvathitavāri ca /
GP12garup1_u:11807: pītaṃ takreṇa mūlaṃ ca ārdrasya tagarasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:11817: sarjarasāḥ sikthakaṃ ca jīrakaṃ ca harītakī /
GP12garup1_u:11825: pākaṃ ca vedanāṃ caiva saṃspṛśedvṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,177.62 //
GP12garup1_u:11828: śarapuṅkhā lajjālukā pāṭhā caiṣāṃ tu mūlakam /
GP12garup1_u:11831: pākapūtiṃ vedanāṃ ca hanti vai rohito vraṇe // GarP_1,177.65 //
GP12garup1_u:11835: bhakṣayitvā hyajīrṇasya nāśo bhavati śaṅkara ! // GarP_1,177.67 //
GP12garup1_u:11846: kṛtvā tu vaṭikāṃ nārī tilakena vaśī bhavet // GarP_1,177.71 //
GP12garup1_u:11851: oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha iti sarvavaśyaprayogeṣu prayuktaḥ sarvakāmakṛt //
GP12garup1_u:11853: citāgnau bhasma tacchatrordattaṃ śirasi śaṅkara // GarP_1,177.74 //
GP12garup1_u:11855: niḥ kṣiptaṃ ca purīṣaṃ vai vanamūṣikacarmaṇi // GarP_1,177.75 //
GP12garup1_u:11857: kṛṣṇakākasya raktena yasya nāma pralipya ca // GarP_1,177.76 //
GP12garup1_u:11858: cyutadale madhyamadhye tato niḥ kṣipyate hara ! /
GP12garup1_u:11859: sa khādyate kākavṛndairnārī puruṣa eva ca // GarP_1,177.77 //
GP12garup1_u:11861: sa śatruṃ nāśayedrudra ! uccāṭitamidaṃ hara ! // GarP_1,177.78 //
GP12garup1_u:11869: śarīraṃ yena sa pumānvṛddherdarpaṃ vyapohati // GarP_1,177.81 //
GP12garup1_u:11873: tadbhasma saṃmukhe kṣiptaṃ śatraṇāṃ bhaṅgakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,177.83 //
GP12garup1_u:11875: oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha cāhīhicāhīhi svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:11877: sudarśanāyā malaṃ tu puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:11878: niḥ kṣiptaṃ gṛhamadhye tu bhujaṅgā varjayanti tat // GarP_1,177.85 //
GP12garup1_u:11882: chāga mūtreṇa tallipto mūṣiko mūṣikānharet // GarP_1,177.87 //
GP12garup1_u:11883: mukto hi mandire rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:11887: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe netrāñjanādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptasaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11893: tāmbūlaṃ yasya dīyeta sa vaśī syātsumantrataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11896: cūrṇokṛtya yasya śire dīyate sa vaśī bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:11898: vaibhī takaṃ śākhoṭakaṃ mūlaṃ patreṇa saṃyutam /
GP12garup1_u:11899: sthāpyate yadgṛhadvāre tatra vai kalaho bhavet // GarP_1,178.4 //
GP12garup1_u:11900: khañjarīṭasya māṃsaṃ tu madhunā saha peṣayet /
GP12garup1_u:11903: guḍena dhūpayitvā tu rājadvāre priyo bhavet // GarP_1,178.6 //
GP12garup1_u:11912: oṃ rudraṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ varaśaktā tvaritāvidyā /
GP12garup1_u:11916: oṃ namaḥ sarvasattvebhyo namaḥ siddhiṃ kuru kuru svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:11918: strīṇāmagre bhrāmayacca kṣaṇādvai sā vaśe bhavet // GarP_1,178.11 //
GP12garup1_u:11919: brahmadaṇḍīṃ vacāṃ patraṃ madhunā saha peṣayet /
GP12garup1_u:11922: mūlaṃ jayantyā vaktrasthaṃ vyavahāre jayapradam // GarP_1,178.13 //
GP12garup1_u:11923: bhṛṅgarājasya mūlaṃ tu piṣṭaṃ śukreṇa saṃyutam /
GP12garup1_u:11924: akṣiṇī cāñjayitvā tu vaśī karyānnaraṃ kila // GarP_1,178.14 //
GP12garup1_u:11927: aṅguṣṭhe ca pade gulphe jānau ca jaghane tathā /
GP12garup1_u:11928: nābhau vakṣasi kukṣau ca kakṣe kaṇṭhe kapolake // GarP_1,178.16 //
GP12garup1_u:11929: oṣṭhe netre lalāṭe ca mūrdhni candrakalāḥ sthitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11930: strīṇāṃ pakṣe site kṛṣṇe ūrdhvādhaḥ saṃsthitā nṛṇām // GarP_1,178.17 //
GP12garup1_u:11932: catuḥ ṣaṣṭi kalāḥ proktāḥ kāmaśāstre vaśīkarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11936: oṃ hrīṃ gauri devi saubhāgyaṃ putravaśādi dehi me /
GP12garup1_u:11937: oṃ hrīṃ lakṣmi ! devi saubhāgyaṃ sarvaṃ trailokyamohanam // GarP_1,178.20
GP12garup1_u:11950: tatpītvā labhate garbhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,178.26 //
GP12garup1_u:11954: palāśasya tu bījāni kṣaudreṇa saha peṣayet /
GP12garup1_u:11956: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hyaṣṭasaptatyadhikaśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:11962: dantāḥ syurlohitāḥ puṃsaḥ śvetā rudra na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,179.2 //
GP12garup1_u:11963: mūlakaṃ svidya mandāgnau rasaṃ tasya prapūrayet /
GP12garup1_u:11969: pacettailaṃ tathā strīṇāṃ naśyetkledaḥ prapūraṇāt // GarP_1,179.5 //
GP12garup1_u:11971: satapuṣpāvacā kuṣṭhaṃ dāru śigra rasāñjanam // GarP_1,179.6 //
GP12garup1_u:11973: tathā granthirviḍaṃ mustaṃ madhuyuktaṃ caturguṇam // GarP_1,179.7 //
GP12garup1_u:11975: pakvatailaṃ haredāśu strāvādīṃśca na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,179.8 //
GP12garup1_u:11977: haridrā nimbapatrāṇi pippalyo maricāni ca // GarP_1,179.9 //
GP12garup1_u:11979: gomūtreṇa ca piṣṭvaiva kṛtvā ca vaṭikāṃ hara ! /
GP12garup1_u:11982: eṣā ca śaṅkarī vartiḥ sarvanetrāmayā pahā // GarP_1,179.11 //
GP12garup1_u:11983: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11986: vacā māṃsī ca bilvañca tagaraṃ padmakesaram /
GP12garup1_u:11993: āliptā strī vaśaṃ yāti nānyaṃ puruṣamicchati // GarP_1,180.3 //
GP12garup1_u:11994: oṃ raktacāmuṇḍe amukaṃ me vaśamānaya ānaya oṃ hrīṃ hraiṃ hraḥ phaṭ /
GP12garup1_u:11995: imaṃ japtvāyutaṃ mantraṃ tilakena ca śaṅkara ! /
GP12garup1_u:11998: madhu sarpiḥ sitāyuktaṃ strīṇāṃ tadbhagalepanāt // GarP_1,180.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12000: śaṅkapuṣpī vacā māṃsī soma rājī ca phalgukam // GarP_1,180.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12002: samūlāni sa patrāṇi kṣīreṇājyena peṣayet // GarP_1,180.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12004: daśavāraṃ prasūtāpi punaḥ kanyā bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,180.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12005: sarṣapāśca vacā caiva madanasya phalāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:12012: tena lepanato yonau bhagastambhastu jāyate // GarP_1,180.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12013: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe aśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12017: tathā payaḥ samāyuktaṃ cakṣuḥ śūlaharaṃ param // GarP_1,181.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12018: harītakī vacā kuṣṭhaṃ vyoṣaṃ hiṅgu manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12019: kāse śvāse ca hikkāyāṃ lihyātkṣaudraṃ ghṛplutam // GarP_1,181.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12021: naśyate pīnasaḥ kāsaḥ śvāsaśca balavattaraḥ // GarP_1,181.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12023: śvāsaṃ kāsañca hikkāñca madhumiśraṃ vṛṣadhvaja ! // GarP_1,181.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12024: nīlotpalaṃ śarkarā ca madhukaṃ padmakaṃ samam /
GP12garup1_u:12026: śuṇṭhī ca śarkarā caiva tathā kṣaudreṇa saṃyutā /
GP12garup1_u:12032: sudhā ca haritālañca śaṅkhabhasma manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12035: śaṅkhamāmalakaṃ patraṃ dhātakyāḥ kusumāni ca // GarP_1,181.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12037: snigdhāḥ śvetāśca dantāśca bhavanti vimalaprabhāḥ // GarP_1,181.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12038: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12042: hemante śiśire caiva varṣāsu dadhi śasyate // GarP_1,182.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12043: bhukte tu śarkarā pītā navanītena buddhikṛt /
GP12garup1_u:12050: kandarpasadṛśo martyo nityaṃ bhavati śaṅkara ! // GarP_1,182.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12052: ebhiśca racitāṃ jagdhvā taruṇo balavānbhavet // GarP_1,182.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12053: hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ śuṇṭhīṃ pītvā tu kvathitodakaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12056: durbalaśca bhavetsthūlo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12058: kṣīrāśī ca kṣayī puṣṭiṃ medhāñcaivātulāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,182.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12061: manaḥ śilā śaṅkhacūrṇaṃ tailapakvaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:12062: lomāni śātayatyeva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12063: mālūrasya rasaṃ gṛhya jalaukāṃ tatra peṣayet /
GP12garup1_u:12070: muṇḍītvakca vacā mustaṃ maricaṃ tagaraṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12071: carvitvā ca tvimaṃ sadyo jihvayā jvalanaṃ lihet // GarP_1,182.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12075: oṃ namo bhagavate jalaṃ stambhaya saṃ saṃ saṃ keka kekaḥ caracara /
GP12garup1_u:12078: areryo nikhaneddvāre pañcatvamu payāti saḥ // GarP_1,182.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12081: puṣpeṇa tu samaṃ piṣṭvā rocanāyāḥ palaikataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12082: striyā puṃsā kṛto rudra ! tilako 'yaṃ vaśīkaraḥ // GarP_1,182.19 //
GP12garup1_u:12083: brahmadaṇḍī tu puṣyeṇa bhakṣye pāne vaśīkaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12084: yaṣṭi madhu palaikena pakvamuṣṇodakaṃ pibet // GarP_1,182.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12087: mantro 'yaṃ harate rudra ! sarvavṛścikajaṃ viṣam // GarP_1,182.21 //
GP12garup1_u:12089: maricaṃ dadhi kuṣṭhañca nasye pāne viṣaṃ haret // GarP_1,182.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12095: vṛścikasya viṣaṃ hanti lepo 'yaṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja ! // GarP_1,182.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12097: nāśayedrudra ! gulmāni niruddhaṃ raktameva ca // GarP_1,182.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12100: sukhaṃ prasūyate nārī nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.27 //
GP12garup1_u:12103: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dvyāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12109: devadārurasaṃ pāṭhāṃ kṣīreṇa saha peṣayet // GarP_1,183.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12113: virecanakarī rudra ! bhavatīti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,183.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12118: ūrustambhaṃ jayantyā vā saptarātreṇa nāśayet // GarP_1,183.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12121: vāyuḥ snāyugataṃ caiva agnimāndyaṃ ca nāśayet // GarP_1,183.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12125: raktapittaṃ vinaśyettu nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,183.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12131: śrotre baddhvā śaṅkhapuṣpīṃ jvaraṃ mantreṇa vai haret /
GP12garup1_u:12132: oṃ jambhinī stambhinī mohaya sarvavyādhīnme vajreṇa ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ sarvavyādhīnme vajreṇa phaṭ iti // GarP_1,183.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12133: puṣpamaṣṭaśataṃ japtvā haste dattvā nakhaṃ spṛśet /
GP12garup1_u:12134: cāturthiko jvaro rudra anye caiva jvarāstathā // GarP_1,183.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12135: jmbūphalaṃ haridrā ca sarpasyaiva tu kañcukam /
GP12garup1_u:12139: pāmāṃ vicarcikāṃ kuṣṭhamabhyaṅgāddhi vraṇāni vai // GarP_1,183.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12141: plīhā vinaśyate rudra tathā sūraṇasevanāt // GarP_1,183.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12145: saindhavañca viḍaṅgāni somarājī tu sarṣapāḥ // GarP_1,183.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12148: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tryaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12155: pānādarśoharaṃ syācca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,184.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12157: cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tu lepo 'yaṃ arśarogaharaḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,184.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12162: citāgniḥ khañjarīṭasya viṣṭhā pheno hayasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:12164: adṛśyastridaśaiḥ sarvaiḥ kiṃ punarmānavaiḥ śiva // GarP_1,184.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12165: tilatailaṃ yavāndagdhvā maṣīṃ kṛtvā tu lepayet /
GP12garup1_u:12166: tenaiva saha tailena agnidagdhaḥ sukhī bhavet // GarP_1,184.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12168: oṃ namo bhagavate ṭha ṭha chindhi chindhi jvalanaṃ prajvalitaṃ nāśaya nāśaya huṃ phaṭ // GarP_1,184.8
GP12garup1_u:12169: kare baddhaṃ tu nirguṇḍyā mūlaṃ jvaraharaṃ drutam /
GP12garup1_u:12171: haste badhvā nāśayecca arśāṃsyeva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12174: triphalāyāstu cūrṇaṃ hi sājyaṃ kuṣṭhavināśanam // GarP_1,184.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12176: hareddhakkāṃ śvāsakāsau pītaṃ strīṇāñca garbhakṛt // GarP_1,184.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12179: viḍaṅgaṃ madhukaṃ pāṭhāṃ māṃsīṃ sarjarasaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12180: rahidrāṃ triphalāñcaiva mapāmārgaṃ manaḥ śilām // GarP_1,184.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12182: yoniṃ liṅgaṃ ca mrakṣeta strīpusoḥ syātpriyaṃ mithaḥ // GarP_1,184.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12183: namaste īśavaradāya ākarṣiṇi vikarṣiṇi mugdhe svāhā iti /
GP12garup1_u:12186: bīje naiṣāṃ jātikāyā rasena rasamardanam // GarP_1,184.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12192: lāṅgalikāyāḥ śākhā ca svarṇañca dahanādbhavet // GarP_1,184.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12197: vismayaṃ kurute caiva vṛṣavannātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,184.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12198: rātrau ca sārṣapaṃ tailaṃ kīṭaṃ khadyo tanāmakam /
GP12garup1_u:12204: yuddhe vijayate so 'pi mahāśūraśca jāyate // GarP_1,184.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12205: dantaṃ ḍuṇḍubhasarpasya mukhe saṃgṛhya vai kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:12206: tiṣṭhate ca jalāntastu nirvikalpaṃ sthale yathā // GarP_1,184.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12217: satakraṃ kuśamalaṃ vā markaṭī mūlameva vā /
GP12garup1_u:12218: kāñjikena ca vākucyā mūlaṃ vai dantaroganut // GarP_1,184.31 //
GP12garup1_u:12222: balā cātibalā yaṣṭī śarkarā madhusaṃyutā // GarP_1,184.33 //
GP12garup1_u:12228: takreṇa śarapuṅkhāṃ vā pītvā plīhāṃ vināśayet // GarP_1,184.36 //
GP12garup1_u:12231: śuṇṭhī sauvarcalaṃ hiṅgu pītaṃ hṛdayaroganut // GarP_1,184.37 //
GP12garup1_u:12232: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidyaśāstre caturaśītyadhikaśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:12235: āṃ gaṇapataye iti ayaṃ gaṇapaternmantro dhanavidyāpradāyakaḥ //
GP12garup1_u:12237: vyavahāre jayaḥ syācca śataṃ jāpānnṛṇāṃ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12238: tilānāṃ tu ghṛtāktānāṃ kṛṣṇānāṃ rudra homayet /
GP12garup1_u:12242: apājitaḥ syādyuddhe ca sarve tañca siṣevire // GarP_1,185.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12244: śikhāṃ baddhvā rājakule vyavahāre jayo bhavet // GarP_1,185.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12245: hrīṅkāraṃ savisargañca prātaḥ kāle narastu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12246: strīṇāṃ lalāṭe vinyasya vaśatāṃ nayati dhruvam // GarP_1,185.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12248: sotkāmāṃ kāminīṃ kuryānnātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,185.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12250: dṛṣṭimātre sadā tasya vaśyamāyānti yoṣitaḥ // GarP_1,185.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12252: kṛta ebhiśca tilake vaśyamāyānti yoṣitaḥ // GarP_1,185.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12254: tenaiva tilakaṃ kṛtvā trailokyaṃ vaśatāṃ nayet // GarP_1,185.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12257: sa karoti vaśe sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,185.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12259: etairvaitilakaṃ kṛtvā sā naraṃ yaṃ nirīkṣate /
GP12garup1_u:12260: tatkṣaṇāttaṃ vaśe kuryā nnātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,185.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12265: nijaśukraṃ gṛhī tvā tu vāmahastena yaḥ pumān /
GP12garup1_u:12266: kāminīcaraṇaṃ vāmaṃ liṃpetsa syātstriyāḥ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12268: ebhirlipte tu liṅge vai kāminīvaśakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,185.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12269: puṣpāṇi pañcaraktāni gṛhītvā yāni kāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:12273: śvetasaṣarpa etaiśca liptaliṅgaḥ striyāḥ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12283: ebhistu kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ vai sarvaśūlanut // GarP_1,185.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12287: pītaḥ satakro 'tīsāraṃ kṣayaṃ nayati śaṅkara // GarP_1,185.24 //
GP12garup1_u:12297: pītaṃ sarvañca mehantu kṣayaṃ nayati śaṅkara // GarP_1,185.28 //
GP12garup1_u:12299: manaḥ śilāmarīcānāṃ sindūrasya palaṃ palam // GarP_1,185.29 //
GP12garup1_u:12301: pītaṃ snuhīgataṃ dugdhaṃ saindhavaṃ śūlanudbhavet // GarP_1,185.30 //
GP12garup1_u:12305: ebhiśca vartikāṃ kṛtvā tvakṣiṇī cāñjayettataḥ // GarP_1,185.32 //
GP12garup1_u:12307: vibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ samadhu śvāsanāśanam // GarP_1,185.33 //
GP12garup1_u:12316: carvitvā dantakīṭānāṃ vināśo hi bhaveddhara // GarP_1,185.37 //
GP12garup1_u:12317: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mantratantravaidyaprayodṛpañcāśītyadhiśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:12320: pītaḥ sāro guḍūcyāśca madhunā ca pramehanut /
GP12garup1_u:12323: tathā hikkāṃ haretpītaṃ sauvarcalayutañca vai // GarP_1,186.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12335: dantīmūlaṃ haridrā ca citrakaṃ tasya lepanāt /
GP12garup1_u:12339: tato na prastravedraktaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,186.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12342: ghoṣāphalaṃ saindhavañca piṣṭvā cārśoharaṃ param // GarP_1,186.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12345: bilvasya ca phalaṃ dagdhaṃ raktārśaḥ pravināśanam /
GP12garup1_u:12349: śuṇṭhyā ca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai /
GP12garup1_u:12350: harītakīṃ saindhavañca citrakaṃ rudra pippalī // GarP_1,186.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12352: sājyaṃ sūkaramāṃsaṃ vai pītaṃ cātikṣudhākaram // GarP_1,186.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12353: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṣaḍaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12363: tajjagdhaṃ madhunā sārdhaṃ daśavarṣa sahasriṇam // GarP_1,187.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12365: dadhnā nityaṃ bhakṣitantu vajradehakaraṃ bhavet // GarP_1,187.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12367: tacca kāñjikasaṃyuktaṃ naraṃ kuryācca bhakṣitam // GarP_1,187.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12369: jagdhaṃ triphalayā kṣaudraṃ cakṣuṣmantaṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,187.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12370: andhaḥ paśyettu cūrṇasya sājyasyaiva tu bhakṣaṇāt /
GP12garup1_u:12372: khalvāṭasya ca vai keśā bhavanti vṛṣabhadhvaja /
GP12garup1_u:12376: palāśasya ca bījāni śrāvaṇe vituṣāṇi ca /
GP12garup1_u:12377: gṛhītvā navanītena teṣāṃ cūrṇaṃ ca bhakṣayet // GarP_1,187.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12378: karṣārdhamekaṃ seveta natvā nityaṃ hariṃ prabhum /
GP12garup1_u:12381: bhṛṅgarājasya vai mūlaṃ puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:12382: vidhāya tasya cūrṇaṃ vai sasauvīrañca bhakṣayetaṃ // GarP_1,187.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12384: śatāni pañca jīvecca naro nāgabalo bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:12385: bhavecchrutidharo rudra puṣyarkṣe caiva bhakṣaṇāt // GarP_1,187.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12386: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āyuṣkarayogodṛsaptāśītyadhikaśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:12391: tadrasena prahārasya raktastrāvo na pūraṇāt // GarP_1,188.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12393: tena vraṇamukhaṃ liptaṃ śalyaṃ niḥ sa rati vraṇāt /
GP12garup1_u:12396: tena liptaṃ ciraṃ jātaṃ vraṇaṃ nāḍyāḥ praśāmyati // GarP_1,188.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12398: hiṅgumūlasya vai cūrṇaṃ dattaṃ nāḍīvraṇāpaham // GarP_1,188.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12400: tena ghṛṣṭaṃ raktadoṣaḥ praṇaśyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,188.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12410: bhujaṅgacarma vai hiṅgu nimbapatraṃ tathā yavāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12411: gaurasarṣama ebhiḥ syāllepo bhūtaharaḥ śiva // GarP_1,188.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12416: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vraṇāci dṛmāṣṭāśītyadhikaśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:12420: paṭalaṃ nāśamāyāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,189.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12424: śvetārkasya tu vai mūlaṃ tasyāstadgulmaśūlanut // GarP_1,189.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12426: ṛtuśuddhā ca lalanā kaṭau baddhvā prasūyate // GarP_1,189.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12434: sārdhaṃ sa vairaṃ saṃyāti pumānstrī vā na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,189.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12436: sarvaṃ viṣaṃ vinaśyecca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,189.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12441: trisaptāhena vai pītaṃ kṣayarogaṃ kṣayaṃ nayet // GarP_1,189.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12447: mukhe tu nihitaṃ rudra harennānāviṣaṃ bahu // GarP_1,189.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12448: haste baddhaṃ kāṇḍayuktaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ grahādihṛt /
GP12garup1_u:12452: paṭṭasūtreṇa bhūteśa makarādibhayaṃ na vai // GarP_1,189.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12453: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonanavatyadhikaśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:12457: pītañcāśu haratyeva gaṇḍamālāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,190.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12466: niḥ kṣipyate samutpāṭya tasya plīhā vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12468: pītaṃ vidradhinutsyācca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12474: pratyūṣe bhakṣayeccaiva tasya kuṣṭhaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12479: somarājasya bījānāṃ jagdhaṃ pathyena dadrunut // GarP_1,190.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12483: ayaṃ lepo hanti dadruṃ pāmānaṃ ca garaṃ tathā // GarP_1,190.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12486: takrānnapānato rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12493: mūlakasya tu bījāni hyapā mārgarasena vai /
GP12garup1_u:12494: piṣṭāni tena lepena sidhmakaṃ rudra naśyati // GarP_1,190.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12499: jalapiṣṭā haridrā ca siddhā mandānalenahi // GarP_1,190.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12506: salodhrāṇi ca tallepo dehadurgandhatāṃ haret // GarP_1,190.23 //
GP12garup1_u:12511: madhuyaṣṭī śarkarā ca vāsakasya raso madhu /
GP12garup1_u:12514: prātaḥ kāle toyapānātpīnasaṃ dāruṇaṃ haret // GarP_1,190.27 //
GP12garup1_u:12515: bibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ pippalyāḥ saindhavasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:12516: pītaṃ sakāñjikaṃ hanti svarabhedaṃ maheśvara // GarP_1,190.28 //
GP12garup1_u:12518: manaḥ śilā balāmūlaṃ kolapaṇa ca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,190.29 //
GP12garup1_u:12519: jātipatraṃ kolapatraṃ tathā caiva manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12521: dhūmapānaṃ kāsaharaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.30 //
GP12garup1_u:12523: bhojanādau hi samadhu pipāsājva(tva)ritaṃ haret // GarP_1,190.31 //
GP12garup1_u:12527: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12531: vāri pītaṃ tasya pārśva bhavaneṣu na pannagāḥ // GarP_1,191.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12533: sa pannagairna dṛśyeta yāvajjīvaṃ vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,191.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12537: gṛhṇīyāllepato vāpi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,191.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12540: mahākālasya vai mūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ tatkāñjikena vai /
GP12garup1_u:12541: voḍrāṇāṃ ḍuṇḍubhānāṃ ca tallopo harate viṣam // GarP_1,191.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12543: ghṛtena saha pītantu haretsarvāviṣāṇi ca // GarP_1,191.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12547: pītaḥ sadugdho hanyācca daṃśakasyaviṣaṃ ca vai // GarP_1,191.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12548: tathā kodravamūlasya mohasya hara eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:12549: yaṣṭīmadhusamāyuktā tathā pītā ca śarkarā // GarP_1,191.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12550: sadugdhā ca trirātreṇa mūṣakānāṃ viṣaṃ haret /
GP12garup1_u:12553: ghṛtaṃ saśarkaraṃ ṣītvā madyapānamado na vai // GarP_1,191.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12559: karañjaṃ piṣitaṃ caiva hyarkamūlaṃ ca śaṅkara // GarP_1,191.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12562: kharjūrakaviṣaṃ naśyettadā vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,191.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12565: śatapuṣpā saindhavañca sājyaṃ vā tena lepayet /
GP12garup1_u:12566: śirīṣasya tu bījaṃvai siddha kṣīreṇa gharṣitam // GarP_1,191.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12574: nāgeśvaro daridre dve tathā mañjiṣṭhakā hara /
GP12garup1_u:12577: tilāśca sarṣapā hanyurviṣaṃ vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,191.23 //
GP12garup1_u:12578: ghṛtaṃ kumārīpatraṃ vai dattaṃ salavaṇaṃ hara /
GP12garup1_u:12580: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12584: śuṇṭhyā bhāgāśca catvāro maricānāṃ dvayaṃ tathā // GarP_1,192.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12592: balā cātibalā rāsnā śvadaṃṣṭrā ca punarnavā /
GP12garup1_u:12593: eraṇḍaḥ śārivā parṇo guḍūcī kapikacchukā // GarP_1,192.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12596: ājaṃ vā yadi gavyaṃ kṣīraṃ dattvā caturguṇam /
GP12garup1_u:12608: etaddhi puraṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ karṇaśūlāpahaṃ param // GarP_1,192.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12616: granthikaṃ viḍamustaṃ ca madhu śuktaṃ caturguṇam // GarP_1,192.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12626: gorocanā priyaṅguśca balā caiva tathā nakhī // GarP_1,192.21 //
GP12garup1_u:12627: saralaṃ saptaparṇaṃ ca lākṣā cāmalakī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12628: tathā tu padmakaṃ caiva hyetaistailaṃ prasādhayet // GarP_1,192.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12630: gacchati strīśataṃ rudra bandhyāpi labhate sutam // GarP_1,192.23 //
GP12garup1_u:12631: yavānī citrakaṃ dhānyaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ jīrakaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12634: tathār'śogulmaśvayathuṃ hanti vahniṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,192.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12635: maricaṃ trivṛtaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12636: devadāru haridre dve kuṣṭhaṃ māṃsī ca candanam // GarP_1,192.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12638: eṣāñca kārṣiko bhāgo viṣasyārdhapalaṃ bhavett // GarP_1,192.27 //
GP12garup1_u:12640: mṛtpātre lohapātre vā śanairmṛdvagninā pacet // GarP_1,192.28 //
GP12garup1_u:12648: śaṅkhapuṣpī vacā somo brāhmī brahmasuvarcalāḥ // GarP_1,192.32 //
GP12garup1_u:12653: agnimantho vacā vāsā pippalī madhu saindhavam /
GP12garup1_u:12655: apāmārgaḥ guḍūcī ca vacā kuṣṭhaṃ śatāvarī /
GP12garup1_u:12665: katakasya phalaṃ śaṅkhaṃ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ vacā // GarP_1,192.40 //
GP12garup1_u:12666: phenī rasāñjanaṃ kṣaudraṃ viḍaṅgāni manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12667: eṣāṃ vartirhanti kācaṃ timiraṃ paṭalaṃ tathā // GarP_1,192.41 //
GP12garup1_u:12671: punarnavā gokṣurakaṃ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ vacā // GarP_1,192.43 //
GP12garup1_u:12679: pippalī ca kadambañca palāśaṃ lodhratindukam // GarP_1,192.47 //
GP12garup1_u:12683: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dvinavatyadhika śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12689: saptāhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ kuryānnirmalāñca matiṃ parām // GarP_1,193.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12690: siddhārthakaṃ vacā hiṅgu karañjaṃ devadāru ca /
GP12garup1_u:12691: mañjiṣṭhā triphalā viśvaṃ śirīṣo rajanīdvayam // GarP_1,193.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12696: nimbaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haridre dve śigru sarṣapajaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12697: devadāru paṭolañca dhānyaṃ takreṇa gharṣitam // GarP_1,193.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12698: dehaṃ tailākta gātraṃ vai nayedudvartanena ca /
GP12garup1_u:12699: pāmāḥ kuṣṭhāni naśyeyuḥ kaṇḍūṃ hanti ca niścitam // GarP_1,193.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12700: sāmudraṃ saindhavaṃ kṣāro rājikā lavaṇaṃ viḍam /
GP12garup1_u:12707: pariṇāmasamutthasya śūlasya ca hitaṃ param // GarP_1,193.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12709: śṛṅgī punarnavā śuṇṭhī jagdhā kāsaṃ nihanti vai // GarP_1,193.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12711: śarkarāyā samaṃ caiva jagdhaṃ jvaraharaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,193.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12712: triphalā badaraṃ drākṣā pippalī ca virekakṛt /
GP12garup1_u:12716: haṃsa eṣāñca viṇmūtraṃ māṃsaṃ vā roma śoṇitam /
GP12garup1_u:12721: dhyāto 'rcitaḥ stuto vāpi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,193.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12722: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe trinavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12726: yena rakṣā kṛtā śambhordaityānkṣapayataḥ purā // GarP_1,194.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12732: harirme rakṣatu śiro hṛdayañca janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,194.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12733: mano mama hṛṣīkeśo jihvāṃ rakṣatu keśavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12734: prātu netre vāsudevaḥ śrotre saṅkarṣaṇo vibhuḥ // GarP_1,194.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12735: pradyumnaḥ pātu me ghrāṇamaniruddhastu carma ca /
GP12garup1_u:12737: pārśvaṃ rakṣatu me cakraṃ vāmaṃ daityanivāraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:12739: udaraṃ musalaṃ pātu pṛṣṭhaṃ me pātu lāṅgalam /
GP12garup1_u:12740: ūrdhvaṃ rakṣatu me śārṅgaṃ jaṅghe rakṣatu nandakaḥ // GarP_1,194.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12741: pārṣṇo rakṣatu śaṅkhaśca padmaṃ me caraṇāvubhau /
GP12garup1_u:12742: sarvakāryārthasiddhyarthaṃ pātu māṃ garuḍaḥ sadā // GarP_1,194.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12743: varāho rakṣatu jale viṣameṣu ca vāmanaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12744: aṭavyāṃ narasiṃhaśca sarvataḥ pātu keśavaḥ // GarP_1,194.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12746: sāṃkhyācāryastu kapilo dhātusāmyaṃ karotu me // GarP_1,194.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12750: haṃso matsyastathā kūrmaḥ pātu māṃ sarvatodiśam // GarP_1,194.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12752: tathā nārāyaṇo devo buddhiṃ pālayatāṃ mama // GarP_1,194.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12754: vaḍavāmukho nāśayatāṃ kalmaṣaṃ yatkṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_1,194.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12755: padbhyāṃ dadātu paramaṃ sukhaṃ mūrdhni mama prabhuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12758: rakṣoghnastu daśarathiḥ pātu nityaṃ mahābhujaḥ // GarP_1,194.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12761: kṛṣṇasya yo bālabhāvaḥ sa me kāmānprayacchatu // GarP_1,194.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12765: dhanyo 'haṃ nirbhayo nityaṃ yasya me bhagavānhariḥ // GarP_1,194.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12767: vaiṣṇavaṃ kavacaṃ baddhvā vicarāmi mahītale // GarP_1,194.21 //
GP12garup1_u:12771: yo māṃ paśyati cakṣurbhyāṃ yañcaḥ paśyāmi cakṣuṣā /
GP12garup1_u:12773: vāsudevasya yaccakraṃ tasya cakrasya ye tvarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12774: te hi cchindantu pāpānme mama hiṃsantu hiṃsakān // GarP_1,194.24 //
GP12garup1_u:12776: vivāde rājamārgeṣu dyūteṣu kalaheṣu ca // GarP_1,194.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12781: ayaṃ bhagavato mantro mantrāṇāṃ paramo mahān /
GP12garup1_u:12795: oṃ namo bhuvaneśāya trilokadhātre iha viṭi siviṭi siviṭi svāhā/ oṃ namaḥ ayokhetaye ye ye
GP12garup1_u:12796: daityadānavayakṣarākṣasabhūtapiśācakūṣmāṇḍāntāpasmārakacchardanaduddharrāṇāmekāhikadvyāhikatryāhikacāturthikamauhūrtikadinajvararātrijvarasandhyājvarasarvajvarādīnāṃ lūtākīṭakaṇṭakapūtanābhujaṅgasthāvarajaṅgamaviṣādī nāmidaṃ śarīraṃ mama pathyaṃ tvaṃ kuru sphuṭa sphuṭa sphuṭa prakoṭa laphaṭa vikaṭadaṃṣṭra pūrvato rakṣatu oṃ hai hai hai hai dinakarasahasrakālasamāhato jaya paścimato rakṣa oṃ nivi nivi pradīptajvalanajvālākāra mahākapila uttarato rakṣa oṃ vili vili mili mili garuḍi garuḍi gaurīgāndhārīviṣamohaviṣamaviṣamāṃ mahohayatu svāhā dakṣiṇato rakṣa māṃ
GP12garup1_u:12797: paśya sarvabhūtabhayopadravebhyo rakṣa rakṣa jaya jaya vijaya tena hīyate riputrāsāhaṅkṛtavādyato bhayanudabhayato 'bhayaṃ diśatucyutaṃ /
GP12garup1_u:12802: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaiṣṇavakavacakathanaṃ nāma caturnavatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12810: tvadrūpāṇi ca sarvāṇi tasmāttubhyaṃ namo namaḥ // GarP_1,195.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12813: mṛnmayīṃ vahasi kṣoṇīṃ tasmai te brahmaṇe namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12819: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe pañcanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12829: nyaseddhṛdaya oṅkāraṃ manuṃ mūrdhni samastakam // GarP_1,196.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12831: oṃ viṣṇave iti imaṃ mantranyāsamudīrayet // GarP_1,196.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12835: aṭavyāṃ narasiṃhastu rāmo rakṣatu parvate // GarP_1,196.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12837: karmabandhācca kapilo datto rogācca rakṣatu // GarP_1,196.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12839: nārado 'nyārcanāddevaḥ kūrmo vai nairṛte sadā // GarP_1,196.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12844: madhuhā cāparāhne ca sāyaṃ rakṣatu mādhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12848: śaṅkhaḥ padmaṃ ca śatrubhyaḥ śārṅgaṃ vai garuḍastathā /
GP12garup1_u:12850: śeṣaḥ sarpasvarūpaśca sadā sarvatra pātu mām /
GP12garup1_u:12851: vidikṣu dikṣu ca sadā nārasiṃhaśca rakṣatu // GarP_1,196.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12853: sa vaśī syādvipāpmā ca rogamukto divaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,196.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12854: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṣaṇṇavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12860: kṣityādiṣveva vargāśca hyete vai maṇḍalādhipāḥ // GarP_1,197.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12863: saṣaḍaṅgaḥ śivaḥ prokto hṛcchiraśca śikhā kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:12869: hṛdi pāṇitale dehe karṇe netre karoti ca /
GP12garup1_u:12880: karkoṭaḥ padmanābhaśca vāruṇe tau vyavasthitau // GarP_1,197.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12882: vāyumaṇḍalasaṃsthau ca pañca bhūtāni vinyaset // GarP_1,197.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12884: parvasandhiṣu ca nyasyā jayā ca vijayā tathā // GarP_1,197.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12886: kaniṣṭhādau hṛdādau ca śikhāyāṃ karayornyaset // GarP_1,197.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12888: bhūtānāñca punarnyāsaḥ śivāṅgāni tathaiva ca // GarP_1,197.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12895: karanyāsaṃ svaraiḥ kṛtvā śarīre tu punarnyaset /
GP12garup1_u:12898: evañcāpyāyanaṃ kṛtvā mūrdhni sañcintya cātmanaḥ // GarP_1,197.21 //
GP12garup1_u:12901: etāṃ bhagavatīṃ pṛthvīṃ svadehe vinyased budhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12904: nābhigrīvāntare nyasya trikoṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ raveḥ // GarP_1,197.24 //
GP12garup1_u:12910: lakārāntā binduyutā mantrā bhūtakrameṇa tu // GarP_1,197.27 //
GP12garup1_u:12915: tārkṣyaṃ dhyāyettato nityaṃ viṣe sthāvarajaṅgame // GarP_1,197.29 //
GP12garup1_u:12918: dvidhā nyāsaḥ samākhyāto nāgānāṃ caiva bhūtayoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12919: evaṃ dhyātvā karma kuryādātmatattvādikaṃ kramāt // GarP_1,197.31 //
GP12garup1_u:12920: tritattvaṃ pratham dattvā sivatattvaṃ tataḥ param /
GP12garup1_u:12921: yathā dehe tathā deve aṅgulīnāṃ ca parvasu // GarP_1,197.32 //
GP12garup1_u:12923: kandaṃ nālaṃ tathā padmaṃ dharmaṃ jñānādimeva ca // GarP_1,197.33 //
GP12garup1_u:12925: śaumiti karṇikāmadhye mūrdhni repheṇa saṃyutam // GarP_1,197.34 //
GP12garup1_u:12927: patrāntakesarānte tu dvau dvau pūrvādikau tathā // GarP_1,197.35 //
GP12garup1_u:12929: vāmādyāḥ śaktayaḥ proktāstritattvantu tato nyaset // GarP_1,197.36 //
GP12garup1_u:12931: karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddevaṃ sāṃgaṃ tatra puraḥ saram // GarP_1,197.37 //
GP12garup1_u:12933: tejastu dakṣiṇe patre vāyuṃ pūrveṇa pūjayet // GarP_1,197.38 //
GP12garup1_u:12936: vaṃ ca tvīśe sadā pūjya oṃ hṛdisthañca pūjayet /
GP12garup1_u:12939: āgneyyāṃ hṛdayaṃ pūjya śira īśānagocare // GarP_1,197.41 //
GP12garup1_u:12940: nairṛtye tu śikhāṃ dadyādvāyavyāṃ kavacaṃ nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:12945: pūjayecca sadā mantrī vidhānena pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_1,197.44 //
GP12garup1_u:12955: pādau pātālaṃ saṃsthau ca diśaḥ pakṣāstu saṃśritāḥ // GarP_1,197.49 //
GP12garup1_u:12956: sapta svargā urasi ca brahmāṇḍaṃ kaṇṭhamāśritam /
GP12garup1_u:12961: grasanaṃ bhīmavaktraṃ ca garuḍaṃ mantravigraham // GarP_1,197.52 //
GP12garup1_u:12963: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā yadyanmanasi cintayet // GarP_1,197.53 //
GP12garup1_u:12968: evaṃ sa garuḍaṃ proce garuḍaḥ kaśyapāya ca /
GP12garup1_u:12969: maheśvaro yathā gaurīṃ prāha vidyāṃ tathā śṛṇu // GarP_1,197.55 //
GP12garup1_u:12970: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saptanavatyadhikaśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:12974: oṃ hrīṃ āgaccha devi aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ rekhākāraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:12975: oṃ hrīṃ kledinī bhaṃ namaḥ madanakṣobhiṇā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12976: ai yaṃ yaṃ krīṃ vā guṇarekhayā hrīṃ madanāntare ca /
GP12garup1_u:12977: aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca nirañjanā vāgati madanāntarekhe khanetrāvalīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:12979: oṃ hrīṃ kraiṃ naiṃ kraiṃ nityaṃ madadrave krīṃ namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12981: oṃ hrīṃ krīṃ paścimavaktraṃ oṃ aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca tathottaram /
GP12garup1_u:12983: oṃ hrīṃ pāśāya krīṃ aṅkuśāya aiṃ kapālāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12984: ādyaṃ bhayaṃ aiṃ hrīṃ ca tathā śiraḥ tathā śikhāyai kavace /
GP12garup1_u:12986: pūrve kāmarūpāya asitāṅgāya bhairavāya namo brahmāṇyai /
GP12garup1_u:12987: dakṣiṇe cai kandāya vai namaḥ rurubhaivāya māheśvaryā vā āvāhayet //
GP12garup1_u:12989: kaumāryai cottare colkāya krodhāya namaḥ vaiṣṇavyai // GarP_1,198.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12991: rakṣaḥ koṇe sārāya kapāline bhairavāya māherndyai // GarP_1,198.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12997: jvālāmukhīkramaṃ vakṣye sā pūjyā madhyataḥ śubhā // GarP_1,198.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12999: mahendrāṇī ca kalanākarṣiṇī bhāratī tathā // GarP_1,198.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13000: brahmāṇī caiva māheśī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13001: vārāhī caiva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā cāparājitā // GarP_1,198.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13005: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe
GP12garup1_u:13010: sūryaṃ devīṃ gaṇaṃ soma smṛtvā tu vilikhennaraḥ // GarP_1,199.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13013: dhvajo dhūmo 'tha siṃhaśca śvā vṛṣaḥ kharadantinau /
GP12garup1_u:13014: dhvāṅkṣaśca aṣṭamo jñeyo nāma mantraiśca tānnyaset // GarP_1,199.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13016: dhvajasthāne sthito dhūmro dhātucintā ca lābhakṛt // GarP_1,199.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13019: dhvajasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānacintā ca lābhakam /
GP12garup1_u:13020: dhvajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khakleśādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13022: dhvajasthāne tathā dhvāṅkṣe kleśacintā dhanakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,199.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13023: dhūmrasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tato dhanam /
GP12garup1_u:13024: dhūmre dhūmraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā kaliduḥ khādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13026: dhūmrasthāne śuni sthite jayalābhādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13028: dhūmrasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyādhiścāpi dhanakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,199.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13036: siṃhasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā grāmasvāmitvameva ca // GarP_1,199.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13040: śunaḥ sthāne sthite dhūmre kalahaṃ kāryanāśanam // GarP_1,199.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13042: sthite śuni śunaḥ sthāne dhananāśo bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,199.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13043: śunaḥ sthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rogī rogādvi mucyate /
GP12garup1_u:13044: śunaḥ sthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā kalahasya bhayaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13046: śvasthāne ca sthite dhvāṅkṣe pīḍāsyātkulanāśanam // GarP_1,199.19 //
GP12garup1_u:13050: sthite śuni vṛṣasthāne balaśrīkāma īritaḥ // GarP_1,199.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13052: vṛṣasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahālābhādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13056: kharasthāne sthite dhūmre taskarādibhayaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13060: kharasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khīpīḍādi nirdiśet // GarP_1,199.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13062: kharasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe kalaho vyādhireva ca // GarP_1,199.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13066: sthite śuni gajasthāne ārogyaṃ sukhasampadaḥ // GarP_1,199.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13068: gajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tataḥ sukham // GarP_1,199.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13072: dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite dhūmre kaliduḥ khaṃ gamiṣyati // GarP_1,199.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13073: dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite siṃhe vigraho duḥ khameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:13079: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13091: saṃkrāntyaḥ ṣoḍaśaproktā divā rātrau varānane // GarP_1,200.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13097: vāyurvahati tatrasthaḥ praśro bhūtasya śobhanaḥ // GarP_1,200.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13098: māhendre vāruṇe vāte ko 'pi doṣo na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:13100: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13106: ekāṇḍaścaiva jātāṇḍaḥ kañcukī dvikhurī stanī // GarP_1,201.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13111: asaṃhatā ye ca vāhā hrasvakarṇāstathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:13127: nimbapatraṃ paṭo lañca triphalā khadiraṃ tathā // GarP_1,201.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13130: savraṇeṣu ca kuṣṭheṣu tailaṃ sarṣapajaṃ hitam /
GP12garup1_u:13139: kaṭutailaiḥ kaphe vyoṣaiḥ pitte catriphalāmbubhiḥ // GarP_1,201.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13143: bhojayetpāyasaṃ dugdhaṃ satvaraṃ susthiro hayaḥ // GarP_1,201.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13144: vikāre bhojane dugdhaṃ śālyannaṃ vātale dadet /
GP12garup1_u:13147: bādhirye vyādhite grāse tridoṣādau tu gugguluḥ // GarP_1,201.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13150: pāne ca bhojane caiva aśītipalakaṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:13153: mandāgnau śotharoge ca gavāṃ mūtreṇa yojitam // GarP_1,201.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13155: deyaṃ kṛśānāṃ puṣṭyarthaṃ māṃsairyuktaṃ ca bhojanam // GarP_1,201.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13157: prabhāte ghṛtasaṃyuktaṃ śaradgīṣme ca vājinām // GarP_1,201.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13161: catvāri trīṇi madhyasya jaghanyasya palāni hi // GarP_1,201.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13163: mriyate ca yadā kṣipramupasargaṃ tamādiśet // GarP_1,201.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13167: ādau pañca tataḥ pañca vṛddhyā pūrṇaśatāvadhi /
GP12garup1_u:13168: uttamā ca śataṃ mātrāstvaśītiḥ ṣaṣṭireva vā // GarP_1,201.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13176: baliṃ dadyācca bhūtebhyaḥ snāpayecca caturghaṭaiḥ // GarP_1,201.36 //
GP12garup1_u:13178: bhūtarakṣā śubhā medhyā vāraṇaṃ rakṣayetsadā // GarP_1,201.37 //
GP12garup1_u:13183: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gajāśvāyurvedanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādhikadviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:13187: sarasaṃ yoniniḥ kṣiptaṃ varāṅgasya vyathāṃ haret /
GP12garup1_u:13192: naśyeta ghṛtapakvā ca kāryāvaśyantu polikā // GarP_1,202.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13198: pāṭhāmūlaṃ rudra pītaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā // GarP_1,202.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13202: ghṛtatulyā rudra lākṣā pītā kṣīreṇa vai saha // GarP_1,202.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13203: pradaraṃ harate rogaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:13204: dvijayaṣṭī trikaṭukaṃ cūrṇaṃ pītaṃ harecchiva // GarP_1,202.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13210: pītantu kāñjika rudra kvathitaṃ śarapuṅkhayā // GarP_1,202.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13212: mātuluṅgasya vai mūlaṃ kaṭibaddhaṃ prasūtikṛt // GarP_1,202.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13214: utpāṭyamāne sakale puttraḥ syādānyathā sutā // GarP_1,202.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13215: apāmārgasya vai mūle nārīṇāṃ śirasi sthite /
GP12garup1_u:13216: garbhaśūlaṃ vinaśyeta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,202.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13218: yoniḥ subhā syādvṛddhāyā yuvatyāḥ kiṃ punarhara // GarP_1,202.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13228: saptāhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ rudra jarāṃ nayati saṃkṣayam // GarP_1,202.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13230: jagdhvā māsaṃ yuvā syācca naro vāgīśvarī bhavet // GarP_1,202.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13232: balāni kuryānnāsāyāḥ pratyūṣe bhakṣitaṃ śiva // GarP_1,202.23 //
GP12garup1_u:13238: strīṇāṃ śataṃ mahādeva tatkṣaṇānnātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,202.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13243: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nānāvidhoṣadhaprayogānirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13246: yā gaurdveṣṭiṃ svakaṃ vatsaṃ tasyā deyaṃ svakaṃ payaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13247: lavaṇena samāyuktaṃ tasyā vatsaḥ priyo bhavet // GarP_1,203.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13248: śuno 'sthi kaṇṭhabaddhaṃ hi mahiṣāṇāṃ gavā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13249: kṛmijālaṃ pātayati sakalaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,203.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13256: kṣīre go-mahīṣasyaiva goḥ puṃsaśca hitaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,203.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13261: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nānauṣadhaprayoganirūpaṇaṃ nāma tryuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13265: ata nāmāni vakṣyāmi oṣadhīnāṃ samāsataḥ // GarP_1,204.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13267: lāṅgalī kalasī caiva kroṣṭupucchā guhā matā // GarP_1,204.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13270: jhaṣā nāgabalā jñeyā śvadaṃṣṭrā gokṣuro mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13271: śatāvarī varā bhīru pīvarīndīvarī varī // GarP_1,204.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13272: vyāghrī tu bṛhatī kṛṣṇā haṃsapādī madhustravā /
GP12garup1_u:13273: dhāmanī kaṇṭakārī syātkṣudrā siṃhī nidigdhikā // GarP_1,204.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13277: tyajā parā ca mahā jñeyā daṇḍayonyaṅkasaṃjñayā /
GP12garup1_u:13278: nyagrodhastu vaṭo jñeyaḥ aśvatthaḥ kapilo mataḥ // GarP_1,204.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13285: tṛtīyā jalajambūḥ syānnādeyī sā ca kīrtitā /
GP12garup1_u:13286: kaṇā kṛṣṇopakuñcī ca śauṇḍī māgadhiketi ca // GarP_1,204.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13288: ūṣaṇaṃ maricaṃ jñeyaṃ śuṇṭhī viśvaṃ mahauṣadham // GarP_1,204.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13290: lāṅgalī halinī ca syāccheyasī gaja pippalī // GarP_1,204.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13293: ṣaḍgranthogrā vacā jñeyā śvetā haimavatīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13294: kuṭajo vṛkṣakaḥ śakro vatsako girimāllikā // GarP_1,204.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13296: mustakto meghanāmā syātkauntī jñeyā hareṇukā // GarP_1,204.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13297: elā ca bahulā proktā sūkṣmailā ca tathā truṭiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13298: padmā bhārṅgo tathā kāñjī jñeyā brāhmaṇayaṣṭikā // GarP_1,204.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13302: ajājī jīrakaṃ jñeyā kāravī copakuñcikā // GarP_1,204.19 //
GP12garup1_u:13304: tagaraṃ syānnataṃ vakraṃ cocaṃ tvacavarāṅgakam // GarP_1,204.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13311: kāśmarī kaṭphalā jñeyā śrīparṇo ceti kīrtitā /
GP12garup1_u:13312: śallakī gajabhakṣyā ca patrī ca surabhī stravaḥ // GarP_1,204.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13314: pathyābhayā ca vijñeyā pūtanā ca harītakī // GarP_1,204.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13318: dhātakī tāmraparṇo syātsamaṅgā kuñjarā matā // GarP_1,204.27 //
