GP12garup1_u:13320: vidyādraktaṃ candanaṃ ca dvitīyaṃ raktacandanam // GarP_1,204.28 //
GP12garup1_u:13321: kākolī ca smṛtā vīrā vayasyā cārkapuṣpikā /
GP12garup1_u:13322: śṛṅgī karkaṭaśṛṅgī ca mahāghoṣā ca kīrtitā // GarP_1,204.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13324: mṛdvikā ca smṛtā drākṣā tathā gostanikā matā // GarP_1,204.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13326: sārañca gopavallī ca gopī bhadrā ca kathyate // GarP_1,204.31 //
GP12garup1_u:13327: dantī kaṭaṅkaṭerī ca jñeyā dāruniśeti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13328: haridrā rajanī proktā pītikā rātrināmikā // GarP_1,204.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13330: vasukoṭaśca vijñeyo vāśiraḥ kāmpillo mataḥ // GarP_1,204.33 //
GP12garup1_u:13332: ghaṇṭākaḥ śuṣkako jñeyo vaco 'tha sūcako mataḥ // GarP_1,204.34 //
GP12garup1_u:13334: vajravṛkṣo mahāvṛkṣaḥ snuhī snukca sudhā guḍā // GarP_1,204.35 //
GP12garup1_u:13338: jñeyā sugandhiparṇoti vāsantī kulajeti ca // GarP_1,204.37 //
GP12garup1_u:13341: indī varaṃ kuvalayaṃ padmaṃ nīlotpalaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:13346: kabarī kumbhako dhṛṣṭaḥ kṣudvidho dhanakṛttathā // GarP_1,204.41 //
GP12garup1_u:13348: prācī balā nadīkrāntā kākajaṅghātha vāyasī // GarP_1,204.42 //
GP12garup1_u:13352: aśvatthā bahupatrā ca vijñeyā cāmalakyapi // GarP_1,204.44 //
GP12garup1_u:13353: arūṣakraṃ patra śūkaṃ kṣīrī rājādanaṃ matam /
GP12garup1_u:13354: mahāpatraṃ dāḍimaṃ ca tameva karakaṃ vadet // GarP_1,204.45 //
GP12garup1_u:13357: vidyā kuntī nikumbhā ca tribhaṅgī tripuṭī trivṛt /
GP12garup1_u:13358: saptalā yavatiktā ca carmā carmakaseti ca // GarP_1,204.47 //
GP12garup1_u:13360: gavākṣī cāmṛtā śvetā girikarṇo gavādinī // GarP_1,204.48 //
GP12garup1_u:13362: hemakṣīrī smṛtā pītā gaurī vai kāladugdhikā // GarP_1,204.49 //
GP12garup1_u:13366: pratyakpuṣpī kharī jñeyā apāmārgo mayūrakaḥ // GarP_1,204.51 //
GP12garup1_u:13368: jīvako jīvaśākaśca karburañca śaṭīṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,204.52 //
GP12garup1_u:13376: suraṅgītagaraḥ snāyuḥ kalanāśā tu vāyasī // GarP_1,204.56 //
GP12garup1_u:13388: dhātukāśīśakāśī ca saṃjñeyaṃ tacca kīrtitam // GarP_1,204.62 //
GP12garup1_u:13391: śilā manaḥ śilā jñeyā nepālī kulaṭīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13392: ālaṃ manastālakaṃ vā haritālaṃ vinirdiśet // GarP_1,204.64 //
GP12garup1_u:13396: mākṣikaṃ madhu ca kṣaudraṃ tacca puṣparasaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,204.66 //
GP12garup1_u:13398: sītā sitopalā caiva matsyaṇḍīśarkarā smṛtā // GarP_1,204.67 //
GP12garup1_u:13404: tripuṭaḥ puṭasaṃjñaśca kalāpo laṅgako mataḥ // GarP_1,204.70 //
GP12garup1_u:13406: picukaṃ pitalaṃ cākṣaṃ biḍālapadakaṃ tathā // GarP_1,204.71 //
GP12garup1_u:13409: palaṃ bilvañca muṣṭiḥ syāddve pale prasṛtiṃ vadet /
GP12garup1_u:13412: caturbhiḥ kuḍavaiḥ prastha prasthāścatvāra āḍhakaḥ // GarP_1,204.74 //
GP12garup1_u:13414: tulā palaśataṃ proktaṃ bhāgo viṃśatpalaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,204.75 //
GP12garup1_u:13419: śaṅkhaḥ śuktinakhaḥ śaṅkho vyāghro vyāghranakhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13421: raso gandharaso bole sarjaḥ sarjaraso mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13422: priyaṅguḥ phalinī śyāmā gaurī kānteti cocyate // GarP_1,204.79 //
GP12garup1_u:13424: śigruḥ śobhāñjano nāma jñānamānaśca kīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,204.80 //
GP12garup1_u:13426: moraṭā pīluparṇo ca tuṇḍī syāttuṇḍikerikā // GarP_1,204.81 //
GP12garup1_u:13427: madano gālavo bodho ghoṭā ghoṭī ca kathyate /
GP12garup1_u:13430: dantī kākendutiktā syātkaṇṭakī ca vikaṅkataḥ // GarP_1,204.83 //
GP12garup1_u:13432: vayasthā ca viśalyā ca cchinnā chinnaruhā matā // GarP_1,204.84 //
GP12garup1_u:13436: nāmānyetāni ca hare vanyānāṃ bheṣajāṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13437: ato vyākaraṇaṃ vakṣye kumāroktañca śaunaka // GarP_1,204.86 //
GP12garup1_u:13438: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe caturattaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13443: suptiṅantaṃ padaṃ khyātaṃ supaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13444: svaujasaḥ prathamā proktā sā prātipadikātmake // GarP_1,205.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13447: amauśaso dvitīyā syāttatkarma kriyate ca yat /
GP12garup1_u:13450: yena kriyate karaṇaṃ tatkartā yaḥ karoti saḥ // GarP_1,205.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13452: yasmai ditsā dhārayate rocate sampradānakam // GarP_1,205.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13454: yato 'paiti samādatte upādatte bhayaṃ yataḥ // GarP_1,205.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13456: ṅayoḥ supo vai saptamī syātsā cādhikaraṇe bhavet // GarP_1,205.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13462: anureṣu sahārthe ca hīne 'nūpaśca kathyate // GarP_1,205.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13464: aprāṇe hi vibhaktī dbe manyakarmaṇyanādare // GarP_1,205.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13470: nirdhāraṇe dve vibhakto ṣaṣṭhī hetuprayogake // GarP_1,205.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13472: hiṃsārthānāṃ prayoge ca kṛti karmaṇi kartari // GarP_1,205.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13474: dvividhaṃ prātipadikaṃ nāma dhātustathaiva ca // GarP_1,205.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13475: bhūvāndibhyastiṅo laḥ syāllakārā daśa vai smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13480: nāmni prayujyamāne 'pi prathamaḥ puruṣo bhavet // GarP_1,205.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13482: bhūvādyā dhātavaḥ proktāḥ sanādyantāstathā tataḥ // GarP_1,205.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13487: liṅatīte parokṣe syālliḍ bhūte ḷḍ bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup1_u:13490: kṛtastriṣvapi vartante bhāve karmaṇi kartari // GarP_1,205.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13492: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vyākaraṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcottaradviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:13496: viprāḥ svasāgatā vīdaṃ suttamaṃ syātpitṝṣabhaḥ // GarP_1,206.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13500: vadhvāsanañca pitrartho lanubandho naye jayet // GarP_1,206.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13501: nāyako lavaṇaṃ gāvasta ete na ta īśvarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13502: devīgṛhamatho atra a avehi paṭū imau // GarP_1,206.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13503: amī aśvāḥ ṣaḍasyeti tanna vāk ṣaḍdalāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:13510: kaḥśete caiva kaḥṣaṇḍaḥ kasko yāti ca gauravam // GarP_1,206.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13511: ka ihātra ka evāhurdevā āhuśca bho vraja /
GP12garup1_u:13514: kuṭīcchāyā tathā chāyā sandhayo 'nye tathedṛśāḥ // GarP_1,206.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13515: samāsāḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātāḥ sa dvijaḥ karmadhārayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13516: dvigustrivedī grāmaśca ayaṃ tatpuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,206.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13520: taddhitāḥ pāṇḍavaḥ śaivo brāhayaṃ ca brahmatādayaḥ // GarP_1,206.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13524: ātmā rājā yuvā panthāḥ pūṣabrahmahaṇau halī // GarP_1,206.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13528: jāyā jarā nadī lakṣmīḥ śrīstrībhūmirvadhūrapi // GarP_1,206.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13529: bhrūḥ punarbhūstathā dhenuḥ svasā mātā ca nau striyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13534: paṭuḥ kamalabhūḥ kartā sumato bahavaḥ sunauḥ // GarP_1,206.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13536: sarvaviśvobha ye cobhau ekonyānyatarāṇi ca // GarP_1,206.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13544: truṭyati mriyate caiva cicīṣati ninīṣati // GarP_1,206.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13551: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān- ācāradṛ nāma ṣaḍuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13554: vāsudevaṃ guruṃ natvā gaṇaṃ śambhuṃ sarasvatīm /
GP12garup1_u:13556: sarvādimadhyāntagalau mnau bhyau jrau stau trikā gaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13559: sānusvāraśca pādānto vā ityukto dvimātrakaḥ // GarP_1,207.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13560: yadā nāpi kramaṃ yoge laghutāpi kvacidguroḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13562: jñeyaḥ pādaśca turyāṃśo yuk samaṃ viṣamantvayuk /
GP12garup1_u:13564: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstrechandaḥsaṃjñāparibhāṣānirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13567: āryālakṣma tvaṣṭa gaṇāḥ sadā jo viṣame na hi /
GP12garup1_u:13568: ṣaṣṭhe jo nlau vāpi bhavet padaṃ ṣaṣṭhe dvitīyalāt // GarP_1,208.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13569: āditaḥ saptame hrasvā dvitīyārdhe śare tataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13576: ṣaṭ kalā viṣame cetsyuḥ same 'ṣṭau na nirantarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13577: samā parāśritā na syādvaitālīye ralau guruḥ // GarP_1,208.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13580: parāśrito dvitīyo laḥ pādeṣu nikhileṣvapi // GarP_1,208.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13588: nikhile vā saitavasya mrau ntau cābdhestatpūrvakau // GarP_1,208.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13595: guruvo lairdale nityaṃ pramāṇamiti niścitam // GarP_1,208.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13599: saptaviṃśātilā gantā dalayo rucirā dvayoḥ // GarP_1,208.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13600: mātrāvṛttāni coktāni varṇavṛttāni vacmi vai // GarP_1,208.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13601: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstre āryāvṛttādichandolakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13604: śrīrukthā gena sā jñeyā utyukthā strī gurudvayam /
GP12garup1_u:13605: mo nārī ro mṛgī madhyā magau kanyā pratiṣṭhayā // GarP_1,209.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13606: bho gau paṅktiḥ suprātiṣṭhā tanumadhyā tayau smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:13607: nayābhyāṃ bālalalitā gāyatrīcchanda eva hi // GarP_1,209.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13609: bhau gau citrapadā khyātā vidyunmālā mamau gagau // GarP_1,209.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13610: māṇavakaṃ bhāttalagā mnau gau haṃsarutaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:13613: ranasaiḥ syāddhalamukhī nau maḥ śiśubhṛtā bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:13614: bṛhatīchanda ityuktaṃ smau jagau sa virājitam // GarP_1,209.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13616: rajābhyāñca ragābhyāñca rukmavatī bhamau sagau // GarP_1,209.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13619: tau jo gāvindravajrā syājjatajgā gupapūrvikā // GarP_1,209.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13621: bhabhabhā gau dodhakaṃ syācchālinī matatā gagau // GarP_1,209.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13623: śrīrbhatau nanagāḥ proktā pañcabhiḥ ṣaḍūbhireva ca // GarP_1,209.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13625: rathoddhatār nau ralagāḥ svāgatā ranabhā gagau // GarP_1,209.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13626: vṛttā nanau sagau gaḥ syānnau ralau gaḥ samadrikā /
GP12garup1_u:13627: rajarā lgau śyenikā syājjasatā gau śikhaṇḍitam /
GP12garup1_u:13629: ranau bhasau candravartma vaṃśasthaṃ syājjatau jarau /
GP12garup1_u:13631: nbhau bhrau drutavilambitaṃ puṭaśca syānnanau mayau // GarP_1,209.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13633: nanararaiḥ samākhyātā nayanā yastathā bhavet // GarP_1,209.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13635: jasau jasau ca pādeṣu catūraiḥ stragviṇī matā // GarP_1,209.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13637: prayaṃvadā nabhajraiśca maṇimālā tayau tayau // GarP_1,209.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13639: pramitākṣarā sajasasairujjvalā tu nanau bharau // GarP_1,209.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13642: nau tatau gaḥ kṣamāvṛttaṃ turagaiśca rasairyatiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13643: praharṣiṇī manau jrau gā vahnibhirdaśabhiryatiḥ // GarP_1,209.19 //
GP12garup1_u:13644: jabhau sajau go rucirā caturbhiśca grahairyatiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13646: mañjubhāṣiṇī sajsā jgau sunandinī sajasā magau /
GP12garup1_u:13647: nanau tatau candrikā gaḥ saptabhiśca rasairyatiḥ // GarP_1,209.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13649: nanarāḥ so ladhuguruḥ svaraiḥ proktāparājitā // GarP_1,209.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13651: vasantatilakā siṃhonnatā tabhjā jagau guruḥ // GarP_1,209.23 //
GP12garup1_u:13653: naranā ralagāḥ pāde śarkarī pratipāditā // GarP_1,209.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13657: vasusvarayatiḥ syācca najau bhajrāḥ prabhadrakam // GarP_1,209.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13659: marau mayau yaśca bhavedukteyamati śarkarī // GarP_1,209.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13663: vasugrayatiḥ pṛthvī jasau jasayalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13665: ṣaḍvedāśvaiśca hariṇī nasamā rasalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13667: nardaṭakaṃ najabhajā jalau go yatireva ca // GarP_1,209.31 //
GP12garup1_u:13669: bhūtartvaśvaiḥ kusumitalatā mtau nyau yayau dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,209.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13673: saptāśvartuḥ suvadanā bhrau manau yabhalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.34 //
GP12garup1_u:13674: vṛttaṃ rajau rajau pāde rajau go laḥ kṛtirbhavet /
GP12garup1_u:13676: digarkairbhadrakaṃ bhrau nrau naranā go yathākṛtiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13677: najau bhaśvāśvalalitaṃ jabhau jabhalagā bhavet // GarP_1,209.36 //
GP12garup1_u:13682: nau nau go 'tikṛtiḥ proktā cchando hyutkṛtirucyate /
GP12garup1_u:13685: guhaiḥ ṣaḍbhī rasairbāṇairmonāḥ ṣaṭsagagā gaṇāḥ // GarP_1,209.40 //
GP12garup1_u:13688: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe samavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma navottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13692: same bhau bhagagāḥ syuśca drutamadhyā bhabhau bhagau // GarP_1,210.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13693: gaḥ pāde viṣame 'nyatra najau jyau ca gaṇau smṛtau // GarP_1,210.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13694: viṣame vegavatī sā gaḥ same bhau bho gagau gaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13695: pāde 'same tajau ro gaḥ same masau jagau garuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13696: bhavedbhadravirāṭ ketumatī tu viṣame sajau // GarP_1,210.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13697: sagau same bhrau nagagā ākhyānakī tvathāsame /
GP12garup1_u:13698: tau jo gagau same pāde jatajā gurukadvayam // GarP_1,210.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13700: tatau jagau same gaḥ syāt piṅgalena hyudāhṛtam // GarP_1,210.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13701: pāde 'tha viṣame caiva puṣpitāgrā nanau rayau /
GP12garup1_u:13702: same najau jarau gaśca vaitālīyaṃ vadanti hi /
GP12garup1_u:13704: vāṅmatī rajarā yaḥ syādayugme jarajā ragau // GarP_1,210.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13705: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍer'ddhasamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13716: sajau salau ca prathame nasajā go dvitīyake /
GP12garup1_u:13717: tṛtīye bhanabhā gaśca caturthe sajasā jagau // GarP_1,211.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13722: gau dvitīye sanajarā gastṛtīye nanau ca saḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13723: nau najau yaścaturthe syāccheṣa pādāśca pūrvavat // GarP_1,211.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13724: tṛtīrye 'ghrau viśeṣaśca vṛttaṃ syānnau sanau nasau // GarP_1,211.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13730: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśottaradviśaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13734: naṣṭamadhye sameṃ'ke laḥ same 'rdhe viṣame guruḥ // GarP_1,212.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13736: saṃkhyā dvirardhe rūpe tu śūnyaṃ śūnye dvirīritam /
GP12garup1_u:13738: pare pūrṇaṃ pare pūrṇaṃ meruḥ prastārato bhavet // GarP_1,212.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13741: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān- ācā- chandolakṣaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśottaradviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:13745: brāhmaṇādisamācāraṃ sarvadaṃ te tathā vade // GarP_1,213.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13746: śrutismṛtī tu vijñāya śrautaṃ karma samācaret /
GP12garup1_u:13747: śrautaṃ karma na ceduktaṃ tadā smārtaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,213.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13749: śrutismṛtī ha viprāṇāṃ locane karmadarśane // GarP_1,213.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13752: satyaṃ dānaṃ dayālobho vidyejyā pūjanaṃ damaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13753: aṣṭau tāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācārasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,213.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13759: vidyā vittaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ kule janma tvarogitā // GarP_1,213.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13761: dharmātsukhaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca jñānānmokṣo 'dhigamyate // GarP_1,213.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13767: pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣiḥ paṇyaṃ vaiśyasyājīvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,213.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13770: triḥ snātā snāpitā bhaikṣyaṃ gurau prāṇāntikī sthitiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13771: samekhalo jaṭī daṇḍī muṇḍī vā gurusaṃśrayaḥ // GarP_1,213.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13786: ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satyaśauce kṣamā dayā /
GP12garup1_u:13787: varṇināṃ liṅgināṃ caiva sāmānyo dharma ucyate // GarP_1,213.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13789: ā bodhātsvapanaṃ yāvat gṛhidharmaṃ ca vacmi te // GarP_1,213.23 //
GP12garup1_u:13795: ubhe mūtrapurīṣe ca divā kuryādudaṅmukhaḥ // GarP_1,213.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13796: rātrau ca dakṣiṇe kuryādubhe sandhye yathā divā /
GP12garup1_u:13797: chāyāyāmandhakāre vā rātrau vāhani vā dvijaḥ // GarP_1,213.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13803: ekāṃ liṅge mṛdaṃ dadyādvāma haste mṛdaṃ dvidhā // GarP_1,213.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13805: ekāṃ liṅge gude tistrastathā vāmakare daśa // GarP_1,213.31 //
GP12garup1_u:13807: ardhaprasṛtimātrā tu prathamā mṛttikā smṛtā // GarP_1,213.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13808: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca tadardhā parikīrtitā /
GP12garup1_u:13809: upaviṣṭastu viṇmūtraṃ kartuṃ yastu na vindati // GarP_1,213.33 //
GP12garup1_u:13810: sa kuryādardhaśaucaṃ tu svasya śaucasya sarvadā /
GP12garup1_u:13811: divā śaucasya rātryardhaṃ yadvā pādo vidhīyate // GarP_1,213.34 //
GP12garup1_u:13813: vasā śukramasṛṅ majjā lālā viṇmūtrakarṇaviṭ // GarP_1,213.35 //
GP12garup1_u:13815: manyeta yāvatā śuddhiṃ tāvacchaucaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,213.36 //
GP12garup1_u:13817: śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,213.37 //
GP12garup1_u:13819: trirācāmedapaḥ pūrvaṃ dviḥ pramṛjyāttato mukham // GarP_1,213.38 //
GP12garup1_u:13822: aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ ca cakṣuḥ śrotre punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13823: kaniṣṭhāṅgaṣṭhayornābhiṃ hṛdayaṃ tu talena vai // GarP_1,213.40 //
GP12garup1_u:13825: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni triḥ paṭhanprīṇayetkramāt // GarP_1,213.41 //
GP12garup1_u:13828: khaṃ mukhe nāsike vāyuṃ netre sūryaṃ śrutī (tīrdi) diśaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13829: prāṇagranthimatho nābhiṃ brahmāṇaṃ hṛdaye spṛśet // GarP_1,213.43 //
GP12garup1_u:13835: uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathārthavat // GarP_1,213.46 //
GP12garup1_u:13837: mukhe paryuṣite nityaṃ bhavatyaprayato naraḥ // GarP_1,213.47 //
GP12garup1_u:13844: prakṣālya bhuktvā ca śucau deśe tyaktvā tadācāmet /
GP12garup1_u:13845: amāyāṃ ca tathā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ navamyāṃ pratipadyapi // GarP_1,213.51 //
GP12garup1_u:13847: abhāve danta kāṣṭhasya niṣiddhāyāṃ tathā tithau // GarP_1,213.52 //
GP12garup1_u:13849: prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakaraṃ hitam // GarP_1,213.53 //
GP12garup1_u:13850: sarvamar hati śuddhātmā prātaḥ snāyī japādikam /
GP12garup1_u:13852: stravatyeṣa divā rātrau prātaḥ snānaṃ viśodhanam /
GP12garup1_u:13855: adya haste tu nakṣatre daśamyāṃ jyeṣṭhake site // GarP_1,213.56 //
GP12garup1_u:13864: tisraḥ koṭyastu vijñeyā mandehā nāma rākṣasāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13866: sa hanti sūryaṃ sandhyāyāṃ nopāstiṃ kurute tu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13868: ahorātrasya yaḥ sandhiḥ sā sandhyā bhavatīti ha /
GP12garup1_u:13871: svayaṃ homaphalaṃ yattu tadanyena na jāyate // GarP_1,213.64 //
GP12garup1_u:13873: ebhireva hutaṃ yattu taddhutaṃ svayameva hi // GarP_1,213.65 //
GP12garup1_u:13877: samāhitātmā sāvitrīṃ praṇavaṃ ca yathoditam // GarP_1,213.67 //
GP12garup1_u:13879: tripadāyāṃ ca sāvitryāṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // GarP_1,213.68 //
GP12garup1_u:13881: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā // GarP_1,213.69 //
GP12garup1_u:13888: pūrvāhna eva kurvīta devatānāṃ ca pūjanam /
GP12garup1_u:13889: na viṣṇoḥ paramo devastasmāttaṃ pūjayetsadā // GarP_1,213.73 //
GP12garup1_u:13895: taddānaṃ caiva śiṣyabhyo vedābhyāso hi pañcadhā // GarP_1,213.76 //
GP12garup1_u:13897: mūlyena lekhayitvā yo dadyādyāti sa vaidikam // GarP_1,213.77 //
GP12garup1_u:13901: mātā pitā gururbhrātā prajā dīnāḥ samāśritāḥ // GarP_1,213.79 //
GP12garup1_u:13909: kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhya ivāpagāḥ // GarP_1,213.83 //
GP12garup1_u:13913: yā vṛttistāṃ samāsthāya vipro jīvedanāpadi // GarP_1,213.85 //
GP12garup1_u:13914: dhanaṃ tu trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ śuklaṃ śabalameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:13915: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasya vijñeyo vibhāgaḥ saptadhā pṛthak // GarP_1,213.86 //
GP12garup1_u:13916: kramāyattaṃ prītidattaṃ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā /
GP12garup1_u:13917: aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ trividhaṃ dhanam // GarP_1,213.87 //
GP12garup1_u:13921: śuddhārthaṃ labdhakarajaṃ daṇḍāptaṃ jayajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,213.89 //
GP12garup1_u:13925: āpatkāle svayaṃ kurvannainasā yujyate dvijaḥ // GarP_1,213.91 //
GP12garup1_u:13929: kṛṣyādike bhavedbādhā sā kusīde na vidyate // GarP_1,213.93 //
GP12garup1_u:13930: śuklapakṣe tathā kṛṣṇe rajanyāṃ divasepi vā /
GP12garup1_u:13931: uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā vardhanaṃ na nivartate // GarP_1,213.94 //
GP12garup1_u:13933: kusīdaṃ kurvataḥ samyak saṃsthitasyaiva jāyate // GarP_1,213.95 //
GP12garup1_u:13935: te tṛptāstasya taddoṣaṃ śamayanti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,213.96 //
GP12garup1_u:13942: vidyā śilpaṃ bhūtiḥ sevā gorakṣā vipaṇiḥ kṛṣiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13943: vṛttirbhaikṣyaṃ kusīdaṃ ca daśa jīvanahetavaḥ // GarP_1,213.100 //
GP12garup1_u:13945: vaiśye nyāyārjitāḥ svārthāḥ śūdre śuśrūṣayārjitāḥ // GarP_1,213.101 //
GP12garup1_u:13951: sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyānna tuṣyettu svayaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,213.104 //
GP12garup1_u:13956: caturthe ca tathā bhāge snānārthaṃ mṛda māharet /
GP12garup1_u:13961: prātaḥ snānaṃ tadarthaṃ tu nityasnānaṃ prakīrtitam // GarP_1,213.109 //
GP12garup1_u:13963: snānārhastu yadā snāti snānaṃ naimittikaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,213.110 //
GP12garup1_u:13967: snānaṃ samācaredyastu kriyāṅgaṃ tacca kīrtitam // GarP_1,213.112 //
GP12garup1_u:13969: saraḥ sudevakhāteṣu tīrtheṣu ca nadīṣu ca // GarP_1,213.113 //
GP12garup1_u:13973: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ cāpi kriyāṅgaṃ malakarṣaṇam // GarP_1,213.115 //
GP12garup1_u:13977: tīrthatoyaṃ tataḥ puṇyaṃ gāgaṃ puṇyaṃ tu sarvataḥ // GarP_1,213.117 //
GP12garup1_u:13979: gayāyāṃ ca kurukṣetre yattoyaṃ samupasthitam // GarP_1,213.118 //
GP12garup1_u:13981: putrajanmani yogeṣu tathā saṃkramaṇe raveḥ // GarP_1,213.119 //
GP12garup1_u:13982: rāhośca darśane snānaṃ praśastaṃ niśi nānyathā /
GP12garup1_u:13985: yatphalaṃ dvādaśābdāni prājāpatye kṛte bhavet // GarP_1,213.121 //
GP12garup1_u:13988: prātaḥ snāyī bhavennityaṃ māsau dvau māghaphālgunau /
GP12garup1_u:13989: yastu māghaṃ samāsādya prātaḥ snāyī haviṣyabhuk // GarP_1,213.123 //
GP12garup1_u:13991: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vāpi bhrātaraṃ suhṛdaṃ gurum // GarP_1,213.124 //
GP12garup1_u:14001: āgacchantu me pitara imaṃ gṛhṇantvapoñjalim // GarP_1,213.129 //
GP12garup1_u:14003: vasitvā vasanaṃ śuṣkaṃ sthalasthā starṇabarhiṣi // GarP_1,213.130 //
GP12garup1_u:14005: yadapāṃ krūramāṃsāttu yadamedhyaṃ tu kiñcana // GarP_1,213.131 //
GP12garup1_u:14007: gṛhītvānena mantreṇa toyaṃ savyena pāṇinā // GarP_1,213.132 //
GP12garup1_u:14011: punātu me tadindrastu varuṇaḥ sabṛhaspatiḥ // GarP_1,213.134 //
GP12garup1_u:14021: arcitaṃ syājjagādidaṃ tena sarvaṃ carācaram // GarP_1,213.139 //
GP12garup1_u:14033: gavā goṣṭhe daśaguṇaṃ agnyagāre śatādhikam // GarP_1,213.145 //
GP12garup1_u:14036: pañcame ca tathā bhāge saṃvibhāgo yathārthataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14039: sa pretya labhate svargamannadānaṃ samācaran // GarP_1,213.148 //
GP12garup1_u:14042: śākaṃ ca rātrau bhūmiṣṭhamatyantaṃ ca vivarjayet /
GP12garup1_u:14045: vaiśyasya cānnamevānnaṃ śūdrānnaṃ rudhiraṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,213.151 //
GP12garup1_u:14047: tatra śrīścaiva lakṣmīśca vasate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14048: udare gārhapatyāgniḥ pṛṣṭhadeśe tu dakṣiṇaḥ // GarP_1,213.153 //
GP12garup1_u:14049: āsye cāhavanīyo 'gniḥ satyaḥ parva ca mūrdhani /
GP12garup1_u:14050: yaḥ pañcāgnīnimānveda āhitāgniḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,213.154 //
GP12garup1_u:14052: prāṇo hyagnistathādityastribhoktā eka eva tu // GarP_1,213.155 //
GP12garup1_u:14058: tataḥ sandhyāmupāsīta snātvā vai paścimāṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,213.158 //
GP12garup1_u:14061: ācārādirdharmakartā keśavo hi smṛto dvija // GarP_1,213.159 //
GP12garup1_u:14062: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pañcottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14065: atha snānavidhiṃ vakṣye snānamūlā kriyā yataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14069: tridhā kṛtvā mṛdaṃ tāṃ tu gomayaṃ ca vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14070: adbhirmṛdbhiśca caraṇau prakṣālyātha karau tathā // GarP_1,214.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14074: oṃ uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaścakāra sūryāya panthānamanveta vā /
GP12garup1_u:14078: oṃ ye te śataṃ varuṇaye sahasraṃ yajñiyāḥ pāśā vitatā mahāntaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14079: tebhirno adya savitota viṣṇurviśve muñcantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:14080: sumitriyāna ityabañjalimākṛtyottareṇa toyaṃ paścādvirājya caiva viniḥ kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:14081: oṃ sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu /
GP12garup1_u:14082: durmitriyāstasmai santu yo 'smāndveṣṭi yañca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ // GarP_1,214.7
GP12garup1_u:14084: prakṣālya hastā vācamya namaskṛtya jalaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,214.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14085: oṃ idaṃ viṣṇurvicakrame tredhā nidhe padam samūḍhamasya pāṃsure /
GP12garup1_u:14089: oṃ āpo asmānmātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtaṣvaḥ punantu /
GP12garup1_u:14090: viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devīrudidābhyaḥ śucirāpūta emi //
GP12garup1_u:14093: oṃ mānastoke tanaye mā na āyuṣi mā no goṣu mā no aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14096: imaṃme varuṇe dvābhyāṃ tvannaḥ satvanna ityapi // GarP_1,214.14 //
GP12garup1_u:14098: oṃ imaṃme varuṇa śrudhīhavamadyā ca mṛḍayatvā mavasyurācake //
GP12garup1_u:14099: oṃ tattvayāmi brahmaṇā vandamānastadāśāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14100: aheḍamāno varuṇeha bodhyuruśaṃ samāna āyuḥ pramoṣīḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14101: oṃ tvanno agne varuṇasya vidvāndevasya heḍo avayāsisīṣṭhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14103: oṃ sa tvanno agnevamo bhavatī nediṣṭho asyā uṣasovyuṣṭau /
GP12garup1_u:14104: avayakṣvano varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhimṛḍīkaṃ suhavo na edhi /
GP12garup1_u:14105: oṃ āpo nauṣadhi hiṃsārdhamno rājastato varuṇo nomuñcā yadāharaghnyā iti varuṇeti śapārmahe tato varuṇa no muñca /
GP12garup1_u:14111: avadevairdevakṛtā manoyāsi samavatyai kṛtaṃ puṣpācchā devadhīmalpāhī //
GP12garup1_u:14115: devīrāpa iti dvābhyāṃ āpodevā iti tryṛcā // GarP_1,214.18 //
GP12garup1_u:14116: drupadādiva iti ca śanno devīrapāṃ rasaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14117: āpo devo pāvamānyaḥ punantvādyā ṛco nava // GarP_1,214.19 //
GP12garup1_u:14119: hiraṇyavarṇā iti ca pāvamānyastathā parāḥ // GarP_1,214.20 //
GP12garup1_u:14121: vāruṇyā bahavaḥ puṇyāḥ śaktitaḥ saṃprayojayet // GarP_1,214.21 //
GP12garup1_u:14123: ādāvante ca kurvīta abhiṣekaṃ yathākramam // GarP_1,214.22 //
GP12garup1_u:14125: antarjale japenmantraṃ triḥ kṛtvā cāghamarṣaṇam // GarP_1,214.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14128: savyāhṛtiṃ sapraṇavāṃ gāyatrīṃ vā japedbudhaḥ āvartayedvā praṇavaṃ smaredvā viṣṇamavyayam viṣṇorāyatanaṃ tvāpaḥ sa evāppatirucyate /
GP12garup1_u:14131: gāyattrī vaiṣṇavī hyeṣā viṣṇoḥ saṃsmaraṇāya vai // GarP_1,214.27 //
GP12garup1_u:14134: āpo mā tasmādenasaḥ pāvamānaśca muñcatu iviṣmato vimā āpohaviṣmān āvirāsati /
GP12garup1_u:14135: haviṣmān deva asuro haviṣmān astu sūryaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14136: devīrāpo apā patnyā yaśca ūrmirhaviṣyaḥ indriyavānmādityantanaḥ taṃ devebhyo devatā dābhuśukralebhyasteṣāṃ bhāgakarṣivasisamudrasya dakṣiṇyāgrayāsimenāpograrbhiraśmatamodhoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14138: yābhirmitrāvaruṇasya siñcayābhirindramanayatyanna vātī vadrupadāṃ śanno devī apāmasṛgdvayasaṃsūrye santaṃ samāhitaṃ apāṃrasasya yo rasya yo gṛhṇāsyuttamam /
GP12garup1_u:14139: āpo devīrupasūrya madhumatīvayasyāya prajābhyaḥ tāsā māsthānātvarjihatāmoṣadhayaḥ sapippalāḥ
GP12garup1_u:14140: punantu mā pitaraḥ saumyāsaḥ punantvanāpi pitā sahasāḥ pavitreṇa gatāyuṣā
GP12garup1_u:14144: punantu mā devajanāḥ punantu manasā dhiyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14145: punantu viśvā bhūtāni jātavedaḥ ! punīhi mā /
GP12garup1_u:14146: pavitreṇa punīhi mā śukreṇa deva dīdyat /
GP12garup1_u:14148: yatte pavitramarciṣyagne vitatamantarā brahmā tena punātu mā /
GP12garup1_u:14156: tayāmadantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām /
GP12garup1_u:14157: citpa tirmā punātvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14159: praṇitacchakeyaṃ devo vākpatirmā savitā tvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14161: punastacchakeyaṃ dyupatiṃ ayaṃ gauḥ pṛśrirakramīsadaśaśataṃ mātaraṃ punaḥ pitarañca prayasmaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14162: devo mā savitā punātvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14163: tasya te pavitrapate pavitrapūtasya yatkāmaḥ punātacchakeyam? /
GP12garup1_u:14164: oṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14166: snātvaivaṃ vāsasī dhaute acchinne paridhāya ca /
GP12garup1_u:14167: prakṣālya ca mṛdādbhiśca hastau prakṣālya vai tadā // GarP_1,214.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14169: drupadāṃ ca trirāvartya tathā caivāghamarṣaṇam // GarP_1,214.31 //
GP12garup1_u:14173: taccakṣurdeva iti ca haṃsaḥ śuciṣadityapi // GarP_1,214.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14175: gāyattrīṃ ca tathā śaktyā upasthāya divākaram // GarP_1,214.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14177: śivasaṅkalpena ca tathā maṇḍalabrāhmaṇena ca // GarP_1,214.35 //
GP12garup1_u:14181: savyaṃ kṛtvā trirācamya śriyaṃ medhāṃ dhṛtiṃ kṣitim // GarP_1,214.37 //
GP12garup1_u:14183: umāmarundhatīṃ caiva śacīṃ mātarameva ca // GarP_1,214.38 //
GP12garup1_u:14184: jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva sāvitrīṃ śāntimeva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14185: svāhāṃ svadhāṃ dhṛtiṃ caiva tathaivāditimuttamām // GarP_1,214.39 //
GP12garup1_u:14190: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe snānavidhivivaraṇaṃ nāma caturdaśottaradviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:14282: teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānāṃ api bhadre saumanase syāma /
GP12garup1_u:14283: oṃ āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāsogniṣvāttāḥ pathibhirdevayānaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14285: oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ kīlālaṃ parisnutaṃ svadhā stha tarpayata me pitṝn /
GP12garup1_u:14293: oṃ akṣanpitaro amīmadanta pitaro amī tṛpyantaḥ pitaraḥ śuṃ(sva) dhadhvaṃ pibeha pitaro 'pi vānatrayāṃśca viśrayāṃśca bhavanapavitratvā rathapati te jātavedāḥ svadhābhiryajñaṃ sukṛtaṃ jupasva? /
GP12garup1_u:14294: oṃ ṇaduvātā ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14296: madhu dyaurastu naḥ pitā madhu mānno vanaspatirmadhubhām astu sūryo mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ prapitāmahasyāñjalidānam /
GP12garup1_u:14297: oṃ namo vaḥ pitaro rasāya namo vaḥ pitaraḥ śuṣmāya namo vaḥ pitaro jīvāya namo vaḥ pitaraḥ svadhāyai namo vaḥ pitaro ghorāya namo vaḥ pitaro manyave
GP12garup1_u:14298: namo vaḥ pitaro gṛhānna pitaro dattaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14299: namo vaḥ pitaro dadhme tadvaḥ pitaro vāsaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14302: ye cāsmākaṃ kule jātā aputrā gotriṇo mṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14303: te tṛpyantu mayā dattaṃ vastraniṣpīḍanodakam // GarP_1,215.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14304: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe devāditarpaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañjadaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14308: prajvālya cāgniṃ paryukṣya-oṃ kraṣyādamagniṃ prahiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājyaṃ gacchatu ripravāhaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14309: ihaivāyamitaro jātavedā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānat /
GP12garup1_u:14310: oṃ pāvaka vaiśvānara idamāsanaṃ araṇīgarbhasaṃskṛtatejorūpa mahābrahman muhūrtāstriṣu vaiśvānaraṃ pratibodhayāmi /
GP12garup1_u:14311: oṃ vaiśvānare na ubhayaṃ āprayātu parāvataḥ agnirna svadyutīrūpapṛṣṭho divi pṛṣṭho 'śvi pṛthivyāṃ pṛṣṭhā vivevā oṣadhīcāviveśa vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā
GP12garup1_u:14312: pṛṣṭho 'gniḥ namo divya sa ṣaṣṭhāṃ naktam // GarP_1,216.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14332: oṃ ye bhūtā pracaranti dīnāca nimihanto bhuvanasya madhye /
GP12garup1_u:14333: tebhyo baliṃ puṣṭikāmo dadāmi mayi puṣṭiṃ puṣṭipatirdadātu /
GP12garup1_u:14335: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaiśvadevanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśottaradviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:14339: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gato 'pi vā // GarP_1,217.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14340: yaḥ smaretpuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,217.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14359: oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ astrāya phaṭ // GarP_1,217.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14360: oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ oṃ mahaḥ oṃ janaḥ oṃ tapaḥ oṃ satyaṃ tatstripadā
GP12garup1_u:14361: oṃ āpo jyo 'tī raso 'mṛtaṃ brahma bhūrbhuvaḥ svarom /
GP12garup1_u:14365: oṃ āyātu varade devi ! pūrvāhne brahmadevatā /
GP12garup1_u:14366: gāyattrī nāma yā sandhyā raktāṅgī raktavāsasā /
GP12garup1_u:14369: āyātu varadā devī madhyāhne śvetarūpiṇī // GarP_1,217.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14377: oṃ āpo hiṣṭhā mayo bhuvastā na urje dadhāta naḥ // GarP_1,217.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14382: oṃ tasmā araṅgamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha /
GP12garup1_u:14384: oṃ sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu oṃ durmitriyāstasmai santu yo 'smān
GP12garup1_u:14393: divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣamatho svaḥ // GarP_1,217.11 //
GP12garup1_u:14396: oṃ udutyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14399: āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatastasthuṣaśca /
GP12garup1_u:14401: paśyema śaradaḥ śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ śatam /
GP12garup1_u:14405: devā gātuvido nāṅgavidvānādbhamitamanasaspata imaṃ devayajñaṃ svāhā vātedhāḥ japet // GarP_1,217.12
GP12garup1_u:14407: brahmaṇā samanujñātā gaccha devi ! yathāsukham // GarP_1,217.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14408: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sandhyāvidhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14416: oṃ susvāgatāmiti tairukte oṃ viśvebhyo devebhya etatpādodakamarghyaṃ svāheti devabrāhmaṇapādayordevatīrthenābhugnakuśasahitajaladānam
GP12garup1_u:14417: tato dakṣiṇā bhimukhena vāmopavītenāmukagotrebhyo asmatpitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhya etatpādodakamarghyaṃ svadheti pitrādibrāhmaṇapādayoḥ pitṛtīrthena ābhugnakuśakusumasahitajaladānam evaṃ mātāmahādibhyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14418: etadācamanīyaṃ svāhā svadheti brāhmaṇahaste eṣavor'ghya iti brāhmaṇahaste puṣpadānam // oṃ siddhamidamāsanam iha siddhamityabhidhāya oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ oṃ mahaḥ oṃ janaḥ oṃ tapaḥ oṃ satyamiti saptavyāhṛtibhiḥ pūrvamukhandevabrāhmaṇopaveśanam /
GP12garup1_u:14420: oṃ devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaśca mahāyogibhya eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14421: namaḥ svadhāyai svāhāyai nityameva bhavantute iti trirjapet //
GP12garup1_u:14422: oṃ adyāsmindeśe amukamāse amukarāśiṅgate savitaryamukatithāvamukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ yathānāmaśarmaṇāṃ viśvedevapūrvakandṛśrāddhaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14423: oṃ viśvebhyo devabhyaḥ svāhā oṃ viśvedevānāvāhayiṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14424: āvāhayetyukte oṃ viśvedevāḥ sa āgata śṛṇutām imaṃ havam /
GP12garup1_u:14425: edaṃ barhirniṣīdata oṃ viśvedevāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ ivaṃ me ye antarikṣe ya upadyaviṣṭa /
GP12garup1_u:14426: ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam /
GP12garup1_u:14427: oṃ oṣadhayaḥ saṃvadante somena saha rājñā /
GP12garup1_u:14430: ye atra vihitāḥ śrāddhe sāvadhānā bhavantu te /
GP12garup1_u:14431: oṃ apahatāsurā rakṣāṃsi vediṣada iti tritriryavavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.7
GP12garup1_u:14433: oṃ karuṣvetyanujñātaḥ kṛtvā pātre pavitraniṣevaṇam // GarP_1,218.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14434: oṃ śanno devīrabhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye /
GP12garup1_u:14438: īśvarīṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tā (tvā) mihopahvaye śriyamiti gandhadānam /
GP12garup1_u:14439: oṃ yā divyā āpaḥ payasā saṃbabhūvuryā antarikṣauta pārthavīryāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14440: hiraṇyavarṇā yajñiyāstāna āpaḥ śivāḥ śaṃ syonā suhavā bhavantu /
GP12garup1_u:14441: eṣor'gho nama iti brāhmaṇahaste jalaṃ dattvānenaiva pātreṇa
GP12garup1_u:14442: pavitragrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃstravaṃ pavitraṃ ca brāhmaṇapārśve dadyāt /
GP12garup1_u:14443: tataḥ prathamapātre saṃstravajalaṃ saṃsthāpya kuśopari ūrdhvamukhaṃ sthāpanaṃ kuryat /
GP12garup1_u:14445: viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ etāni gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpavāso yugayajño pavītāni namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14448: tataḥ pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ mātāmahapramātāmahavṛddhapramātāmahānāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhamahaṃ kariṣye iti anujñāvacanam /
GP12garup1_u:14451: oṃ amukagotrebyo 'smatpitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ idamāsanaṃ svadhā iti brāhmaṇavāme āsanadānam /
GP12garup1_u:14456: oṃ āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāso 'gniṣvāttāḥ pathibhirdevayānaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14458: oṃ apahatā surā rakṣāṃsi vediṣadaḥ iti tilavikiraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14461: pratnamadbhiḥ pṛktaḥ svadhayā pitṝṃllokānprīṇīhi naḥ svāhā iti tiladānam // GarP_1,218.12
GP12garup1_u:14462: gandhapuṣpe hastābhyāṃ dattvā pitṛpātramutthāpya yā divyeti paṭhitvā amukagotrāsmatpitaḥ ! amukadevaśarman ! sapatnīka ! eṣa te 'rghyaḥ svadhā
GP12garup1_u:14463: apavitraṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā vāmapārśve dakṣiṇe kuśopari oṃ pitṛbhyaḥ sthānamasītyadhomukhapātrasthāpanam oṃ śundhantāṃ lokāḥ pitṛsadanāḥ pitṛsadanamasi /
GP12garup1_u:14472: tato ghṛtāktamannaṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇopavītī pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ agnau karaṇamahaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14473: oṃ kuruṣveti tenokte oṃ agnaye kavyavāhanāya svāhā iti āhutidvayaṃ devabrāhmaṇahaste dattvā avaśiṣṭānnaṃ piṇḍārthaṃ sthāpayitvā aparamardhaṃ pitrādipātre mātāmahādipātre ca niḥ kṣipet pātramudrādi nidhāya kuśaṃ dattvā adhomukhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā oṃ pṛthivīte pātraṃ dyaurapidhānaṃ brāhmaṇasya mukhe amṛte amṛtaṃ juhomi svāhā pātrābhimantraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14478: oṃ nihanmi sarvaṃ yadamedhyavadbhaveddhatāśca sarve 'suradānavā mayā /
GP12garup1_u:14479: rakṣāṃsi yakṣāḥ sapiśācasaṅghā hatā mayā yātudhānāśca sarve iti siddhārthavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.16
GP12garup1_u:14480: tato dhūrilocanasaṃjñakebhyodavebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ svāheti vārikuśādyairanusaṅkalpanam
GP12garup1_u:14482: tato viparītopavītena savyañjanaṃ saghṛtamannaṃ pitrādi brāhmaṇapātre nidhāya tadupari bhūmisaṃlagnakuśaṃ dattvā oṃ pṛthivī te pātraṃ iti mantreṇa uttānābhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā oṃ idaṃ viṣṇorityannopari uttānaṃ dvijāṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet /
GP12garup1_u:14484: bhūmipātitavāmajānuḥ amukagotrebhyaḥ asmatpitṛpitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ svadhā /
GP12garup1_u:14485: annaṃ saṅkalpya oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛta payaḥ kīlālaṃ paristrutaṃ svadhāstu tarpayata me pitaram /
GP12garup1_u:14488: oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svastatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargodevasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt iti visajayitvā oṃ madhuvātā ṛtāyate madhukṣarantu sindhavaḥ mādhvīrnaḥ santvoṣadhīrmadhunaktamutoṣaso madhutpārthivaṃ rajaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14489: madhudyaurastu naḥ pitā madhumānno vanaspatiḥ madhumānastu sūryo mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ
GP12garup1_u:14490: madhu madhu madhu iti japaḥ // GarP_1,218.19 //
GP12garup1_u:14494: cakravākāḥ śarādvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase // GarP_1,218.20 //
GP12garup1_u:14498: oṃ agnidagdhāśca ye jīvā ye 'pyadagdhāḥ kule mama /
GP12garup1_u:14499: bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṅgatim /
GP12garup1_u:14500: iti bhūmau kuśopari saghṛtamannaṃ jalaplutaṃ vikiret // GarP_1,218.22 //
GP12garup1_u:14501: tato brāhmaṇakrameṇa jalagaṇḍūṣaṃ dattvā pūrvavatsavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvātetitryṛcaṃ japtvā oṃ rucitaṃ bhavadbhiriti devabrāhmaṇapraśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14504: pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ vāmopavītena oṃ tṛptāḥ stha iti praśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14505: oṃ tṛptāḥ sma iti tenokte bhūmyabhyukṣaṇaṃ maṇḍalacatuṣkoṇaṃ ti lavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.23
GP12garup1_u:14506: oṃ amukagotra ! asmatpitaḥ ! amukadevadarśan ! sapatnīka ! etatte piṇḍāsanaṃ svadhā /
GP12garup1_u:14507: itthaṃ rekhāmadhye pitāmahāya khavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trarjapannannaṃ sājyaṃ piṇḍaṃ kṛtvā kuśopari amukagotra asmatpitaḥ !
GP12garup1_u:14510: tataḥ savyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trirjaṃpanpiṇḍavikiraṇaṃ piṇḍāntike /
GP12garup1_u:14511: oṃ lepabhujaḥ prīyantamiti staraṇkuśeṣu hastamārjanaṃ prakṣālitapiṇḍodakena oṃ amukagotra ! asmatpitaḥ ! amukaśarman sapatnīka etatte jalamavanekṣva ye cātratvāmanujāśca tvāmanu tasmai tesvadheti pitṛpiṇḍasecanam /
GP12garup1_u:14512: piṇḍapātramadhomukhaṃ kṛtvā baddhāñjaliḥ oṃ pitaro mādayadhvaṃ yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyadhvamiti japet /
GP12garup1_u:14513: apaḥ spṛṣṭvā vāmena parāvṛttya udaṅmukhaḥ prāṇāṃstriḥ saṃyamya ṣaḍbhya ṛtubhyo namaḥ iti japaḥ vāmenaiva parāvṛtya puṣpadānam /
GP12garup1_u:14515: dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ amī madantaḥ pitaro yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyiṣata iti japaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14516: vāsaḥ śithilīkṛtvāñjaliṃ kṛtvā oṃ namo vaḥ pitaro namo vaḥ iti japaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14518: tataḥ sadā vaḥ pitaro dveṣma iti vīkṣya etadvaḥ pitaro vāsa ityuccārya amukagotra etatte vāsaḥ svadhā iti sūtradānam /
GP12garup1_u:14519: vāmena pāṇinā udakapātraṃ gṛhītvā ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ ityādi piṇḍopari dhārātyāgaḥ pūrvasthāpitapātraśeṣodakaiḥ pratyekaṃ piṇḍasecanaṃ-piṇḍamāvāhya
GP12garup1_u:14520: gandhādidānaṃ-piṇḍopari kuśapatrañca dattvā oṃ akṣannamīmadantahya va priyā adhūṣata astoṣatasvabhānavo viprā naviṣṭhayāmatī /
GP12garup1_u:14521: yo jānvindra te harīti trirjapaḥ // GarP_1,218.26 //
GP12garup1_u:14524: oṃ apāṃ madhye sthitā devāḥ sarvamapsu pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12garup1_u:14525: brāhmaṇasya kare nyastāḥ śivā āpo bhavantu naḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14530: akṣataṃ cāstu me puṇyaṃ śāntiḥ puṣṭirdhṛtiśca me /
GP12garup1_u:14536: oṃ aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu gotraṃ no vardhatāṃ--dātāro no 'bhivardhantāṃ
GP12garup1_u:14538: śraddhā ca no mā vyagamadbahudeyañca no 'stviti /
GP12garup1_u:14540: yācitāraśca naḥ santu mā ca yāciṣma kañcana /
GP12garup1_u:14544: kuśapavitraṃ gṛhītvātena kuśena pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ spṛṣṭvā svadhāṃ
GP12garup1_u:14545: vācayiṣye-oṃ vācyatāṃ-oṃ pitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ svadhocyatām
GP12garup1_u:14546: astusvadhā ityukte ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtamiti piṇḍopari vāridhārāṃ dadyāt // GarP_1,218.29
GP12garup1_u:14547: tataḥ oṃ viśvedevā asminyajñe prīyantā--devabrāhmaṇahaste yavodakadānam /
GP12garup1_u:14548: oṃ prīyantāmiti tenokte oṃ devatābhya iti trirjapet // GarP_1,218.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14549: adhomukhaḥ piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya dakṣiṇopavītī pūrvābhimukhaḥ oṃ amukagotrāya amukadevaśarmaṇe brāhmaṇāya sapatnīkāya śrāddhapratiṣṭhārthadakṣiṇāmetadrajataṃ tubhyamahaṃ sampradade iti dakṣiṇāṃ dadyāt /
GP12garup1_u:14551: tataḥ pitṛbrāhmaṇe piṇḍāḥ sampannā iti praśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14552: susampannā iti piṇḍe kṣīradhārāṃ dattvā piṇḍacālanaṃ atithibrāhmaṇe piṇḍapātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā oṃ vāje vāje vata vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14553: asyamadhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvaṃ tṛptā yāta pathibhirdevayānairiti piṇḍā
GP12garup1_u:14554: divisarjanaṃ-āmāvājasya prasavo jagamyādeme dyāvāpṛthivī viśvarūpe āmāgantāṃ pitarā cāmā somo 'mṛtatvena gamyāt /
GP12garup1_u:14560: anena vidhinā śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ vai yatra kutracit // GarP_1,218.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14562: ityuktaṃ pārvaṇaṃ śrāddhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ brahmalokadam // GarP_1,218.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14563: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pārvaṇaśrāddhakathanaṃ nāmāṣṭradaśādhikadviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:14567: oṃ amukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahānāṃ amukaśarmaṇāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsvahaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14570: jātaputramukhadarśanādau vṛddhi śrāddhaṃ pūrvābhimukheṣu dakṣiṇopavītiṣu sayavabadarakuśairdevatīrthena namaskārāntena dakṣiṇopacāreṇa kartavyam //
GP12garup1_u:14571: dakṣiṇajānu gṛhītvā adyāsmadīyāmukavṛddhau amukagātrāṇāmasmatprapitāmahīpitāmahīmātṝṇāmamukadevīnāmamukagotrāṇāṃ śrāddhe kartavye vasusatyasaṃjñakānāṃ viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnenayuṣmāsu mayā kartavyamiti devabrāhmaṇāmantraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14573: tataḥ amukavṛddhau amukagotrāyā matprapitāmahyā amukadevyā nāndīmukhyāḥ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsu mayā kartavyamiti prapitāmahībrāhmaṇāmantraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14576: āsane oṃ viśvedevāsa āgata śṛṇutāma imaṃrṭha ivam /
GP12garup1_u:14578: oṃ viśvedevāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ ivaṃ ye me antarikṣe ya udadyaviṣṭa /
GP12garup1_u:14579: pe agnijihvā utavā yadatrā āsādyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam /
GP12garup1_u:14586: oṃ vasusatyasaṃjñakebhyo devebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ savadaraṃ sadadhi pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ nama iti annasaṅkalpanam /
GP12garup1_u:14587: oṃ amukagotre ! matpitāmahamukadevi nāndīmukhi ! etadannaṃ sabadaraṃ sadadhi namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14591: adya amukagotrasya matpituramukadevaśarmaṇaḥ pratisāṃvatsarikamekoddiṣṭaśrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsvahaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14595: tatasmṛptiṃ jñātvā dakṣiṇābhimukhīvāmopavītī ucchiṣṭasamīpe agnidagdhā iti annavikiraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14596: amukagotramatpitaramukadevaśarmannetatte jalamavanenikṣva ye cātra tvāmanuyāśca tvāmanutasmai te svadhā iti rekhopari vāridhārādānam /
GP12garup1_u:14598: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:14608: tataḥ pitāmahaprapitāmahavṛddhaprapitāmahānāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhamahaṃ kariṣye ityanujñāgrahaṇaṃ-pātratrayakaraṇaṃ-pātropari kuśaṃ dattvā pātrāntareṇa pidhāya acchidrāvadhāraṇāntaṃ parisamāpya tathaiva piturapi
GP12garup1_u:14611: uddhāṭanaṃ kṛtvā--oṃ ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ pitaro yamarājye /
GP12garup1_u:14612: teṣāṃ lokaḥ svadhā namo yajño deveṣu kalpatām /
GP12garup1_u:14613: oṃ ye samānāḥ samanaso jīvā jīveṣu māmakāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14614: teṣāṃ śrīrmayi kalpatāmasmin loke śataṃ samāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14615: etanmantradvayena pitṛpātrodakaṃ pitāmahaprapitāmahapātre vṛddhaprapitāmahapātraṃ parityajya pitāmahaprapitāmahayorudakaṃ pavitrañca pitṛpātre kṣipet // GarP_1,220.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14618: jaladānaṃ--hastābhyāṃ pātramutthāpya oṃ yā divyeti paṭhitvā oṃ amukagotra matpitāmaha amukadevaśarman sapatnīka eṣa te arghyaḥ svadhā /
GP12garup1_u:14619: pitṛpātreṇaiva pitāmahabrāhmaṇahaste stokamarghyodakaṃ sapavitraṅgṛhītvāstokamudakaṃ piṇḍasecanārthaṃ pātrāntareṇa pidhāya pitṛbrāhmaṇavāmapārśva dakṣiṇāgrakuśopari pitṛbhyaḥ stānamasīti adhomukhapātrasthapanam pitāmahaprapitāmahavṛddhaprapitāmahebhyo gandhādidānamagnaukaraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14622: aṅguṣṭhaniveśanaṃ tilavikaraṇaṃ kṛtvā amukagotra etatte annaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ ye cātra tvā manuyāśca tvāmanu tasmai te svadhā iti // GarP_1,220.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14626: pitāmāhadau praśraṃ kṛtvā pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ svaditaṃ bhavadbhiriti praśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14627: oṃ amukagotra matpitaḥ amukaśarman sapatnīka eṣa te piṇḍo ye cātratvāmanuyāśca tvāmanu tasmai svadheti piṇḍapātramacchidramastu /
GP12garup1_u:14628: tataḥ saṅkalpa siddhivācanaṃ samāpya piṇḍaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā ye samānāḥ sumanasa iti mantradvayaṃ paṭhitvā pitāmahavṛddhaprapitāmahapātreṣu kṣipet
GP12garup1_u:14633: suprokṣitamastu śivā āpaḥ santu--vṛddhaprapitāmahakrameṇa brāhmaṇahaste jaladānam /
GP12garup1_u:14635: aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu astvityukte svadhāṃ vācayiṇya iti pitāmāhadibrāhmaṇānujñāpanam // GarP_1,220.7
GP12garup1_u:14636: oṃ vācyatāṃ ityukte oṃ pitāmahādibhyaḥ svadhocyatām /
GP12garup1_u:14638: astu svadhetyukte oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīriti dakṣiṇābhimukhavāridhārātyāgaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14639: oṃ viśvedevā asmin yajñe prīyantāmiti devabrāhmaṇahaste oṃ yavodakadānam /
GP12garup1_u:14641: piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya pitāmahādibhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā tataḥ pitṛ brāhmaṇāya āśiṣo me pradīyantāmityāśīḥ prārthanam /
GP12garup1_u:14642: pratigṛhyatāmityukte dātāro no 'bhivardhantāmiti pātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā vāje
GP12garup1_u:14646: śrāddhaṃ viṣṇuḥ śrāddhakartā phalaṃ śrāddhādikaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,220.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14647: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrāddhānuṣṭhānaṃ nāmaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:14652: śrutaṃ dharmaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ sukhamutsāhameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14653: śoko harati vai nṝṇāṃ tasmācchokaṃ parityajet // GarP_1,221.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14655: karmāṇi prerayantīha puruṣaṃ sukhaduḥ khayoḥ // GarP_1,221.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14657: dānāḥtsvargaśca rājyañca dadyāddanaṃ tato naraḥ // GarP_1,221.4 //
GP12garup1_u:14660: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa yajñaiḥ snānena vā punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14661: dharmasya nāśakā ye ca te vai nirayagāminaḥ // GarP_1,221.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14664: na dātā sukhaduḥ khānāṃ na ca hartāsti kaścana /
GP12garup1_u:14665: bhuñjate svakṛtānyeva duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca // GarP_1,221.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14667: santuṣṭaḥ ko na śaknoti phalamūlaiśca vartitum // GarP_1,221.9 //
GP12garup1_u:14669: idameva hi lobhasya kāryaṃ syā datiduṣkaram // GarP_1,221.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14671: lobhānmohaśca māyā ca māno matsara eva ca // GarP_1,221.11 //
GP12garup1_u:14673: yaḥ sa śāntaḥ paraṃ lokaṃ yāti pāpavivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,221.12 //
GP12garup1_u:14674: devatā munayo nāgā gandharvā guhyakā hara /
GP12garup1_u:14675: dhārmikaṃ pūjayantīha na dhanāḍhyaṃ na kāminam // GarP_1,221.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14677: alabhyaṃ labhate martyastatra kā parivedanā // GarP_1,221.14 //
GP12garup1_u:14683: bhūmiṃ sarvaguṇopetāṃ dattvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,221.17 //
GP12garup1_u:14684: na godānātparaṃ dānaṃ kiñcidastīti me matiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14685: yā gaurnyāyārjitā dattā kṛtsnaṃ tārayate kulam // GarP_1,221.18 //
GP12garup1_u:14687: annena dhāryate sarvaṃ carācaramidaṃ jagat // GarP_1,221.19 //
GP12garup1_u:14691: annātprāṇā balaṃ tejaścānnādvīryaṃ dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ // GarP_1,221.21 //
GP12garup1_u:14695: kālena tīrthaṃ phalati sadyaḥ sādhusamāgamaḥ // GarP_1,221.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14697: jñānaṃ śamo dayā dānameṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,221.24 //
GP12garup1_u:14698: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dharmasārakathanaṃ nāmaikaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:14702: makṣikā vipruṣo nārī bhuvi toyaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14707: snānaṃ japyañca kartavyaṃ dinasyānte ca bhojanam // GarP_1,222.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14709: yaśca pāṇitale bhuṅkte aṅgulyā bāhunā ca yaḥ // GarP_1,222.4 //
GP12garup1_u:14716: yastatra bhuṅkte pakvānnaṃ kṛcchrārdhaṃ tasya dāpayet /
GP12garup1_u:14717: teṣāmapi ca yo bhuṅkte kṛcchrapādo vidhīyate // GarP_1,222.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14719: etadannañca yo bhuṅkte dvijaścāndrāyaṇaṃ caret // GarP_1,222.9 //
GP12garup1_u:14728: phalaṃ bhakṣayate tatra ahorātreṇa śudhyati // GarP_1,222.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14730: gāyattryaṣṭasahasrantu drupadāṃ vā śataṃ japet // GarP_1,222.14 //
GP12garup1_u:14744: varṇabāhyena saṃspṛṣṭaḥ pañcarātreṇa vai tadā // GarP_1,222.21 //
GP12garup1_u:14746: striyo bālāśca vṛddhāśca na duṣyanti kadācana // GarP_1,222.22 //
GP12garup1_u:14747: nityamāsyaṃ śuci strīṇāṃ śakuntaiḥ pātitaṃ phalam /
GP12garup1_u:14748: prastrave ca śucirvatsaḥ śvā mṛgagrahaṇe śuciḥ // GarP_1,222.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14749: udake codakasthaṃ tu sthaleṣu sthalajaṃ śuci /
GP12garup1_u:14750: pādau sthāpyau ca tatraiva ācāntaḥ śucitāmiyāt // GarP_1,222.24 //
GP12garup1_u:14752: mūtreṇa surayā miśraṃ tapanaiḥ khalu śudhyati // GarP_1,222.25 //
GP12garup1_u:14760: bhūmauniḥ kṣaipya taddravyaṃ śaucaṃ kṛtvā samāhitaḥ // GarP_1,222.29 //
GP12garup1_u:14761: āranālaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ takrantu kṛsarañca yat /
GP12garup1_u:14762: śūdrādapi ca tadgāhyaṃ māṃsaṃ madhu tathāntyajāt // GarP_1,222.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14763: gauḍīṃ paiṣṭīñca mādhvīkaṃ viprādiryaḥ surāṃ pibet /
GP12garup1_u:14764: surāṃ pibandvijaḥ śudhyedagnivarṇāṃ surāṃ piban // GarP_1,222.31 //
GP12garup1_u:14765: vipraḥ pañcaśataṃ japyaṃ gāyatryāḥ kṣatriyasya ca śataṃ vipraśca bhuktvānnaṃ pānapātreṇa sūtake śucirvipro daśāhena kṣattriyo dvādaśāhataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14766: vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśāhana śūdro māsena śudhyati // GarP_1,222.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14768: bāle prete māsike ca sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_1,222.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14770: jatadantaśca bālaśca kumārī ca trivarṣikā // GarP_1,222.35 //
GP12garup1_u:14778: agnayo yatra hūyante vedo vā yatra paṭhyate // GarP_1,222.39 //
GP12garup1_u:14779: satataṃ vaiśvadevā di na teṣāṃ sūtakaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:14780: aśuddhe ca gṛhe bhukte trirātrācchudhyati dvijaḥ // GarP_1,222.40 //
GP12garup1_u:14781: brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā caiva rajasvalā /
GP12garup1_u:14783: dvirātrataḥ kṣatriyā ca śuddhā vaiśyā hyupoṣitā /
GP12garup1_u:14784: śūdrā snānena śudhyettu droṇārthaṃ na visarjayet // GarP_1,222.42 //
GP12garup1_u:14786: suvarṇādbhaiḥ samabhyukṣya hutāśe ca pratāpayet // GarP_1,222.43 //
GP12garup1_u:14787: kūpe ca patitāndṛṣṭvā śvaśṛgālau ca markaṭam /
GP12garup1_u:14790: asthi carma malaṃ vāpi mūṣikāṃ yadi kūpataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14791: uddhṛtya codakaṃ pañca gavyācchuddhyettu śodhitam // GarP_1,222.45 //
GP12garup1_u:14799: krīḍāyāṃ śayanīyādau nīlīvastraṃ na duṣyati // GarP_1,222.49 //
GP12garup1_u:14800: nīlīvastraṃ na spṛśecca nīlī ca nirayaṃ brajet /
GP12garup1_u:14801: vrahmaghnaśca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,222.50 //
GP12garup1_u:14802: ṛkṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśudhyante tatsaṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14804: brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset /
GP12garup1_u:14807: vṛṣamekaṃ sahasraṃ gāṃ dadyācca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,222.53 //
GP12garup1_u:14811: asthibhaṅgaṃ gavāṃ kṛtvā śṛṅgabhaṅgamathāpi vā // GarP_1,222.55 //
GP12garup1_u:14812: tvagbhedaṃ pucchanāśe vā māsārdhaṃ yāvakaṃ pibet /
GP12garup1_u:14815: punaḥ saṃskāramāyānti trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ // GarP_1,222.57 //
GP12garup1_u:14819: antyabhāṇḍasthitāḥ sarve niṣkrāntāḥ śucayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,222.59 //
GP12garup1_u:14822: upavāsaḥ pādakṛcchraṃ kṛcchārdhadviguṇaṃ hi yat // GarP_1,222.60 //
GP12garup1_u:14828: ekaikaṃ vardhayetpiṇḍaṃ śukle kṛṣṇe ca hrāsayet // GarP_1,222.63 //
GP12garup1_u:14833: kṣīrasya dvādaśa proktā dadhnastu daśa ucyate /
GP12garup1_u:14834: ghṛtasya māṣakāḥ pañca pañcagavyaṃ malāpaham // GarP_1,222.66 //
GP12garup1_u:14835: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prāyaścitakathanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:14837: brahmovāca munibhiścaritā dharmā bhaktyā vyāsa mayoditāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14839: tarpaṇena ca homena sandhyāyā vandanena ca /
GP12garup1_u:14841: dharmo hi bhagavānviṣṇuḥ pūjī viṣṇostu tarpaṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14842: homaḥ sandhyā tathā dhyānaṃ dhāraṇā sakalaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,223.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14844: pralayaṃ jagato vakṣye tatsarvaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka /
GP12garup1_u:14847: kṛte dharmaścatuṣpācca satyaṃ dānaṃ tapo dayā // GarP_1,223.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14849: caturvaṃṣarsahasrāṇi narā jīvanti vai tadā // GarP_1,223.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14851: śūraścātibalo viṣṇū rakṣāṃsi ca jaghāna ha // GarP_1,223.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14857: catuḥ śatāyuṣo lokā dvijakṣatrodbhavāḥ prajāḥ // GarP_1,223.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14864: aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni yair vedyo harireva hi // GarP_1,223.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14887: sattvaṃ rajastama iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14889: prabhūtañca yadā sattvaṃ mano burdhondriyāṇi ca /
GP12garup1_u:14890: tadā kṛtayugaṃ vidyājjñāne tapasi yadratiḥ // GarP_1,223.24 //
GP12garup1_u:14896: śokamohau bhayaṃ dainyaṃ sa kalistamasi smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,223.27 //
GP12garup1_u:14905: udvignāḥ santi ca janāḥ piśācasadṛśāḥ prajāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14907: kariṣyenti kalau prāpte na ca pitryodakakriyām /
GP12garup1_u:14908: strīparāśca janāḥ sarve śūdraprāyāśca śaunaka // GarP_1,223.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14910: śiraḥ kaṇḍūyanaparā ājñāṃ bhetsyanti bhartsitāḥ // GarP_1,223.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14914: kṛte yadyyāyato viṣṇuṃ tretāyāṃ japataḥ phalam // GarP_1,223.36 //
GP12garup1_u:14916: tasmāddhyeyo harirnityaṃ geyaḥ pūjyaśca śaunaka // GarP_1,223.37 //
GP12garup1_u:14917: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yugadharmakathanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:14922: utiṣṭhanti tadā raudrā divi sapta divākarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14923: te tu pītvā jalaṃ sarvaṃ śoṣayanti jagattrayam // GarP_1,224.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14925: viṣṇuśca rudro bhūtvāsau pātālāni dahatyadhaḥ // GarP_1,224.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14927: varṣante vai varṣaśataṃ nānāvarṇā mahāghanāḥ // GarP_1,224.4 //
GP12garup1_u:14932: atha prākṛtikaṃ vakṣye pralayaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka // GarP_1,224.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14934: brahmāṇaṃ nyasya dehe hi mukto yogabalairhariḥ // GarP_1,224.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14935: ye gatā brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ te 'pi yānti paraṃ padam /
GP12garup1_u:14939: pūrṇe brahmāyuṣi gate bhidyate 'mbhasi līyate // GarP_1,224.9 //
GP12garup1_u:14940: evaṃ sā jagadādhārā toye corvo pralīyate /
GP12garup1_u:14941: āpastejasi līyante tejo vāyau pralīyate // GarP_1,224.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14942: vāyuḥ khe khañca bhūtādau viśate ca tadā mahān /
GP12garup1_u:14946: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe naimittikapralayonāma caturviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:14952: yadvinā puruṣārtho na līnaḥ syātparamātmani // GarP_1,225.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14956: yacca piṇḍaṃ prayacchanti yamaloke tadaśnute // GarP_1,225.4 //
GP12garup1_u:14958: pāpakṛdyāti narakaṃ puṇyakṛdyāti vai divam // GarP_1,225.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14960: nābhibhūtañca tasyaiva yāti bījadvayaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,225.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14962: peśyāḥ palasamo 'ṇḍaḥ syādaṅkuraṃ tata ucyate // GarP_1,225.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14965: tvaco romāṇi jāyante keśāścaiva tataḥ param /
GP12garup1_u:14966: naraścādhomukhaḥ sthitvā daśame ca saḥ jāyate // GarP_1,225.9 //
GP12garup1_u:14968: bālatvaṃ tvatha kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ vṛddhatāmapi // GarP_1,225.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14974: upādhyāyavyalīkaṃ tu kṛtvā śvā bhavati dvija // GarP_1,225.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14978: bhurtuḥ piṇḍamupāśvasto vañjayitvā tameva yaḥ // GarP_1,225.15 //
GP12garup1_u:14982: viśvāsahartā ca naro mīnayonau prajāyate // GarP_1,225.17 //
GP12garup1_u:14994: aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hartā naraḥ sañjāyate kharaḥ // GarP_1,225.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14995: kṛmiḥ strīvadhakartā ca bālahantā ca jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:14996: bhojanañcorayitvā tu makṣikā jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,225.24 //
GP12garup1_u:14998: ghṛtaṃ hṛtvā ca nakulaḥ kāko madbhuramāmiṣam // GarP_1,225.25 //
GP12garup1_u:14999: madhu hṛtvā naro daṃśa-pūpaṃ hṛtvā pipīlikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15000: apo hṛtvā tu pāpātmā vāyasaḥ samprajāyate // GarP_1,225.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15001: hṛte kāṣṭhe ca hārītaḥ kapoto vā prajāyate /
GP12garup1_u:15002: hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛmiyonau prajāyate // GarP_1,225.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15004: mayūro varṇakaṃ hṛtvā śākapatrañca jāyate // GarP_1,225.28 //
GP12garup1_u:15006: chuchundariḥ śubhāngandhāñchaśaṃ hṛtvā śaśo bhavet // GarP_1,225.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15012: eṣa eva kramo dṛṣṭo gosuvarṇādihāriṇām // GarP_1,225.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15014: asamiddhe hute cāgnau mandāgniḥ khalu jāyate // GarP_1,225.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15018: nikṛtya bandhanaṃ nṝṇāṃ kārpaṇyañca nṛṇāṃ vadhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15020: dayā bhūteṣu saṃvādaḥ paralokaṃ prati kriyā /
GP12garup1_u:15025: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karmavipākādikathanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15027: sūta uvāca vakṣye sāṅgaṃ mahāyogaṃ bhuktimuktikaraṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:15029: mameti mūlaṃ duḥ khasya na mameti nivartanam /
GP12garup1_u:15038: mūrtendriyalayaṃ nūnaṃ na tvaṃ rājan na cāpyaham // GarP_1,226.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15039: na tanmātrādikaṃ vācā naivāntaḥ karaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:15040: kaṃ vā paśyasi rājendra pradhānamidamāvayoḥ // GarP_1,226.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15044: sā muktirbrahmaṇā caikya manaikyaṃ prākṛtairguṇaiḥ // GarP_1,226.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15045: tadgṛhaṃ yatra vasati tadbhojyaṃ yena jīvati /
GP12garup1_u:15046: yanmuktaye tadevoktaṃ jñānājñāne na cānyathā // GarP_1,226.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15050: yamāḥ pañcātha niyamāḥ śaucaṃ dvividhamīritam // GarP_1,226.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15054: laghuryo daśamātrastu dviguṇaḥ sa tu madhyamaḥ // GarP_1,226.14 //
GP12garup1_u:15062: nirudhya niścalo bhūtvā sthito yuñjīta yogavit // GarP_1,226.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15065: prāṇāyāmā daśāṣṭau ca dhāraṇā sā vidhīyate /
GP12garup1_u:15066: dve dhāraṇe smṛto yogo yogibhistattvadarśibhiḥ // GarP_1,226.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15067: prāṅnāḍyāṃ hṛdaye cātra tṛtīyā ca tathorasi /
GP12garup1_u:15068: kaṇṭhe mukhe nā sikāgre netre bhrūmadhyamūrdhasu // GarP_1,226.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15080: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ pṛthivyā malavarjitam /
GP12garup1_u:15085: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ śrotratvakparivarjitam // GarP_1,226.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15087: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prāṇāpānavivarjitam // GarP_1,226.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15090: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotisturīyaṃ paramaṃ padam /
GP12garup1_u:15093: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjñānarūpo vimuktaye // GarP_1,226.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15095: ityaṣṭāṅgo mayā yoga uktaḥ śaunaka muktidaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15097: utpadyante hi saṃsāre naikaṃ yātvā parātmanām /
GP12garup1_u:15099: tato naṃ mriyate duḥ khī na rogī na ca vandhavān /
GP12garup1_u:15100: na pāpairyujyate yogī narake na vipacyate // GarP_1,226.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15101: garbhavāse sa no duḥ khī sa syānnārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15106: indro 'pi paramaṃ sthānaṃ gandharvāpsaraso varāḥ // GarP_1,226.39 //
GP12garup1_u:15107: prāptā devāśca devatvaṃ munitvaṃ munayo gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15109: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍeṣṭāṅgayogakathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:15113: yathā bhaktyā haristuṣyettathā nānyena kenacit // GarP_1,227.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15115: jīvitasya phalaṃ svādu niyataṃ smaraṇaṃ hareḥ // GarP_1,227.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15120: iha nityakriyāḥ kuryuḥ snigdhā ye vaiṣṇavāstu te /
GP12garup1_u:15121: brahmākṣaraṃ na śṛṇvanvai tayā bhagavateritam // GarP_1,227.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15122: praṇāmapūrvakaṃ bhaktyā yo vadedvaiṣṇavo hi saḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15125: yena sarvātmanā viṣṇau bhaktyā bhāvo niveśitaḥ // GarP_1,227.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15130: sa viprendro muniḥ śrīmānsa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,227.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15131: tasmai deyaṃ tato grāhyaṃ sa ca pūjyo yathā hariḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15132: smṛtaḥ saṃbhāṣito vāpi pūjito vā dvijottamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15134: dayāṃ kuru prapannāya tavāsmīti ca yo vadet /
GP12garup1_u:15135: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dadyādetad vrataṃ hareḥ // GarP_1,227.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15148: yo bhaktiṃ vahate viṣṇau tena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,227.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15150: na tāṃ yānti gatiṃ bhaktā yāṃ yānti munisattamāḥ // GarP_1,227.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15154: te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇāḥ // GarP_1,227.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15160: sa maro badhiro jñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // GarP_1,227.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15161: nāmni saṃkīrtite viṣṇoryasya puṃso na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:15165: svapuruṣamabhivīkṣya pāśahastaṃ vadati yamaḥ kila tasya karṇamūle /
GP12garup1_u:15168: sādhureva sa mantavyaḥ samyagavyavasito hi saḥ // GarP_1,227.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15169: kṣipraṃ bhavati dharmātmā śaśvacchāntiṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:15170: viprendra pratijānīhi viṣṇubhakto na naśyati // GarP_1,227.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15171: dharmārthakāmaḥ kiṃ tasya muktistasya kare sthitā /
GP12garup1_u:15172: samastajagatāṃ mūlaṃ yasya bhaktiḥ sthirā harau // GarP_1,227.28 //
GP12garup1_u:15174: tameva ye prapadyante māyāmetāṃ taranti te // GarP_1,227.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15178: toṣameti mahātmāsau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,227.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15181: patreṣu puṣpeṣu phaleṣu toyeṣvakaṣṭalabhyeṣu sadaiva satsu /
GP12garup1_u:15182: bhaktyaikalabhye puruṣe purāṇe muktyaikalābhe kriyate prayatnaḥ //
GP12garup1_u:15184: vaiṣṇavosmatkule jātaḥ sa naḥ santārayiṣyati // GarP_1,227.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15186: muktiṃ gatāḥ smaraṇamātravidhūtapāpāḥ kaḥ saṃśayaḥ paramabhaktimatāṃ janānām // GarP_1,227.35
GP12garup1_u:15188: te 'pi mṛtyumatikramya yānti tadvaiṣṇavaṃ padam // GarP_1,227.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15193: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhagavadbhaktivivaraṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15197: yo namet sarvalokasya namasyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,228.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15199: praṇamāmi sadā bhaktyā cetasā hṛdayālayam // GarP_1,228.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15201: taṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ namasye parameśvaram // GarP_1,228.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15205: eko hi bhāvaguṇamātradṛḍhapraṇāmaḥ sadyaḥ śvapākamapi sādhayituṃ saśaktaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15207: sa yāṃ gatimavāpnoti na tāṃ kratuśatairapi // GarP_1,228.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15209: ekaḥ kṛṣṇe namaskāro muktyā tāṃstārayiṣyati // GarP_1,228.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15210: āsīno vā śayāno vātiṣṭhan vā yatra tatra vā /
GP12garup1_u:15213: tathāpi narake mūḍhāḥ patantīti kimadbhutam // GarP_1,228.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15214: caturmukho vā yadi koṭivaktro bhavennaraḥ kopi viśuddhacetāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15215: sa vai guṇānāmayutaikadeśaṃ vadenna vā devavarasya viṣṇoḥ // GarP_1,228.10
GP12garup1_u:15219: pumān vimucyate sadyaḥ siṃhatrasto mṛgā yathā /
GP12garup1_u:15220: baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati // GarP_1,228.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15221: svapne 'pi nāma spṛśato 'pi puṃsaḥ kṣayaṃ karotyakṣayapāparāśim /
GP12garup1_u:15222: pratyakṣataḥ kiṃ punaratra puṃsā prakīrtite nāmni janārdanasya //
GP12garup1_u:15231: kṛṣṇeti vaiṣṇavaṃ kṣāntaṃ japtvā mukto bhavennaraḥ // GarP_1,228.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15233: yadāpnoti tadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃsmṛtyakeśavam // GarP_1,228.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15235: saṃsārasāgaraṃ tīrtvā sa gacchedvaiṣṇavaṃ padam // GarP_1,228.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15237: spapnāntare na hi punaśca bhavaṃ sa paśyennārāyaṇastutikathāparamo manuṣyaḥ // GarP_1,228.20
GP12garup1_u:15238: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇubhaktivivaraṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:15242: dadyātu puruṣasūkteṇa yaḥ puṣpāṇyapa eva ca // GarP_1,229.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15244: yo na pūjayate viṣṇuṃ taṃ vidyādbrahmaghātakam // GarP_1,229.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15246: taṃ yo na dhyāyate viṣṇuṃ sa viṣṭhāyāṃ krimirbhavet // GarP_1,229.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15248: kintvayā nārcito devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ // GarP_1,229.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15250: yo dadāti svakaṃ lokaṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na cārcitaḥ // GarP_1,229.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15251: na tatkaroti sā mātā na pitā nāpi bāndhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15256: toṣameti mahātmāsau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,229.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15259: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjānirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonatriśaduttaradviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:15262: ālokya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15263: idamekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā // GarP_1,230.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15264: kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kintīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kimadhvaraiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15265: yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇamananyadhīḥ // GarP_1,230.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15271: prāyaścittantu tasyaikaṃ hareḥ saṃsmaraṇaṃ param // GarP_1,230.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15275: yā kācinmanaso vṛttiḥ sā bhavatyacyutāśrayāt // GarP_1,230.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15277: bhuñjañjāgracca govindaṃ mādhavaṃ yaśca saṃsmaret // GarP_1,230.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15280: dhyānameva paro dharmo dhyānameva paraṃ tapaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15281: dhyānameva paraṃ śaucaṃ tasmāddhyānaparo bhavet // GarP_1,230.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15282: nāsti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ dhtheyaṃ tapo nānaśanātparam /
GP12garup1_u:15284: yaddurlabhaṃ paraṃ prāpyaṃ manaso yanna gocaram /
GP12garup1_u:15287: smaraṇādeva tadviṣṇoḥ saṃpūrṇaṃ syāditi śrutiḥ // GarP_1,230.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15291: prāpnoti yogī yogāgnidagdhakarmā ca yo 'cirāt // GarP_1,230.15 //
GP12garup1_u:15293: tathā cittasthite viṣṇau yoginā sarvakilbiṣam // GarP_1,230.16 //
GP12garup1_u:15295: saṃpluṣṭo vāsudevena manuṣyāṇāṃ sadā malaḥ // GarP_1,230.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15297: yatpāpaṃ nilayayāti smṛte naśyati taddharau // GarP_1,230.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15301: na krāmenmānasaṃ tasya yasya cetasi keśavaḥ // GarP_1,230.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15302: sā tithistadahorātraṃ sa yogaḥ sa ca candramāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15303: lagnaṃ tadeva vikhyātaṃ yatra saṃsmaryate hariḥ // GarP_1,230.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15305: canmuhūrtaṃ kṣaṇo vāpi vāsudevo na cintyate // GarP_1,230.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15306: kalau kṛta yugaṃ tasya kalistasya kṛte yuge /
GP12garup1_u:15307: hṛdi no yasya govindo yasya cetasi nācyutaḥ // GarP_1,230.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15309: govinde niyataṃ cetaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ sadaiva saḥ // GarP_1,230.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15312: asaṃtyajya ca gārhasthayaṃ sa taptvā ca mahattapaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15314: kṣamāṃ kurvanti kruddheṣu dayāṃ mūrkheṣu mānavāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15321: ūrdhvā hyeva gatiścāsti kiṃ punarjñānināṃ nṛṇām // GarP_1,230.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15323: narakadvāraśamanī sā kimarthaṃ na sevyate // GarP_1,230.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15324: na ca durvāsasaḥ śāpo rājyañcāpi śacīpateḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15325: hantuṃ samarthaṃ hi sakhe hṛtkṛte madhusūdane // GarP_1,230.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15327: nāpayāti yadā cintā siddhāṃ manyeta dhāraṇām // GarP_1,230.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15330: na hi dhyānena sadṛśaṃ pavitramiha vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:15331: śvapacānnāni bhuñjāno pāpī naivātra lipyate // GarP_1,230.35 //
GP12garup1_u:15333: yadi nārāyaṇe 'pyevaṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,230.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15335: viṣṇubhaktiryasya citte kaṃ vā jīvo nametsadā /
GP12garup1_u:15336: sa tārayati cātmānaṃ tadaiva duritārṇavāt // GarP_1,230.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15337: tañjñānaṃ yatra govindaḥ sā kathā yatra kāśavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15339: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti taccittaṃ yattadarpitam /
GP12garup1_u:15340: tāveva kevalau ślāghyau yau tatpūjākarau karau // GarP_1,230.39 //
GP12garup1_u:15341: praṇāmamīśasya śiraḥ phalaṃ vidustadarcanaṃ pāṇiphalaṃ divaukasaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15342: manaḥ phalaṃ tadguṇakarmacintanaṃ vacastu govindaguṇastutiḥ phalam //
GP12garup1_u:15346: sarvaṃ nārāyaṇe nyasya kurvannapi na limpati // GarP_1,230.42 //
GP12garup1_u:15348: carācaraṃ jagatsarvaṃ prasuptaṃ māyayā tava // GarP_1,230.43 //
GP12garup1_u:15349: yasminnyastamatirna yāti narakaṃ svargo 'pi yaccintane vighno yatra navā viśetkathamapi brāhmo 'piloko 'lpakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15350: muktiñcetasi saṃsthito jaḍadhiyāṃ puṃsāṃ dadātyavyayaḥ kiñcitraṃ yadayaṃ prayāti vilayaṃ tatrācyute kīrtite // GarP_1,230.44 //
GP12garup1_u:15352: gantuṃ duḥ khodadheḥ kuryurye ca tatra naranti te // GarP_1,230.45 //
GP12garup1_u:15353: rāṣṭrasya śaraṇaṃ rājā pitaro bālakasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:15354: dharmaśca sarvamartyānāṃ sarvasya śaraṇaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,230.46 //
GP12garup1_u:15356: na yebhyo vidyate tīrthamadhikaṃ munisattam // GarP_1,230.47 //
GP12garup1_u:15359: śūdraṃ vā bhagavadbhaktaṃ niṣādaṃ śvapacaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:15360: dvijajāti samaṃmanyo na yāti narakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,230.49 //
GP12garup1_u:15362: tathā viśvasya kartāraṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,230.50 //
GP12garup1_u:15371: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇumahātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma triṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15375: pūrvaṃ mātṛgaṇāḥ sarve śaṅkaraṃ vākyamabruvan // GarP_1,231.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15379: bhavatībhiḥ prajāḥ sarvā rakṣaṇīyā na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15383: trailokye bhakṣyamāṇe tu tadā mātṛgaṇena vai /
GP12garup1_u:15394: yādṛśena rūpeṇa dhyāto rudraistu bhaktitaḥ // GarP_1,231.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15396: praṇipatya tu deveśaṃ tadā tuṣṭāva śaṅkaraḥ // GarP_1,231.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15412: andhakasya vināśāya yā sṛṣṭā mātaro mayā /
GP12garup1_u:15413: anādṛtya tu madvākyaṃ bhakṣyantvadbhutāḥ prajāḥ // GarP_1,231.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15415: pūrvaṃ kṛtvā kathaṃ tāsāṃ vināśamabhirocaye // GarP_1,231.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15419: saṃhṛtya jagataḥ śarma kṛtvā cāntardadhe hariḥ // GarP_1,231.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15423: anādimadhyāntamaja purāṇaṃ parāpareśaṃ jagatāṃ nidhānam // GarP_1,231.23
GP12garup1_u:15425: samātṛvargasya karoti mūrtiṃ yadā tadā tiṣṭhati tatsamīpe // GarP_1,231.24
GP12garup1_u:15427: prasādya taṃ devavaraṃ sa labdhvā avyājjaganmātṛgaṇebhya eva ca //
GP12garup1_u:15428: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nṛsiṃhastotraṃ nāmaikatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:15432: pṛṣṭaḥ śrīnāradenaiva nāradāya tathā śṛṇu // GarP_1,232.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15434: yaḥ saṃkāre sadā dvandvaiḥ kāmakrodhaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15439: uvāca tamṛṣiṃ śambhuḥ prasannavadano haraḥ // GarP_1,232.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15442: vakṣyāmi śṛṇu duḥ khaghnaṃ bhavabandhabhayāmaham // GarP_1,232.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15444: carācaraṃ jagatsarvaṃ prasuptaṃ yasya māyayā // GarP_1,232.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15446: sa nistarati saṃsāraṃ devānāmapi dustaram // GarP_1,232.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15449: sarva ekārṇave magnā jīrṇā vanagajā iva /
GP12garup1_u:15458: acalaṃ sarvagaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15460: vāsudevaṃ guruṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15466: yogibhiḥ sevitaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.16 //
GP12garup1_u:15468: stutvaivaṃ varadaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15473: nāradena purā pṛṣṭa evaṃ sa vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15474: yettena tasmai vyākhyātaṃ tanmayā kathitaṃ tava // GarP_1,232.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15476: avāpsyasi dhruvaṃ tāta ! śāśvataṃ padamavyayam // GarP_1,232.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15480: sa viṣṇuṃ samyagārādhya siddhaḥ padamavāptavān // GarP_1,232.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15484: prayatnādyaḥ paṭhennitya mamṛtatvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_1,232.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15485: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe kulāmṛtastotraṃ nāma dvātriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:15490: dāmodaraṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15492: adho 'kṣajaṃ prapannosmi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15494: mādhavaṃ ca prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15496: lokanāthaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15498: mahāyogaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15500: viśvarūpaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mūtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15507: idaṃ yaḥ paṭhate bhaktyā trikālaṃ niyataṃ śuciḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15510: vicintya sūryādatirājamānaṃ mṛtyuṃ sa yogi jitavāṃstathaiva //
GP12garup1_u:15511: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe mārkaṇḍeyakṛtaṃ mṛtyvaṣṭakastotraṃ nāma trayastriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:15515: brahmā pṛṣṭo nāradāya yathovāca tathā param // GarP_1,234.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15518: pratyahaṃ cārcanākāle tathā tvaṃ vaktumarhasi // GarP_1,234.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15520: saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ teṣāṃ ye stuvanti sadācyutam // GarP_1,234.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15523: śṛṇu yena stutaḥ samyak pūjākāle prasīdati // GarP_1,234.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15535: namaḥ śivāya sūkṣmāya purāṇāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,234.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15555: jaya vedāntavidvedya jaya sarvada mādhava // GarP_1,234.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15557: jaya sūkṣma cidāndana jaya cittanirañjana // GarP_1,234.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15559: jaya nātha jagatpuṣṭa (tpūjya) jaya viṣṇo namo 'stūte // GarP_1,234.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15564: tvaṃ prabho chalabhṛdrāmastvaṃ punaḥ sa kharāntakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15567: tvaṃ suparṇastathā cakraṃ tvaṃ gadā śaṅkha eva ca // GarP_1,234.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15568: tvaṃ śrīḥ prabho tvaṃ muṣṭisatvaṃ tvaṃ mālā deva śāvatī /
GP12garup1_u:15569: śrīvatsaḥ kaustubhastvaṃ hi śārṅgo tvaṃ ca tatheṣudhiḥ // GarP_1,234.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15570: tvaṃ khaḍgacarmaṇā sārdhaṃ tvaṃ dikpālāstathā prabho /
GP12garup1_u:15571: tvaṃ vedhāstvaṃ vidhātā ca tvaṃ yamastvaṃ hutāśanaḥ // GarP_1,234.28 //
GP12garup1_u:15573: tvaṃ rakṣo 'dhipatiḥ sādhyastvaṃ vāyustvaṃ niśākaraḥ // GarP_1,234.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15574: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau tvaṃ marudgaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15575: tvaṃ daityā dānavā nāgāstvaṃ yakṣā rākṣasāḥ khagāḥ // GarP_1,234.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15577: bhūtāni viṣayastvaṃ hi tvamavyaktendriyāṇi ca // GarP_1,234.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15580: tvaṃ vedī tvaṃ hare dīkṣā tvaṃ yūpastvaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15581: tvaṃ patnī tvaṃ puroḍāśastvaṃ śālā strukca tvaṃ stuvaḥ // GarP_1,234.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15582: grāvāṇaḥ sakalaṃ tvaṃ hi sadasyāstvaṃ sadākṣiṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15583: tvaṃ sūrpādistvaṃ ca brahmā musalolūkhale dhruvam // GarP_1,234.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15584: tvaṃ hotā yajamānastvaṃ tvaṃ dhānyaṃ paśuyājakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15589: tava rūpamidaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭyarthaṃ saṃprakāśitam // GarP_1,234.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15603: kṣantumarhasi tatsarvaṃ yatkṛtaṃ na kṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_1,234.44 //
GP12garup1_u:15604: na śaknomi vibho samyakkartuṃ pūjāṃ yathoditām /
GP12garup1_u:15607: divā rātrau ca sandhyāyāṃ sarvāvasthāsu ceṣṭataḥ // GarP_1,234.46 //
GP12garup1_u:15609: śarire na (ṇa) tathā prītirna ca dharmādikeṣu ca // GarP_1,234.47 //
GP12garup1_u:15611: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ karma svargamokṣādisādhanam // GarP_1,234.48 //
GP12garup1_u:15613: pūjāṃ kartuṃ tathā stotraṃ kaḥ śaknoti tavācyuta // GarP_1,234.49 //
GP12garup1_u:15614: stutaṃ tu pūjitaṃ me 'dya tatkṣamasva namo 'stu te /
GP12garup1_u:15616: stauhi viṣṇuṃ mune bhaktyā yadīcchasi paraṃ padam // GarP_1,234.50 //
GP12garup1_u:15617: stotreṇānena yaḥ stauti pūjākāle jagadghurum // GarP_1,234.51 //
GP12garup1_u:15619: anyo 'pi yo japedbhaktyā trisandhyaṃ niyataḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,234.52 //
GP12garup1_u:15621: putrārtho labhate putrānbaddho mucyate bandhanāt // GarP_1,234.53 //
GP12garup1_u:15623: vidyārtho labhate vidyāṃ bhagyaṃ kīrti ca vindati // GarP_1,234.54 //
GP12garup1_u:15625: sa dhanyaḥ sarvavitprājñaḥsa sādhuḥ sarvakarmakṛt // GarP_1,234.55 //
GP12garup1_u:15627: asaṃbhāṣyā hi te sarve sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtāḥ // GarP_1,234.56 //
GP12garup1_u:15629: na śuddhaṃ vidyate tasya mano vākca durātmanaḥ // GarP_1,234.57 //
GP12garup1_u:15635: sakalamunibhirādyaścintyate yo hi śuddho nikhilahṛdi niviṣṭo vetti yaḥ sarvasākṣī /
GP12garup1_u:15636: tamajamamṛtamīśaṃ vāsudevaṃ nato 'smi bhayamaraṇavihīnaṃ nityamānandarūpam // GarP_1,234.60
GP12garup1_u:15637: nikhilabhuvana nāthaṃ śāśvataṃ suprasannaṃ tvativimalaviśuddhaṃ nirguṇaṃ bhavapuṣpaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15638: sukhamuditasamastaṃ pūjayāmyātmabhāvaṃ viśatu hṛdayapadme sarvasākṣī cidātmā // GarP_1,234.61
GP12garup1_u:15642: sañcintya viṣṇuṃ paramadvitīyaṃ kastatra yogī na laṃya prayāti //
GP12garup1_u:15643: imaṃ stavaṃ yaḥ satataṃ manuṣyaḥ paṭhecca tadvatprayataḥ praśāntaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15644: sa dhūtapāpmā vitataprabhāvaḥ prayāti lokaṃ vitataṃ murāreḥ //
GP12garup1_u:15645: yaḥ prārthayatyarthamaśeṣasaukhyaṃ dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca tathaiva mokṣam /
GP12garup1_u:15646: sa sarvamutsṛjya paraṃ purāṇaṃ prayāti viṣṇuṃ śaraṇaṃ vareṇyam //
GP12garup1_u:15648: yo vāsudevaṃ vimalaṃ prapannaḥ sa mokṣamāpnoti vimuktasaṅgaḥ //
GP12garup1_u:15649: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe
GP12garup1_u:15653: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirviṣṇurityeva cintayan // GarP_1,235.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15654: sūrye hṛdvyomni vahnau ca jyotirekaṃ tridhā sthitam /
GP12garup1_u:15655: yathā sarpiḥ śīrasthaṃ gavāṃ na kurute balam // GarP_1,235.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15656: nirgataṃ karmasaṃyuktaṃ dattaṃ tāsāṃ mahā balam /
GP12garup1_u:15657: tathā viṣṇuḥ śarīrastho na karoti hitaṃ naṇām // GarP_1,235.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15662: lobho mohaḥ krodha etairyuktaḥ pāpaṃ naraścaret /
GP12garup1_u:15664: etatsusaṃyataṃ yasya sa vipraḥ kathyate budhaiḥ (dhaḥ) /
GP12garup1_u:15665: paravittaṃ na gṛhṇāti na hiṃsāṃ kurute tathā // GarP_1,235.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15669: satyaṃ hitaṃ mitaṃ brūte yasmādvāktasya saṃyatā // GarP_1,235.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15673: bhruvormadhye sthitāṃ buddhiṃ viṣayeṣu yunakti yaḥ // GarP_1,235.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15677: hṛdi sthitaḥ sa tamasā mohito na smaratyapi /
GP12garup1_u:15678: yadā tasya kuto veti suṣuptiriti kathyate // GarP_1,235.14 //
GP12garup1_u:15679: jāgrato yasya no tandrā na moho na bhramastathā /
GP12garup1_u:15682: buddhyāhaṅkāramapi ca prakṛtyā buddhimeva ca // GarP_1,235.16 //
GP12garup1_u:15683: saṃyamya prakṛtiṃ cāpi cicchaktyā kevale sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15688: puryaṣṭakasya padmasya patrāṇyaṣṭau ca tāni hi // GarP_1,235.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15690: karṇikāyāṃ sthito devo dehī cidrūpa eva hi // GarP_1,235.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15692: yadā yāti tadā jīvo yāti muktiṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,235.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15694: dhyānaṃ samādhirityete ṣaḍ yogasya prasādhakāḥ // GarP_1,235.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15698: madhyo dvādaśamātrastu oṅkāraṃ satataṃ japet // GarP_1,235.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15699: vācake praṇave jñāte vācyaṃ brahma prasīdati /
GP12garup1_u:15704: sahasā saha buddhyā ca pratyāhāreṣu saṃsthitaḥ // GarP_1,235.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15707: tasyaiva brahmaṇā proktaṃ dhyānaṃ dvādaśa dhāraṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15708: tuṣyeta niyato yuktaḥ samādhiḥ so 'bhīdhīyate // GarP_1,235.28*1 //
GP12garup1_u:15709: dhyāyanna calate yasya manobhidhyāyato bhṛśam // GarP_1,235.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15711: dhyeye saktaṃ mano yasya dhyeyamevānupaśyati // GarP_1,235.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15713: dhyeye mano niścalatāṃ yāti dhyeyaṃ vicintayan // GarP_1,235.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15715: dhyeyameva hi sarvatra dhyātā tanmayatāṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,235.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15723: sthityarthaṃ manasaḥ sarvaṃ sthūlarūpaṃ vicintayet // GarP_1,235.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15725: na vinā paramātmānaṃ kiñcijjagati vidyate // GarP_1,235.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15727: oṅkāraṃ paramaṃ brahma dhyāyedabjasthitaṃ vibhum // GarP_1,235.38 //
GP12garup1_u:15729: hṛdi sañcintayetpūrvaṃ pradhānaṃ tasya copari // GarP_1,235.39 //
GP12garup1_u:15733: jñānaṃ tu karṇikā tatra vijñānaṃ kesarāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,235.41 //
GP12garup1_u:15735: karṇikāyāṃ sthitaṃ tatra jīvavanniścalaṃ vibhu // GarP_1,235.42 //
GP12garup1_u:15738: hariṃ saṃsthāpya dehābje dhyāyanyo gī ca bhaktibhāk /
GP12garup1_u:15743: jitendriyātmakaraṇo jñānadṛpto hi yo bhavet // GarP_1,235.46 //
GP12garup1_u:15749: sarvabhūteṣu kāruṇyaṃ vidveṣaṃ viṣayeṣu ca // GarP_1,235.49 //
GP12garup1_u:15751: indriyairindriyārthāṃstu na jānāti naro yadā // GarP_1,235.50 //
GP12garup1_u:15753: sarvavarṇāḥ śriyaḥ sarvāḥ kṛtvā pāpāni bhasmasāt // GarP_1,235.51 //
GP12garup1_u:15754: dhyānāgninā ca medhāvī labhate paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:15761: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmavijñānasvarūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15771: atraivāntargataṃ sarvaṃ śāśvate nādvaye pade // GarP_1,236.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15775: so 'hamasmīti mokṣāya nānyaḥ panthā vimuktaye // GarP_1,236.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15776: śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ dhyānaṃ jñānānāṃ caiva sādhanam /
GP12garup1_u:15779: dvividhaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca // GarP_1,236.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15786: yadā sarve vimucyante kāmā yesyahṛdi sthitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15788: vyāpakatvātkathaṃ yāti ko yāti kva sa yāti ca /
GP12garup1_u:15795: yathā te priyātmā naḥ sarveṣāṃ ca tathā priyaḥ // GarP_1,236.16 //
GP12garup1_u:15796: bodhamārge yathā cittaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca tathā mate /
GP12garup1_u:15797: sarvadā sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvasya ca mahāmune // GarP_1,236.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15799: jāgratsvapnaṃ tathā vṛttaṃ sauṣuptasukhameva ca // GarP_1,236.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15801: satyamastu tathā vāṇu aśarīraṃ paraṃ tathā // GarP_1,236.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15802: nāsti cetsukhaduḥ khānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vedanaṃ katham /
GP12garup1_u:15803: sadā sarvatra sarvajñaḥ sarvasya hṛdaye na yet // GarP_1,236.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15805: satya jñānānanta bhinnaṃ syānnasatyaṃ jñānataḥ pṛthak // GarP_1,236.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15808: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ tattvaṃ jñātvā tvakhilavidbhavet /
GP12garup1_u:15818: tathā hi rajjururagaḥ śuktiḥ kārajataṃ yathā /
GP12garup1_u:15827: ekaḥ satyaṃ tathā bhāgī vicāreṇa paraṃ mṛṣā // GarP_1,236.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15829: māyecchayā dvidhā sa syātpatiḥ patnī sukhaṃ jagat // GarP_1,236.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15835: yathā rathādayaḥ svapne santo naiva ca satyataḥ // GarP_1,236.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15836: tathā jāgradavasthāyāṃ bhūtāni na tu sannidhau /
GP12garup1_u:15837: dvairūpyaṃ māyayā yāti jāgratsvapnapadajña (kṣa) yoḥ // GarP_1,236.37 //
