GP12garup1_u:15847: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ātmajñānasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15859: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśo ca kṣetrajñastāni paśyanti // GarP_1,237.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15860: yadā prakāśate hyātmā paṭe dīpo jvalanniva /
GP12garup1_u:15868: ahaṃ kāraṃ tathā buddhau buddhiṃ ca prakṛtāvapi /
GP12garup1_u:15869: prakṛtiṃ puruṣe sthāpya puruṣaṃ brahmaṇi nyaset // GarP_1,237.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15870: ahaṃ bahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prasaṃkhyāya vimucyate /
GP12garup1_u:15872: kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitaṃ vidvānyo veda sa varaḥ kaviḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15874: jñānayajñasya sarvāṇi kalāṃ nārhanti ṣocśīm // GarP_1,237.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15875: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīmadbhagavadgītāsāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:15882: karmaṇā manasā vācā sarvabhūteṣu sarvadā // GarP_1,238.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15884: vidhinā yā bhaveddhiṃsā sā tvahiṃsā prakīrtitā // GarP_1,238.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15886: priyaṃ ca nānṛtaṃ brūyādeṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,238.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15901: āsanaṃ svastikaṃ proktaṃ padmamardhāsanaṃ tathā // GarP_1,238.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15909: padadvayārthau dvividhau vācyau lakṣyau smatau budhaiḥ // GarP_1,239.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15923: aikyajñānaṃ tu hi bhavedvedāntāddūrato dhruvam // GarP_1,239.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15925: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmagītāsāravarṇanaṃ nāmaikonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:15928: sannapi brahma tasmātkhaṃ marutkhācca tato 'nalaḥ // GarP_1,239.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15930: tataḥ saptadaśaṃ liṅgaṃ pañcakarmendriyāṇi ca // GarP_1,239.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15932: śrotraṃ tvakcakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇaṃ syātpañca vāyavaḥ // GarP_1,239.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15934: manontaḥ karaṇaṃ dhīśca syānmanaḥ saṃśayātmakam // GarP_1,239.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15940: pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni tatkāryaṃ tatsthameva ca // GarP_1,239.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15942: tridhāhri paramātmasthaṃ śarīraṃ procyate budhaiḥ // GarP_1,239.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15946: jāgratsvapnasuṣuptīnāṃ sākṣī jīvaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,239.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15962: yathā mṛdo ghaṭo bhinno nāsti tatkāryatastathā // GarP_1,239.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15966: pṛthvyādhāraṃ vinā nāsti vinā nāsti ca tena sā // GarP_1,239.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15967: tejaśca vāyunā nāsti vāyuḥ khena vinā na hi /
GP12garup1_u:15968: yadbrahmaṇā ca khaṃ nāsti śuddha brahma vinā ca kham // GarP_1,239.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15972: tattvaṃpadāntau śiṣṭau ca tatkāro brahmavācakaḥ // GarP_1,239.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15976: satyaṃ jñānamanataṃ hi tvamasīti śrutīritam // GarP_1,239.25 //
GP12garup1_u:15979: gītāsāror'junāyokto yena brahmaṇi vai layaḥ // GarP_1,239.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15980: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe brahmagītāsāro nāmekonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo
GP12garup1_u:15983: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ rudra proktaṃ sāraṃ mayātava /
GP12garup1_u:15986: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādrudra sarvavitsa divaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,240.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15988: iti vyāsa mayā viṣṇoḥ purāṇaṃ muktidaṃ śrutam /
GP12garup1_u:15992: mayāpi tubhyaṃ sūtena purāṇaṃ kathitaṃ param // GarP_1,240.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15994: viṣṇuḥ sāratamaṃprāha garuḍaṃ gāruḍaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,240.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15997: śaunaka pravaraṃ proktaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava // GarP_1,240.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15999: vyāsaḥ śrutvā brahmaṇaśca purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham /
GP12garup1_u:16001: aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni tāni māṃ prāha vai śukaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16002: idaṃ tu gāruḍaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mayā te śaunakeritam // GarP_1,240.8 //
GP12garup1_u:16010: kṣattriyo kṣattriyasyāpi rakṣitā bhavatīha ca // GarP_1,240.12 //
GP12garup1_u:16013: anyasmai ca vadedvidvān brāhmaṇontarito ya di /
GP12garup1_u:16014: brāhmaṇāntaritai sarvaiḥ śrotavyaṃ gāruḍaṃ tvidama // GarP_1,240.14 //
GP12garup1_u:16016: gāruḍaṃ vasurājaśca śrutvā sarvamavāpa ha // GarP_1,240.15 //
GP12garup1_u:16026: na khādyau tau tvayānīcau caturbhujau ca pakṣipa? /
GP12garup1_u:16031: śākhā bhinnā tvayā yatra vālakhilyāḥ samāsthitāḥ // GarP_1,240.22 //
GP12garup1_u:16034: tvayā jitā raṇe devāḥ sarve śakrapurogamāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16035: āhṛtaṃ tatpurā somaṃ vāhniṃ nirvāpya kāśyape // GarP_1,240.24 //
GP12garup1_u:16036: nāgau dṛṣṭiviṣau kṛtvā rajasā tu vicakṣuṣau /
GP12garup1_u:16037: tīkṣṇāgreṇa na sā bhaṅktvāvikravetau manohataḥ? // GarP_1,240.25 //
GP12garup1_u:16038: āhṛtyāpi tvayā somaṃ nītameva na bhaktitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16039: tena viṣṇordhvajasthānaṃ vāhanatvaṃ gato hyasi // GarP_1,240.26 //
GP12garup1_u:16040: tvayā niḥ kṣipya darbheṣu somaṃ nāgāśca vañcitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16041: jahāra cāmṛtaṃ pātraṃ śīghraṃ vai brahmasūdana // GarP_1,240.27 //
GP12garup1_u:16043: vinatā mocitā dāsyātkadvā pūrvajitā raṇe // GarP_1,240.28 //
GP12garup1_u:16044: uccaiḥ śravāḥ sa kiṃvarṇaḥ śukla ityeva bhāṣate /
GP12garup1_u:16048: tasya pakṣasya devendro yadānītaṃ hi dṛṣṭavān /
GP12garup1_u:16049: tadā tava suparṇoti nāma sthānaṃ jagattraye // GarP_1,240.31 //
GP12garup1_u:16055: taduktaṃ gāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16058: yasyedaṃ vartate geha tasya sarvaṃ bhavediha // GarP_1,240.35 //
GP12garup1_u:16059: gāruḍaṃ yasya haste tu tasya hastagato nayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16062: putrārtho labhate putrān kāmārtho kāmamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.37 //
GP12garup1_u:16063: vidyārtho labhate vidyāṃ jayārtho labhate jayam /
GP12garup1_u:16065: vandhyāpi labhate puttraṃ kanyā vindati satpatim /
GP12garup1_u:16066: kṣemārtho labhate kṣemaṃ bogārtho bogamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.39 //
GP12garup1_u:16068: kāvyārtho ca kavitvaṃ ca sārārtho sāramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.40 //
GP12garup1_u:16070: idaṃ svastyayanaṃ dhanyaṃ gāruḍaṃ garuḍeritam // GarP_1,240.41 //
GP12garup1_u:16071: nākāle maraṇaṃ tasya ślokamekaṃ tu yaḥ paṭhet /
GP12garup1_u:16075: oṃ iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe garuḍapurāṇamāhātmyaṃ nāma catvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
